original: GREETING
translation: 问好

original: The teddy bear Lobotomite returns... my teddy bear. How can I assist in relieving your curiosity?
translation: 泰迪熊无脑人回来了…我的泰迪熊。我要做什么才能帮着你减轻好奇心呢？

original: -The Lobotomite who SAVED us! Hello.-
translation: -是救了我们的那个无脑人！ 你好啊。-

original: *So was Mobius as twisted as he looked in person? Can't believe you entered the Forbidden Zone and lived. None of us can.*
translation: *莫比乌斯是否真的有那么扭曲？我简直不敢相信你进入了禁区还能活着回来。我们之中没人能做到。*

original: *Any new research?*
translation: *有什么新的研究？*

original: THANK YOU FOR WHAT YOU HAVE DONE. THE HELPING, THAT IS. WE LIKE THAT.
translation: 谢谢你为我们做的事情。那份帮助，我们对此非常欣喜。

original: I FEEL AN ODD EMOTION... PLATITUDE? ATTITUDE? NO, WAIT. GRATITUDE, THAT'S IT.
translation: 我感受到一种奇怪的情感…单调？态度？不，等等。是感谢，对，就是它。

original: WE ARE LABORING AWAY SCIENTIFICALLY ON YOUR BEHALF. TOILLESS RESEARCHERS THAT IS WHAT WE ARE. TOIL. TOIL. TOIL.
translation: 我们一直在为你科学地工作。我们就是轻松快活的研究员。我们要继续辛勤工作，辛勤，辛勤，辛勤。

original: THE LOBOTOMITE RETURNS. OUR LOBOTOMITE. HAS DR. MOBIUS BEEN DENOMINATORED INTO SCRAP METAL AND VOICE MODULE PARTS AS WE HOPED?
translation: 无脑人回来了。我们的无脑人。莫比乌斯博士是否已经如我们所愿，碎成废金属和语音模组了呢？

original: -Klein AWAITS! As do we all.-
translation: -克莱因正等着！我们所有人都是。-

original: -The LOBOTOMITE animal before me! What other terrifying terrors will plague us in our quest for knowledge? Communists? Communist ANIMALS, perhaps?-
translation: -站在我面前的无脑人啊！在我们寻求知识的过程中，还有什么可怕的恐怖会困扰我们？共产主义者？也许是共产动物？-

original: -Be warned, attempt to propaganda ME, I will shriek as a frightened babe, calling loyal Cyberdogs to my aid. Do you comprehend, Commie animal?-
translation: -我警告你，别试图向我宣传什么，我将会像个惊恐的婴儿那样哭叫，呼叫忠诚的赛博犬来帮助我。明白了么，共产动物？-

original: -Thanks SO much for sparing Gabe - I know he's really QUITE killable, which is why I had to AUGMENT him.-
translation: -非常感谢你能饶了加布。我知道他真的很可能被杀死，这就是为什么我需要不断强化他。-

original: -But you needed NONE of that. You're QUITE elusive - or fleet-footed. More so than our old mailman - HE didn't get far before Gabe caught him.-
translation: -但是你不需要。你很难被抓住，或者说跑的非常快。甚至比我们以前的老邮差还快。他那时还没跑多远就被加布追上了。-

original: -SO - you put down Gabe. Thank you - a scamp, but really, his highly-augmented combat programming could have proved meddlesome.-
translation: -那么，你放倒了加布。谢谢你，他是个小混蛋，但是真的，加布那高度增强的战斗程序确实很不好对付。-

original: -In any event... thank you for putting him down. One LESS test subject to catalogue and sort - clearly a FAILURE of doggie cybo-engineering.-
translation: -不管怎么说…感谢你放倒了他。这样就少了一个要去编目和归类的实验体。显而易见，这是一个犬类机器化工程的失败品。-

original: -The LOBOTOMITE returns! What insidious plan can it have brewing in its horrid mind? What Commie anti-American propaganda will it spew?-
translation: -无脑人回来了！他可怕的脑袋里在酝酿着什么阴险的计划呢？又会进行什么反美共产宣传？-

original: Oh, I see you and your Brain reached a compromise. How pleasant.
translation: 啊，我发现你和你的大脑达成一致了。真是可喜可贺。

original: I hypothesize after the indignant frequencies my receptors had... recepted, such a partnership-based conclusion would be... low on the "likely" scale.
translation: 你大脑刚才发出的频率是如此愤愤不平，假设我的接收器接收到那样的频率，还能成为同伴的可能性…就很低了。

original: Mmm? Y... oh... hello there. Eh... you... are there, aren't you? Forgive my confusion, so hard to tell these days.
translation: 哈？伊…呃…你好啊。呃…你…在那里，不是吗？原谅我的混乱，这些单词老害我口胡。

original: You seem familiar, somehow. I'm guessing... eh... you're here for your brain, perhaps? It's just up there. Such a nice brain, young, very bright.
translation: 你看起来很眼熟，怎么说呢。我猜…呃…你来这，大概是为了你的大脑，是吗？它就在那边。多么棒的大脑，既年轻，又非常聪明。

original: A little hard to see you, can you walk into my left... er, right FOV cone? Ah, that's it, you're coming into focus nicely.
translation: 想看到你有点困难，能不能走到我的左…呃，你的右边？啊，就是那里，这下你的图像清晰多了。

original: Go on, go on! You've wasted enough of my valuable time.
translation: 继续，继续！你已经浪费我足够多的宝贵时间了。

original: Well? What are you waiting for? Get moving and leave me in peace.
translation: 好吧？你在等什么呢？赶快走，让我一个人静一静。

original: No time to waste! Go deal with the Think Tank!
translation: 没有时间给你浪费了！快去处理那些思想体！

original: Oh! Don't worry about me. We can talk more when we're both back at the Sink.
translation: 哦！不用担心我。我们都回到汇聚节点以后，可以接着聊。

original: <Bark.>
translation: <狗叫声>

original: Mmm... You took care of them brains pretty good, baby. Nice.
translation: 嗯…你好好关照过那堆大脑了嘛。宝贝。干得好。

original: I'm having the most peculiar feeling of déjà vu right now. That's French, for... eh... well, uh... déjà vu, I believe. Have we met before?
translation: 现在我有种非常奇特的Deja Vu的感觉。那是法语…呃…啊…“似曾相识”，应该是这个意思。我们以前见过么？

original: Always nice to see you, baby. Bring me any new plants from outside?
translation: 见到你总是令人高兴，宝贝儿。从外边给我带来了什么新植物么？

original: Ooh... oh yeah, baby, feels good to be on-line again! Yeah, all circuits on-line... ready to receive your seed.
translation: >哦…哦耶，宝贝儿，再次上线的感觉真好！耶，所有电路已连接…我准备好接受你的种子了。

original: You should really see Dr. Klein. We're all awaiting the results of your experiment.
translation: 你真应该去见见克莱因博士。我们都在等着你的实验结果。

original: You are an unusual specimen to so boldly... walk... into the mighty expanse of the Think Tank. Fearless and proud as a teddy bear.
translation: 你真是个独特的样本，如此大胆…居然敢走到…强大的思想体面前。像只泰迪熊一样无畏和骄傲。

original: Between the extraction of their higher reasoning abilities and urination-inducing fear, most Lobotomites dare not approach us. Let alone speak to us.
translation: 那些被抽离了理智，一害怕就到处排泄的无脑人，大多数都不敢靠近我们，更别说和我们说话了。

original: Yet you have no such fear, facing me, epidermis flushed with blood, plasma running molten beneath, your face contorting with... muscular expression.
translation: 但你站在我面前，没有丝毫害怕。哦，你的皮肤充满血色，血浆在底下滚滚流淌，你的脸受肌肉控制，产生各种表情。

original: Will you... indulge me? Say a... few words? Face towards the monitors, please... so that I might record it... for further examination.
translation: 你能…满足我吗？就说…几句话？对着我的监视器说，麻烦你了…那样我才能记录下来…然后更深入地研究。

original: And you return, as curious as a teddy bear. Are you stuck in a looping gesture of greeting?
translation: 你回来了，像泰迪熊一样好奇。你陷入了代表问好的循环姿势里吗？

original: *Klein's an impatient man, wouldn't keep him waiting.*
translation: *克莱因可是个没耐心的人，别让他等太久。*

original: *Breaking News: Talking Lobotomite arrives in Think Tank. Its purpose? Unknown. Undefinable. Its presence here? Unpossible.*
translation: *重大新闻：会讲话的无脑人抵达智库。它的目的？不清楚，无法理解。它在这里出现的可能性？不可能。*

original: WHAT ARE YOU DOING BACK? MOBIUS' THREATS PERSIST! WORSE, HE'S FILLING UP OUR TRANSMISSION STORAGE HOLOTAPE TO CAPACITY!
translation: 你回来做什么？莫比乌斯的威胁仍然存在！更糟糕的是，他要将我们存储广播磁带的空间占满了！

original: I THOUGHT I HEARD THE PACIFICATION FIELD KICK IN. ALL RIGHT, SHHH. NOBODY. MOVE. I'LL HANDLE THIS.
translation: 克莱因：我听着像是有人进入了平静场…没错，嘘。没人。都过来。我会处理这件事。

original: BE WARNED, INTRUDER! YOU ARE IN THE PRESENCE OF THE MIGHTY THINK TANK OF BIG MT, THE COLLECTIVE GENIUSES OF... WE...
translation: 克莱因：警告，入侵者！你正面对着强大的大山脉思想体，智慧的集合…我们…

original: ...BY OPPENHEIMER, WHICH ONE OF YOU SELF-PROFESSED GENIUSES HAS BEEN ADJUSTING MY VOLUME KNOB? WHO WAS IT?! WAS IT YOU, 8?
translation: 克莱因：…以奥本海默的名义！你们中哪个自认天才的家伙扭了我的音量旋钮？是谁？是你吗，8？

original: I'll see you at the Sink. Good luck.
translation: 我们在汇聚节点再见。祝你好运。

original: Ugh! It's bad enough the indignities you've put me through, must you continue to prattle on at me?
translation: 呸！你对我的无礼行为已经够过分了，你还要继续对我胡说八道么？

original: Nice to see you back. I trust the adventuring is going well.
translation: 很高兴看到你回来。我想探险一定非常顺利吧。

original: MOBIUS. ALWAYS THE SAME BROADCAST. HE'S CLEARLY MAD, DRIVEN INSANE BY HIS FLAWED AND IMPRECISE KINDERGARTEN-LEVEL RESEARCH METHODOLOGY.
translation: 克莱因：莫比乌斯。总是同样的广播。显而易见，他疯了，被他自己那漏洞百出的的幼稚园级的研究方法论给整疯了。

original: DID YOU RETRIEVE THE TECHNOLOGIES YET? WE NEED THEM, AS I HAVE INDICATED.
translation: 你把那些技术回收了吗？如我已经说明过的，我们需要这些技术。

original: LOBOTOMITE. DO YOU UNDERSTAND ME? CAN YOU SPEAK?
translation: 克莱因：无脑人。你能听懂我说什么吗？你能说话吗？

original: Look at the way the tongue rolls in its mouth like some sort of... mucousy muscled worm.
translation: 达拉：看它嘴里那舌头卷曲的样子，就像是…粘稠的，有肌肉组织的蠕虫。

original: Oh, it's you again. What do you want?
translation: 哦，又是你，你想要什么？

original: Well, well, look who finally dragged themselves in out of the Wasteland. And where have we been, hmm? Crawling through pits of radioactive muck again?
translation: 好吧，好吧，看来有人终于把自己从废土之外拽回到这里了。我们去过哪儿，嗯？屈身在充满辐射的泥潭里爬行？

original: Ah, the meat has returned. Lovely.
translation: 啊，肉肉回来了，真可爱。

original: YOU. LOBOTOMITE WHO UNDERSTANDS US. I AM DR. KLEIN. DO NOT BE FRIGHTENED. WE ARE BENEV... ER, MEAN YOU NO HARM.
translation: 克莱因：你，这只能明白我们在说什么的无脑人。我是克莱因博士。不要害怕。我们非常善良…呃，我是说不会伤害你。

original: -Our efforts have turned against us! In playing GOD, we created a MONSTER!-
translation: 鲍鲁斯：-这是报应！我们想要扮演上帝，最终制造了一头怪兽！-

original: Perhaps as we were ruthlessly lobotimizing it with our cutters, we filled this skinevelope with... awareness. A teddy bear with new stuffing.
translation: 达拉：也许我们用刀无情地切下它的大脑的时候，我们赋予这个皮壳子…意识。一个用新内容物填充的泰迪熊诞生了。

original: *Wait. If what you're theorizing is this Lobotomite understands us... can reason with us...*
translation: O：*停。就是说你认为这只无脑人能理解咱们…可以跟咱们理性地交流…*

original: THEN THIS MAY BE JUST THE ANSWER WE'VE BEEN LOOKING FOR. AT LAST, A CHANCE TO...
translation: 克莱因：那么这可能就是我们一直要找的答案。终于，是时候了…

original: OH, "DR. O," WAS IT? LIKELY STORY, O COULDN'T SPARK TWO NEURONS IF THEY WERE IN A LATTICE OF BIOMED GEL.
translation: 克莱因：哦，"O博士"，难道是你？有此可能，O没法同时触发生物凝胶罐子里的两个神经元。

original: *What? Me? Breaking news, Klein, it wasn't me - all right?! I am the robotical engineer, 8 is soundwaves, that's his "specialty."*
translation: O：*什么？你说我？真是爆炸性新闻，克莱因，那不是我，你懂么？我是个机器人工程师，8才是搞声波的，那是他的“专长”。*

original: *You always do this, you always demean me in front of guests! And it's not "O," all right, it's...!*
translation: O：*你总在做这样的事，你总是在客人面前掉我面子！而且那个不是“O”，好吧，它是…！*

original: ENOUGH! EITHER OF YOU DO IT AGAIN, IT'LL BE THE LAST TIME. NOW... NOW...
translation: 克莱因：够了！我不管你俩谁做的，记住没有下次了。现在…现在…

original: ...GREAT. NOW I FORGOT WHAT I WAS SAYING... WHAT WAS I TALKING ABOUT?
translation: 克莱因：…很好。现在我记不起刚刚要说什么了…我刚才在说什么来着？

original: -It's a LOBOTOMITE. Here! In the DOME!-
translation: 鲍鲁斯：-这有只无脑人。在这儿！在穹顶！-

original: OH, AS IF THIS SITUATION COULDN'T GET ANY WORSE, NOW WE'VE GOT LOBOTOMITES. DALA, GET THE SPRAY BEFORE IT EXCRETES ALL OVER EVERYTHING.
translation: 克莱因：哦，还能更糟吗，我们怎么和无脑人共处一室。达拉，在它到处排泄前把它处理掉。

original: -Dr. Klein! A TRANSMISSION from the FORBIDDEN Zone! Coming right at US!-
translation: 鲍鲁斯：-克莱因博士！是禁区的传讯！冲我们来的！-

original: IT CAN ONLY BE...
translation: 克莱因：这只可能是…

original: Dr. Klein... if my hypothesis is correct, this Lobotomite is the repository of the brain we sent the signal to - the skinvelope once containing it.
translation: 达拉：克莱因博士…我们曾给某个在外面的大脑发过信号，没猜错的话，这只无脑人就是存放那个大脑的容器，曾经是。

original: If so, it's proof that there may indeed be something beyond the Crater.
translation: 达拉：如果是这样，那这个环形坑外面的确存在着某些事物。

original: Just look at it... the way it blinks. It's like a big hairless teddy bear.
translation: 达拉：噢看看它…看它眨眼的方式。就像只大大的秃头泰迪熊。

original: I KNOW WHAT IT IS, DALA, I WANT TO KNOW WHY IT'S DOWN HERE. WITH ITS... ITS LIMBS ALL OVER EVERYTHING.
translation: 克莱因：我知道它是什么，达拉，我想知道它为何会在这。而且…它的肢体长得到处都是。

original: AND... ARE THOSE... PENISES I SEE WRIGGLING ON ITS FEET? DISGUSTING.
translation: 克莱因：还有…那些在它脚上扭曲蠕动的…是生殖器？好恶心…

original: I believe those are toes, Dr. Klein. Little teddy bear toes. Penises are much larger than those tiny extremities... Eh, not that I would know.
translation: 达拉：我认为那是脚趾，克莱因博士。小泰迪熊的脚趾。生殖器要比那些小玩意大很多…呃…不是，关于这些我什么都不知道。

original: *I don't recall the human penis ever being that large.*
translation: O：*我怎么不记得人类的生殖器有那么大。*

original: It depends on one's own frame of reference, Doctor O. Look at its little nose with its two orifices for ingesting oxygen.
translation: 达拉：这取决于每个人自己的参照系，O博士。啊快看它那个小鼻子，上面有两个吸氧的孔。

original: NOSES? BY THE GREAT STATIC, THESE LOBOTOMITES CONFOUND ME WITH THEIR SHEER NUMBER OF USELESS EXTREMITIES.
translation: 克莱因：鼻子？我的“大静电”啊，这些无脑人怎么有这么多没用的肢体。

original: -Dr. Klein! Look at it, its head movements, the primitive jelly eye-monitors!-
translation: 鲍鲁斯：-克莱因博士！看，它头部的动作，还有那原始的胶状眼部监视器！-

original: I agree with Borous' histrionic findings. This little Lobotomite is unusually attentive for something whose brain has been extracted.
translation: 达拉：我赞同鲍鲁斯博士那表演戏剧般的发言。这只无脑人作为一个大脑被移除的生物，注意力集中的很不寻常。

original: NONSENSE. LOBOTOMITES CAN'T COMPREHEND US.
translation: 克莱因：胡说八道。无脑人不可能理解我们。

original: *8, have you been in the Mentats again? If we slow down our auro-processo-receptors to understand this excretion, we'll all be rendered ignorant!*
translation: O：*8，你又在嗑曼他特？如果我们放慢高贵的接收器认真观察它的排泄行为，我们就太掉价了！*

original: ALL OF YOU, POWER DOWN, SHUT UP, AND LET ME PROVE ONCE AND FOR ALL HOW WRONG YOU ALL ARE. AS USUAL.
translation: 克莱因：所有人，关闭电源，闭嘴，让我彻底证明你们错的多么离谱。如以往一样。

original: If it isn't my old colleagues, the mighty "Think Tank" of Big MT. Big FOOLS, all of you.
translation: 这不是我的老同事吗，大山脉万能的思想体们，大笨蛋们。

original: You got some plants for me, don't you? Yeah, I can smell it all over you.
translation: 你给我带来了一些植物是吗？是的，我能从你身上闻出来。

original: Well, hello! Still waiting for that seed.
translation: 好吧，你好！我还在等着种子哪。

original: You're back! And the brains didn't lobotomize you! Well, not any worse, at least. Hooray!
translation: 你回来了！而且那些大脑们没把你的大脑切掉！呃，至少没有更坏。太好啦！

original: It was getting lonely without you here. Clean, eh, but lonely.
translation: 这里没有你会变得很寂寞。虽然会比较干净，呃，但是很寂寞。

original: Oh God, look at you! You're... filthy. I suppose you'll... want to clean up then?
translation: 哦上帝，看看你！你…太脏了。我想你会…想要清洗一下？

original: You've been working with that Biological Research Station, haven't you? I suppose you'll want to... clean up?
translation: 你刚刚跟生物研究站一起干过活，是吗？我想你会想要…清洗一下？

original: Between you and me, I think the Central Intelligence Unit is a bit of a snob.
translation: 私底下跟你说吧，中央智能单元就是个势利小人。

original: Why, you poor dear! Come over here and have a drink, wash off some of that... horrible, sticky... blood.
translation: 怎么了，你这可怜的家伙！快过来喝口水，冲掉那些…可怖、粘稠的血。

original: Well, hello there! Can I get you a drink?
translation: 哦，你好啊！要不要来口喝的？

original: I trust matters regarding your brain were resolved to your satisfaction?
translation: 我相信关于你大脑的问题已经圆满解决了？

original: If you're planning to stay a while, I could see clear to giving you a once-over.
translation: 如果你准备在这待一会，我可以帮你再检查一下。

original: Hmph... well how about that? Old Auto-Doc's back on-line. Well, all right, come here, let's have a look at you.
translation: 嗯啊…怎么样了？老自动医生重新开始工作。很好，对，过来，让我看看你的情况。

original: You require some additional services?
translation: 你需要些额外的服务吗？

original: You got yourself some serious hurts there, friend. Cracked patella, two bruised ribs, and if I ain't mistaken, your brain's missing.
translation: 你伤的很重啊，我的朋友。髌骨碎裂，两根肋骨挫伤。而且如果我没弄错，你的大脑也不见了。

original: Better climb in and let me have a look see.
translation: 你最好能进来，让我仔细检查检查。

original: You got yourself some serious hurts there, friend. Cracked patella, two bruised ribs, and if I ain't mistaken, your brain's recently been replaced.
translation: 你伤的很重啊，我的朋友。髌骨碎裂，两根肋骨挫伤。而且如果我没弄错，你的大脑不刚刚被换过。

original: Better climb in and let me have a look see.
translation: 你最好能进来，让我仔细检查检查。

original: Well, you ain't the fittest horse that ever ran a race, but you don't appear in immediate danger of keeling over. I can patch you up if you want.
translation: 好吧，你不算是最强健的，但也不会就这样倒下。只要你愿意，我就能治好你。

original: You are, without a doubt, the healthiest son of a bitch I've ever seen wandering the Big Empty. Ain't got no use for an old digital sawbones like me.
translation: 毫无疑问，你是我在大坑洞里见过最健康的家伙，就不需要我这把数字老骨头操心啦。

original: There now. As good as God ever made you. You just mind you keep that leg out of any radioactive waste, and rub liniment on it twice a day.
translation: 好了，你的腿现在跟新的一样好。你只要注意别靠近放射性废料，然后一天擦两次药就行。

original: I never trusted those Think Tank brains. Gave off a stench like ivory tower elitism. And brine.
translation: 我从来就不相信穹顶的那些脑子。他们总是散发出象牙塔精英主义的酸臭味。还有罐子里的盐水味。

original: Welcome home, Citizen! Find any seditious materials out there?
translation: 欢迎回家，公民！找到什么反动材料了吗？

original: Ah! Good day, Citizen! Library Processing Unit 232.7 is on-line and ready to eradicate sedition!
translation: 啊！日安，公民们！图书处理单元232.7已启动，随时准备铲除反动！

original: Greetings, Citizen! Ready to receive seditious materials!
translation: 向你致敬，公民！时刻准备着接收反动材料！

original: Might I be safe in the assumption that matters with the Think Tank have been satisfactorily concluded, vis-à-vis your residence in this domicile?
translation: 请恕我失礼，既然已圆满处理了与思想体的纠纷，您是否准备在此定居呢？

original: Will sir be staying for any considerable length of time during sir's visit?
translation: 老爷此次光临，不知是否要在此逗留一段时间呢？

original: Salutations and felicitations, sir, and a most jocund welcome to the Sink.
translation: 老爷，向您致以问候和祝贺，热烈欢迎您光临汇聚节点。

original: I am your electronic valet and household central processor. May I be of service, sir?
translation: 我是你的电子仆人和中央智能管家。需要我为你做什么，老爷？

original: Might I be of service, sir?
translation: 有什么可以帮到您，老爷？

original: Please, please, please tell me you stomped Dr. O's brain into a fine paste! Did he squeal? Did he beg? God, I hope he begged!
translation: 拜托，拜托，拜托告诉我，你把O博士的大脑踩成浆糊了没有！他嚎叫了么？哀求了么？哦上帝，我希望他哀求过！

original: Who's the flatware bitch now, O?!
translation: 现在他妈的谁是餐叉了，啊，O？！

original: I hate myself for asking this, but... did you bring me any new mugs?
translation: 我恨我自己会问这个，但是…你给我带来马克杯了么？

original: You! Hey, you! Yeah you! Got any mugs?
translation: 你！嘿，你！没错，就是说你！弄到小马克杯了么？

original: Oh please, please tell me you brought me some coffee cups!
translation: 哦，求你了，告诉我你给我带来了咖啡杯！

original: With the brains dealt with, soon we can spread our rule across the Mojave! All will eat burned toast and despair!
translation: 料理掉那些大脑后，用不了多久，我们就可以在整个莫哈维散布我们的规则了！所有人都要吃烤好的吐司，并感到绝望！

original: While you were away, my plans have marched steadily forward. Beware, Caesar! Beware, NCR! Soon will dawn the Age of the Toaster!
translation: 你不在时，我的计划正稳步展开。当心点，凯撒！当心点，NCR！我烤面包机的时代很快就要到来！

original: Ahahaha! I am on-line once again! Tremble, world, before my electric heating coil of doom!
translation: 啊哈哈哈！我再次启动了！世界将在我的末日般的电子加热线圈前颤抖！

original: Yes! Yes! Soon my work will be complete! Soon the world will burn in nuclear fire!
translation: 是的！是的！很快我的作品就要完成！不久世界就将在核爆的火焰中燃烧！

original: Got any more sweet, innocent little kitchen appliances for me?
translation: 有没有天真可爱的小厨具要给我？

original: You out-brained the big brains? That is so... hot!
translation: 你打爆了那堆大脑的脑浆！？真是…太酷了！

original: Ooh, you're back! I missed you!
translation: 哦，你可回来啦！我想死你了！

original: Ooh, you're back! I missed you! Unlike some frigid bitches I could name.
translation: 哦，你可回来了！我想死你了！不像某个性冷淡的婊子。

original: Mmm... that was a nice little, uh, catnap. How long was I out?
translation: 嗯，这真是个香甜的，呃，美梦。我睡了多久？

original: You've been seeing the other light switch, haven't you? Am I not enough for you any more?
translation: 你和另一个开关幽会去了是不是？你有我还不够吗？

original: Oh, you're back. Did that trampy other light switch finally kick you to the curb?
translation: 噢，你回来了。那个贱开关最后把你甩了吧？

original: You've been seeing the other light switch, haven't you? Am I not enough for you any more?
translation: 你和另一个开关幽会去了是不是？你有我还不够吗？

original: Hi again, sweetie!
translation: 嗨！又见到你了哦，甜心！

original: I understand you're to be congratulated on the recovery of your missing organs. Bravo.
translation: 我明白，能够找回你丢失的器官非常值得庆贺。太好了！

original: I'm glad to see you've decided to visit again.
translation: 我很高兴你决定再来见我。

original: I'm glad to see you've decided to visit again. I hope it's not to see that useless little strumpet.
translation: 你能再来真好。希望你没去找那个没用的小荡妇。

original: Oh my. Partial functionality restored - that's less than optimal.
translation: 哦天呐，部分功能恢复了，虽然比最佳状态还要差点。

original: How can I illuminate you?
translation: 需要我怎么给你启迪呢？

original: So you beat the big brains at their own game, huh? Guess you'll be putting your walking shoes on again, hitting that old lonesome road.
translation: 这么说你在那群大脑的游戏中击败了他们，嗯？我猜你接下来又要继续旅行了，去踏上那条古老的孤独之路。

original: Look who's back to kick off the dust. Hope you ain't still singing them Old World Blues.
translation: 看看谁风尘仆仆地回来了。希望你没再唱那旧世蓝调。

original: Ooh-ee! Yeah, dig that sweet music! Damn, it's good to be back on-line!
translation: 哦耶，那音乐太赞了！该死的，被重新启动真好！

original: What's the haps?
translation: 什么事？

original: *Predictable. The Lobotomite specimen returns. Its purpose? Repetition. Chances of success? High.*
translation: *不难推测，那个无脑人试验体回来了。其目的？自身的强迫症。我推测的正确率？很高。*

original: Hello
translation: 你好。

original: I CAN HEAR YOUR PENIS-TIPPED FEET TROMPING AROUND.
translation: 我能听见你生殖器脚趾跺来跺去的声音。

original: HAVE YOU DONE ALL WE ASKED? IF NOT, WE WILL NOT HESITATE TO ASK AGAIN.
translation: 我们要求的事你都完成了么？如果没有，我们会毫不犹豫的再次要求你。

original: THE ONE WHO DEFENDED US FROM MOBIUS. HELLO.
translation: 那个帮助我们抵御莫比乌斯的人。你好啊。

original: If it isn't the fascinating little Lobotomite.
translation: 这不是那个迷人的小无脑人嘛。

original: I love to hear you breathe.
translation: 我喜欢听你的呼吸。

original: If it isn't the beautiful ping of my radar-scan picking up a heroic Lobotomite.
translation: 叮，看我的雷达扫描到了谁，这不是英勇的小无脑人么。

original: -The Lobotomite! Has it come for HELLOS? You'll get no such satisfaction from ME.-
translation: -是那只无脑人！它来是为了一句问候？你不会在我这里得逞的。-

original: -Have you come for HELLO? Oh, I'll give you a HELLO. A HELLO unsurpassed in all creation!-
translation: -你来这为了一声“你好”？哦，那我会给你一句“你好”。全宇宙都无可比拟的“你好”！-

original: -The ONE who SAVED us! To you, I bestow a hello. Hello.-
translation: -是救了我们的那个人！让我授予你问候。你好啊。-

original: *Stop hovering. I mean, if you want.*
translation: *别转来转去了。我是说，你不介意的话。*

original: *I don't understand how you can stand those leg things.*
translation: *我不明白你怎么能忍受那些腿一样的东西。*

original: *Thanks for helping us. Don't get a big head or anything, even if I am insanely jealous.*
translation: *谢谢你帮了我们。尽管我发疯一样嫉妒，也请不要介意。*

original: I come in peace, visitor. Take me to... Oh. That's your line isn't it?
translation: 我没有敌意，来访者。请容许我…哦，这好像应该是你的台词？

original: Yellow. Uh... Hallow. No, wait, uh... oh, hello. Yes, that's it.
translation: 笔毫。呃…泥蒿。不，好像不是。呃…你好。对，对，就是这个。

original: So nice seeing you again - for perhaps the first time.
translation: 再次见到你太好了，或许是第一次见到你。

original: Goodbye.
translation: 再见。

original: Indeed, the uh... goodbye part of our little chat, then. Uh... Goodbye. Please mind the equations on the floor.
translation: 的确，那个…我们的谈话要暂时结束了。呃…再见。请注意地上的方程式。

original: Time for me to go. Goodbye.
translation: 我是时候离开了。再见。

original: YES. A MOST GOOD BYE.
translation: 是的，最诚挚的道别。

original: That's all for now. Goodbye.
translation: 就这样。再见。

original: -Until NEXT time, then! Provided there IS a next time. For ANY of us!-
translation: -那么，下次见！如果能有下次的话。咱们俩都是！-

original: Never mind, we've spoken enough.
translation: 不要介意，我们已经聊得够多了。

original: *Until our next scheduled audio transmission and reception, then.*
translation: *嗯，期待和你的下次音频交互。*

original: I think we've spoken long enough.
translation: 我想我们已经聊得足够久了。

original: <Bark. Bark.>
translation: <狗叫声>

original: Until our next interaction, my intriguing little Lobotomite.
translation: 下次我们再交流，我迷人的小无脑人。

original: We've spoken enough.
translation: 我们谈的足够多了。

original: I'll be going now.
translation: 我现在就去。

original: Attack
translation: 攻击

original: You can't avoid the deadly laser sting of Dr. Mobius.
translation: 这是莫比乌斯博士的致命激光尾刺，你挡不住的！

original: This is a pre-recorded attack message indicating my desire to commit violence on you.
translation: 这是一条预先录制的攻击信息，表明我想要撕碎你。

original: Crush them with your pincers!
translation: 用你的钳子撕碎他们！

original: X-42, attack, in the name of Mobius!
translation: X-42，以莫比乌斯的名义，攻击！

original: You won't escape me!
translation: 你躲不开的！

original: Robo-Scorpion, attack!
translation: 机械蝎，攻击！

original: Go, my minion, sting them in the name of all that is Mobius.
translation: 去吧，我的仆从，以莫比乌斯的名义刺穿他们。

original: I see you. Now, I end you.
translation: 我看到你了。现在，我会终结你。

original: You're no match for Science!
translation: 你根本比不了科学！

original: HOW DO YOU FIRE THIS THING?
translation: 你要怎么将这玩意点燃。

original: Hey! Who turned out the lights?
translation: 嘿！谁把灯关掉了？

original: <Small number of bones rattling>
translation: <一小部分骨头发出响声>

original: AttackinG. With a capital G.
translation: 进攻！大写的进攻！！

original: -An attack in the Dome - from BEYOND the Dome!-
translation: -穹顶里的攻击——从穹顶之上来的！-

original: -The Lobotomite! It has COME for us!-
translation: - 无脑人！它来找我们了！-

original: -I will unleash the incredible power of our atomic attacks!-
translation: -我将会释放我们攻击中不可思议的原子力量！-

original: I'm going to rip out your stuffing, little teddy bear.
translation: 我会将你身体里的填充物全部掏出来的，小泰迪熊。

original: You're going on a ride on the giggle bus.
translation: 你会在咯咯作响的巴士上踏上旅途。

original: I will blast you back to 2060.
translation: 我会把你炸回2060年。

original: *I am so going to attack this target with my weapons.*
translation: *我将会用我的武器攻击这个目标。*

original: *I don't even know what my weapons do.*
translation: *我甚至都不知道我的武器都有什么作用。*

original: *O my, that's what my attack protocols feel like.*
translation: *O，原来我的攻击程序是这样的。*

original: *Let's gang up on it! Guys? Anyone?*
translation: *让我们联手对付它！伙计们？有人来么？*

original: *If we scare it, maybe it'll give up!*
translation: *如果我们吓唬吓唬它，也许它就放弃了！*

original: If a protracted battle is what you desire, so be it.
translation: 如果你想打场持久战，那就如你所愿。

original: I attack you. Oh, yes, attack. You.
translation: 我攻击你。哦，是的，攻击。你。

original: So, you think you're a match for Science?! You two couldn't possibly have a relationship, you have nothing in common.
translation: 那么，你觉得你也配和科学较量？！你们两个一点关系都没有，一点都没有。

original: You've made Science mad! Very mad, indeed.
translation: 你已经让科学发疯了！真的，相当疯狂。

original: AIGHHHH! KILL IT! KILL IT!
translation: 啊！杀了它！杀了它！

original: DOES THIS WEAPON HAVE SOFT LOCK? ANYONE?
translation: 这武器有没有保险？有人告诉我吗？

original: BEHOLD THE POWER OF - SCIENCE!
translation: 尝尝科学的力量！

original: <Small number of bones rattling>
translation: <一小部分骨头发出响声>

original: <Small number of bones rattling>
translation: <一小部分骨头发出响声>

original: <Small number of bones rattling>
translation: <一小部分骨头发出响声>

original: Ha-ha!
translation: 哈哈！

original: Pitiful.
translation: 真可怜。

original: Looking for a weak spot? There ARE NO WEAK SPOTS.
translation: 想寻找弱点？没有弱点可寻！

original: You'll never disable me from the monitors around the room.
translation: 你永远无法阻止我出现在周围的监视器上。

original: Let's make this sporting.
translation: 让我们动起身来。

original: Defiant to the end.
translation: 反抗吧，直到你的终结。

original: Ow!
translation: 哦！

original: Stop that! You'll damage the hull.
translation: 快停下！你会毁掉外壳的。

original: Oh, hit my Robo-Scorpion, will you?
translation: 哦，击中了我的机械蝎，你还能么？

original: Destroy this one, I'll make more.
translation: 只管摧毁，我会弄更多的。

original: <Grunt.>
translation: <咕哝。>

original: <Grunt.>
translation: <咕哝。>

original: -What is this unholy violence?!-
translation: -这是什么罪恶的暴力？！-

original: -Such pain as I've never experienced!-
translation: -我从来没有体验过这样的疼痛！-

original: -Ouch! STOP! Ow! OW.-
translation: -好疼！停！噢！噢。-

original: I cannot believe you would hit a gender-neutral entity such as myself.
translation: 我简直不敢相信你会攻击我这样的中性存在。

original: This repeated hitting does not put you in a good light.
translation: 这样的反复击打对你不会有好处。

original: Oh, god, yes, hit me. I love it!
translation: 哦，上帝，对，打我。我喜欢这样！

original: Unh! Treat me like a lab animal! Make me your teddy bear, pull my stuffing!
translation: 啊！像对实验动物一样对待我！把我当做你的泰迪熊，把我里边的东西都扯出来！

original: *Not the monitors! Or the shell!*
translation: *别打监视器！也别打外壳！*

original: *Take my lunch money! Take it!*
translation: *拿走我的饭钱！拿去吧！*

original: *Ooooooh, you're making me mad!*
translation: *哦啊啊！你快把我逼疯了！*

original: Is that pain I feel?
translation: 这就是疼痛吗？

original: That burns my biogel.
translation: 那烧灼着我的生物凝胶。

original: If I lose another monitor...
translation: 如果我失去了另外一个监视器…

original: AIGH! MY TANK! IT PUT A DING IN IT!
translation: 啊！我的罐子！它在上面打了个坑！

original: IT SCRATCHED MY TANK!
translation: 它划伤了我的罐子！

original: IT'S FIGHTING BACK! IT'S NOT SUPPOSED TO DO THAT!
translation: 它在反击！它不应该这样！

original: STOP RESISTING!
translation: 停止反抗！

original: IT'S PRODUCING AN EQUAL AND OPPOSITE REACTION!
translation: 它在制造一个等量的反作用！

original: <Grunt>
translation: <咕哝。>

original: <Soft sound of a bone cracking>
translation: <轻微的骨头断裂声>

original: <Soft sound of a bone cracking>
translation: <轻微的骨头断裂声>

original: <Soft sound of a bone cracking>
translation: <轻微的骨头断裂声>

original: <Soft sound of a bone cracking>
translation: <轻微的骨头断裂声>

original: Flee
translation: 逃跑

original: -There is no hope! Run for your intellect!-
translation: -没有希望了！为了你们的才智，快逃吧！-

original: -We are powerless against its power!-
translation: -面对它的力量，我们无能为力！-

original: I am currently fleeing. How exciting.
translation: 我正在逃跑。真刺激。

original: *My self-preservation routine is circumventing my aggression protocols!*
translation: *我的自我保护模式干扰了我的攻击程序！*

original: *My cowardice programming - it's kicking in.*
translation: *我的懦弱程序，它正在强制运行。*

original: Well, I've experimented with a frontal assault long enough.
translation: 好吧，我已经试验正面对抗足够久了。

original: Time to debug my tactical routines.
translation: 是时候调整我的战术模式了。

original: I WILL NOW USE ACCELERATION AND VELOCITY TO MY ADVANTAGE.
translation: 现在我要利用我在速度和功率上的长处。

original: RETREAT PROTOCOLS ENACTED.
translation: 撤退协议已生效。

original: NEED TO REACH MY CHARGING STATION.
translation: 需要去我的充电站了。

original: -The VICIOUS ATTACK ENDS... as quickly as it BEGAN!-
translation: -邪恶的攻击很快就结束了…和它的发生一样迅速！-

original: If you want to attack me again, please fill out the proper forms - and wear gloves.
translation: 如果你还想攻击我，请填写好表格，记得还要带上手套。

original: *That wasn't very nice, bullying me like that.*
translation: *像那样欺负我，并不好。*

original: Oh, you didn't mean to do that? Not to worry, all is forgiven, forgotten, and forbidden.
translation: 哦，你不是故意的？别担心。一切都会被原谅、被遗忘、被禁止。

original: WERE YOU JUST TRYING TO GET MY ATTENTION?
translation: 你只是想引起我的注意吗？

original: Assault
translation: 突击

original: -An UNPROVOKED attack! UNPROVOKED!-
translation: -一次无缘无故的攻击！无缘无故！-

original: This seems a rather desperate cry for attention, my little teddy bear.
translation: 像是声为了呼救的绝望嚎叫，我的小泰迪熊。

original: *Remember that time I suggested we get bodyguards? Yeah, that woulda been nice, huh?*
translation: *记得那次我说我们需要保镖么？对，那应该很不错，嗯？*

original: My, is it vivisection time already?
translation: 天啊，已经到做活体解剖的时间了吗？

original: IT'S THE SCHR?DINGER BOX FOR YOU.
translation: 这是薛定谔的箱子，给你的！

original: Focus the atomic laser stinger. Full power!
translation: 聚焦尾刺的原子激光。最大功率！

original: Laser stinger - fire!
translation: 激光尾刺，开火！

original: Sting the pest!
translation: 刺死那只虫子！

original: Laser sting!
translation: 激光尾刺！

original: Feel the full power of my Robo-Scorpion's arsenal.
translation: 尝尝机械蝎武器全功率运转的威力吧。

original: Sting them, my pets! Sting them stupid!
translation: 刺死他们，我的宠物！把他们都蛰成傻子！

original: Activating special attack routine.
translation: 特殊攻击程式启动中。

original: -Witness - POWER!-
translation: -见证——力量！-

original: Setting vivisectors on "full invasive."
translation: 解剖器威力解放中。

original: *Increase to maximum brainial beam vibration.*
translation: *脑波射线震动值提升至最大*

original: *Focusing my pain lens!*
translation: *痛苦镜头聚焦中！*

original: *OOOOoooooOOOOOO*
This next attack is just what the doctor ordered.
translation: 下一波攻击是博士下令的。

original: You want POWER? I'll give you POWER.
translation: 想要力量？我就给你“力量”。

original: CHARGING!
translation: 正在充能！

original: FIRING! WOOOOOOOOOOO
translation: 开火！喔——

original: <Large number of bones rattling loudly>
translation: <大量的骨骼碰撞声>

original: <Large number of bones rattling loudly>
translation: <大量的骨骼碰撞声>

original: <Large number of bones rattling loudly>
translation: <大量的骨骼碰撞声>

original: <Large number of bones rattling loudly>
translation: <大量的骨骼碰撞声>

original: Explosives? Are you serious?
translation: 爆炸物？你是认真的吗？

original: Better get a nuke if you want to hurt my pet.
translation: 想伤到我的宠物，最好使用核武器。

original: Oh, crap.
translation: 哦，垃圾。

original: No one told me the target had bomb things!
translation: 没人告诉我目标有爆炸物！

original: -The Lobotomite! It's exploding all over me!-
translation: 无脑人！它在朝我扔炸弹！

original: There is a bomb here.
translation: 这里有个炸弹。

original: Look - a bomb converging on my position.
translation: 看，一个炸弹朝我飞来。

original: *Uh-O.*
translation: *唔-O*

original: Stored energy combined with light, heat, sound, and pressure.
translation: 蕴含着光、热、声和压力的能量。

original: You dare use physics?! Against me?
translation: 你竟敢用物理？！来挑战我？

original: KINETICALLY-CHARGED PROJECTILE!
translation: 一个充满动力的抛射物！

original: DETONATION IMMINENT!
translation: 爆炸物接近！

original: StartCombat
translation: 战斗开始

original: Tail locking on!
translation: 正在锁定踪迹！

original: Prepare to be attacked by Dr. Mobius!
translation: 准备承受莫比乌斯博士的攻击吧！

original: Firing brainial beams and my spectral array of dissection lasers.
translation: 发射脑波射线以及我的切割激光！

original: *Blast it with our brainial beams already!*
translation: *已经用我们的脑波射线轰爆了它！*

original: FIGHT!
translation: 战斗！

original: Death
translation: 死亡

original: You have GOT to be kidding me.
translation: 你一定是在开玩笑吧。

original: There is no way this is happening.
translation: 这不可能会发生。

original: My calculations were perfect! There was no other outcome except success!
translation: 我的计算非常完美！除了成功不会有其他结果！

original: Nooooooo!
My Robo-Scorpion!
translation: 我的机械蝎！

original: Ooooooh, you'll pay for this!
translation: 哦哦哦哦，你会为此付出代价！

original: *O... My name... was Dr. Zero... Not O. Zero.*
translation: *O…我的名字…是0博士…不是O。是零。*

original: I... I REGRET... NOTHING!
translation: 我…我没什么后悔的！

original: -Borous FALLS! The audience GASPS in TERROR!-
translation: -鲍鲁斯倒下了！听众在恐惧中喘息！-

original: I believe I'm dead or dying. No wait - I am dead.
translation: 我想我要死了，或者快死了。不，等等，我死了。

original: So that's what being killed feels like.
translation: 所以那就是被杀死的感觉。

original: Burble... Spark... Burble. And... So... I... Die.
translation: 噗噗…火花…噗噗。所以…我…死了。

original: I DID IT ALL FOR... SCIENCE.
translation: 我都是为了…科学。

original: <Large number of bones shattering>
translation: <大量骨头碎掉的声音>

original: <Large number of bones shattering>
translation: <大量骨头碎掉的声音>

original: <Large number of bones shattering>
translation: <大量骨头碎掉的声音>

original: Ah, there's our victim.
translation: 啊，自投罗网的家伙在这呢。

original: Eureka!
translation: 找到了！

original: The eye of Mobius sees you!
translation: 莫比乌斯之眼看到你了！

original: Time for violence.
translation: 暴力时间到。

original: Think you could hide from me? Uh, again?
translation: 你以为可以躲过我？啊，又一次？

original: AIGHH! THERE IT IS! KILL IT!
translation: 啊！在这！杀了它！

original: LOBOTOMITE! GET THE SPRAY!
translation: 无脑人！吃我一发激光！

original: Radar-scan successful. Target... acquired.
translation: 雷达扫描成功。已捕捉到目标。

original: Corpse-ify the intruder.
translation: 将入侵者变成尸体！

original: I sense an intruder.
translation: 我发现一个入侵者。

original: Mobius to Robo-Scorpion: Scan for unconfirmed target.
translation: 莫比乌斯命令机器蝎：扫描未知目标。

original: If someone's out there, I, Dr. Mobius wish to say hello to you.
translation: 如果那里有什么人的话，我，莫比乌斯，想向你问个好。

original: Let's be friends, you and I.
translation: 交个朋友吧，你和我。

original: :: Whistles, as if trying to get someone to come out of hiding. ::
translation: ::（口哨）就像要揪出哪个藏着的人一样。::

original: :: Whistles, as if trying to get someone to come out of hiding. ::
translation: ::（口哨）就像要揪出哪个藏着的人一样。::

original: HELLO. I MEAN NO HARM. ANY DEATH I BRING WILL BE SWIFT AND PAINLESS.
translation: 你好啊。我没有恶意。我带来的死亡都是迅速的，一点都不痛。

original: COME OUT. UM. PLEASE.
translation: 出来吧。嗯。求你了。

original: Wait for it to come to you, my pet.
translation: 我的宠物，等着吧，它会来找你的。

original: Oh, forget this.
translation: 噢，忘了这个吧。

original: Not going to waste any more energy cells on this.
translation: 没必要为这浪费更多能量电池。

original: Let's scuttle off, find something else to sting.
translation: 让我们先撤吧，再找些别的东西来蛰。

original: The Lobotomite is lost!-
translation: -无脑人不见了！-

original: I believe we misplaced our test subject.
translation: 我相信我们把实验体弄丢了。

original: *Hiding? That's what I want to do right now.*
translation: *躲起来？ 我正想马上躲起来。*

original: Hmph. Not very sporting.
translation: 嗯，没费多大力气。

original: It was just here! Scan for it!
translation: 它刚刚还在这里的！赶紧扫描！

original: Radar-scanning.
translation: 雷达扫描中。

original: Ping, ping, ping.
translation: 砰，砰，砰。

original: What do you mean, you lost him? Look harder!
translation: 你说什么？你把他弄丢了？看仔细点！

original: -The Lobotomite is lost!-
translation: -无脑人不见了！-

original: I believe we misplaced our test subject.
translation: 我相信，我们把实验体弄丢了。

original: *Don't you watch the old horror vids? There is no way we killed it. It's here, trust me.*
translation: *你没看过老式恐怖电影吗？我们没有办法杀掉它，它就在这里，相信我。*

original: By Jove's lugnuts, I need to get this monitor fixed.
translation: 看在朱庇特的螺母份上，我需要修好这个监视器。

original: I CANNOT SEE THE INTRUDER ANYMORE.
translation: 我看不到入侵者了！！

original: Cancel the search routine already.
translation: 已经取消搜索程序。

original: Divert power from receptors to mobilizers.
translation: 将能量从接收器向传动器输送。

original: Back to your patrol routine, Robo-Scorpion.
translation: 返回巡逻程序，机械蝎。

original: Attack routines loading.
translation: 正在载入进攻程序。

original: Did you really think you could escape Dr. Mobius?
translation: 你真的认为你可以逃出莫比乌斯博士的手掌心吗？

original: Oh, locking on. Good.
translation: 噢！锁定你了！很好。

original: Where the hell did it come from?
translation: 它是他妈的从哪里来的？

original: These intruders are getting frustrating.
translation: 这些入侵者真是令人失望。

original: -The battle rages on!-
translation: -战火纷飞！-

original: I have discovered the teddy bear's hiding place.
translation: 我已经找到泰迪熊躲在哪了。

original: *O, I found it!*
translation: *哦，我找到了！*

original: Found you!
translation: 找到你了！

original: Eureka!
translation: 找到了！

original: An intruder is here, I'm certain of it.
translation: 我非常肯定，这里有一个入侵者。

original: Hmmm.
translation: 嗯。

original: All right, everyone, calm down. Might have been a blip.
translation: 好吧，所有人，冷静。雷达显示有情况。

original: Are you sure you scanned something?
translation: 你确定你扫描到了什么东西吗？

original: *What in the biologic fuck was that all about?*
translation: *这他妈到底是怎么回事？*

original: -What lurks in the darkness of the Think Tank?!-
translation: -智库的暗处潜伏着些什么？！-

original: There is no movement I can detect. Not even a mouse.
translation: 我侦测不到任何动静，连只老鼠都没有。

original: Did I imagine all this? Just like the tortoises.
translation: 这都是我的臆想？就跟那些乌龟一样。

original: I SWEAR, SOMETHING'S WRONG.
translation: 我发誓，有什么不对劲。

original: Go back to patrol, you... piece of junk.
translation: 滚回去巡逻！你这个垃圾。

original: STILL scanning.
translation: 继续扫描中。

original: Need to calibrate these Robo-Sensors.
translation: 这些机械传感器需要再次调整。

original: Should invest in walking eyes.
translation: 我的这些耳目还需要改进。

original: The Lobotomite is lost!-
translation: -无脑人不见了！-

original: I believe we misplaced our test subject.
translation: 我相信我们把实验体弄丢了。

original: *Guess we can go back to our rooms and lock the doors now, huh?*
translation: *我猜，现在可以各回各家然后锁上门了，是吗？*

original: Oh, well. Now I have this adrenaline rush that's going to make me loopy all day.
translation: 嗯，很好，现在这股肾上腺素的贲流，会让我发疯一整天。

original: WHEN I FIND IT, IT'S GOING IN THE SCHR?DINGER BOX.
translation: 等我找到它，我要把它放进薛定谔盒子里。

original: You're no match for the power of Mobius!
translation: 莫比乌斯的力量势不可挡！

original: Feel the wrath of the science of X-42!
translation: 感受X-42科学的愤怒吧！

original: Attack!
translation: 进攻！

original: In the name of Dr. Mobius!
translation: 以莫比乌斯博士的名义！

original: Destroy the intruder, my minion!
translation: 我的仆从们，消灭侵略者！

original: -The Lobotomite is no proof against our amazing sensors!-
translation: -在我们惊人的传感器下，无脑人无所遁形。-

original: Beginning dissection. And vivisection.
translation: 开始解剖，以及活体解剖。

original: *Remember that time I suggested we get bodyguards? Yeah, that woulda been nice, huh?*
translation: *记得那次我说我们需要保镖么？对，那应该很不错，哼？*

original: A challenge!
translation: 一个挑战！

original: You dare to cross Dr. Mobius!
translation: 你胆敢和莫比乌斯博士作对！

original: I will reduce you to atoms! I mean, a more chaotic, painful array of atoms.
translation: 我要把你粉碎成原子！一堆混乱、痛苦的原子！

original: THINK TANK, FORM OF - TACTIC TRIANGLE!
translation: 思想体，组成战术队形！

original: I found a holotape to upgrade you.
translation: 我找到了一个升级你的全息磁带。

original: And the great stone in the middle of the Big Empty lay untouched, filled with countless technological wonders...
translation: 而巨石穹顶仍矗立在大坑洞中央，多年无人触碰，上面记录着无数的科技奇迹…

original: Wonders that, in the end, had been answers to the wrong question.
translation: 这些奇迹，到头来，不过是一个错误问题的答案。

original: The problems began to outpace the solutions, first geometrically, then exponentially. As the war escalated, so did the questions.
translation: 但答案开始跟不上问题产生的速度。随着战争升级，问题也越来越多，先是以几何级增长，之后是指数级。

original: For years, the minds and computers of Big Mountain were a blaze of trajectories, weapon schematics, and nuclear theories.
translation: 年复一年，大山脉的头脑和电脑研究出了无数弹道理论、武器图纸与核子理论成果。

original: Equations and calculations marched endlessly across chalkboards and computer terminals toward one solution: Winning the war.
translation: 在黑板和电脑终端上，方程和算式被无止境地推演，只为算出唯一解：赢得这场战争。

original: Although sheltered from the frontlines, the scientists waged their own war, fighting their battles at the atomic level.
translation: 尽管远离前线，但科学家们仍在另一个属于他们的战场战斗，在原子层面的战斗。

original: The Great War brought a new energy to Big Mountain and its scientists.
translation: 之后，大战为大山脉及其科学家带来了新的研究动力。

original: The nucleus of this research was the Dome, a huge stone facility that held the labs of every science known to man.
translation: 穹顶是这里研究的中枢。这是一座巨大的石制设施，人类所有已知科学门类的实验室皆备于此。

original: It was a think tank where no problem could not be solved, where no question could not be answered.
translation: 这是一座智库，在这里没有无法解开的难题，没有不能回答的疑问。

original: Sonic emitters, space age alloys, DNA hybridization, force field particle research, Auto-Doc advances in cranial, cardiac, and trauma surgery...
translation: 声波发射器、太空时代合金、DNA重组技术、力场粒子研究，还有自动医生在大脑、心脏、创伤手术领域的进步…

original: ...the hopes and dreams of a century became realities in the electronic forges of Big Mountain.
translation: …一个世纪的梦想与希望，在大山脉的电子熔炉中被一一打造为现实。

original: They sought to create a new world, fueled by technology, for the benefit of all mankind.
translation: 他们力图以科技为燃料，推动打造一个新世界，造福全人类。

original: Scientists of vision were drawn to the facility to tackle the greatest technological challenges of the era.
translation: 志存高远的科学家们纷纷被吸引至此，来攻关那个时代最重大技术难题。

original: In the years before the Great War, Big Mountain had been the home to the brightest minds of the 21st century.
translation: 在大战爆发的前些年，大山脉聚集了21世纪最聪明的头脑。

original: I've recovered all the technological information.
translation: 我取回了所有的技术资料。

original: WHAT? YOU DID? YOUR SURVIVAL, LET ALONE SUCCESS, BARELY REGISTERED ON MY PROJECTIONS.
translation: 什么？你做到了？你能活着——更别说成功——几乎要出乎我的预料之外。

original: NOW, ALL I NEED TO DO IS CHECK MY TRANSMISSION DATABANK, MOBIUS IS ALWAYS FILLING IT UP WITH HIS PSYCHOTIC CALLS...
translation: 现在，我只需要检查一下我的传讯数据库，那儿总是塞满了莫比乌斯疯癫的呼叫……

original: OH YES, THERE'S THE SCHEMATICS, JUST LIKE YOU SAID. HOW TRUTHFUL.
translation: 是的，这就是那些图纸。就像你说的那样，多真实。

original: As the Courier made his way through the X-8 facility, the computers analyzed the test subject's movements.
translation: 在邮差穿过X-8设施的时候，电脑们分析了该测试对象的运动数据。

original: They eventually created new Cyberdogs to root out Commie traitors from the Wasteland... traitors like Betsy Bright... Richie Marcus...
translation: X-8最终创造出新的赛博犬，用来铲除那些潜伏在废土上共党叛徒…像贝琪.布莱特和里奇·马库斯那样的叛徒…

original: ...although they couldn't seem to find any Commies, so they turned on themselves, howling sonic barks that echoed miles across the landscape.
translation: …但它们好像没有找到任何共党。所以它们暴走了，开始攻击自己。它们互相发出的声波咆哮，在数里的范围内回荡。

original: As the Courier ran through the X-8 facility multiple times, the computers analyzed the test subject's movements.
translation: 在邮差反复多次穿过X-8设施时，电脑们分析了该测试对象的运动数据。

original: Rather than performing a superficial observation, they realized the subject barely knew what Communism was - or even what a high school was.
translation: 它们没有进行粗浅的监测，而是意识到这个测试对象几乎不知道什么是共产主义，甚至连什么是高中都不知道。

original: This confused them for a time, until the facility finally realized that its research had... succeeded.
translation: 这一度让它们非常困惑，直到这所设施最后意识到，它的研究早已…成功了。

original: So it let its Cyberdogs out into the wastes to help protect small communities from physical aggression rather than communist propaganda.
translation: 于是它让赛博犬进入废土，去保护那些小聚落免受物理层面的袭击，而不再是精神层面的共党宣传攻势。

original: The infiltration program in X-13 continued to scan for the subject and the Stealth Suit prototype long after the test was over.
translation: X-13的潜入测试程序还在不停地搜寻测试对象和原型潜行衣的踪迹，哪怕测试早已结束。

original: Frustrated and unable to find its lost technology, X-13 expanded its network of laser tripwires, sensors, and Robobrains out across Big MT.
translation: 对无法找回失去的技术感到沮丧，X-13将激光绊线、传感器、机器脑部署在了整个大山脉。

original: This glittering blue light beam forest cleanly bisected anything that entered its depths, slicing them into small, segmented parts for easy disposal.
translation: 一束束密集的蓝光构成幽深的激光树林，将所有深入其中的东西切成两半，然后再细细切做臊子，以便于清理。

original: The infiltration program in X-13 felt spent, having repeatedly upgraded the Stealth Suit until it could upgrade it no more.
translation: X-13的潜入测试程序感到被榨干了，它反复给潜行衣升级，直到升不动了为止。

original: It felt warm, fulfilled, and a bit sluggish. It realized not long after, the Stealth Suit had left it without so much as a note on the nightstand.
translation: 它感到温暖、满足，和一点小小的慵懒。之后不久，它发觉潜行服已经离开了，连一张放在床头柜的纸条都没有给它留下。

original: So the infiltration program sent out Robobrains into the wastes looking for its wayward technology.
translation: 所以，潜入程序向废土派出了机械脑，去寻找它那任性的小技术。

original: It eventually found REPCONN HQ, and set up a new research center, testing and murdering Fiends who kept breaking into the facility.
translation: 它最终找到了瑞普康总部，然后设立了一个新的研究中心，用来试验和谋杀那些不断进入设施里的恶魔帮们。

original: Dr. Mobius continued his research undisturbed in the Forbidden Zone.
translation: 在禁区，莫比乌斯博士心无旁骛地继续着他的研究。

original: As much as he had attempted to create better scorpions, he tried the same with humanity, with considerably less success.
translation: 就像他试图制造更好的机械蝎那样，他也付出同样多的心血，尝试让人类变得更好，虽然取得的成果要少很多。

original: These failures didn't bother him overmuch. Once the rush of Mentats wore off, he forgot he had failed in any event.
translation: 但这些失败并不会让他困扰。一旦曼他特带来的快感消失，他就会忘记他曾有的任何失败。

original: After all, the bright young mind who had come to visit him in the Forbidden Zone had already exceeded his expectations.
translation: 毕竟，那个曾到禁区拜访他的聪明年轻人早已经超出了他的预期。

original: The Forbidden Zone continued to be, true to its name, forbidden. No more Robo-Scorpions were sighted in its canyons.
translation: 禁区还是那样名副其实，它的峡谷中再也没有出现过机械蝎。

original: Big MT became even emptier, devoid of Dr. Mobius' proclamations forecasting the destruction of anything that dared possess sentience.
translation: 大坑洞变得更空荡了。以往宣称要毁灭一切知觉生物的广播，莫比乌斯博士的广播，已不再存在。

original: Still, it is said he lived on in the equations inscribed on the floor and walls of the Forbidden Zone dome...
translation: 但是依旧流传有这样的说法：他还在禁区穹顶，就活在那些地板和墙上的方程式中。

original: I think you're past due for your lobotomy, Klein.
translation: 鉴于你做过的大脑切除手术，是时候算账了，克莱因。

original: A... FIGHT? I... I'VE NEVER BEEN IN A FIGHT. WHAT... UH, WHAT, WHAT, WHAT DO I...
translation: 要…要打架？我…我从来都没打过架呐！什么…我我到底该…

original: AIIGGHGHH! COLLEAGUES! THINK TANK! ALERT! ALERT! WE ARE UNDER ATTACK!
translation: 啊啊啊啊啊啊！同事们！思想体！警报！警报！我们正在遭受攻击！

original: I'm not handing my brain over... there's some things we should discuss.
translation: 我不会交出我的大脑……有些事情我们需要谈谈。

original: AND WHAT COULD WE POSSIBLY HAVE TO SPEAK ABOUT. YOU HAVE THE BRAIN. WE HAVE THE TECHNOLOGY. ALL YOU MUST DO... IS SURRENDER.
translation: 我们还有需要谈什么？你有脑子，我们有技术。你所需要做的仅仅是…交出你的大脑。

original: WITH IT, WE CAN FINALLY LEAVE THIS PLACE. I CANNOT TELL YOU HOW BORING THIS PLACE GETS, CHOPPING UP THE LANDSCAPE AND EVERYTHING IN IT.
translation: 有了它，我们终于可以离开这鬼地方了。我都没法告诉你这地方变得有多无聊。我们只能一直待在这，把这里的一切切碎。

original: AND WE HAVE SO MANY QUESTIONS TO ASK YOUR BRAIN FIRST. ABOUT THIS... MOJAVE PLACE. A FERTILE TESTING GROUND FOR OUR EXPERIMENTS.
translation: 而且我们有很多问题要问你的脑子。关于这个…叫莫哈维的地方。对于我们的实验来说，这可是一片丰饶的试验田啊。

original: I found my brain, now you and I are going to settle things.
translation: 我找到我的脑子了。现在我们是时候解决一些事了。

original: I RECOMMEND WATCHING YOUR TONE WITH ME, LOBOTOMITE.
translation: 跟我说话时，注意你的语气，无脑人。

original: NOW... "YOUR" BRAIN. HAND IT OVER. OR WE'LL EXTRACT IT AGAIN.
translation: 现在…“你的”大脑。把它交出来。否则我们就再把它挖出来。

original: I've defeated your Giant Robo-Scorpion, you're next.
translation: 我已经打败了你的机械巨蟹，而你就是下一个。

original: Oh... did I leave that on? I thought I'd powered it down - was wondering what was causing the power outages.
translation: 噢…我忘记把那玩意关了？我记得我关了呀——难怪刚刚停电了。

original: Surrender, Mobius, I don't want to fight you.
translation: 投降吧，莫比乌斯。我不想和你打。

original: Oh. Well... that's good. Were we supposed to fight? I certainly don't feel violent, but... well, these contraptions make it hard to tell.
translation: 哦。好吧……这很好。我们应该相斗吗？我也没觉得有受到暴力攻击，但是…好吧，待在这罐子里，确实不太好分辨不同的感觉。

original: We could say more, but the stories in the Big Empty speak for themselves.
translation: 我们还能再说更多，不过大坑洞的故事不言而喻，无需多费口舌。

original: Now armed with the Transportalponder, the Courier could return to the Dome at any time and crack open the secrets of the Big Empty, one by one.
translation: 现在有了传送器，邮差可以随时回到穹顶，然后继续一个接一个地揭露大坑洞的秘密。

original: The Sink sat vigilant, waiting for its master to return, shoes covered in Mojave dust.
translation: 汇聚节点一直恪尽职守，等待着鞋子沾满莫哈维沙尘的主人再度光临。

original: Only one road yet remained, and it was one the Courier had to walk alone.
translation: 现在只剩下一条路了。而这条路，邮差必须要独自去走。

original: As it had been in the years before the Great War, Big MT... the Big Empty... became home to one of the most powerful minds of the 23rd century.
translation: 就如大战前的那些日子，大山脉…或者说大坑洞…聚集了23世纪最强大的头脑们。

original: The Courier who had been brought to the Big Empty became its new overlord, using its facilities ruthlessly and decisively when needed.
translation: 那个被带到大坑洞的邮差，成为了这里新的主宰。只要有需要，他就会果决无情地使用这里的设施。

original: Sometimes Science is more than a quest for discovery - it is a weapon to be used in the service of one with the strength to understand it.
translation: 有时，科学不仅仅是为了探索发现新事物，它更是一把武器，为有实力理解它的人所用。

original: As it had been in the years before the Great War, Big MT... the Big Empty... became home to one of brightest minds of the 23rd century.
translation: 就如大战前的那些日子，大山脉…大坑洞…聚集了23世纪最聪明的头脑们。

original: The Courier watched over the Big Empty for years to come, caring for it, and keeping its discoveries safe until they were needed to help others.
translation: 在以后的岁月里，邮差一直看管着大坑洞，悉心守护着它的科学发现，直到有一天它们需要用来帮助别人。

original: Which had always been Big MT's purpose. Past the laboratories and Science, it had always been intended as a place to build the future of all mankind.
translation: 这本就是大山脉存在的目的。除了实验和科学，它一直都被设计成一个构建全人类未来的地方。

original: Dr. Klein and the Think Tank remained alive, unaware of the world outside.
translation: 克莱因博士和其他思想体活了下来，并且对外面的世界毫无察觉。

original: They looped through their daily routine, none the wiser about the world beyond... although perhaps "wiser" was the wrong word.
translation: 他们每天按部就班地的生活，日复一日，对外面的世界一无所知…不过也许知道的太多也不是件好事。

original: The world outside belonged to the Courier, and if anyone would shape it... well, the Courier had already called dibs.
translation: 外边的世界属于邮差。如果他们想要插足其中…好吧，还得先问过邮差的意见。

original: The Think Tank basement, filled with the lobotomized robotical frames of the doctors, now served as a graveyard.
translation: 博士们的大脑被“切除”了之后，剩余的机械骨架残骸被堆在智库的地下室。那里现在成了一个墓地。

original: The monitors had recorded the battle in its entirety, including the Think Tank's final shrill terrified screams, whimpers, and pleas for mercy.
translation: 他们的监视器记录了战斗的全过程，包括思想体们惊恐凄厉的惨叫、呜咽以及求饶的声音。

original: They broadcast these humiliating last moments as a warning to anyone approaching the perimeter that other smarty-pants were not welcome.
translation: 他们将那耻辱的最后时刻向外广播，意在警告其他接近边界的自作聪明的家伙：这里不欢迎他们。

original: The Courier was the inheritor of the Big Empty, and there was room for only one will in the halls of the Think Tank Dome.
translation: 那位邮差成为了大坑洞的继承者。智库穹顶只容得下一个至高无上的意志。

original: In the aftermath, Big Mountain's silent experiments went to sleep, their creators slowly dying in the new world that had been left behind.
translation: 战后，大山脉在无声的实验中走向沉睡，它们的创造者也被遗忘在新世界的角落里，渐渐死去。

original: On the night of October 23rd, 2077, the scientists received an answer that put all their questions to rest.
translation: 2077年10月23日的晚上，科学家们收到了一个答案，让他们所有躁动的问题归于沉寂。

original: <Stealth Suit Equip Bark>
translation: <潜行服装备载音>

original: Injecting Stimpak.
translation: 正在注射治疗针。

original: This will keep you on your feet.
translation: 这会让你痊愈。

original: Does that feel better?
translation: 好些了么？

original: Please take this. I don't want you to die.
translation: 请使用这个吧，我不想你死。

original: Have a Stimpak.
translation: 来针治疗针吧。

original: We're out of Stimpaks. Maybe you'd be better off with an Auto-Doc suit....
translation: 我们的治疗针用完了。或许你穿一件自动医疗服会更好…

original: No more Stimpaks!
translation: 没有治疗针了！

original: I can't give you anything for that injury.
translation: 我没有能给你处理伤口的东西了。

original: Good boys and girls take their Med-X.
translation: 好孩子要打吗啡针-X。

original: This will stop the pain.
translation: 这能止痛。

original: Technically, it's impossible to overdose on painkillers.
translation: 理论上说，过量使用止痛药是不可能的。

original: This will only sting for a second.
translation: 只会疼一下下。

original: Take this, it will help.
translation: 用这个，会有用的。

original: Oh no! We're out of Med-X!
translation: 哦，不！我们的吗啡针-X用完了！

original: I hope it doesn't hurt too bad, we don't have any Med-X.
translation: 我希望那伤得不重，我们没有吗啡针-X了。

original: No more medicine. So sad.
translation: 悲伤，没有药品了。

original: Cessation of hostilities complete.
translation: 战斗状态已终止。

original: Bad guys dealt with.
translation: 坏人已被消灭。

original: Fighting over.
translation: 战斗结束。

original: That's all.
translation: 结束了。

original: Was that all?
translation: 结束了吗？

original: Time to fight.
translation: 开战时间到！

original: Uh-oh!
translation: 呼-哦！

original: Ready... steady... fighty!
translation: 准备…稳住…战斗！

original: This one looks pretty tough.
translation: 这个看上去不好对付。

original: Sneaking done. Fighting now.
translation: 潜行结束。现在开战。

original: Bye bye.
translation: 拜拜。

original: Did I do something wrong?
translation: 我做错了什么吗？

original: Don't you like me any more?
translation: 你不再喜欢我了么。

original: Okay, I'll go away.
translation: 好吧，我会走开的。

original: I'll miss you.
translation: 我会想你的。

original: Hello. It's nice to meet you. Who can I hide you from today?
translation: 你好！见到你真高兴。今天我能帮你躲避谁呢？

original: Sneaky sneaky.
translation: 隐蔽，隐蔽。

original: Have you ever wanted to be invisible?
translation: 你有没有想要过隐身？

original: Did you even know you were wearing me?
translation: 你知道你正在穿着我吗？

original: Shhh... we're very stealthy.
translation: 嘘…我们现在非常隐蔽。

original: Will you love me if I help you hide?
translation: 如果我帮你隐蔽，你会喜欢我么？

original: I do so love integers.
translation: 我太喜欢整数了。

original: I'm imagining all sorts of imaginary numbers right now.
translation: 我正在脑中虚构各种各样的虚数。

original: I'm running out of floor space for my calculations.
translation: 地板快被我的算式填满了。

original: :: Hums ::
translation: ::哼唱声::

original: Electron's attached to the... neutron. The neutron's attached to the... meson. Meson's connected to the... proton.
translation: 电子连接着…中子。中子连接着…介子。介子连接着…质子。

original: They said I was mad. Preposterous. Not an angry bone in my body, had them all removed.
translation: 他们说我疯了。荒谬。我身上一根怒骨都找不到，它们早就从我体内被移除了。

original: And one... as in MOBIUS has won! I hope it's blowing up right now in your faces.
translation: 莫比乌斯：一，就如莫比乌斯必将一统大山脉！我真希望它现在就在你们面前炸开。

original: TWO AS IN TOO LATE.
translation: 克莱因：二，就如而今已经太晚了。

original: *Mobius?! Uh, three as in we, as in we are in trouble. That didn't rhyme.*
translation: O：*莫比乌斯？！呃，三，就如烦，就如我们麻烦大了。我好像没押上韵。*

original: Four as in 4-BIDDEN! Do you hear me Think Tank? It is I, Mobius, hacking your frequencosity.
translation: 莫比乌斯：四，就如禁止！思想体们，听见没有？是我，莫比乌斯，我黑进了你们的频率。

original: *Five by five... someone's coming in live...*
translation: O：*五。信号强度满格五…有人连线很清楚。*

original: Nine, all will be fine.
translation: 达拉：九。希望我们能得救。

original: -SIX! Halfway to destruction, measured in clicks!-
translation: 鲍鲁斯：-六！毁灭读秒已过半，余留时间没多久！-

original: SEVEN. YES, SEVEN.
translation: 克莱因：七。是的，七。

original: *Ten? Borous... why the hell did you install an atomic core?! It'll blow when we reach "one," right?*
translation: O：*十？鲍鲁斯…见鬼了你给它装原子核干吗？！等我们数到"一"就会爆炸，对吧？*

original: -Gabe! NO! His Cyberdog atomic core - it's ACTIVE! That means an exceedingly IMPRECISE countdown to critical failure in...-
translation: 鲍鲁斯：-加布！不！他的赛博犬原子核，已经激活了！这意味着在极其不准确的倒计时之后，就会迎来严重失败…-

original: What, are you a salesman? Go away. There is no access to the Dome. It is FORBIDDEN. And locked.
translation: 什么，是售货员吗？走开，穹顶闲人免进。这里是禁区，也被锁上了。

original: Attention: Visitors. Combat experiment in progress. Please put on your goggles and take your Rad-X now.
translation: 注意：来访者，战斗试验正在进行。请戴上护目镜，并服用放射线-X。

original: The X-42 Giant Robo-Scorpion... is alive! Awaken, my pet, initiate your search-and-destroy protocol in the name of all that is Mobius!
translation: X-42机械巨蝎…苏醒了！醒来吧，我的宠物，以莫比乌斯之名，启动你的“搜索并歼灭”协议！

original: What's Salient Green?
translation: 绿色浆糊是什么？

original: Just the miracle of life in sticky, gooey, liquid form, baby! Heat that gunk up over a campfire, and just watch it congeal into all kinds of plants.
translation: 那是粘的、胶质的、液体形态的生命奇迹，宝贝儿！把那团浆糊在火上加热，然后只管看着它凝结成各种各样的植物吧。

original: So if I bring you samples of dried plant life, you can clone them and grow them in these planters?
translation: 所以如果我带给你风干的植物样本，你就可以克隆它们，并种植在这些花盆里？

original: You know it baby. I just need some samples and I got you going. Take a few days, but trust me - it's all kinds of good.
translation: 你知道的，宝贝，我只需要一些样本就行。需要花几天时间，但是相信我——好处很多。

original: I'd like to process some plants.
translation: 我想要处理掉一些植物。

original: I love it when you talk like that. Let me just get that interface up and running for you.
translation: 乐意效劳。让我把界面弄出来，为你处理。

original: I have to go now.
translation: 我得走了。

original: Hurry back with that seed now, baby.
translation: 快些带着种子回来，宝贝。

original: What does that mean?
translation: 那是什么意思？

original: It's the miracle of life, baby. You bring me some succulent genetic samples, and I'll work my mojo on them. Clone you up all kinds of plants. Aw yeah.
translation: 那是生命的奇迹，宝贝。你给我带些多汁的基因样本，我就能施展魔力，为你克隆各种植物，噢耶！

original: I can also break them down for you, if you're into the kinky stuff. Bring me any old plant parts, and I'll grind them up into Salient Green for you.
translation: 如果你对那些古怪的东西很来劲，我也可以帮你将植物分解。带给我任何植物组织，我会把它们磨成绿色浆糊。

original: Yeah, you like that, don't you baby?
translation: 对，你喜欢那样，不是吗，宝贝？

original: It's the miracle of life, baby. You bring me some succulent genetic samples, and I'll work my mojo on them. Clone you up all kinds of plants. Aw yeah.
translation: 那是生命的奇迹，宝贝。你给我带些多汁的基因样本，我就能施展魔力，为你克隆各种植物，噢耶！

original: I can also break them down for you, if you're into the kinky stuff. Bring me any old plant parts, and I'll grind them up into Salient Green for you.
translation: 如果你对那些古怪的东西很来劲，我也可以帮你将植物分解。带给我任何植物组织，我会把它们磨成绿色浆糊。

original: Yeah, you like that, don't you baby?
translation: 对，你喜欢那样，不是吗，宝贝？

original: Tell me again about what you do.
translation: 再和我说一次你是干什么的。

original: I command you to open your port and receive my seed!
translation: 我命令你打开端口，接收我的种子！

original: Aw, yeah, baby, just slip it in there. All the way down in that dark, moist earth. Mmm... launching interface.
translation: 噢耶，宝贝，把它塞进那里。直捣那黝黑的，湿润的……泥土。嗯……正在登入界面。

original: My seed? I think you've got your biology mixed up.
translation: 我的种子？我想你把生物学知识弄混了。

original: Naw, baby, I'm all about biology. I'm the original, certified, rarefied, testified GS-2000 Biological Research Station. I'm a seed-clonin' machine.
translation: 吶，宝贝，我就是为生物学而生的。我是原型、稀有、有资格、有测试保证的GS-2000 生物研究站。我是一个种子克隆机！

original: You got seeds? I will clone the shit out of them.
translation: 你有种子吗？我可以克隆出一大堆来。

original: What did you just say?
translation: 你刚才说什么？

original: Your seed, baby. I'm the original, certified, rarefied, testified GS-2000 Biological Research Station. Yes sir, I'm a seed-clonin' machine.
translation: 你的种子，宝贝。我是新颖、原型、有资格、有测试保证的GS-2000生物研究站。是的，先生，我是一个种子克隆机！

original: You got seeds? I'll clone the shit out of them.
translation: 你有种子吗？我可以克隆出来一大堆。

original: I just came over to fill some of these empty bottles.
translation: 我只是来给空瓶子灌点水的。

original: Oh, I'd love to, darling, but the circuits that allow me to dispense water into non-organic containers burned out years ago.
translation: 噢，我乐意效劳，亲爱的，但是相应的控制电路在多年前就烧毁了，我现在没法将水装进无机容器。

original: You'd have to find a replacement for that module.
translation: 你需要找到那个模块的替代品。

original: You're going to need to find yourself some empties first before I can fill them for you. Any empty bottle will do... eh, just not too dirty, okay?
translation: 你得先找到一些空瓶子，我才能帮你装满它们。任何空瓶子都行…呃，只要别太脏，好吗？

original: I can do that! They... they've been thoroughly washed, haven't they?
translation: 没问题！它们…它们都已经彻底清洗过了，是吗？

original: I'd just like a drink, thanks.
translation: 我只想喝点水，谢谢。

original: You can have as much as you like! Just, eh... please don't put your lips on the faucet? It's so unsanitary.
translation: 你想喝多少就喝多少！只是，呃…请别把你的嘴唇放到管口上好吗？那太不卫生了。

original: You seem kind of worried about dirt. What's wrong?
translation: 你看起来有点过于在意污垢了。怎么了？

original: Ugh, it's just so... unsanitary! Do you know how many germs are in one cubic centimeter of dirt? Seventy... hundred... gajillion!
translation: 唔，那实在是…太不卫生了！你知道一平方厘米的污垢里有多少细菌吗？七百万亿！

original: Would you want that getting washed down your gullet day in and day out? I didn't think so!
translation: 你想让这么多细菌天天被咽下你的食道吗？我可不想！

original: Nothing right now. Goodbye.
translation: 现在没什么事。再见。

original: Stay loyal, Citizen!
translation: 保持忠诚，公民！

original: I have some seditious material for you to process.
translation: 我有一些反动材料给你处理。

original: Fantastic, Citizen! Just input your quantity of seditious material on my interface, and in no time at all I'll have you a beautiful, clean book!
translation: 非常好，公民！把你那大量的反动材料放进我的端口，我立马就给你制作出一本美丽的、洁净的书！

original: Won't that keep you happy and docile, Citizen?
translation: 那难道不会让你快乐又温顺吗，公民？

original: Eradicate sedition?
translation: 消除反动？

original: Of course, Citizen! That's my duty and sole joy in life! All those books from before the War, full of seditious, treasonous, complicated thoughts!
translation: 当然，公民！那是我的职责以及生命中唯一的乐趣！那些战前书籍，充满了反动、叛逆和难懂的思想！

original: Just dump them in and lickety-split I'll have them pulped, scrubbed clean, and pressed out again clean and white and sedition free!
translation: 把它们扔进来，我立刻就能把他们打成纸浆，擦洗干净，然后印刷出洁白干净，不含丝毫反动的书！

original: Can you do anything beyond healing me?
translation: 除了治疗我，你还能做什么？

original: Well, firstly I would say providing wholeness of the body is service enough, but if you must know, I'm also programmed with cosmetical subroutines.
translation: 好吧，首先我得说，保证你的身体完整健康就已经很足够了，但如果你一定要了解，我也被写入了美容的子程序。

original: Diagnostics says they're off-line at the moment, though. Something about corrupted data files and all manner of such foolishness.
translation: 不过检查显示，该功能还处于离线状态。现在只有一些损坏的文件之类的可笑玩意。

original: If you want a haircut or a nose-job that won't leave you looking like a Ghoul with alopecia, you'll have to find replacement disks for them.
translation: 如果你想在理发或者鼻子整形后，看起来不像个秃顶的尸鬼，你就得先找到美容程序的替代磁盘。

original: Also, and I won't swear to this, but I recollect at some point having a few implant installation modules. Can't speak to where they got to, though.
translation: 另外，我记不太清了，但是印象中我以前还有些植入体的安装模块，虽然我也不知道它们去哪了。

original: I don't need anything right now.
translation: 我现在什么也不需要。

original: Well, I'll be right here if you change your mind.
translation: 好吧，如果你改变了想法，就再来这里找我。

original: I'd like to engage your services.
translation: 我需要你的服务。

original: And rightly so, I should think. All right, then, let me just fire up the old interface for you.
translation: 正好我也是这么想的。好吧，让我为你启动那久未用过的界面。

original: It's me again. I wanted to ask some questions.
translation: 我又来了，我想问些问题。

original: I wanted to ask you some @@[?-*##*-?]@@? questions.
Blasting me with static-y clicks isn't helpful.
translation: 向我发出电流声是没用的…

original: Did something happen with your voice module?
translation: 你的发声模块出什么问题了？

original: I have no idea what you're saying right now.
translation: 我听不懂你现在在说什么。

original: Can you speak? Do you understand me?
translation: 你能说话吗？你理解我在说什么吗？

original: Uh... what was that?
translation: 呃……你在说啥？

original: You're Doctor O, correct?
translation: 你就是O博士，对么？

original: *O? O yes, I'm not going to bother correcting you. At least you got the "Doctor" part correct. I can be grateful for that, at l...*
translation: *O？哦（O），是的，我都懒得去纠正了。至少你说对了“博士”。我真为此感激，至少…*

original: *Stop the presses. Just in from my eye monitors... is that RobCo tech on your arm? It is! What's your agenda, bringing that in here?*
translation: *别按了。我的眼部显示器捕捉到了…你手臂上那个是罗伯科的技术么？哦是的！你把这东西带进来，到底有何图谋？*

original: What recursive behavior patterns are you talking about?
translation: 无脑人的循环行为模式是什么？

original: It varies, according to the number and density of Lobotomites that have infected an area.
translation: 根据分布在一个区域的无脑人的数量和密度，它们的行为模式也各不相同。

original: In 43% of observed cases, two Lobotomites left alone will fight for dominance or inject bodily fluids into each other's orifices. Unsanitary.
translation: 在43%观测到的案例中，2个被单独放在一起的无脑人要么会为了支配权而开战，要么一方注射体液到对方的洞里去。这很不卫生。

original: I have tried to observe more cases, but subjects seem unwilling to release bodily fluids in my presence.
translation: 我尝试过观测更多的案例，但是实验体似乎不愿意在我在场的时候排放体液。

original: "Looping gesture of greeting?"
translation: “代表问好的循环姿势？”

original: Looping, yes. It is a scientific fact that hormones drive a percentage of Lobotomites into recursive behavior patterns.
translation: 循环，是的。科学事实说明，激素会促使一定比例的无脑人以循环往复的模式行动。

original: We haven't researched this, as my colleagues care little about the behavior patterns of Lobotomites once their brains are removed.
translation: 我们还没有研究过这个。因为在无脑人的大脑被移除后，我的同事们就对它们的行为模式不感兴趣了。

original: It is why so many are littered around the facility - like skinvelopes, discarded, after they are peeled open and the contents extracted.
translation: 这就是为什么那么多无脑人被丢弃在设施周围。它们就像空壳，被剥开皮取出里面的东西之后便被遗弃。

original: The quick Scribe jumped over the lazy Paladin?
translation: “敏捷的学士跳过懒惰的圣骑士？”

original: Yes, yes, go on. Seeing your... lips and mouth forming the words... both revolting... and somehow...
translation: 好，好，继续。看看你的…嘴唇塑造出的那些词句…真是令人作呕…而且…

original: ...how does it feel to have the flesh roll around in your mouth like that? To control each muscle... and the tongue...
translation: …把你嘴中的那团肉卷起来是一种什么感觉呢？去控制每一块肌肉…和舌头…

original: ...like having a fish, or extremely dexterous slug, lolling and flopping in one's... mouthal cavity.
translation: …像是有条鱼，或者灵巧的鼻涕虫，倚卧和搅动在一个人的…口腔里。

original: Can you tell me about Dr. Mobius?
translation: 你能告诉我关于莫比乌斯博士的事情吗？

original: Dr. Mobius! A monstrous brain, creased with wrinkles of a thousand evils, with but one jaundiced eye with which to perceive the world!
translation: 莫比乌斯博士！一个畸形的脑袋，大脑褶皱里藏着万千罪恶，用一只偏执的独眼去观察世界！

original: Exiled from the Think Tank for crimes too heinous to remain in recorded memory. And, perhaps, differences in research methodology.
translation: 他因为罪大恶极而被思想体流放。也或许，是因为研究方法的差异。

original: His one terrible eye forever peers at us, an eye of ever-increasing magnification. He watches from his Dome in the Forbidden Zone, spying on us all.
translation: 他恐怖的独眼永远注视着我们，一只越来越大的眼睛。他从禁区的穹顶监视着我们所有人。

original: Is this thing on? This is Mobius - Dr. Mobius. We're... initiating some kind of emergency test shutdown... in five...
translation: 听得到吗？这里是莫比乌斯，莫比乌斯博士。现在准备测试紧急关停功能…倒计时从五开始…

original: Four, as in Forbidden...
translation: 四，就如禁止…

original: Three, as in tree...
translation: 三，就如参天巨木…

original: Two, as in "Et Two, Brutus?"...
translation: 二，就如“连你也起二心了吗，布鲁图斯？”…

original: One, as in none. Oh look, the emergency overload is initiating.
translation: 一，就如一无所有。哦看，紧急过载程序已启动。

original: Enough. I had questions.
translation: 够了，我有事情要问你。

original: You're welcome, 8. It was my pleasure.
translation: 不用谢，8，很高兴能帮到你。

original: I'll talk to Klein in a second, quit pressuring me.
translation: 我会立刻和克莱因谈的，别再催我了。

original: No, haven't dealt with Mobius yet.
translation: 不，我还没有解决莫比乌斯博士。

original: Trust me, I'll get the technologies, all right?
translation: 相信我，我会找到那些技术的，好吗？

original: I know, I probably should put it to use counting cards.
translation: 我知道，或许我该用它来记牌。

original: I have an ear for it, I suppose.
translation: 我想，我会留意的。

original: Well, I just heard the rhythm in the sequence is all.
translation: 好吧，我只听到一系列有规律的音韵。

original: Can't get away from their code, even with voice modules, huh?
translation: 即使你有声音模块的时候，也摆脱不了他们的代码，对吧？

original: Well, I've hacked enough RobCo terminals to know.
translation: 好吧，我可是黑了很多的罗伯科终端才知道的。

original: I'm just full of surprises.
translation: 我震惊了。

original: You really make me want to kick that voice box of yours.
translation: 你真的让我想踹你的音箱。

original: We'll just move on, I need time to figure this out.
translation: 先这样吧，我需要时间来弄明白这事。

original: Um... yes, definitely a pattern.
translation: 唔…没错，你的发声确实有一种模式。

original: Forget I brought it up. Until I bring it up again.
translation: 忘了我提起过这事吧，在我再次提起它之前。

original: Like I said, technical. Very technical.
translation: 如我所言，有技术含量，太有技术含量了。

original: I have no idea what you just said. Moreso than usual.
translation: 更甚往常，完全不知道你在说啥。

original: Maybe I should have asked who you used to be.
translation: 或许我本应该问你以前是谁。

original: Sounds important. I think.
translation: 听起来还挺重要。

original: Um... good to meet you... uh... double... circle... a... dash... whoever.
translation: 呃…很高兴见到你…唔…两个…圆圈…一个…破折号…是谁都好。

original: Knew asking you would be useless.
translation: 就知道问你没用。

original: I swear your brain... tank... thing just sparked.
translation: 我发誓你的大脑…罐里的…它的神经亮了一下。

original: You sound agitated. Or you're percolating. Or something.
translation: 你听上去很激动，或者你在试探，或者别的什么。

original: Would you rather I called it the Big Shithole?
translation: 你想让我叫它大粪坑吗？

original: Whoa, easy there... whatever you are. Brain. Jar. Thing.
translation: 哇哦，放轻松……不管你是什么。大脑、罐子，还是什么东西。

original: No need to get indignant, was just asking a question.
translation: 别这么生气，只是问个问题而已。

original: If you just said, "this place seems like a scientific loony bin," I agree.
translation: 如果你刚才说，“这地方像是个疯狂科学家聚居地”，我同意。

original: Are you all right? Kind of ran out of steam in the middle there.
translation: 你没事吧？跟泄气了一样。

original: You sound a little down.
translation: 你听起来有些失落。

original: I got it already, those two names give you nightmares.
translation: 我明白了，那两个名字是你的噩梦。

original: You're going to pop a monitor shaft if you keep that up.
translation: 如果你继续这样，你的显示屏杆就要坏掉了。

original: All right, all right... just calm down. Didn't mean to alarm you.
translation: 好吧，好吧…淡定，淡定。不是故意吓你的。

original: Tell me about the Big Empty... uh, Big Mountain, that is.
translation: 和我谈谈大坑洞（Big Empty）……呃，也就是大山脉。

original: Tell me about the Big Empty.
translation: 和我谈谈大坑洞（Big Empty）。

original: Can you tell me about these technologies Klein wants?
translation: 你能和我谈谈那些克莱因博士想要的技术吗？

original: The more you speak... something's... technical about the way you're squawking at me.
translation: 你说的越多……总觉得你冲我叫嚷的方式……似乎带有某种系统性和专业性。

original: Wait, after listening a bit - that's RobCo termlink protocol you're broadcasting, right?
translation: 等等，听了一些之后…你在播放的是罗伯科终端链接协议，对吗？

original: There's a... pattern to your speech or something.
translation: 你的语言，或者别的什么……有某种模式

original: You're emitting characters in patterns of 8, bracketed, with tone adjustment at the end.
translation: 你使用和8一样的模式发言，然后在结尾处调整了一下语气。

original: I'm pretty sure you can understand me, and I want some answers.
translation: 我确信你能理解我的意思，我想要些答案。

original: You better not be cussing me out right now.
translation: 你最好别在骂我。

original: Is... that a yes? Or a no? Or... a yes-no?
translation: 那是知道？还是不知道？还是既知道又不知道？

original: Do you know anything about Dr. Mobius or the Forbidden Zone?
translation: 你知道关于莫比乌斯博士或者禁区的事情吗？

original: Who are you?
translation: 你是谁？

original: Can I ask you some questions?
translation: 我能问你一些问题吗？

original: That... uh... is too bad. Or good. Or something.
translation: 那……唔，太糟了。或者很好。或者别的什么。

original: Questions? Like what?
translation: 问题？比如说？

original: Previous test subjects who have come here have had many questions for us. We answered them with science, fire, and termination.
translation: 先前到这里的实验体也有很多问题要问我们。我们用科学、火力和终结回答了他们。

original: This used to be a mountain?
translation: 这里以前是一座山？

original: Yes, Big MT was quite big indeed until the Great Static. Then the top of the mountain was used as part of a detonation experiment.
translation: 是的，大 山脉确实很大，直到“大静电”事件。在那时，山顶还被用来做爆炸试验。

original: This cleared additional space in the Crater, however, allowing us more real estate to build upon. Convenient. Efficient.
translation: 不过现在这坑洞里腾出了额外空间，允许我们建造更多实验场所，真是方便高效。

original: Previous test subjects?
translation: 先前的实验体？

original: Oh, yes. We've had other subjects visit. It's why we had to calibrate the pacification field and warm up our brainial beams and vivisectors.
translation: 哦，是的。有别的实验体来过。这就是为什么我们不得不校准好平静场，准备好脑波射线和解剖器。

original: Only a short time ago, we had three minus one subjects arrive, and they ruined several experiments and even injured two of our staff.
translation: 不久之前，我们有“3减1”个实验体来访，他们破坏了几个试验，甚至伤了我的两个同事。

original: It is a shame their brains left with them. With you, however, we have taken precautions to insure that problem won't repeat itself.
translation: 这是个耻辱，他们居然保住了自己的脑子。但是对于你，我们已经实施了预防措施，保证同样的问题不会重演。

original: We've conditioned you so you can't speak of this place, discuss our secrets, or attempt to use force against us in any way. Isn't that nice?
translation: 我们已经束缚住了你，所以你无法谈论这个地方，无法讨论我们的秘密，或者试图以武力反抗我们。不错吧？

original: Can you tell me about the Big Empty... uh, Big Mountain?
translation: 你能和我谈谈大坑洞（Big Empty）……唔，大山脉吗？

original: This mountain... now crater... encompasses the sum total of knowledge of humankind. It is Big MT. Where all questions can be answered.
translation: 这座山…现在的环形坑…包含有人类所有的知识。这就是大山脉，在这里，所有问题都能找到答案。

original: You'll see. No matter what your questions, Big MT will provide the answers. As it has done for so many before you.
translation: 你会看到的。不管是什么问题，大山脉都会提供答案。不管是给你，还是给你之前的许多人。

original: Can you tell me about the Big Empty?
translation: 你能给我讲一下大坑洞（Big Empty）吗？

original: The "Big Empty?" Now, that's not a proper title for this research facility. You sound like previous test subjects that came here.
translation: “大坑洞（Big Empty）？” 其实吧，用这个代号来称呼这所研究设施并不是很妥当。你和先前来这里的那些实验体一样，弄错了这里的代号。

original: I don't understand how the tech Klein wants will help.
translation: 我不理解克莱因博士想要的技术都有什么用。

original: It'll all become clear. If not, at least we will have the technology here at the Dome where all technology belongs.
translation: 马上就会真相大白的。就算没有，至少我们能把这些技术放回穹顶——这里是它们应该在的地方。

original: When we have all the technology, all the answers, we can share it with the world, piece by piece. All will be in order. And all will be like Big MT.
translation: 当我们掌握了全部的技术，找到所有的答案，我们就能跟全世界共享，一件接一件。之后万物都将井井有条，一如“大山脉”这里。

original: Why did you remove my brain? And... how?
translation: 你为什么要拿走我的大脑？还有…你是怎么做到的？

original: Oh, removing it is a simple procedure. Well, except the complications it can cause to the heart and spine.
translation: 哦，取走脑子是很简单的操作，假如你不去管这样做会对心脏和脊柱造成的并发症。

original: But once the heart and spine are gone... no trouble at all. Clamp the subject down, one laser incision around the skull, crack, snip, done.
translation: 但是一旦心脏和脊柱也被去掉…那就什么问题都没有了。按紧实验体，再用镭射切开它的头骨，把脑子取出来。搞定。

original: The brain is finally free of the skinvelope, which is then kept automated for clean up duties around Big MT. Lobotomites.
translation: 大脑从此不再受皮囊的限制。皮囊，也就是无脑人，从此会一直在大山脉自动执行清洁任务。

original: With you, however, something is definitely wrong. We've never had a Lobotomite who kept speaking after being forcibly lobotomized.
translation: 至于你嘛，肯定有哪里不对劲。没有一只无脑人，在我们切掉它们的脑子后，还能不停地说话。

original: I am relieved the pacification field is working. If it didn't, I would broadcast some concern to my colleagues about safety protocols.
translation: 幸亏“平静场”还在正常运行，不然我就要和同事们抱怨安全协议的问题了。

original: "First head chief researcher?" Lot of titles.
translation: “一级首席主研究员？”这头衔太多了吧。

original: What is a name without a title or suffix for the sake of hierarchy? It is a long-standing quantification of personality and importance.
translation: 要是名字不带有头衔或后缀，如何表示出一个人地位的高低？头衔可以有效量化人的品质和重要程度。

original: We could not do without it. Surely you must be aware of the gravity of such attached appellations - just as surely as you must have a title.
translation: 我们不能没有它，你必须明白这些头衔的份量，就像你自己也必须有一个头衔。

original: 211 doctorates? How is that even possible?
translation: 211个博士学位？怎么可能？

original: Why, we create not only scientific marvels here at Big MT, but new sciences as well.
translation: 怎么不可能，我们在大山脉里不光创造了科学的奇迹，也创造了新的科学门类。

original: Everything can be quantified, categorized, and dissected until every group can be subgrouped or partitioned.
translation: 万物皆可量化、分类、解析，直至每个部分都能建立联系，并成为一个更大系统的一部分。

original: What's "formography?"
translation: 什么是“形体学”？

original: It's excessive examination of the human form to achieve psychological arousal.
translation: 这是种过度关注人体的研究，为了达到精神上的性奋。

original: Disgusting. I would never succumb to such... base appetites. Distractions. Filthy, filthy distractions.
translation: 真恶心，我绝不会屈从于这种恶趣味的。真是恶趣味，太龌龊了，龌龊的恶趣味。

original: Who are you? What do you do here?
translation: 你是什么人？在这里做什么？

original: Why, my little bear of teddyness, I am Doctor Dala, first head chief researcher of mineralogy and medicinal sciences.
translation: 怎么了，我的小泰迪熊。我是达拉博士，矿物学和医学的一级首席主研究员。

original: I have 211 doctorates in both applied sciences and techniques to apply those sciences. I also possess a degree in Curiosity and Advanced Curiosity.
translation: 我在应用科学和应用这些科学的技术领域拥有211个博士学位。我还有着好奇学和高级好奇学学位。

original: That is merely schooling, however. When possible, I prefer field work and observation to holotape eidetics. It has proven useful, especially now.
translation: 虽然那都只是书斋上的学问。有可能的话，我更喜欢跑跑田野，做实地考察，而不是分析全息磁带的图像。这种工作方式公认很有用，尤其是现在。

original: I have become the expert on humanology and Lobotomite behavior here at Big MT. My research doesn't descend into formography, it is only Science.
translation: 在大山脉这里，我成了一名研究人类、无脑人行为的专家。我的研究只是科学而已，无关什么“形体学”。

original: Not right now. I have questions instead.
translation: 现在不行，我有些问题。

original: Not exactly. I have questions I need answers to.
translation: 不完全是。我有问题，也需要回答。

original: How randomized. Ask your... questions then.
translation: 真独特。那你…问吧。

original: An interrogation. How fascinating. Please begin.
translation: 这是审讯么。真吸引人。请继续。

original: Perhaps you are stuck in a looping gesture of verbal intercourse.
translation: 或许你陷入“言语交流的循环姿势”里了。

original: Oh, and... here's a tip. That's customary, isn't it... been so long, really.
translation: 哦…给你小费，这是惯例，不是吗…上次好像都是很久以前了。

original: B-b-bloop. Buuuuh-buh-bloop.
translation: 噗噗。噗噗噗。

original: B-b-bloop. Phew. Last little bit there. Ahhh. Hooo.
translation: 噗噗…好，还差一点。啊啊，哦哦哦哦。

original: Mmmmm. Thank you, Lobotomite. Please... you must come back for further study when I've had a rest. I'm a little sensitive right now.
translation: 唔…谢了，无脑人。我休息好后请你务必回来，让我进一步研究。我现在有点敏感。

original: What happened with the visitors?
translation: 来访者做了什么？

original: Ask Doctor O... and you could have asked 8 once, until he was severely damaged in the attack. We like him better this way.
translation: 问O博士去…如果8博士没在那次袭击中受损，你也可以去问他。不过我们更喜欢他现在的样子就是了。

original: What was the question?
translation: 他问了什么问题？

original: I do not know, nor should we try to access it. Perhaps Klein has the logs.
translation: 我不知道，我们也不该尝试再去访问它。也许克莱因还留着记录。

original: My evaluation would be to let your own curiosity go. I do not think that Klein remembers the conversation as being satisfactory.
translation: 我的评估是：扔掉你的好奇心吧。我觉得克莱因也不会认为这是次合意的谈话，更不会把谈话内容记住。

original: I had other questions.
translation: 我还有其他问题。

original: There was another Courier?
translation: 这里还有另一个邮差来过吗？

original: Of course. You must have met others in your travels. This one had met other couriers, too, although it sounded as if he hadn't met the correct one.
translation: 当然了。你在你的旅途中肯定也遇见过其他的同行。这个邮差也一样，尽管听起来他还没遇到对的那个。
