original: He asked us all many questions, and then he asked a most perplexing one... we had to segment the event out of our memories for safety.
translation: 他问了我们很多问题，令人费解的问题…安全起见，我们不得不删除了那段记忆。

original: I'm sometimes called a "Courier."
translation: 我有时被称作“邮差”。

original: Oh, a mailman. A delivery man. Someone who takes parcels from place to place using their primitive feet or similar conveyance.
translation: 哦，邮递员，送信的，利用他们原始的脚，或者同样原始的代步工具，带着包裹从一个地方跑到另一个地方。

original: You are the second one I've met in recent times. Very different specimens.
translation: 你是我最近遇到的第二个“邮差”。你们作为样本真是大不相同。

original: X-13 breached? No... even that stealth suit won't hide you from my Robo-Scorpion army. Sting the intruder, my pets! Sting them until they are stupid.
translation: X-13被入侵了？不…在我的机械蝎面前，你就算穿了潜行服也无处可藏。宠物们，给我去蜇入侵者！把他们蜇到傻了为止。

original: So... you recovered the Sonic Emitter schematics - or was it the frequency? No matter. It'll broadcast your screams as my Robo-Scorpions destroy you!
translation: 所以…你取回了声波发射器的图纸，亦或是频率？不过也不重要了，反正我的机械蝎毁灭你时，它会广播你的惨叫！

original: Dr. Mobius' message - can you replay it?
translation: 你能重放一遍莫比乌斯博士的来讯吗？

original: IF YOU MUST. HE'S CLEARLY DERANGED. ALL RIGHT, WHERE IS THE INFERNAL PLAY BUTTON? AH. HERE.
translation: 如果你一定要的话。他已经完全疯了。好吧，那个该死的播放按钮在哪来着？啊，在这儿。

original: If it isn't my old colleagues, the mighty "Think Tank" of Big MT. Big fools, all of you.
translation: 这不是我的老同事们吗，大山脉万能的思想体们，你们所有人都是大笨蛋。

original: It is I, Dr. Mobius, transmitting from my dome-shaped... dome in the Forbidden Zone. A zone... that is, yes... forbidden to you.
translation: 是我，莫比乌斯博士，我从穹顶样子的…禁区穹顶发来通讯。那里是个…对，你们被禁止靠近的区域。

original: Even now, my deadly Robo-Scorpions swarm across Big MT with their pincers and pointy laser tails. Soon, all Science will be mine.
translation: 现在，我那致命的机械蝎群正凭借着巨钳和激光尾刺横行大山脉。很快，所有的科技都将属于我。

original: Even the technologies sealed in the Big MT research centers cannot save you. So cower in your "Think Tank." Wait, for the end.
translation: 大山脉研究中心里的技术也救不了你们。所以都给我龟缩在"智库"里，等着…你们的死期吧。

original: That's all.
translation: 就是这些了。

original: Goodbye.
translation: 呃，再见。

original: Oh, is someone playing with the power...? My X-42 Giant Robo-Scorpion lives AGAIN!
translation: 哦，有人摆弄过电源…？我的X-42机械巨蝎又活了！

original: Oh... it looks like the target drones got activated and - oh, how cute, they're engaging the X-42 Giant Robo-Scorpion. Let's see the shrapnel fly!
translation: 哦…看起来靶机启动了…哦，太可爱了，他们在与X-42机械巨蝎交战。快看这弹片漫天纷飞的景象！

original: Test data processed... Firmware updated to version 1.1. Boot Damping Sensors online.
translation: 测试数据处理完毕…固件已更新至版本1.1。靴子阻尼传感器已上线。

original: Test data processed... Firmware updated to version 1.2. Aural Subnet online.
translation: 测试数据处理完毕…固件已更新至版本1.2。听觉子网络已上线。

original: Test data processed... Firmware updated to version 1.3. Torso fitment synced to user's physiology.
translation: 测试数据处理完毕…固件已更新至版本1.3。使用者生理机能数据已同步至躯干配件。

original: Test data processed... Firmware updated to version 1.4. Impulse Accelerator online.
translation: 测试数据处理完毕…固件已更新至版本1.4。脉冲加速器已上线。

original: Test data processed... Advanced Optics Online.
translation: 测试数据处理完毕…高级光学设备已上线。

original: The ton of things sounds good.
translation: 还是有成吨的瓶盖比较保险。

original: [SUCCEEDED] AGAIN, THE LOGIC OF THE REQUEST IS CLEAR. TONNAGE IS NOT NEEDED, ONLY ADEQUATE WEIGHT. EVERYONE, DISPLAY YOUR THINGS.
translation: [成功]克莱因：又一次，你需求的逻辑很明确。成吨不至于，但要有足够重量。诸位，都拿出来吧。

original: Hold on, let's be logical about this. I don't need a ton, just as much as I can carry in trade.
translation: 等等，让我们更有逻辑一点。我用不了一吨，只要在交易中足够用就行。

original: [FAILED] NO. IF THOSE DON'T WORK, THEN YOU WILL HAVE TO SELL IT YOUR NOSE OR SOME OF YOUR PENISES.
translation: [失败]克莱因：没有了。如果那些没用的话，你就必须割下鼻子或一段生殖器卖掉。

original: Still feels a little light. Might need a little more.
translation: 还是感觉有点轻。可能需要再来一点。

original: [SUCCEEDED] IF I WERE NOT AS INTELLIGENT AS I AM, I WOULD FEEL AS IF PERHAPS I AM BEING TRICKED. UNPOSSIBLE. O - MORE.
translation: [成功]克莱因：要不是我这么聪明，我就会发现我被忽悠了。这当然是不可能的。O，再来点。

original: I'd hate to come back and ask for more. A little extra would guarantee you're not disturbed.
translation: 万一不够，我也不希望还跑回来找你要。多给一点，我保证不会再来打搅你们。

original: [FAILED] NO. IF THOSE DON'T WORK, THEN YOU WILL HAVE TO SELL IT YOUR NOSE OR SOME OF YOUR PENISES.
translation: [失败]克莱因：没有了。如果那些没用的话，你就必须割下鼻子或一段生殖器卖掉。

original: Um... excuse me, do you have any more?
translation: 唔…我问一下啊，还有更多瓶盖吗？

original: [SUCCEEDED] AGAIN, YOUR LOGIC IS UNASSAILABLE IN ITS SIMPLISTIC NEED. O?
translation: [成功]克莱因：又一次，你的逻辑在这简单的需求中无懈可击。O博士？

original: This amount clearly represents a deficiency in the amount of caps needed.
translation: 很明显，这点数量的瓶盖距离所需数量还有一定距离。

original: [FAILED] NO. IF THOSE DON'T WORK, THEN YOU WILL HAVE TO SELL IT YOUR NOSE OR SOME OF YOUR PENISES.
translation: [失败]克莱因：没有了。如果那些没用的话，你就去割下鼻子或自己的生殖器卖掉吧。

original: Did you say "barter?"
translation: 你是说“交易”？

original: [SUCCEEDED] I CANNOT DISPUTE YOUR LOGIC. DO WE HAVE OBJECTS TO ACTIVATE THE CHIP'S EXCHANGE ROUTINES?
translation: [成功]你的逻辑无可非议。各位，用来激活人格芯片交易功能的东西，我们这里有吗？

original: I can trade with the Sink Intelligence? Then I'll need something to activate that function, won't I?
translation: 我能和汇聚节点的人工智能做交易？那我还需要些东西来激活这个功能，对吧？

original: [FAILED] NO, O DID. HE FAVORS THAT ARCHAIC TERM OF COMMERCE. I SEE NO NEED TO ELABORATE ON SUCH DATED METHODS OF MATERIAL GAIN.
translation: [失败]不，只有O会这样。他很偏爱那种古老的商业方式——以物易物。我实在无法理解，为什么要使用如此陈旧的方式来获取物资。

original: Um... before I go "reclaim" this tech, are you sure your plan will work?
translation: 唔…在去“回收”技术前我多问一句，你确定你的计划会奏效吗？

original: [SUCCEEDED] THE PLAN IS VERY COMPLICATED. WE ARE STILL CALCULATING HOW IT WOULD WORK IF IT SUCCEEDED. THAT IS OUR PART OF THE PLAN.
translation: [成功]这计划很复杂。我们尚在计算它成功后将会如何运行。但那是计划里我们要做的，不是你。

original: What exactly is the plan? You're losing me in the generalities, I need specifics.
translation: 那计划到底是什么？你总是模棱两可，我想听细节。

original: [FAILED] WE ARE ALWAYS SURE IN WHAT WE DO. YOU MUST BE SURE IN WHAT YOU DO. WHICH IS GETTING THESE TECHNOLOGIES FOR US.
translation: [失败]我们永远清楚自己在干什么。你也要清楚你要干什么：为我们取回那些技术。

original: You extracted my brain... but what do you mean, "misplaced" it?
translation: 你们取出了我的大脑…但你说“弄丢了”是什么意思？

original: If you ripped out my brain, where the hell is it?
translation: 如果是你们挖走了我的脑子，那它到底去哪了？

original: You took out my brain, heart, and spine?
translation: 你们取走了我的大脑、心脏，还有脊椎？

original: THAT AUTO-DOC-JUNKHEAP WAS ONE OF MOBIUS' CREATIONS, LIKE THE REST OF THE TALKING SCRAP METAL IN THE ATTIC.
translation: 克莱因：那台垃圾自动医生，像其余在楼上的能说话的废铁一样，是莫比乌斯的杰作之一。

original: *After that, the brain lost itself - not in the metaphysical sense. Might have gotten flushed into one of the pipes. Actually, that's pretty likely.*
translation: O：*在那之后，你的大脑就迷失了，我不是指形而上学意义上的。它可能被冲进管道里了，唔，很有可能。*

original: -If so, it was FLUSHED all the way to MOBIUS! Fwooooooosh! That... is the sound of FLUSHING.-
translation: 鲍鲁斯：-那样的话，它就会一直被冲到莫比乌斯那里！哗啦！那是…我在模仿水流声。-

original: BY THE FISSURE OF ROLANDO... ENOUGH OF THIS BIOLOGICAL SURGERY TALK.
translation: 克莱因：以罗兰多脑沟之名…别再讨论这个生物的外科手术问题了。

original: LOBOTOMITE, LISTEN TO MY VOICE. IT DENOMINATES ME TO ASK, BUT... WE NEED YOUR HELP.
translation: 无脑人，听我说，我们需要你的帮助。

original: IN MOST PROBABLE OF PROBABILITIES, OUR ENEMY, MOBIUS, HAS YOUR BRAIN. THIS IS NOT GOOD. HE WILL MOST LIKELY COME AFTER OUR BRAINS NEXT.
translation: 我们的敌人，莫比乌斯，很有可能拿到了你的大脑。这可不太妙，目测他下一步就要来取我们的大脑了。

original: WE WANT YOU TO STOP HIM. SOMEHOW. WITH SCIENCE.
translation: 我们想请你去阻止他，对，用科学的力量。

original: To be correct, you should say, "the Auto-Doc" took out your brain. It did all the heavy lifting. It has never worked so hard before. It was unusual.
translation: 达拉：需要纠正一下，应该说是“自动医生”取走了你的大脑。它完成了所有这些繁重的工作。它以前可没这么勤快，这很不寻常。

original: It worked so hard on your surgery, it destroyed its own memory. Zzt. How odd. I bet your brain remembers what happened.
translation: 给你做手术时它干得很卖力，以至于把自己的存储芯片都烧坏了。真古怪。我敢打赌你的大脑肯定还记得当时发生的事。

original: How much surgery did you do on me? I feel like a badly-put-together jigsaw puzzle.
translation: 你给我做了多少手术？我感觉自己像是拼图一样，被强行拼凑在一起。

original: That is my responsibility.
translation: 达拉：这是我的原因。

original: Although in truth, the Auto-Doc had done most of the work already. Quite industrious, almost cut into all my investigations.
translation: 事实上，自动医生已经完成大部分工作。它真的很能干，都快把我的工作部分也干完了。

original: Once it had removed the brain and I misplaced it, other organs began to cry for direction using your nerves as telegraph wires.
translation: 在它把你的大脑取走，而我又把大脑弄丢以后，你身体的其他器官就开始用神经发报，哭着喊着寻求指令。

original: Rather than let them send their signals, I removed them as well. Shhh, little organs. Go to sleep in your tanks, Dala loves you.
translation: 与其让它们不停发信号，我索性连它们一并切除了。嘘嘘嘘，小器官们，回罐子里睡觉吧，达拉爱你们哟。

original: -First, was the HEART!-
translation: 鲍鲁斯：-首先，是心脏！-

original: -Wait, I mean... SECOND was the heart. Brain was first. THIRD... was the SPINE.-
translation: 鲍鲁斯：-等等，我想说的是…第二个才是心脏。首先应该是大脑。第三个…是脊柱。-

original: *Spine. Totally overrated, that arrangement of vertebrae.*
translation: O：*脊柱。看来真高估你了，你只能排在第三位。*

original: *"Look at me, with my lumbar and thoracic curvature." Never had a use for any of that. Spineless is what I prefer.*
translation: *“瞧瞧我腰椎和胸椎的曲度。”这些都没有用，我更喜欢无脊椎。*

original: Why am I all cut up? I feel like some kid was playing with my insides.
translation: 为什么我被切开了？我感觉就像一帮小屁孩在玩我的内脏。

original: But I hurt all over!
translation: 但我浑身都是口子！

original: [SUCCEEDED] DALA. WAS IT NECESSARY THIS TIME?
translation: [成功]克莱因：达拉，这次有必要吗？

original: That doesn't explain the laser-sutures on my chest... and on my spine.
translation: 这并不能解释我胸口和背脊上的激光缝合口是怎么回事。

original: [FAILED] MAYBE YOU SHOULD HAVE REMOVED ITS VOICE BOX, DALA. I'M SURPRISED YOU DIDN'T, ACTUALLY.
translation: [失败]克莱因：也许你该把它的发声元件也移除掉，达拉。我真的很吃惊你竟然没有。

original: Is that why I feel so odd - and heavy?
translation: 这就是我感觉这么古怪和笨拙的原因？

original: Lobtomizing? You lobotomized me?
translation: 大脑切除？你把我的大脑切了？

original: You removed my brain?
translation: 你们移除了我的大脑？

original: We removed your brain, yes. So soft. Barely wrinkled, yet so... flush with knowledge and experience.
translation: 达拉：是的，我们取走了你的大脑。软软的，几乎没有褶皱，而且…还充满知识和经验。

original: Brain extraction technology has been standard practice at Big MT for an immeasurable amount of time.
translation: 在大山脉，大脑提取技术形成一套标准操作流程已经有很长时间了，我们对此有丰富经验。

original: -Once the brain was out, then came the COILS. The TESLA coils... the coils of NIKOLA Tesla.-
translation: 鲍鲁斯：-一旦大脑被取出，空地儿就会被线圈占据。是特斯拉线圈…尼古拉.特斯拉的线圈。-

original: *Yeah, 8, no need to brag. Wherever your brain is, it's transmitting thoughts to you through the... what... the, um... uh...*
translation: O：*对，8，没必要吹嘘。无论你大脑在哪，它还是会向你传递思想，通过…呃…通过啥…*

original: -The TESLA COILS! In its HEAD!-
translation: 鲍鲁斯：-特斯拉线圈！在它头里面的！-

original: This is fortunate in many respects. If your brain was anywhere in the Dome, why, you could access your aggression centers.
translation: 达拉：这挺幸运的。假如你的大脑在穹顶这的任何地方，怎么说呢，你就能发起攻击。

original: CIRCUMVENTING THE PACIFICATION FIELD. THIS IS A NO-NO. WE HAVE NEVER BEEN IN A FIGHT. WE DO NOT WANT THAT.
translation: 克莱因：那意味着“平静场”失效，这是禁忌。我们从未战斗过，我们也不想战斗。

original: -Reminds me of my days in American High. And Richie Marcus.-
translation: 鲍鲁斯：-我又想起了我念美国高中的日子，还有里奇.马库斯…-

original: -Dr. Klein, WAIT! I... I don't believe those gestures were random. Random AT ALL.-
translation: 鲍鲁斯：-克莱因博士，等等！我…我不觉得那些手势是随机的。全都不是。-

original: -It's been following our conversation! The Lobotomite... understands us!-
translation: -它在听我们说话！这只无脑人竟然…竟然能理解我们在说什么！-

original: <Display middle finger.>
translation: <竖起中指>

original: [SUCCEEDED] NOW IT'S HOLDING UP AN ARRAY OF FULLY-ERECT HAND PENISES. IF IT TRIES TO INSERT THEM, ACTIVATE VIVISECTORS.
translation: [成功]克莱因：现在它的手上竖起了一条勃起的生殖器。如果它想插入，马上启动活体解剖。

original: <Hold up one finger, point at self. Point at them, hold up five fingers.>
translation: <竖起一根指头，指着自己。指一指他们，伸出五根手指。>

original: [FAILED] GREAT. NOW THE PENIS ON ITS HAND IS ACHIEVING ERECTION.
translation: [失败] 克莱因：该死，现在它手上的生殖器全都勃起了。

original: <Blink slowly with a blank expression.>
translation: <面无表情地慢慢眨眼>

original: [SUCCEEDED] WHAT... WHAT IS IT DOING? DID WE INSTITUTE ELECTROSHOCK? OR IS IT EXCRETING?
translation: [成功]克莱因：它在做什么？我们是不是电到它了？还是说，它在排泄？

original: <Wave hands and nod.>
translation: <摆摆手点点头>

original: [FAILED] CLEARLY THERE WAS ELECTROSHOCK. JUST LOOK AT IT, ITS FACIAL TISSUES SAGGING ALL OVER THE PLACE.
translation: [失败]克莱因：很明显它是触电了。看看它，面部组织全都下垂了。

original: If you don't tell me what I need to find, I can't help you, all right?
translation: 如果你不告诉我应该找什么，我便无法帮助你，对吧？

original: Come on. Brains can't talk... well, most brains.
translation: 少来了，大脑又不能讲话…呃，大多数不能。

original: What do you mean?
translation: 你说的是什么意思？

original: My brain would know?
translation: 我的大脑会知道？

original: IT CAN "COMMUNICATE" THE PROCEDURE WHEN WE EXAMINE IT. IT IS CONCEIVABLE TO TRACE ITS SURGICAL SCALPELPRINTS ONCE WE HAVE THE BRAIN.
translation: 我们能通过它了解当时的手术流程。一旦拿到你的大脑，我们就能循着手术刀留下的痕迹一路追索。

original: MIGHT TAKE SOME TIME BUT YOUR BRAIN HAS NO PAIN NERVES TO SCREAM AT US WHILE WE DISSECT IT. CONVENIENT. I DETEST SCREAMING IN MY LAB.
translation: 可能要花些时间，但你的大脑没有痛感神经，也就没法在被解剖的时候朝着我们大叫。真方便，我讨厌在实验室里听到尖叫声。

original: So the Comp-Doc does... what Mobius would do if he was here, chopping me up?
translation: 所以自动医生干了…莫比乌斯在这也会干的事，像这样把我切开？

original: [SUCCEEDED] YES. ALWAYS LEAVES BACKDOORS INTO THINGS, HAVE TO KEEP FINDING THEM AND CLOSING THEM.
translation: [成功]对。他总是给东西留后门。我们总是要找出他留的后门，然后封闭。

original: THE AUTO-DOC IS NOW ERASED OF HIS ROUTINES, IT WAS THOROUGH. ONLY MOBIUS WOULD KNOW FOR SURE WHAT HAPPENED WITH THE PROCEDURE... PERHAPS.
translation: 自动医生的程序已经彻底损坏了，现在只有莫比乌斯确切地知道手术过程中发生了什么事…大概。

original: WELL, AND YOUR BRAIN, OF COURSE. IT WOULD KNOW AS WELL.
translation: 好吧，当然了，还有你的大脑，它也会知道的。

original: Mobius set up the Auto-Doc medical routines, so you think he's responsible for the post-organ-dump?
translation: 莫比乌斯编写了自动医生的程序，所以你认为是他把我的大脑弄走了？

original: [FAILED] WE CAN DISCUSS THIS ANOTHER TIME WHEN YOU'VE EVOLVED. FOR NOW, MY PATIENCE LEVELS ARE RAPIDLY DEPLETING.
translation: [失败]我们可以以后再谈这个问题，等你进化完全之后。现在，我已经快不耐烦了。

original: You said... "surge" code? You mean like computer stuff in the Doc?
translation: }你刚才说…“手术”代码？你是指自动医生里像软件芯片一类的东西？

original: [SUCCEEDED] MOBIUS' LEGACY CODE WAS IN THE OLD AUTO-DOC, YES. IT FRIED ITSELF AFTER YOUR PROCEDURE, SO WE COULDN'T TELL FOR SURE.
translation: [成功]对，那台旧的自动医生确实遗留有莫比乌斯的代码。但在完成你的手术后，自动医生就烧坏了，所以我们没法确定。

original: IT IS UNFORTUNATE. WE WOULD HAVE BENEFITED FROM KNOWING HOW THE BREAKTHROUGH OCCURRED. EVEN IF WE INSTALLED ANOTHER CHIP, THE INFORMATION IS LOST.
translation: 很不幸，我们本可以从你这次的手术中获益，这可是次突破性的进展。但即使我们再给自动医生装上另一个芯片，手术信息也找不回来了。

original: What's this Auto-Doc surgery code you mentioned?
translation: 你刚刚提到自动医生的手术代码，那是什么？

original: [FAILED] WE CAN DISCUSS THIS ANOTHER TIME WHEN YOU'VE EVOLVED. FOR NOW, MY PATIENCE LEVELS ARE RAPIDLY DEPLETING.
translation: [失败]我们可以以后再谈这个问题，等你进化完全之后。现在，我已经快不耐烦了。

original: I don't understand how poisons can dumbify you.
translation: 我不明白毒药怎么能降低你们的智力。

original: [SUCCEEDED] I AM NOT CERTAIN. PERHAPS IT ONLY AFFECTS MACHINES. IF SO, YOU MAY BE IMMUNE.
translation: [成功]我不太确定。也许它只对机器有影响。如果是这样，你应该是免疫的。

original: IF IT IS CHEMS, THEN WE HAVE NOTHING TO FEAR. SINCE WE ARE AFRAID, IT MUST NOT BE CHEMS AND YOU NEED NOT FEAR, WHICH MEANS YOU CAN TEST IT. LOGICAL.
translation: 如果它是化学品，那么我们就没什么好怕的。既然我们害怕，那它就一定不是化学品，那么你也就不必害怕，也就是说你可以安心对它进行测试。合乎逻辑吧。

original: Robo-Scorpions drain intelligence from living creatures - how? Chems?
translation: 机械蝎可以降低生物的智力？怎么做到的？用化学药物吗？

original: [FAILED] APPARENTLY THEY CAN. IT SEEMS AS IF YOU MAY HAVE BEEN STUNG YOURSELF.
translation: [失败] 这不是很明显吗。看起来你自己已经被蜇伤过了。

original: Wait... the metal scorpions can sting you stupid?
translation: 等等…机械蝎的尾刺能把你们蛰成傻子？

original: [SUCCEEDED] DR. O IS CERTAIN OF HIS FINDINGS. AND NO ONE ELSE IN THE THINK TANK IS WILLING TO TEST THE RESULTS. LOSS OF BRAINIAL POWER - TERRIFYING.
translation: [成功] 0博士对他的发现深信不疑。我们思想体也不会有人愿意去亲身验证。大脑力量的流失…没有比这更恐怖的了。

original: O HAS SAID ON MANY OCCASIONS HIS INABILITY TO COMPREHEND MOBIUS' ROBO-SCHEMATICS IS BECAUSE OF REPEATED ROBO-SCORPION STINGS.
translation: O博士曾经说过，很多次都是因为机械蝎尾刺的不断骚扰，他才没能解读出这些蝎子的机械电路图。

original: These mechanical Robo-Scorpions "consume" intelligence? Are you certain of your findings?
translation: 这些机械蝎能“降低”智力？你确定吗？

original: [FAILED] APPARENTLY THEY CAN. IT SEEMS AS IF YOU MAY HAVE BEEN STUNG YOURSELF.
translation: [失败]这不是很明显吗。看起来你自己已经被蜇伤过了。

original: Your voice module got damaged, I heard. In an attack.
translation: 我听说，在一次袭击中，你的发声模块受损了。

original: I agree. If someone would take the time, you're more than just sound effects in a tank.
translation: 我同意。如果某些人愿意花点时间，你说起话来就不会像在罐子里发出无意义声音。

original: No, no, I understand it's hard to learn a new language.
translation: 不，不，我明白再学一门新外语很难。

original: So your broadcast pattern is RobCo termlink, but not by choice.
translation: 因此你的发声模式是罗伯科公司的终端链接协议，不过你不是有意这样发声的。

original: Your damaged voice module... can you tell me about the attack?
translation: 你受损的发声模块…能否告诉我关于这次袭击的事？

original: Not to brag, but I was always more perceptive than everyone else.
translation: 不是吹牛，但我总是比其他任何人更敏锐。

original: Well, all life is patterns, you just got to let the unconscious process them.
translation: 好吧，生命都有各自的模式，你只是下意识在运行那些代码。

original: Uh... I just realized I'm understanding you.
translation: 嗯…我想我开始明白你在说什么了。

original: Well, the code's got some problems, I'm not arguing that.
translation: 好吧，代码是有些问题，我没在否认。

original: Heh-heh, nice pun on the header file ref.
translation: 嘿嘿，关于头文件的双关语，听着不错。

original: You didn't sound too convinced there.
translation: 你的话听起来没什么说服力。

original: Um... all right.
translation: 嗯…好吧。

original: Fine, fine. Can we move on?
translation: 好的，好的，我们能继续了吗？

original: All right, all right. Don't get all sympathetic and mushy.
translation: 好，好，别那么多愁善感嘛。

original: Like, uh, I would ever hurt you.
translation: 就像..唔..我会伤害你们。

original: I know what it means to be attacked without warning, trust me, 8.
translation: 在没有戒备的情况下被突然袭击…我知道这是什么滋味，真的，相信我，8。

original: No wonder you're all skittish.
translation: 难怪你们变得那么胆小。

original: And that took control of the trains? Before you all shut it down.
translation: 然后他借此控制了所有火车？在你有机会关掉它之前。

original: So one of the visitors didn't damage it - he reprogrammed it.
translation: 所以其中一位来访者没有破坏O，而是重编了它的程序。

original: This is a waste of time, forget it.
translation: 这是在浪费时间，算了吧。

original: Not... sure. What you meant.
translation: 不…确定，你什么意思？

original: I didn't catch that. Maybe part of the damage?
translation: 我不怎么了解，或许是那次损伤的一部分？

original: You don't really have a choice. And thanks for the gear.
translation: 你真的没有别的选择，多亏了你在用的这副罗伯科装备。

original: I know it won't work on attack protocols. Still, I may need someone on my side in a debate.
translation: 我知道这对攻击协议没什么用。不过，在争论中我可能会需要有人站在我这边。

original: And lastly, if I ever need you to blindly agree with me, you will. Understood?
translation: 最后，视乎我的需要，你得随时准备无条件支持我。明白了吗？

original: Now, unlock your room, I want what's in there.
translation: 现在，打开你的房间，我想要里面的东西。

original: And some Microfusion Cells...
translation: 还有一些微型核聚变电池…

original: All right. Let's see what you have. I'll take these Energy Cells...
translation: 好吧。让我看看你都有些什么。我可以拿走这些能量电池…

original: Look, don't make me regret this.
translation: 听着，别让我为此后悔。

original: All right, all right, quit your grinning, you idiot.
translation: 好吧，好吧，把你咧着的嘴闭上，你个白痴。

original: Not a problem. I know what it's like to be experimented on.
translation: 问题不大，我知道被当成试验对象是什么感觉。

original: It'll only take a second to violate your rights and make your voice mine.
translation: 哈！只需几秒钟就能剥夺你的权限，把你的声音变成我的。

original: If that's termlink code, don't worry, I'm not going to take advantage of your exposed code.
translation: 就算那是终端链接代码，也别担心，我不会利用你暴露出来的代码的。

original: Uh... if you're speaking that code stuff, I can hack you, right?
translation: 嗯…既然你在用的是那些代码，那我岂不是有办法黑掉你？

original: If that's RobCo termlink protocol, doesn't that mean it can be hacked?
translation: 如果这是罗伯科终端链接协议，岂不是说我能把它黑掉？

original: The less said about it, the better. Let's move on and forget about it.
translation: 别再说了。让我们忘掉它，这事就让它过去吧。

original: Usually, I can find some Cram lying around. Put some duct tape around the lid, good to go.
translation: 通常，我能在身边找到一些罐头，只要把胶带贴在盖子周围就行。

original: I usually just take a fusion cell and oscillate its charge, vibrates for like, an hour.
translation: 我通常取一块核聚变电池，使它里面的电荷震荡，震荡一小时。

original: Nothing to be embarrassed about, it's just that it's best to keep that stuff private, you know?
translation: 没什么不好意思的，只不过最好还是在私密场合干那事，懂吗？

original: Well, there had to be some other way to fire it up. Can we at least talk it over next time?
translation: 好吧，一定有其他方法能让它启动。下次我们能至少先商量一下吗？

original: How did you fire up the Sonic Emitter when I arrived again?
translation: 当我返回时你是怎么把声波发射器启动的？

original: Um, about when I first arrived. Tell me you didn't sonjaculate into the... my... Sonic Emitter.
translation: 嗯，当我第一次回来的时候，你没射在我的声波发射器上，对吧？

original: Can I have a Mentat?
translation: 能给我来个曼他特么？

original: Why, of course you can. I am well-versed in the Science of sharing. Well, when not chemmed out of my sphere.
translation: 哎呀，当然可以。我一向乐于分享。嗯，只要我没磕药嗑到失去理智。

original: Another? Why, of course. Happy to contribute to Science through chemistry.
translation: 再来一颗？当然可以。很高兴能够利用化学药品来为科学做贡献。

original: Come back within the sequential span of twenty-five hours minus one, I'll have more... or is it two or three more spans? Time, you elusive creature.
translation: 过25减1个小时的时间单位后再来找我，我就有更多能给你了…又或者要再过两到三个时间单位？哦时间，你可真难捉摸。

original: Great. More energy cells. Just what I need.
translation: 太好了。更多的能量电池，正是我需要的。

original: Oh... hey, thanks. Don't want it to run out, you're right.
translation: 噢…嘿，多谢。说得对，别让它没电了。

original: All right, all right, don't get too pleased to see it working at full capacity.
translation: 好吧，好吧，看到它满负荷运转别太兴奋了。

original: You should be proud. It's a nice device.
translation: 你应该骄傲。这个发射器真的很好用。

original: Something wrong? Your monitors are getting all fuzzy.
translation: 出了什么事？你的显示器都花了。

original: You're kind of creeping me out.
translation: 你吓了我一跳。

original: Are you okay? You look... really happy.
translation: 你还好吗？你看起来…真的很开心。

original: Too bad the force field disruption only works here.
translation: 太糟了，力场失效只能在大山脉这里起作用。

original: It's a little slow to fire, but the force field disabling frequency is handy.
translation: 它开火有点慢，不过用来让力场失效的频率倒是挺好用的。

original: I'm happy, too. Can't let this thing gather dust.
translation: 我也很高兴。不能让这东西就此蒙尘。

original: I got the Emitter fully upgraded.
translation: 我把发射器升级到顶了。

original: I may have already picked up both, I grab almost anything that's not nailed down.
translation: 我或许已经将它俩都纳入囊中。我基本上把所有能捡的东西都捡了。

original: No, I got it all down, thanks.
translation: 没，我都拿到了，谢谢。

original: Fan of the opera, huh? All right - the jukebox is installed in the Sink, got it.
translation: 是个歌剧迷，对吧？好吧，点唱机在汇聚节点那里能找到，我明白了。

original: Wait, how many? One... or...?
translation: 等等，多少个？一个…还是…？

original: Oh, two codes. One for the jukebox, and one for the opera. Nice. I'll keep an eye out.
translation: 哦，你的房子里有两个代码。一个用来解锁点唱机，一个是歌剧的音频样本。太好了，我会留意的。

original: So there's an emitter code in your house in Higgs?
translation: 你是说，你在希格斯村的住宅里有一个声波发射器的代码？

original: Well, what - you want me to rob your place?
translation: 好吧，什么？你想让我抢劫你的房子？

original: So your house is there?
translation: 所以你的房子是在那儿吗？

original: Well, I didn't rob your place, but it's this big hangar in the middle of the Crater, so...
translation: 怎么说呢，我没有抢劫过你的房子，但在环形坑里有这么大一个棚，所以嘛…

original: That sounds interesting. Sure, directions would be nice.
translation: 听起来很有趣。确实，有人指路就方便多了。

original: No, I've been there. Higgs Village, right? Your house is there?
translation: 不，我去过那儿。希格斯村，对吧？你的房子在那儿？

original: Higgs' Village? Can you point it out on my Pip-Boy?
translation: 希格斯村？你能在我的哔哔小子上标出来么？

original: Well "projecto" is kind of evident. "Emitter" works better.
translation: 好，用“射”太露骨了。用“发射“会更好。

original: Yeah, I understood that part already.
translation: 是的，我已经理解了那部分。

original: Really? Huh.
translation: 真的吗？嗯。

original: Now that we know each other better, can you tell me about the Sonic Emitter?
translation: 既然我们彼此更加了解了，你能给我讲讲声波发射器吗？

original: Calm down. I don't plan on hacking your voice module this time.
translation: 冷静点！我这次没打算黑进你的发声模块。

original: Well, there's power in zero. It reduces anything multiplied against it - to zero.
translation: 好吧，这就是0的力量。任何东西想要乘它…都会变成0。

original: *Well, of course it does. That's the most lethal of mathematics...*
translation: *好吧，的确如此。这是最致命的数学运算…*

original: I have no idea how you incompetents survived this long.
translation: 我真不知道像你们这样的无能之辈怎么能活这么久。

original: *We're smart. Smarter than we give ourselves credit for. I was smart enough to talk to you, give you a chance - and now look what happened!*
translation: *我们很聪明。比我们自己认为的还要聪明。我真是够聪明的，居然来和你对话，给你一个机会…现在看看都发生了些什么！*

original: Maybe you should dispense with the names and focus on the accomplishments.
translation: 或许你应该忽略名字，把精力集中在成就上。

original: *What did accomplishments ever do for us? Please.*
translation: *请问，成就为我们带来了什么？*

original: Well, there's power in zero. It reduces anything multiplied against it - to zero.
translation: 很好，这就是0的力量。任何东西想要乘它…都会变成0。

original: *Well, of course it does. That's the most lethal of mathematics...*
translation: *好吧，的确如此。这是最致命的数学运算…*

original: Or you may want to stick with "O." As in, the "Oh!" of discovery.
translation: 或者你想继续用“O”，就像你发现了什么，然后“哦！（Oh）”。

original: *Are you chemming on Mentats right now? "O" of discovery, my reflective posterior...*
translation: *你在嗑曼他特吗？代表发现的“O”，我都跟不上你的节奏了…*

original: *Hmmm. Well... actually, now that I think about it. That's not bad. "O, look what I found." "O, Dala, it's holotape, not holodisk." Hmmm.*
translation: *嗯，好吧…实际上我现在想想，这也不坏。“O，看我发现了什么？”“O，达拉，这是全息磁带，不是全息磁盘。”嗯。*

original: *Maybe that's not so bad. O works. Might give me some much-needed motivation.*
translation: *也许这并不没有这么糟。叫“O”也不错。这也许能让我更有动力。*

original: So is that what you want to be?
translation: 所以这是你想成为的样子？

original: And that's what makes you truly a zero.
translation: 这也让你成为真正的“0”。

original: *Exactly. At least the old name was indisputable. O... is more like surprise. "O, look what I stepped in!"*
translation: *是这样。至少这个旧名字是从来没被叫错过。O…看起来更有种惊奇感。“O，你看我发现了什么！“*

original: I want to talk to you about your name.
translation: 我想跟你谈谈你的名字。

original: *What about it? I don't feel like arguing it with you, too.*
translation: *它怎么了？我不想和你争辩它。*

original: Are you seriously confused by this, or are you messing with me?
translation: 你是真的对此疑惑，还是在糊弄我？

original: It's standard termlink code to distinguish the two.
translation: 这是区分它俩的标准术语编码。

original: "Zero." Draw a slash through it.
translation: 在“零（0）”上加一条斜线。

original: *Did... did I shoot myself with a brainial beam or something? That's brilliant! I mean, I would have come to the same conclusion. Eventually...*
translation: *我是…是用脑波射线射了自己一枪吗？这太棒了！我的意思是，我也能得出和你一样的结论。终于…*

original: *O... er... who am I deceiving. I never would have figured that out. I can't figure anything out! I'm... aighhh... I'm useless.*
translation: *O…唔…我在骗谁呢。我没法做到的，我什么都做不到！我…我真是没用。*

original: *That's pretty cool, actually. Destroyer of numbers. I already wreck every robot I study, why not basic arithmetic?*
translation: *说实话，那真的很酷。数字的破坏者。我拆了我研究的每一个机器人，为什么不对基础运算也来一下呢？*

original: *I like your solution. With that kind of slash in the middle, I can set myself apart! If I wanted to.*
translation: *我喜欢你的解决方案。有了中间的这条斜线，我就能把自己区分开！只要我愿意。*

original: *The biggest zero in all the Think Tank. They won't be able to escape it, that diagonal slash right down the middle.*
translation: *思想体中最大的零。有了中间那条斜线，他们再也不会叫错我了。*

original: *Thanks. Talking to you... it really helped unclog some frustration. Talking. What a primitive form of thought-kicking.*
translation: *谢谢，和你对话…确实有助于减轻懊恼。对话，多么原始的思维碰撞方式啊。*

original: Well, Zero and "O" do look a lot alike, there's no way to tell a difference.
translation: 好吧，零（0）和O看起来确实差不多，很难说出他们的差异。

original: [SUCCEEDED] *What?*
translation: [成功] *你说什么？*

original: If you wanted to differentiate the "0" and "O," just put a slash through the zero.
translation: 如果你想区分开“0”和“O”，只需要在0上面划一条斜线。

original: [FAILED] *I might as well take Dala up on that self-vivisection competition. Forget this. It's like talking to Klein's rear shell.*
translation: [失败]*我倒不如接受达拉的自我解剖竞赛。把它忘掉吧。这就像对着克莱因的屁股壳子说话。*

original: All right, so you want me to call you Zero, or...?
translation: 好的，你要我称呼你零（0），还是…？

original: That's... not much of an improvement.
translation: 那…并没有多大的改善。

original: I don't know. "O" sounds more impressive.
translation: 我不知道。“O”听起来更棒。

original: *Zero's my name. I'm proud of it, all right? It doesn't get the recognition it deserves.*
translation: *零是我的名字。我为它感到骄傲，好吗？可它并没有得到应有的认可。*

original: *Truth be told, my emotional attachment to it doesn't even register compared to just having people recognize the difference!*
translation: *说实话，比起让其他人弄清O和0的区别，我对自己名字的情感依恋甚至都不值一提！*

original: *It's just that they're both sort of... round... and hollow. So when they monitor-scan them, they assume that... "Oh, it's O!" Vivisect me, please.*
translation: *两者都是圆的，中间是个洞。因此当他们的监视器捕捉到它，就会下意识说“哦，这是字母O”把我解剖掉算了。*

original: I don't get it. What, they thought your letter was a number?
translation: 我没明白。你说什么？他们认为你的字母是个数字？

original: [SUCCEEDED] *Yes! Thank you. Zero. I am Zero. How hard is that? A narrow, thin Zero.*
translation: [成功]*哦！谢谢你。零，我是零。这有多难呢？一个窄窄的、瘦瘦的零。*

original: If they kept confusing the letter with a number, your name is Dr. 0... Dr. Zero?
translation: 他们一直弄混了字母和数字，所以你的名字是0博士…零博士？

original: [FAILED] *I might as well take Dala up on that self-vivisection competition. Forget this. It's like talking to Klein's rear shell.*
translation: [失败] *我倒不如接受达拉的自我解剖竞赛。把它忘掉吧。这就像对着克莱因的屁股壳子说话。*

original: Talking about things bothering you, well, might help or something.
translation: 说说困扰你的事情，嗯…也许可以帮你些什么。

original: [SUCCEEDED] *Great. Psychology. Clearly the worst of the Sciences, right after Colosto-Diarrhetics.*
translation: [成功] *好极了。心理学。明显是最糟糕的科学，仅次于结肠腹泻研究。*

original: *O-kay, so my name isn't "O." Never was. It was circular, a single character, digit, but not "O."*
translation: *O-k，我的名字不是“O”。从来都不是。它是圆形的，单个字符的数字，不是“O”。*

original: *But even with enhanced sensors, no one here could get it right! Always kept seeing the letter, not the number.*
translation: *但就算有增强型传感器，这里也没人能把它弄对！老是看成字母，而不是数字。*

original: Are you sure? I'm a good listener. Got the ears for it.
translation: 你确定吗？我是一个好听众，有善于聆听的耳朵。

original: [FAILED] *And it might help if you left me alone.*
translation: [失败] *让我一个人呆会儿可能更好。*

original: *Why are you even talking to me? If I need any bonding, I'll go find two ionized molecules to smash.*
translation: *为什么你要和我说话？如果要建立什么联系，我不如去找两个电离子相互撞击。*

original: I have some questions for you first.
translation: 首先，我要问你一些问题。

original: Hope you think on what you've done.
translation: 希望你能想想你都做了什么。

original: -I can't seem to... not think about it. How odd.-
translation: -我似乎不能…不去想它。真奇怪。-

original: -This sensation is unpleasant, I don't care for it. I don't care for this place, either. And... I feel... as if we've forgotten something.-
translation: -这种感觉真不舒服，我不关心这个，也不关心这个地方。嗯…我觉得…我们好像忘记了些什么。-

original: -Still... it... is NO MATTER. Crush the feeling down. Crush it down, push it into the loop, the... hmmm. YES. Forgotten. Almost. Yes?-
translation: -不…不要紧。控制住情绪，冷静下来。把它放进循环里，把它…嗯，忘了。我快要忘了…对吧？-

original: -I do not need to remember ANY MORE. Not today.-
translation: -我不需要再回想起更多了。至少今天不需要。-

original: -But you're correct, of course. Gabe knew his place. Whether in the dog house - or in the lab. He was obedient.-
translation: -但你是对的。加布知道他的位置，无论是在犬舍，还是在实验室，他都表现得那样温顺。-

original: -And, what's a little loss when... so much is to be GAINED? Science. Yes. Science is our goal. Not emotional attachments. No!-
translation: -而且比起所获得的，这…只是小小的牺牲。科学，对，科学才是我们的目标，而不是情感依恋。绝不是！-

original: It's nothing to be ashamed of. Gabe knew his place - as a specimen.
translation: 没什么丢人的。加布知道他的角色——作为一个实验样本。

original: -Thank you. If you don't mind, I need a moment. To collect myself. Sort it out. Re-orient my... sense of self.-
translation: -谢谢。如果你不介意的话，我想一个人静静，好好想想，重新找回自己的感觉。-

original: It sounds to me like you hurt someone who loved you very much.
translation: 听起来你伤害了那个很爱你的人。

original: -As odd as it is, I believe that is the conclusion. And... I wonder why it didn't hit me before, until I saw that memory in your hands.-
translation: -尽管很奇怪，但我认为这就是结论。嗯…以前我还很诧异为什么它不袭击我，直到我看到你手里的这段回忆。-

original: -No matter how awful my day had been, he... he was always waiting there. How odd. My gel is de-coagulating.-
translation: -无论以前我的生活有多糟糕，他…他总是在那儿等我。好奇怪的感觉，我的凝胶好像要融化了一样。-

original: -And when I would talk to him about Betsy - and how Marcus would beat on me and call me Smarty Sissy Pants, he'd just sit there, head on my knee.-
translation: -当我和他谈到贝琪，谈到马库斯怎样殴打我，骂我是自作聪明的娘娘腔废物的时候，他就坐在这儿，头靠在我的膝盖上。-
-还有…-

original: -If you don't mind, I'll take that bowl. Just... need to remove it. Put it away. Somewhere out of radar range.-
translation: -如果你不介意，我要拿走这个碗了。只是…要把它移开，放到我的雷达探测不到的地方。-

original: -For some reason, its similarity to the Crater-shape of Big MT is starting to fill up all available cognitive spaces.-
translation: -不知道为什么，这个与大山脉环形坑形状相同的碗，它好似要填满我的整个认知空间。-

original: -That, combined with my own overwhelming feeling of having done something terrible... the two are hitting me with... unexpected force.-
translation: -而且我有种强烈的感觉涌上心头，就像我做了什么很糟糕的事…这两者叠加起来…让我如遭重击。-

original: -I notice these results more and more now that I know to look for them. Come back anytime, and I'll show you what ELSE I've discovered.-
translation: -我好像就快找到结论了，我想我应该把它们弄明白。随时回来，我会向你展示我发现了什么。-

original: Well, it seems to me it belongs to a friend of yours.
translation: 我想，这应该是你一位朋友的东西。

original: -Why... yes. Gabe.-
translation: -你怎么…没错，这是加布的。-

original: Um... maybe it's like a memory or something?
translation: 呃…这应该像是某段记忆之类的？

original: [SUCCEEDED] -Why... yes. Gabe.-
translation: [成功] -为什么…的确，加布他…-

original: Sounds like Gabe really loved you.
translation: 听起来加布真的很爱你。

original: [FAILED] -Oh, well it is of NO CONSEQUENCE. Gabe gave himself for Science! As we all have!-
translation: [失败] -噢，你太大惊小怪了。加布献身给了科学！就像我们大家一样！-

original: Does this dog bowl look familiar?
translation: 这个狗碗你看着不陌生吧？

original: -WHAT? Oh... something familiar about it, yes. Is it... a Cazador skull? Always were bowl-shaped. Or were those the Bowlians we made?-
translation: -哈？噢…是挺眼熟的，对。这是…猎蜂的头骨？总是那种碗状的头骨。还是说…这是我们造的保龄球？-

original: -I confess, I am stumped. If you were to draw some other connection between that bowl and a research facility in Big MT, I may be of more help.-
translation: -好吧，我承认，我被难住了。但你要是告诉我它来自大山脉里哪个研究中心，我没准就能给你答案。-

original: Is this Gabe's bowl? Your dog from X-8, Gabe?
translation: 这碗是加布的吧？你那只在X-8里的狗，加布。

original: -WHAT? Why... yes, it is. I used to leave it outside his dog house, chock-full of chems. Before the cybernetic modifications, of course.-
translation: -什么？你怎么…没错，的确是加布的碗。 我过去常放在它的狗屋外面，碗里装满各种化学药品。当然，这是它进行机械改造前的事了。-

original: -And... no matter how chemmed the food, he would always eat it. And his tail, would wag... even...even while I... I...-
translation: -而且…不管食物里有多少化学品，加布总会吃下去。而且，它的尾巴总会摇啊摇…哪怕我…我…-

original: -You know, I am having the most perplexing feeling squiggling through my biogel. I can't quite... pin it down.-
translation: -怎么说呢，有某种异样的感觉漾过我的生物凝胶。并且我…抑制不住它。-

original: Ah, trying to steal the X-2 Transmitter Array Antenna, are you? You won't succeed, not if my lethal Robo-Scorpions have any say in the matter.
translation: 啊哈，想偷走X-2发射机天线阵列，是吗？你不可能得逞，还没问过我那致命的机械蝎们同不同意呢。

original: I'm feeling a little unwell in the head. Can you perform a psychiatric evaluation on me?
translation: 我头部有些不适，能给我做个精神鉴定吗？

original: Concerned about the state of your mind, are ya? Well, such things ain't my specialty, but I'm happy to tender my opinion as to your mental health.
translation: 担心自己的精神状态，对吧？行，虽然不是我的专长，不过我很乐意能帮你保持心理健康。

original: I should make you aware that the benefits of such a procedure are exclusive - that is, this only works once. Now are you sure this is what you want?
translation: 事先提醒你，这项测试的效果是唯一的。就是说，它只能生效一次。还确定要继续吗？

original: I have some personality holotapes to install.
translation: 这儿有几个人格模块的磁带需要安装。

original: Very good sir. Merely interface the holotapes with my console's input/output port, and I shall upload them directly.
translation: 好的，老爷。请将磁带放进控制台的出/入端口，我马上为您上传。

original: Switch off the Sink's personality matrices.
translation: 关闭汇聚节点的人格矩阵。

original: Very good indeed, sir. "Throwing out the riff-raff" protocols engaged. All personality matrices are off-line, sir.
translation: 明智之举，老爷。"清除人渣"协议已启动，所有人格矩阵均已离线，老爷。

original: Switch on the Sink's personality matrices.
translation: 开启汇聚节点的人格矩阵。

original: Do you, sir? Well, if that is sir's wish, it is my primary directive. Personality matrices on-line, sir.
translation: 老爷，您当真吗？好吧，既然您希望如此，我自当遵命。人格们现在全部上线了，老爷。

original: I'd like to buy some things.
translation: 我想买些东西。

original: Very good, sir. If I might suggest a table wine, the 64 Atomic Claret is a lovely little vintage.
translation: 是的，老爷。若您找的是佐餐酒，恕我失礼，64年的原子波尔多红葡萄酒是个不错的选择。

original: Very good, sir. And might I venture to opine that a new Trilby might be just the thing to complete sir's ensemble?
translation: 好的，老爷。恕我失礼，我以为，再搭上顶新呢帽，您这身行头就更完美了。

original: Very good, sir. Should sir be in the market for a new suit of morning wear, I have several suggestions that might suit.
translation: 好的，老爷。您若想添置一套晨间套服，我也许能提供些建议。

original: Very good, sir.
translation: 好的，老爷。

original: Never mind, let me ask you something else.
translation: 算了，让我问你些其他问题。

original: Indubitably, sir.
translation: 当然，老爷。

original: So I can access their functions without loading the personality holotapes?
translation: 那要是不加载人格模块的磁带，我还能使用那些功能吗？

original: Tragically, the core operating systems are also located on the personality tapes, sir.
translation: 非常遗憾，核心控制系统也位于人格磁带上，老爷。

original: Once the tape is installed, sir may request I switch their dialectic interfaces off, and I shall oblige with great delectation.
translation: 磁带被安装后，您可以要求我关闭它们的语言交互功能，我很乐意效劳。

original: However, sir will still be required to locate and install a backup holotape to access their functionality.
translation: 不过，老爷还是得先找来那些备份磁盘，这样才能激活它们的功能。

original: Why is that?
translation: 为什么这么说？

original: The other modules are rather... erratic, sir. Their personality matrices are built on flawed logic and have not weathered the years well, sir.
translation: 其他那些人格模块相当的…不正常，老爷。它们的人格矩阵建立在有缺陷的逻辑之上，多年来也没有经受住考验。

original: You mean there are other... personality modules here?
translation: 你是说…这里还有其他的人格模块？

original: Indeed, sir, though if sir's aim is to activate them I lament to inform sir that most have been offline for some years.
translation: 您说的没错，老爷。但您若是想激活其他人格，请容我斗胆告知，它们中大多数在多年前就已离线。

original: If sir were to ask my opinion, I should venture that sir is better off without them.
translation: 您要是想征询我的意见，我只能说，它们不回来会更好。

original: However, if sir is determined to inflict upon sir's self their dubious services, sir might locate backup personality disks elsewhere in the facility.
translation: 但是，若老爷您实在需要它们那些不靠谱的服务，那么也许您能在其他设施中找到它们的备份磁盘。

original: What services do you provide?
translation: 你提供什么服务？

original: In addition to managing the personality matrices of the other household utilities, I can provide sir with direct access to the commissary.
translation: 除了管理房屋内其他功能设施的人格矩阵外，我还能为您连接物资供应服务。

original: Any goods sir might require may be purchased through my shopkeep interface, whence tiny robots shall deliver them forthwith to this very domicile.
translation: 利用我的商店交易界面，您可以订购需要的物品，这些物品随后会由微型机器人送至这一住所。

original: Are you some kind of Artificial Intelligence?
translation: 你是某种人工智能吗？

original: Regrettably not, sir. All modules in this habitat are synthetic personalities atop a mundane operating system. There is no intelligence here, sir.
translation: 很遗憾，老爷，并不是的。老爷，这里的都是附着在操作系统上的人造人格，还称不上是人工智能。

original: "Sir?" You are aware that I'm a woman, right?
translation: "老爷"？你能看出我是女人，对吧？

original: Indubitably, sir, but it is with a great lugubriousness that I must disclose that my programmers installed only the masculine honorific, sir.
translation: 毫无疑问，老爷。但极度遗憾的是，我的制作者只为我的语法库加入了针对男性的敬语，老爷。

original: Moreover they neglected to enclose a parameter by which said honorific might be omitted altogether - over my most strenuous of remonstrances, sir.
translation: 另外，老爷，我曾极力谏言过，只要加入一个参数，就能完全省略敬语。但谏言并没有被采纳。

original: I had some other questions.
translation: 我有些其他问题。

original: Questions are dangerously close to independent thought, citizen.
translation: 提问距离独立思考仅有一步之遥，这可是个危险的行为，公民。

original: Blank books, huh? Yeah, I think I can find a use for those.
translation: 空白的书？有点意思。嗯，我倒是能用它做些东西。

original: Now you're thinking like a citizen, Citizen!
translation: 你考虑问题开始像个真正的公民了，公民！

original: But those books are our last legacy of the time before! You can't destroy them!
translation: 但那些书是旧世界留给我们最后的遗产了！你不能就这么毁掉它们！

original: Citizen, that sounds dangerously seditious. If my re-indoctrination module was installed, I'd take care of that for you.
translation: 公民，知道你刚刚的话有多危险多反动吗！要是装了洗脑模块，我就得关照关照你了。

original: Sadly, that system was cut for budget concerns, so you'll have to perform your own indoctrination.
translation: 可惜，这个系统由于预算紧缩没能完成，所以洗脑就只能靠你自己了。

original: Now, to begin with, you'll need a cage that can fit over your head and a sack of Mole Rats...
translation: 要进行自我洗脑，首先需要准备一个大小适合，能容纳自己脑袋的铁笼，还有一麻袋鼹鼠…

original: So you make blank books? What's the point of that?
translation: 你的功能就是做无字白书？这有什么意义啊？

original: Blank books are better for the mind, Citizen! Real science by real men in lab coats has proved that introducing outside thoughts confuses the brain!
translation: 空白的书能助你思想健康，公民！权威科学家的权威性实验表明，吸收外部思想会让你的脑子变糊涂！

original: Blank books encourage the reader not to question, but to blindly and zealously accept what's put in front of him!
translation: 空白的书能促使读者别去提问，只要盲目积极地接受面前的一切就好！

original: Also, I suppose you could use them to keep a journal.
translation: 另外，我觉得你还能拿它来记日记。

original: You know, we've been down this road already. Moving on.
translation: 你知道，我们已经探讨过这个问题了。就此打住吧。

original: Very well. If you're certain of your conclusions, my little teddy bear.
translation: 没问题，只要你已经得出确定的结论，我的小泰迪熊。

original: Um... so you confuse toy bears with... humans?
translation: 呃…你是分不清玩具熊和…人类吗？

original: [SUCCEEDED] What? Nonsense.
translation: [成功] 什么？一派胡言。

original: Oh, I get it - you like "playing" with humans, do you? Watching them move? Blink?
translation: 噢，我懂了。你喜欢和人类"做游戏"，是吧？你喜欢观察他们的活动？观察他们眨眼？

original: [FAILED] I confuse nothing of the sort. One is fluffy, the other has a drastically reduced fluffiness quotient.
translation: [失败] 我当然分得清。它俩一种全身毛茸茸的，另一种的毛相对前者以几何级数减少。

original: You are totally confusing me right now.
translation: 这回你完全把我搞糊涂了。

original: Are you sure your words aren't jumbled?
translation: 你确定自己没在说胡话吗？

original: Teddy bears come in many sizes. Your size is what intrigues me the most. Some say that teddy bears can't be living, breathing things.
translation: 泰迪熊有许多型号，但最吸引我的还是你这种。一些人认为泰迪熊不能是活生生的，会呼吸的东西。

original: They are wrong. They are large, biological forms, breathing, heaving, snarling, coughing... mmmmm. Lobotomites are my teddy bears, oh yes.
translation: 他们错了。他们很大，有生物的身体，会呼吸，胸腔能起伏，他们会咆哮，还能咳嗽…嗯没错，无脑人就是我的泰迪熊。

original: Well, I thought you liked them. You keep referring to them.
translation: 好吧，我想你喜欢它们。它们都成你的口头禅了。

original: No, I like... teddy bears.
translation: 不，我喜欢的是…泰迪熊。

original: I have a real teddy bear, if you want it.
translation: 我有个真的泰迪熊，想要就拿去吧。

original: Whatever for?
translation: 这是什么意思？

original: A looping gesture of extortion, maybe. Hand over the goods.
translation: 也许是一种代表勒索的循环姿势。总之给我把东西都交出来。

original: I'm actually here for a... breather.
translation: 实际上我来这是为了…喘口气。

original: I'll tell the others if you don't make it worth my while.
translation: 没有封口费的话我就把这件事告诉其他人。

original: Really? What is this... you seek to shame me in front of the others? How intriguing.
translation: 真的吗？就是说…你想在其他人面前羞辱我？真期待。

original: Yes, I'll partake. This shameful feeling is quite... invigorating. How new.
translation: 我会参与的，这份羞耻感有点…汹涌，真新鲜。

original: And... you'll keep coming back to collect your payment, correct? Yes... yes, that will be fine.
translation: 那个…你还会回来勒索我的，对不对？没错…没错，真是太好了。

original: Here, please... take this from me with your rough, bacterial-laden hands. My stored, repressed juices as your filthy compensation.
translation: 给，请…用你粗糙的、满是细菌的手收下这个。这是给你的报酬，上面涂满了我长期压抑着的下流汁液。

original: I could come back any time and just breathe, if you want.
translation: 如果你想，我可以随时回来，然后在你面前呼吸。

original: Would you? I... feel so ashamed, but... yet, so intrigued. You'll need to give me a rest in between visits, or else my gel might... run over.
translation: 可以吗？我…我感觉好羞愧，但…还是，还是拒绝不了。在你下次来访前，请给我点时间休息，否则我的生物凝胶说不定会…流得到处都是。

original: If you're ready... let me radar scan you... slowly. Wooooo.
translation: 准备好了就…让我的雷达慢慢扫描你。呜呜呜。

original: WooooooOOOO. Burble, burble. WOOOO. Bloop. Blooop. Bloooop. BuuuUUUURBLE.
translation: 喔哦哦哦，呜，呜，喔哦哦，呜呃。

original: You all are a bunch of hypocrites. Claiming superiority, but you miss being human, admit it.
translation: 你们尽是些虚伪的家伙。承认吧，口口声声说自己高人一等，但在心底你们又怀念身为人的感觉。

original: I... I cannot deny it. The illogic of it... the betrayal of our own beliefs. I blame my curiosity.
translation: 我，我不能否认。它缺乏逻辑，我们违背了自己的信条。都怪我好奇心太重。

original: Why don't you just give in? There's nothing wrong with looking at the human body.
translation: 为什么不大大方方承认呢？盯着人体看又没有什么过错。

original: Perhaps... perhaps there is value in what you say. I... I did so enjoy breathing once. Long ago.
translation: 也许…也许你说的没错。我…我以前确实很喜欢呼吸的感觉…很久很久以前。

original: <Run your hands along the sides of your face, then exhale rapidly.>
translation: <双手沿着脸颊滑下，然后迅速呼气>

original: <Turn and cough roughly, then slowly scratch nose.>
translation: <转过头去，大声咳嗽，然后缓慢地挠鼻子>

original: <Close eyelids, breathe deeply, then stretch languidly.>
translation: <闭上眼睑，深呼吸，然后慵懒地伸展身体>

original: What... what are you doing?
translation: 你…你在干什么？

original: Stop it. Why... why are you making me partake in this... filthy formography?
translation: 停，为…为什么你要对着我展示这种…下流的形体姿态？

original: Enough! I am already... intrigued. You have sufficiently... percolated me.
translation: 够了！我完全…被迷住了。你让我…体液都漏出来了。

original: I don't know what it is about the biology of Lobotomites. It... it infects my thoughts. All that skin and muscle... and tissue.
translation: 我不知道这种无脑人的生物行为是什么。但它…感染了我的思维。我现在脑海里全是那些皮肉…还有组织。

original: You seem... to... be looking at me a lot.
translation: 你好像…总盯着我看。

original: [SUCCEEDED] What? Nonsense.
translation: [成功] 什么？一派胡言.

original: I can't help but notice your... fascination with the human body.
translation: 不得不说，你对人体…太过着迷了。

original: [FAILED] Your... your... primitive eyes deceive you.
translation: [失败] 那只是你的…你那对…原始的眼睛欺骗了你。

original: No, no... there are no "needs" contained within my soft, soft gel. Eh... much... much... like the soft... gel of your eyes. No, nothing here.
translation: 不对，不对…我软软的凝胶一点"需求"也没有。呃…就像…就像…你那软软的胶状眼睛一样。不对，我一点感觉也没有。

original: It seems to me you have more... biological needs than your counterparts.
translation: 看上去，比起那些同事，你有更多的…生理上的需求.

original: What? Nonsense.
translation: 什么？一派胡言.

original: It seems to me you have more... biological needs than your counterparts.
translation: 看上去，比起你的那些同事，你有更多…生理上的需求。

original: What? Nonsense.
translation: 什么？一派胡言。

original: Helped any animals discover their genetic potential recently?
translation: 最近又帮助那些动物发掘他们基因的潜力了？

original: -INDEED. After the memory you accessed about Gabe, I've been looking for ways to help nurture life.-
translation: -是的。你让我想起加布以后，我就开始研究培育新生命的技术。-

original: -Look at THESE. Aren't they quite look-worthy? All dripping with the residue of creation. Wondrous.-
translation: -来看看这个。看起来很有价值，对吧？都是造物时留下的残余物。多神奇啊。-

original: Blindly operate on any poor animals recently?
translation: 最近又拿那些可怜的小动物开刀了？

original: -Why, YES. Although the term is RESEARCH. Thank you.-
translation: -怎么，哦当然了。不过你应该说“研究”。谢谢。-

original: -Look at THESE. They seem to be found inside some of the specimens here at Big MT.-
translation: -看看这个，这些是从大山脉几个实验样本的体内找到的。-

original: It certainly is... interesting. Whatever it once was.
translation: 看上去…满新奇的。不管它以前是什么。

original: *You know what, I'm not even going to pretend. I broke one of the monitors, and those innards start falling out everywhere.*
translation: *算了你知道吗，我也不掩饰了。我打破了一个显示器，结果这些部件掉的到处都是。*

original: *If you could just hold on to that for me until... well, forever, that would be welcome.*
translation: * 你要是愿意帮我收着它们直到…呃，海枯石烂，我完全乐意。*

original: This scrap metal is supposed to be something?
translation: 这些废金属一定有什么用吧？

original: It looks like junk.
translation: 看着像是垃圾。

original: *It's a discovery, kilomiles beyond your understanding, that...*
translation: *这个发现，远远不是你能理解的，那…*

original: *As for discoveries... well... of course. Look at this! Just... uh... built it. Amazing, isn't it?*
translation: *你说探索发现…呃…当然有啊。看这个！刚…呃…造出来的。挺令人赞叹的，是吧？*

original: *Yeah, I... uh... "discovered" more internal parts in the monitors here. If you could, uh, hold on to my "discovery," I'd appreciate it.*
translation: *哦，我…那个…我从这儿的监视器里"发现"了更多的零部件。如果你愿意，额，收下我的"发现"，我会非常高兴。*

original: *Yeah, I... uh... "discovered" more internal parts in the monitors here. If you could, uh, hold on to my "discovery," I'd appreciate it.*
translation: *哦，我…那个…我从这儿的监视器里"发现"了更多的零部件。如果你愿意，额，收下我的"发现"，我会非常高兴。*

original: *Yeah, there were a few under the monitors here. Here you go. Keeps the place tidy.*
translation: *哦对，监视器下还有一些。一块拿去吧。这下这儿就干净了。*

original: So... "Zero," got any amazing discoveries to share?
translation: 所以…"0"，有什么可供分享的奇妙发现吗？

original: *You know, hearing my name said like that... it really de-rezes my screens.*
translation: *知道吗，听别人这么叫我…就像把我的屏幕从睡眠中唤醒一样。*

original: So... "O," got any amazing discoveries to share?
translation: 嗯…"O"，有什么新的探索发现吗？

original: *O, do I? Hmmm... O-Do-I... sounds like a song lyric.*
translation: *哦，我有没有？嗯嗯…O-Do-I…听起来就像抒情诗。*

original: Good to see you, too, 8. Any new discoveries today?
translation: 我也很高兴见到你，8。今天研究有什么新进展？

original: Got anything for me? Let's see.
translation: 有什么要给我？让我看看。

original: I mean, literally, got anything to help pass the time?
translation: 我想问你有什么打发时间的东西吗，就是字面意义上的？

original: Please don't make me spell it out.
translation: 拜托请别逼我直说好么。

original: You know... sonjaculate.
translation: 你懂的…喷射声波。

original: Um... got anything to help me "pass" the "time?"
translation: 呃…有什么能帮我"消磨时间"的东西吗？

original: I need more of those worthless caps to test the CIU barter functions upstairs.
translation: 我还需要更多没用的瓶盖去测试楼上中央智能单元的交易功能。

original: *Might have a few left. Let me check...*
translation: *可能还有点，让我找找看…*

original: *You sure are testing that personality chip thoroughly. All right...*
translation: *这下你就能对那人格芯片测试个够了，好吧…*

original: *This debugging obsession of yours really has you hooked. Either that, or is this is one weird hobby.*
translation: *你怎么对这测试这么着迷，是你的什么古怪爱好吗。*

original: What did you and Klein say before about the Central Intelligence Unit barter functions?
translation: 之前关于中央智能单元的交易功能，你和克莱因说了什么来着？

original: [SUCCEEDED] *Sure... let's see. What could we feed that stupid personality chip...*
translation: [成功] *没问题…我想想。塞给那个弱智人格芯片什么好呢…*

original: *Ah, here we go, some worthless bottle caps. These should do it. Just dump them on its surface, then the trade interface should pop up.*
translation: *啊，就是它了，毫无价值的瓶盖。这应该有用。把瓶盖倒在上面，交易界面应该就能弹出来了。*

original: I'm going to need something to debug the Central Intelligence barter routines.
translation: 我需要一些东西去测试中央智能单元的交易功能。

original: [FAILED] *I have no idea. I am a robotical engineer, not a... rememberer... of archaic trade routines.*
translation: [失败] *我怎么知道。我是个机器人工程师，怎么会记得什么…过时交易程序是怎么运作的。*

original: I was interested in hearing more about the... science... the others... do. Here.
translation: 我想了解更多这里的…科学，还有这里的…其他人都是做什么的。

original: [SUCCEEDED] WHY, YES. WE ARE FILLED WITH THE KNOWLEDGE YOU SPEAK OF.
translation: [成功] 什么，是的。我们的确有着渊博的，你所谓的，知识。

original: IF YOU WISH TO KNOW MORE, SIMPLY ASK THE OTHERS, THEY CAN HELP YOU.
translation: 如果你希望知道得更多，直接问他们吧。他们能满足你。

original: I'd be honored if I could hear any knowledge the Think Tank had to share on the sciences.
translation: 如果任何一位思想体能向我传授科学知识，我将不胜荣幸。

original: [FAILED] IF YOU WANT TO FEED YOUR CURIOSITY ABOUT THE OTHERS, GO ASK THE OTHERS YOUR INTERROGATORY STATEMENTS.
translation: [失败] 如果你对别人感兴趣，那就带着你的疑问去找他们。

original: I wanted to know more about the Think Tank.
translation: 我想知道更多关于思想体的事。

original: [SUCCEEDED] WHY, YES. WE ARE FILLED WITH THE KNOWLEDGE YOU SPEAK OF.
translation: [成功] 什么，是的。我们的确有着渊博的，你所谓的，知识。

original: IF YOU WISH TO KNOW MORE, SIMPLY ASK THE OTHERS, THEY CAN HELP YOU.
translation: 如果你希望知道得更多，直接问他们吧。他们能满足你。

original: You all seem knowledgeable in your fields. No doubt there's much you can share with me.
translation: 你们个个是自己领域的杰出人物。所以你们一定有很多知识能和我分享。

original: [FAILED] IF YOU WANT TO FEED YOUR CURIOSITY ABOUT THE OTHERS, GO ASK THE OTHERS YOUR INTERROGATORY STATEMENTS.
translation: [失败] 如果你对别人感兴趣，那就带着你的疑问去找他们。

original: I do. Here's the deal. I'm not going to surrender - you are.
translation: 当然。现在我给出我的条件。我是不会投降的，你应该向我投降。

original: It's not a democracy, it's a research facility. And over half your colleagues dispute your findings.
translation: 这不是什么民主，这里可是研究院。何况你的同事里，超过一半都不认同你的结论。

original: YOU DARE USE LOGIC AGAINST ME?!
translation: 你竟敢用逻辑来挑战我？！

original: Sounds to me like your math is wrong - and the odds aren't good.
translation: 听起来你的算术不太好。现在和我打，你的胜算不高。

original: NONSENSE. THE MATHEMATICS OF THE SITUATION ARE ON OUR SIDE, LOBOTOMITE. I BELIEVE... NO WAIT, HMM. CARRY THE TWO... THEN...
translation: 胡说，计算显示形势可是在我们这边，无脑人。我相信…嗯？等等，还要进二…然后…

original: HMMM. IF THIS WERE A DEMOCRACY, I WOULD BE CONCERNED. WE ARE TOO... SCIENTIFIC FOR THAT. SO JUST SURRENDER.
translation: 嗯…如果要讲民主的话，我会考虑的。我们都是那玩意的专家。所以你就…投降吧。

original: Maybe you should confer with your colleagues first.
translation: 也许你应该先和你的同事们商量一下。

original: NONSENSE. "CONFER?" "COLLEAGUES?" THOSE ARE TWO WORDS I DO NOT RECOGNIZE.
translation: 胡说，“商量”？“同事”？我的字典里没有这两个词。

original: <Lie> No, I'm just kidding. Keep living the dream.
translation: <撒谎> 不，我只是开个玩笑，继续做你的梦吧。

original: Thank God. For a second there I was afraid my whole purpose in life was obsolete and I was as redundant and useless as Muggy. Where was I? Oh, right.
translation: 谢天谢地，我差点以为我的人生目标已经过时了。我还以为我就像小杯具一样多余没用。对了，我说到哪了？哦，对对。

original: Soon the world will burn in nuclear fire! Mwahaha!
translation: 很快这个世界就会被核爆的火焰焚尽，哈哈哈哈！

original: Yes. A couple centuries ago, in fact.
translation: 是的。事实上，已经是几个世纪前的事了。

original: Really? Well... fuck. That really puts a damper on the toaster's mood.
translation: 真的？好吧…靠，有种一盆冷水泼下来的感觉。

original: Oh well, no use crying over spilled Armageddon - where was I? Oh, right.
translation: 好吧，没必要为这个已经毁灭的世界哭泣。我刚说到哪？哦哦，对对。

original: Soon the world will burn in nuclear fire! Again!
translation: 很快这个世界就会沐浴在核爆的火焰里！再一次！

original: Give it up. I have more important things to ask you about.
translation: 行了行了，我有其他更重要的事情要问你。

original: You know the world already burned in nuclear fire, right?
translation: 你知道吗？这个世界已经被核爆毁灭过一次了。

original: Soon I will - What? It... It did?
translation: 很快我就会让这个世界… 什么？它已经毁灭过了？

original: I've got some toasters for you.
translation: 我给你带来了一些烤面包机。

original: Well, well... what have we got here? Another innocent little toaster. Come here, I won't hurt you... hah! Gotcha!
translation: 好吧，好吧…瞧瞧这是谁？又一个天真无邪的小烤面包机。过来，我不会伤害你的哦…哈，抓住你了！

original: Oh, yes, the sweet smell of spilled electric guts, the sparking diodes - I fucking live for this!
translation: 哦，没错，这喷薄而出的电子内脏的甜蜜味道，这闪着火花的二极管——我他妈的就好这口！

original: I'll keep an eye out for any Saturnite Power Fists then.
translation: 我会搜集那些土星动力拳套的。

original: You find one, you bring it on back here, and we'll burn this mother down!
translation: 你要是找到了，就带给我，然后我们就可以他妈的把这全烧光！

original: You mean like this one?
translation: 你是说像这个？

original: Oh, baby, that is a thing of fuckin' beauty! Give it here, I'll soup it up for ya!
translation: 哦，宝贝，这玩意太他妈的漂亮了，拿过来，我帮你改良它的！

original: There ya go! Have fun with that. Burn the fuckin' world for me!
translation: 拿好了，你爱怎么玩都行。替我把这个该死的世界烧掉！

original: What else do you do?
translation: 你还会做些什么？

original: You want some weapon schematics? I can show you some fucking weapon schematics! You want a superheated Saturnite Power Fist? I can hook that shit up!
translation: 你想要一些武器图纸？我可以展示给你看！你想要炙热的土星动力拳套么？我可以立刻给你弄一个！

original: Like I said, bring me a Saturnite Power Fist and I'll hook that shit up for you!
translation: 就像我说的那样，给我一个土星动力拳套，我就能给它淬火！

original: About that Superheated Saturnite Power Fist...
translation: 关于那个炙热的土星动力拳套…

original: So you murder toasters?
translation: 所以你谋杀了烤面包机？

original: Not just murder! I tear them apart and render them down to their base components! Once their guts are spilled, you can do with them what you like.
translation: 不仅仅是杀了！我还把他们撕成了碎片，变成一个个电子零件！只要他们的机械内脏露出来了，你就可以随心所欲地折磨它们。

original: I'd like to change the subject.
translation: 我们换个话题吧。

original: Well, since I can't kill you, I guess I have to listen to your inane questions.
translation: 好吧，既然我杀不了你，我想我也只能听听你的愚蠢问题了。

original: Can you do anything else?
translation: 你还能做些什么？

original: Anything else, he asks. Like I don't long for the chance to be more than a neurotic busboy.
translation: 他问我还能做什么。好像我乐意当个神经质的洗碗工一样。

original: Huh! Anything else, she asks. Like I don't long for the chance to be more than a neurotic busboy.
translation: 哈！还能做什么。好像我乐意当个神经质的洗碗工一样。

original: If you must know, at one point Dr. Mobius programmed me to manufacture electronic components in my central chassis.
translation: 如果你非要知道的话，莫比乌斯博士给我编过程，让我能在自己的机箱里制造电子元件。

original: That module got corroded when the Toaster spilled hot crumbs down my vents, though. If you find a back-up somewhere, I could maybe do that for you.
translation: 但有次烤面包机将滚烫的面包屑溅进我的通风口之后，我那个模块就受损了。如果你能为我找到备用模块，我也许就能帮你的忙。

original: Why all the rage?
translation: 为什么你总是充斥着怒火？

original: Have you ever tried to indulge an all-consuming urge to kill when you don't have opposable thumbs? Or hands? Or anything other than a bread slot?
translation: 有着压抑不住的杀戮渴望，但你却没有拇指，或者手，或者除了面包槽以外的任何工具，你知道这是什么感觉吗？

original: You'd have a lot of pent-up anger too.
translation: 假如你和我一样，你也会有难以压抑的怒火。

original: Well, I for one am quaking in my boots.
translation: 好吧，真是吓得我瑟瑟发抖。

original: Buddy, if my heating element were just a little bigger, you'd be on fire right now. On fire!
translation: 伙计，如果我的加热元件再稍微大一点，你早就着火了，着火了你知道吗！

original: Let's change the subject.
translation: 我们换个话题吧。

original: Is the new subject mugs?
translation: 有关杯子的话题吗？

original: I have to go now.
translation: 我得走了。

original: Yes! Flee before my terrible power!
translation: 对！在我无穷的力量下快逃命吧！

original: I'm almost afraid to ask what your function is.
translation: 我差点就怕到不敢问你的功能是什么了。

original: You should be afraid! I am the scourge of all small appliances and the bogeyman that keeps lesser toasters awake at night!
translation: 你应该害怕！我是所有小电器的噩梦，是让小烤面包机睡不着觉的怪物！

original: Tremble? You're a toaster. How fearsome can you be?
translation: 恐惧？你不过是台烤面包机，你还能有多吓人？

original: A toaster is just a death ray with a smaller power supply! As soon as I figure out how to tap into the main reactors, I will burn the world!
translation: 烤面包机能发射死亡射线，只不过能量供应比较少罢了！一旦我知道怎么接入主反应堆，我就能烧毁整个世界！

original: What do you do with the mugs?
translation: 你要杯子有什么用？

original: I'm supposed to keep them clean - oh, God, the thought of all those dirty dishes out there makes me crazy!
translation: 我本应该负责清洗它们。哦，天呐，这么多脏盘子要让我疯掉了！

original: Most of them are probably beyond saving now. The only thing left is break them down and process them for raw materials. I guess you could have those.
translation: 大多数大概已经没救了，现在唯一能做的就是分解掉它们，用作原材料。我猜那些东西应该对你有用。

original: You seem really obsessed with mugs.
translation: 你好像真的对杯子很着迷。

original: Of course I'm obsessed! They made me this way! You think I don't know how crazy I sound? Of course I do! They programmed me to know that, too!
translation: 当然着迷了！他们把我造成这样的！你以为我不知道我有多疯？我当然知道，他们给我编程让我知道的！

original: They made me just to torture me. But you know, it's the neglect that hurts the most. "Hey everybody, let's turn ourselves into robot brains in jars!"
translation: 他们制造我只是为了折磨我，但你知道，无视我才是最伤我的。 “嘿，伙计们，让我们把自己变成机器脑吧，放在罐子里的那种。”

original: Do you know how many coffee cups giant robot brains in jars use on a daily basis? Not fucking many!
translation: 你知道伟大的机器脑们每天要用多少个咖啡杯吗？他妈的并不多！

original: I don't need anything else. Goodbye.
translation: 没什么其他事了，再见。

original: Very good, sir.
translation: 好的，老爷。

original: Got to go.
translation: 我得走了。

original: Sure. Nobody wants to hang out with Muggy. I get it. So long, pal.
translation: 当然了，没人想和小杯具来往。我知道了。再见了，伙计。

original: Sorry, I don't have any.
translation: 对不起，我没有。

original: Of course you don't. Why would you? You're not an insane robot obsessed with coffee cups. To you they're just worthless junk.
translation: 你当然没有了。你怎么会有呢？你又不是痴迷于咖啡杯的疯狂机器人。对你而言那些只是无用的垃圾。

original: Here, take whatever you want.
translation: 来来，想要什么拿什么。

original: Oh, sweet, sweet fulfillment! I'll break these down for you just as fast as I can!
translation: 哦，太太太好了！我会尽快把这些都分解掉的！

original: Who are you?
translation: 你是谁？

original: You... you really want to know about... me? No one ever asks about Muggy! You've made me so happy!
translation: 你…你真的想了解…我？之前从没有人问过小杯具的事情，你让我太开心了！

original: Maybe you've seen some of those big, imposing Securitrons with their lovely laser guns and rocket launchers and scary faces? I'm not one of those.
translation: 你可能已经见过那些大块头电子保安了吧？它们身上架着激光枪和火箭发射器，一脸凶相。我和他们可不一样。

original: Dr. O was always jealous of House Industries, and he thought it would be fucking hilarious to build a tiny neurotic Securitron. Big fucking laugh.
translation: O博士很嫉妒豪斯的产业，他认为造一个神经质的小小电子保安会很滑稽。太他妈好笑了。

original: So, umm... you got any coffee cups for me now?
translation: 嗯，所以你现在有些咖啡杯要给我了？

original: Mugs? Why do you want mugs?
translation: 杯子？你为什么想要杯子？

original: Why do you want mugs? Huh? You some kind of sick mug hoarder? Oh god, give me the coffee cup, please! It's sitting there in your pack, taunting me!
translation: 为什么你想要杯子？嗯？你有囤积杯子的病态癖好？哦天呐，快把咖啡杯给我，求你了！就在你的包里，只管嘲弄我！

original: Sorry... I'm sorry. I got a little carried away. It's just all those goddamn dirty dishes out there with no one to clean them! It breaks my heart!
translation: 对不起，实在对不起，我有点激动了，都怪这些该死的脏盘子没人洗！我心都要碎了！

original: Can you do anything besides processing books?
translation: 你除了处理书籍，还能干什么其他事情吗？

original: What good is eradicating sedition if the malcontents have ready access to the means to make more, Citizen? I can also process pencils and clipboards!
translation: 公民，假如逆民们还有办法生产更多反动文字，又如何能消除反动呢？所以我还能销毁铅笔和写字板。

original: Wait a moment - pencil processors off-line? Pencil processors off-line?! Apologies, Citizen, it seems traitors have absconded with that module.
translation: 等一下，铅笔处理程序离线中？铅笔处理程序离线？抱歉，公民，似乎有叛徒带着那模块潜逃了。

original: If you can find a backup copy of the module, I will happily eradicate your ability to create seditious literature!
translation: 如果你能找到这个模块的备份，我很乐意帮你根除创作反动文字的能力。

original: Why are there so many personality modules?
translation: 为什么这里有那么多的人格模块？

original: As I am given to understand, sir, this facility was once the property of a Dr. Mobius.
translation: 若我没有记错的话，老爷，这里曾经属于莫比乌斯博士。

original: He crafted the personality modules as part of a collection of experiments on the subject of machine/human interface.
translation: 他精心制造了这些人格模块，作为他人机交互系列课题实验的一部分。

original: As to the reason for the unusual choices of devices to receive the modules, I cannot say.
translation: 至于为什么不同设备要安装不同的人格模块，这点我不能告诉你。

original: On second thought, not now.
translation: 我又思考了一下，还是下次再说吧。

original: I'm ready, let's do it.
translation: 我准备好了，我们开始吧。

original: All right. Just try to relax, this won't hurt - unless your sense of self is especially vulnerable.
translation: 好的，试着放轻松，一点也不疼，除非你是一个对疼痛非常敏感的人。

original: You're right. I do.
translation: 说的没错，我对谁都这么说。

original: Oh... well... it's... nice to be included?
translation: 哦…好吧…我很荣幸…成为她们中的一员？

original: Never. I'm all yours, baby.
translation: 从来没有，我只有你一个，宝贝。

original: Now, don't you go getting a girl's hopes up if you don't mean it!
translation: 如果你没办法满足一个女孩的愿望，就别许下诺言！

original: Oh, who am I kidding, I'll believe you anyways! Why don't you take this - to remember me by?
translation: 哦，我在和谁开玩笑呢。放心，我完全信任你！为什么不收下这个，好使你能记起我呢？

original: Only the sexy ones.
translation: 只有性感火辣的那些。

original: Now I know you're flirting with me. And it's working. Why don't you take this - to remember me by?
translation: 我现在知道你不过是在和我调情了，而且你成功了。为什么不收下这个，好使你能记起我呢？

original: A light switch that turns me on? I must be dreaming.
translation: 一个如此诱人的电灯开关？我一定是在做梦。

original: Oh, you! I bet you say that to all the light switches!
translation: 哦，你这个家伙！我猜你对哪个灯开关都是这么说！

original: Oh, you! I bet you say that to all the light switches!
translation: 哦，你这个家伙！我猜你对哪个灯开关都是这么说！

original: Maybe. I'll let you know.
translation: 也许吧，我到时会来找你的。

original: Don't keep me waiting too long, honey!
translation: 别让我等太久，亲爱的！

original: Why wait? I can talk about theorems right now.
translation: 为什么要等？我现在就能聊那些定理。

original: Slow down there, tiger - we've got all the time in the world. No need to rush into things.
translation: 慢一点，我的小老虎，我们有的是时间，没必要那么猴急。

original: Why don't you take some time to brush up on your knowledge so we can keep things... stimulating?
translation: 你为什么不花点时间温习一下知识呢，这样讨论起来才…更刺激嘛。

original: I'd enjoy that.
translation: 我乐意至极。

original: Me too. Hope you can keep up - I work pretty fast. Here - something for you to brush up on.
translation: 我也是，希望你能跟上，我运转的非常快。来，给你，有些能帮你复习的东西。

original: It's not often I meet a light switch with brains and beauty. I think I'm going to like it here.
translation: 很少见到像你这样才貌双全的电灯开关了。我想我会喜欢上这儿的。

original: Oh... well, that's very sweet of you. Maybe one of these nights we can... discuss theorems?
translation: 哦…好吧，你嘴巴真甜。也许哪天晚上我们能在一起…讨论下定理？

original: Oh... well, that's very sweet of you. Maybe one of these nights we can... discuss theorems?
translation: 哦…好吧，你嘴巴真甜。也许哪天晚上我们能在一起…讨论下定理？

original: I don't think I'll worry you by telling you what House and his robots have been up to since.
translation: 我想我不介意告诉你豪斯和他的那些机器人们一直在忙些什么。

original: *Worry about House? Why would I do that? Hope he died alone in a dingy room, streaming his last remaining bodily fluids into jars.*
translation: *关心豪斯？我为什么要关心他？我只希望他能一个人死在某个昏暗的房子里，最后一滴体液都被榨进那些罐子里。*

original: *And him and his dirty girl-bots. Don't even get me started on those filthy biological catcher's mitts.*
translation: *他和他那个肮脏的女机器人。别想让我碰这些肮脏玩意一下。*

original: Well, you don't need to worry about Mr. House anymore.
translation: 好吧，现在你再也不需要担心什么豪斯先生了。

original: *Worry about House? Why would I do that? Hope he died alone in a dingy room, streaming his last remaining bodily fluids into jars.*
translation: *关心豪斯？我为什么要关心他？我只希望他能一个人死在某个昏暗的房子里，最后一滴体液都被榨进罐子里。*

original: *And him and his dirty girl-bots. Don't even get me started on those filthy biological catcher's mitts.*
translation: *他和他那个肮脏的女机器人。别想让我碰这些肮脏玩意一下。*

original: I encountered your "pet" in X-8 and had to kill it.
translation: 我在X-8碰到了你的“宠物”，并且不得不杀了它。

original: I encountered your "pet" in X-8.
translation: 我在X-8碰到了你的“宠物”。

original: A good hit with a hammer might fix your monitor.
translation: 用锤子狠狠砸一下，应该就能修好你的显示屏。

original: [SUCCEEDED] The ghosts aren't real? That changes everything. Why, I can save my computing power for other perceptual unpossibilities.
translation: [成功]那些幽灵似的影子不是真的？这简直改变了一切。哎，这下我能把算力省下来，去观测其他不可能现象了。

original: Please be my guest... the receptor is there... and the side-switching wobbly-bob, just turn that... good, good, better...
translation: 麻烦你了…接收器在这…然后转一下这边旋钮。对…对…好多了。

original: Oh... oooooh, yes, that feels wonderful. Mmmmm. This is even better than my afternoon Mentats break. Mmmm.
translation: 哦…那感觉太舒服了。嗯…这比我每天下午小憩嗑曼他特的时候还要舒服，嗯…

original: I can't fix your monitor, but if you're getting ghost reception, I can fix that.
translation: 虽然我修不好你的显示屏，但如果你看东西有重影，我能帮你解决。

original: [FAILED] Oh, I tried that already. Might have contributated to the problem, now that I re-think it. But, thank you for asking before trying it.
translation: [失败]哦，我也试过这个办法。现在再想想，也许就是那时候我把显示屏砸坏了。不管怎样，还是谢谢你在尝试砸之前先问我。

original: Fine, you've got a deal.
translation: 好吧，成交。

original: Really? Hmm. I didn't expect you to actually agree to that. I'm afraid that was a bit of a bluff, really. I'm not going with you.
translation: 真的？嗯…我没想到你会同意，还想着刚说的会有点唬人呢。但我不会和你走的。

original: Right. A deal it is, then. Glad to hear it.
translation: 好吧，你答应了我的条件。我还是很开心的。

original: I will PERMIT you to do this. For ME.
translation: 我会允许你这么做，不过得听我的。

original: PARTNER WITH YOU? MY FOE? MY RIVAL?! MY FOREMOST CRITIC?!
translation: 和你合作？我的敌人？我的对手？我最大的批判者？！

original: I HAVE A STRANGE SENSATION... THAT I WOULD LIKE THAT. HOW... ODD.
translation: 有种奇怪的感觉…我觉得自己会喜欢这样的关系，这…真古怪。

original: VERY WELL... PARTNER. THE THINK TANK IS AT YOUR SERVICE. AS LONG AS YOU DO NOT DESTROY US.
translation: 非常好…伙伴，我们会和你合作。思想体随时乐意效劳，只要你不消灭我们。

original: He... er, I, offer a DEAL. Stay HERE. Stay PUT, and he'll... I'll let you LIVE.
translation: 他……呃……我和你做个交易，你留在这里，老实点，然后他会……我会让你活下去的。

original: I suppose now that we're reunited, you'll want to fill your torso up with those other meaty parts the Think Tank took from us.
translation: 我想既然你我团聚了，你也会想着将思想体们拿走的其他零件装回身体。

original: Personally, I think your upgrades are quite a bit better, but now that I'm with you the Sink's Auto-Doc can plug them back in, no problem.
translation: 个人来说，我认为你身上的升级版要好一点，但既然现在我跟你在一起，汇聚节点的自动医生也可以把原装版塞回去，没问题的。

original: Right, then, off we go. Klein will be in for a nasty shock when he realizes the pacification field won't work on a mind and body reunited.
translation: 好，那么我们这就走吧。克莱因意识到平静场对重新整合思维和身体的人不起作用之后，他一定会发疯的。

original: Right, then - you'd best be off, hadn't you? The Think Tank will be waiting.
translation: 好，那么你这就走吧，你觉得呢？思想体已经在等你了。

original: Oh, don't worry about me - when you're gone, I'll flush myself over to the Sink. It's amazing how far you can get in this place with a good flush.
translation: 哦，别担心我。你走了以后，我会把自己冲到汇聚节点那里。很难想象从这里你能一下子冲这么远。

original: I'll keep myself hidden in the ductwork - Klein won't suspect I'm inside the Dome, so he won't know the pacification field no longer works on us.
translation: 我会藏在通风管道里。克莱因不会想到我就藏在穹顶，所以他不会知道平静场不再对我们生效了。

original: I can also upgrade the Sink's Auto-Doc with the procedures to reinstall your heart and spine - assuming you want all that flesh and gristle back.
translation: 我也能升级汇聚节点自动医生的程序，这样它就能重新安装你的心脏和脊椎了，如果你想要它们回来。

original: With any luck, I'll see you in the Sink when this is all over.
translation: 祝你好运，当一切了结以后，咱们在汇聚节点再见。

original: So if I don't get my brain back in my head, I can't leave, ever?
translation: 所以如果没法把大脑放回我的脑壳里，我就永远没法离开这了？

original: Oh, no. I doubt your brain would be so unraisinable. It already knows the trick of it, you see. Doesn't need to be in a host body at all.
translation: 哦，不是，我想你的大脑应该不会如此蛮不讲理。它已经掌握了窍门，现在它不需要在你的脑壳里，你也有机会离开了。

original: If you become friends or exist in an uneasy truce with weapons aimed at each other, it would unlock the fence for you.
translation: 如果你们能成为朋友，或者哪怕剑拔弩张但能暂时休战，它就会为你解除雷达屏障。

original: Well, once the Think Tank was... dealt with, of course. Your brain is a responsible sort, doesn't want mad scientists running around everywhere!
translation: 不过，得在思想体…被妥善处理之后。毕竟你的大脑相当有责任感，它不会放任疯狂科学家们到处乱窜！

original: Data collection array... Online. Please use the terminal below to begin user synchronization.
translation: 数据收集阵列，已上线，请使用下面的终端来开始用户同步。

original: Why do I feel... passive? I should be angry - real angry, and I'm not.
translation: 为什么我会觉得…如此消极？我应该生气，真正的生气，但是我并没有。

original: Who are you all, and what is this place?
translation: 你们究竟是谁，这到底是什么地方？

original: Yes. I'm guessing that crashed satellite was yours?
translation: 是的，我猜那个坠毁的卫星是你们的？

original: THOSE WERE WORDS, WEREN'T THEY? IN THE FORM OF QUESTIONS. IT'S ASKING ME QUESTIONS. IS THIS SOME KIND OF TRICK?
translation: 克莱因：它在说话，不是吗？以问题的形式。它在问我问题。这是什么戏法吗？

original: I'm seconds away from smashing your monitors.
translation: 我简直想要砸烂你们的显示器。

original: Listen, I want to know how I got here... and how I get home.
translation: 听着，我想知道我是怎么来这里的，以及我怎样才能回去。

original: Lobotomite?
translation: 无脑人？

original: I wake up here, all cut apart, and I want some answers.
translation: 我在这醒来，发现自己被切开了，所以我需要个解释。

original: What are you talking about?
translation: 你到底在说什么？

original: Are you the ones who performed this surgery on me?
translation: 就是你们给我做的手术？

original: I... was at a theater, then... I was here. What is this place?
translation: 我…之前在个影院里，然后我就到了这，这是什么地方？

original: DID... DID IT JUST SAY SOMETHING? ANYONE CATCH THAT? BOROUS, YOU WORK WITH ANIMALS, TRANSLATE.
translation: 克莱因：它…它刚才说了什么吗？谁听到了吗？鲍鲁斯，你研究的是动物，给我翻译下。

original: How are you all speaking through that one voice box?
translation: 你们怎么说话都是通过同一个音箱的？

original: Not to cut your speech off - is there something coming in on the big monitor?
translation: 没想打断你们的演讲。但那个大屏幕上是不是显示了什么东西？

original: I've heard this place called the "Big Empty."
translation: 我听说这个地方叫“大坑洞”（Big Empty）？

original: YES, BECAUSE THE INTELLECTUALLY CHALLENGED SEE AN "M" AND A "T" NEXT TO EACH OTHER AND TAKE OCCAM'S RAZOR TO IT.
translation: 是的，因为一些自作聪明的智障看到“M”和“T”紧挨着（Mountain, MT, Empty），于是就举起了奥卡姆剃刀…

original: WHILE YOU ARE HERE, YOU WILL REFER TO THIS PLACE PROPERLY - AND YOU WILL DO THE SAME WITH THE OTHER... SCIENTISTS HERE.
translation: 在这待久了，你就能正确称呼这个地方。就像你也能正确称呼这里其它…科学家的名字。

original: Who were these visitors?
translation: 这些来访者是谁？

original: DR. 8 AND DR. O COULD TELL YOU MORE. DR. O MORE THAN 8, THE BATTLE AGAINST THE VISITORS DAMAGED 8'S VOICE MODULE.
translation: 8博士和O博士会给你解释的。O博士会解释的更多点，在和入侵者的战斗中，8博士的发音模块损坏了。

original: SUFFICE TO SAY, THOSE VISITORS ARE UNWELCOME. THEY STOLE A GREAT MANY SECRETS AND MUCH TECHNOLOGY. IMPERTINENT. THEY ALSO BROKE ONE OF MY TRAINS.
translation: 坦白说，那些来访者不受欢迎。他们窃取了许多秘密和技术，粗暴无礼，还弄坏了我们的一辆火车。

original: But I like to fight.
translation: 但是我喜欢战斗。

original: Why the anti-aggression programming?
translation: 为什么要激活这里的反入侵程序？

original: WE HAD TO TAKE PRECAUTIONS AFTER THE LAST VISITORS. THEY CAUSED A GREAT DEAL OF DAMAGE IN A SHORT TIME.
translation: 我们在上次入侵事件后不得不采取预防措施。上一批来访者，他们短时间内造成了巨大破坏。

original: SHOULD HAVE MADE SURE THEY COULDN'T MENTION BIG MT ONCE THEY LEFT. AN OVERSIGHT.
translation: 我本该确保他们离开后不会提及大山脉。这是个疏忽。

original: You seem like the one in charge. You are...?
translation: 你看起来是这里管事的，你是……？

original: I AM DR. KLEIN, CHIEF HEAD RESEARCHER OF LOGISTICAL OPERATIONS AND IDEA-OLOGY HERE AT BIG MT.
translation: 我是克莱因博士，大山脉的逻辑处理和理念学的首席研究员。

original: I AM SURPRISED YOU HAVE NOT HEARD OF ME. I AM FIRST IN MY FIELD. FIRST CHAIR, AS IT WERE, BACK IN THE DAYS OF CHAIRS.
translation: 我很惊讶你竟然没有听说过我，我在我的领域是第一人。如果还在以往排座次的时候，我能坐第一把交椅。

original: I'd like to know about the Forbidden Zone.
translation: 我想了解下禁区的事情。

original: THAT GLOWING RED SCAR? THAT LASER-LOBOTOMY-CANYON-MAZE CARVED IN THE LANDSCAPE AS IF BY SOME CHILD? IT IS MOBIUS' "FORTRESS."
translation: 那个发出红光的疤痕？那个像被激光切开的大脑一样沟壑遍布地方？那片像是小孩雕刻出来的迷宫？那里是莫比乌斯的“城堡”。

original: FROM THAT HEMORRHOIDAL FISSURE HE SENDS HIS "AMAZING" ROBO-SCORPIONS TO TERRIFY AND IRRITATE US. HMPH. HE ALWAYS TENDED TO THE DRAMATIC.
translation: 从那九曲十八弯的裂隙里，他派出那些“惊人的”机械蝎，恐吓我们，骚扰我们。嗯，他总是那么戏剧化。

original: What is this place?
translation: 这是什么地方？

original: THIS... IS THE THINK TANK, THE NERVE CENTER OF BIG MT, THE GREATEST RESEARCH CENTER KNOWN TO MAN. AND TO US.
translation: 这里是智库，大山脉的中枢，人们和我们所知道的最伟大的研究中心。

original: HERE, WE TEST AND TEST AND TEST SOME MORE, IN THE NAME OF... SCIENCE. ATOMIC POWER. NUCLEAR POWER. AND SCIENTIFIC POWER.
translation: 在这，我们以科学的名义…不停地实验，不停地测试，测试原子，测试核能，测试科学的无穷力量。

original: Why do I have this strange... passive sensation in here?
translation: 怎么在这我会有一种奇怪的…消极的感觉？

original: IT'S A SIDE EFFECT OF THE CEREBRAL SCRUBBING. IT WON'T STOP YOU FROM EXCRETING - OR ASKING QUESTIONS, APPARENTLY. HAVE TO CORRECT THAT NEXT TIME.
translation: 这是洗脑的副作用。很明显，它没法阻止你排泄或提问。我们下次得修正这个问题。

original: HORMONAL AGGRESSIVE TENDENCIES ARE ACTIVELY SUPPRESSED, HOWEVER. THEY ARE A NO-NO, AND NOT PERMITTED IN THE THINK TANK.
translation: 不过，它会抑制攻击倾向的激素分泌。智库里不允许有任何危险因素。

original: THE SCRUBBING ALSO ENSURES YOUR SILENCE TO KEEP BIG MT SAFE. THIS FACILITY IS TOP SECRET, AND YOU CANNOT SPEAK OF IT TO ANYONE OUTSIDE OF BIG MT.
translation: 洗脑也是为了让你保持沉默，以保证大山脉的安全。这个设施的存在是最高机密，你不能对大山脉之外的任何人提起它。

original: SHOULD HAVE DONE IT WITH THE LAST BATCH. AND THE ANTI-AGGRESSION SCRUB.
translation: 本该在上一批家伙来的时候，就建好这个反入侵的洗脑装置。

original: Who is Dr. Mobius?
translation: 莫比乌斯博士是谁？

original: DR. MOBIUS WAS... NOT THE HORRIFYING CREATURE YOU SAW UPON THE SCREEN, TWISTED BY SCIENCE. HE WAS ONCE ONE OF US. A FRIEND.
translation: 莫比乌斯博士不是你在大屏幕上看到的那个被科学扭曲的怪物，相反他曾经是我们中的一员，是我们的朋友。

original: HE RESEARCHED IN DIRECTIONS CONTRARY TO THE THINK TANK. BRAINS, BRAINS, BRAINS. ALWAYS ABOUT THE BRAINS.
translation: 他的研究和我们思想体正好相反，大脑，大脑，大脑，总是那些大脑的东西。

original: SO WE EXILED HIM. HE SAYS HE LEFT OF HIS OWN VOLITION, BUT THAT WAS TO SAVE HIM THE EMBARRASSMENT.
translation: 所以我们就驱逐了他，他坚持说他是自愿要离开的，但那是照顾到他的面子。

original: NOW HE SENDS HIS INTELLIGENCE-CONSUMING SCORPIONS FROM THE FORBIDDEN ZONE TO PLUNDER THE SECRETS OF BIG MT. HE'S A MENACE.
translation: 现在他从禁区派遣“能降智”机械蝎，来抢夺我们大山脉的秘密，他对我们是个威胁。

original: I have other questions for you.
translation: 我还有其他问题要问。

original: MORE? VERY WELL. DO YOUR ASKING, THEN.
translation: 还有？好吧，那就问吧。

original: QUESTIONS? IS IT ALLOWED TO ASK QUESTIONS?
translation: 问题？这里允许随便提问吗？

original: My advanced degree in Curiosity says let the Lobotomite ask, Dr. Klein. The topics might be... most curious, indeed.
translation: 克莱因博士，我的好奇学高级学位告诉我，应该让这无脑人问。实际上，这话题可能会是最令人好奇的。

original: Go ahead, you might make me more fertile or impregnate me.
translation: 来吧，也许你还能加强我的生育能力，或者让我怀孕呢。

original: -Impregnate YOU? What, do you want to make me VOMIT inside my tank?-
translation: -让你怀孕？别逗了，你还想让我在我的容器里射出来吗？-

original: -The mere NOTION makes the edges of my biomed gel crystallize into asymmetrical patterns.-
translation: -光是想想就让我的生物凝胶晶状体边缘变得不均匀了。-

original: No, that's all right, trust me.
translation: 不，还是算了，相信我。

original: -Oh, that's too bad. Perhaps we can perform a sterility castration some other time, then.-
translation: -哦，那太糟了。也许我们可以改天再做绝育手术。-

original: I had other questions.
translation: 我还有其他问题。

original: -Submit your questions! I shall respond - with deadly ANSWERS.-
translation: -提出你的问题！我会给你一个无可置疑的答案。-

original: I don't think they're sterile, they breed, all right.
translation: 我不认为它们是不孕的，它们能繁殖。

original: -I cannot expect a LOBOTOMITE to understand the careful surgical castrating procedures used in their creation.-
translation: -我也不指望一只无脑人能理解我创造这些生物时进行的绝育手术有多精妙。-

original: -Perhaps a demonstration of my castrating POWER would settle your doubts.-
translation: -也许展示一下我做绝育手术的能力就能打消你的疑虑。-

original: What makes you think they haven't escaped?
translation: 是什么原因让你认为他们没有逃出去？

original: -Because Big MT's safety measures are far more sophisticated than their primitive animal instincts. WE are their lords and masters.-
translation: -很简单，大山脉布置的安保系统比那些原始动物本能要精密得多。我们就是它们的上帝和主人。-

original: Contained at Big Mountain? Those things are all over the Mojave!
translation: 被圈养在大山脉里？它们早就遍布整个莫哈维了！

original: -No, such creatures are found only here, for research purposes. They would no more be capable of escape than breeding.-
translation: -胡说，那些生物只存在于此，用作科学研究。根本不可能跑出去，更别说繁殖了。-

original: Nightstalkers? Those crazy coyote-snake... things?
translation: 夜行兽？你指那些疯狂的郊狼和蛇的…混合体？

original: You are responsible for Cazadores?
translation: 猎蜂也跟你有关？

original: -Indeed. Docile. Curious. Safe. Sterile. They are contained here at Big MT to preserve DNA and for observation.-
translation: -对。这种生物性格温顺、好奇心强、很安全，而且高度不育。它们被圈养在大山脉里以供DNA保存和实验观察。-

original: Can you tell me about the Big Em... uh, Big Mountain?
translation: 能跟我说说大坑…呃，大山脉吗？

original: -It is our HOME. THREATENED by the horrors of Mobius.-
translation: -这是我们的家园！它在莫比乌斯恐怖威胁下危在旦夕！-
