original: -All we wish to do is continue our research, layer upon layer, above and beneath the floor of the Crater until we have our answers.-
translation: -我们唯一的愿望就是继续研究，地上地下，一层层地不断研究，直到找到答案。-

original: -But NO! Mobius will not let us rest. Scaring us with his scary robots with their laser tails and blowing up all the time.-
translation: -但是不！莫比乌斯不会让我们休息。他用那些长着镭射尾巴，整天爆炸的机械蝎吓唬我们。-

original: Can you tell me about the Big Empty?
translation: 你能跟我讲讲大坑洞（Big Empty）吗？

original: -That castrated nickname of our facility is NOT its true name. The true name is: BIG MT. Where are your manners?-
translation: -那个掐头去尾的外号（Big Empty）绝不是它真正的名字。它真正的名字是：大山脉（BIG MT）。你的规矩都丢哪儿去了？-

original: Why does Klein want these particular technologies?
translation: 为什么克莱因专门想要这些技术？

original: -There is LOGIC and purpose in it. If these technologies are needed to pierce the FORBIDDEN ZONE... so be IT.-
translation: -自然有逻辑和目的蕴含其中。如果必须有这些技术才能突入禁区…那就是这样。-

original: -Science! is powerful, and in the right hands... OUR hands... if we had hands, we would be nigh-unstoppable!-
translation: -科学的力量，无比强大！掌握在正确的人手中…我们手中…好吧如果我们有手，我们就将所向无敌！-

original: I want to know more about Mobius and the Forbidden Zone.
translation: 关于莫比乌斯和禁区，我想知道更多。

original: -The malignant tumor that is Mobius plagues us ALL. His hunger for power, INSATIABLE.-
translation: -那恶性肿瘤，莫比乌斯，折磨着我们所有人。他对权力的饥渴，永远无法被满足。-

original: -From his LAIR in the FORBIDDEN ZONE, his terrifying ROBO-SCORPION army clicks and whirs across the crater of Big MT. EVER-seeking. EVER-stinging.-
translation: -他那可怕的机械蝎大军从禁区里倾巢而出，轰鸣着横扫整个大山脉。搜索，蜇人，永不停歇！-

original: -He must be STOPPED. Or all of Big MT... shall be DESTROYED.-
translation: -必须阻止他。否则整个大山脉…将被破坏殆尽。-

original: Who are you - what do you do here?
translation: 你是谁？你在这里做什么？

original: -BEFORE you is the brain of Dr. Borous. Head of Animalogy, Beastology, and DNA-Scrambling technology here at Big MT.-
translation: -你面前是鲍鲁斯博士的大脑。大山脉动物学、野兽学和DNA重组技术的首席。-

original: -I lay the bones and hearts of animals bare beneath my searing gaze. Especially the dogs. I did so love dogs once. Especially Gabe, that rascal.-
translation: -我带着灼热的目光研究动物的骨头，心脏。尤其是狗，我以前真的很喜欢狗。特别是加布，那个小淘气。-

original: -But there are MANY animals to shape. Industrious Cazadores, the happy-go-lucky Nightstalkers... they are my living, breathing DNA test tubes.-
translation: -但还有很多动物可以塑造。勤劳的猎蜂，快乐的夜行兽…它们都是我活生生的DNA试管。-

original: Calm down. I just had some questions.
translation: 冷静点。我只想问些问题。

original: -Just as I feared! Questions, quizzes, just as there were in American High School! And if there are NO answers, how will the Think Tank graduate?-
translation: -正如我害怕的！问题、小测，就像这里是美国中学！如果没法作答，思想体该怎么毕业啊？-

original: Do you always get this dramatic?
translation: 你怎么总是像表演戏剧一样？

original: -DRAMA? There is no DRAMA in Science! As I learned in High School, Science! is an intellectual pursuit DEVOID of bestial emotions.-
translation: -戏剧？科学中没有戏剧的位置！正如我在高中学到的，科学，是不受原始情感左右的理性工作！-

original: -Unless, of course, you are a Communist. Like Betsy Bright, who "sat" "next" to me in math. And her smoking confederate, Richie Marcus.-
translation: -当然，除非你是一个共产主义分子。就像我数学课的同桌贝琪·布莱特，还有她的烟友，里奇·马库斯。-

original: -As I learned in my High School, American High, AHS, "Drama" is for movies, things of FICTION. Here, in the Think Tank, the ONLY star is... SCIENCE!-
translation: -就像我在高中——美国高中学到的那样。“戏剧”就像电影，是虚构的东西。而在思想体里，唯一的明星是….科学！-

original: Animal? Did you just call me an animal?
translation: 动物？你刚刚把我称作动物？

original: -Yes, animal. Hormones, pores, GLANDS, all wrapped up in SKIN. Who knows what terrifying secrets lie beneath your EPIDERMIS?-
translation: -是的，动物。激素、毛孔、腺体，全都被包裹在皮肤里。谁能知道你的表皮下还藏着什么可怕的秘密？-

original: -Scalpels shall tell us your secrets, even if we must cut DEEP for such knowledge. I was head of my Biology class at American High, you know.-
translation: -解剖刀能够告诉我们你的秘密，为了这些知识我们可能需要切得深一点。知道吗，我在美国高中时可是生物课代表。-

original: Why is that?
translation: 为什么这么说？

original: *Klein knows things we don't. And I think he told some of those things to the last visitor. Dangerous things if they ever got out.*
translation: *克莱因知道我们不知道的东西。我认为他将其中一些告诉了最后那位来访者。如果那些东西从这里泄露出去，那就很危险了。*

original: Who were the others?
translation: 其他人是谁？

original: *Two other human specimens. One arrived not long after the troublemaker... and the last one, not sure when he showed up.*
translation: *另外两个人类样本。其中一个紧随那捣乱者而来…另一个，我也不确定他是何时出现的。*

original: *Thought the first one was going to be lobotomized in Y-17, she got out somehow.*
translation: *本以为其中一个会在Y-17执行大脑切除手术，结果她不知用什么方法逃了。*

original: *The last subject... Klein might know more. He talked to him, then let him leave the Think Tank. Hope he knew what he was doing.*
translation: *最后那个实验体…克莱因可能知道的更多。他们聊过，然后克莱因放他离开了智库。希望他知道自己在干什么。*

original: Tell me what happened.
translation: 告诉我发生了什么。

original: *This human... I can't believe it... he broke out of the Think Tank. In seconds.*
translation: *这个人类…简直难以置信…他只用了几秒钟就逃出了智库。*

original: *Then he went for Yangtze, got bomb collars, and started practicing on the subjects that were still there until he got the right frequency.*
translation: *然后他去了长江集中营，拿到了爆炸项圈，开始用还留在那里的实验体做试验，直到找到正确的频率。*

original: *We were sending robots to stop him and he was slicing and cutting through their shells with some suped-up laser gun like they were cheese... paper.*
translation: *我们派机器人去阻止他，他拿着几把强力激光枪切开它们的装甲，就像切奶酪…或者纸。*

original: *When he hacked into the mainframe, 8 tried to stop him and got fried. Me? He rerouted my processors to take control of the train network here.*
translation: *当他黑进中央处理器的时候，8试图阻止他，结果被烧坏了。我？他黑进我的处理器，控制了这儿的火车网络。*

original: *If you see the tunnels with the trains plowed into them, you can thank our visitor for that. He wrecked the whole place.*
translation: *如果你看见有些被火车堵住的隧道，那就是这位来访者的手笔，他把这地方搞得一团糟。*

original: *While we were trying to keep containment on the surface, turns out he used one train to punch out a tunnel and escape... sealed now, but...*
translation: *在我们试图夺回控制时，他用一辆的火车撞开隧道逃了出去…现在那里也堵了，但…*

original: That doesn't sound impressive - breaking machines, that is.
translation: 听上去让人不齿，那是在破坏机器。

original: *Who asked you? You just wait until a working machine threatens you, and you'll wish I was around!*
translation: *管你怎么想。等到一个运转中的机器追杀你的时候，你就会希望我在你身边了！*

original: I had other questions.
translation: 我还有其他问题。

original: A Giant Robot Scorpion?
translation: 一个机械巨蝎？

original: *Yeah, crazy right? Something right out of a Midnight Science Fiction Feature. Ridiculous. What are the odds?*
translation: *对，很疯狂是吧？就像从午夜科幻小说里跑出来的东西一样，很荒唐。可能性有多少呢？*

original: I heard you and 8 were attacked by previous visitors.
translation: 我听说你和8被先前的来访者攻击过。

original: *I don't like to talk about it. 8... he can't talk about it, they fried his voice module something good.*
translation: *我不喜欢谈那些。8…他也没办法谈那些，他们把他的发音模块烧坏了。*

original: *It wasn't all the visitors, though - only one of them got out of control. He's the one that took control of Little Yangtze, our old human farm.*
translation: *不是所有的来访者，他们中仅有一位失控了。他控制了长江集中营，我们曾经的畜人场。*

original: Can you tell me about this facility?
translation: 可以给我介绍一下这个设施吗？

original: *Big MT used to be a mountain. Then there was a... slight mishap. Now it's a crater - the Dome used to be buried, now it's exposed to the sky.*
translation: *大山脉过去曾经是一座山。后来出了一起…轻微的事故。现在它变成了一个环形坑。智智库的穹顶过去是埋在地下，现在它才重见天日。*

original: *Don't get me wrong. Makes the sky light up like a planetarium at night. All those spectra... so soothing.*
translation: *别误会我。现在夜里的天空像星象仪那样明亮。所有那些光谱…如此清晰。*

original: Tell me about Mobius and these monsters of his.
translation: 告诉我关于莫比乌斯和他那些怪兽的事。

original: *That "genius" Mobius somehow cobbled together these really impressive-looking robot scorpions with spare parts. Even painted them.*
translation: *那个“天才”莫比乌斯用零配件就组装出这些令人印象深刻的机械蝎。甚至还给它们画了涂装。*

original: *Tried to see what makes them tick. Can't even examine them without them detonating all over me. Left with shrapnel and burns. Every. Time.*
translation: *我曾想弄明白它们是怎么运转起来的。但没等我检查多久，它们就炸的到处都是，只剩下些弹片和残骸。次次如此。*

original: *Supposedly, he has even larger models, even a Giant Robot Scorpion hidden deep within the Forbidden Zone. Yeah, right. Giant monsters. Sure.*
translation: *恐怕，他还有更大的模型，甚至是一只巨大的机械蝎，藏在禁区深处。是的，巨大的怪兽。毋庸置疑。*

original: Do you have another name?
translation: 你还有另一个名字？

original: *Yeah, I do. It wasn't always "O." I had took that one by default because sometimes it's easier to accept the mistake as long as the purpose works.*
translation: *是的。我的名字并不总是“O”。我默认使用它，只是觉得既然这个名字能起到称呼我的目的，那我还是接受这个错误更轻松些。*

original: *I don't want to get into it. It's a sore topic with me. Makes my gel ripple.*
translation: *我不想提起它。对我来说它是个痛苦的话题，让我的生物凝胶泛起涟漪。*

original: What do you do here?
translation: 你在这做什么？

original: *All things robotical. You see a robot, I made it. See a broken robot, I made it that way. Deconstructed it down to parts.*
translation: *制作所有机械化的东西。你看到一个机器人，是我做的；看到一个破碎的机器人，也是我做的，只是把它肢解了。*

original: *I have a gift with machines. I can render anything inoperable - preserve them in a non-functioning state.*
translation: *我天生擅长摆弄机器。我能让任何东西变得无法操作——让它们保持在无机能的状态。*

original: Calm down. Just wanted to ask some questions.
translation: 冷静。我只是想问些问题。

original: *Fine. Ask.*
translation: *好吧。问。*

original: Agenda? I don't have any agenda, not with RobCo, anyway.
translation: 图谋？我没有任何图谋，至少没有和罗伯科公司有关的。

original: *Ooohh, really? You have their tech. On. Your. Arm.*
translation: *哦呵呵，真的吗？你有他们的技术，就在你的手！臂！上！*

original: Some problem with RobCo?
translation: 罗伯科公司有什么问题吗？

original: What, my Pip-Boy?
translation: 什么？我的哔哔小子？

original: *How dare you bring RobCo tech in here! What, are you showing off? How great Robert House and his biiiig company are?*
translation: *你怎么敢把罗伯科技术带到这里！怎么，你在炫耀吗？罗伯特·豪斯和他的大大大公司很伟大是吗？*

original: *"Oh! We can make Securitrons better than any robot those geniuses at Big MT can make, and they'll last a thousand years!"*
translation: *“哦！我们做出的电子保安，比大山脉里那些天才们做出的任何机器人都更好，它们能运转上千年！“*

original: *Rrrr! You're lucky I don't have hands to tear that Dip-Boy off your arm - or feet to stomp on its stupid metal guts! Ooooo, damn RobCo!*
translation: *哈！你真幸运，我没有手，不能把那烂哔小子从你的手臂上扯下来。我也没有脚，不能把它愚蠢的金属内脏踩烂！啊啊啊，该死的罗伯科！*

original: I wanted to talk to you.
translation: 我想跟你谈谈。

original: *Congratulations, you've succeeded. What, you come to humiliate me, tell me how I've yet to find a means of stopping Mobius' scorpions?*
translation: *恭喜，你成功了。怎么，来羞辱我的是吗，说我这么久还没找到办法来阻止莫比乌斯的蝎子？*

original: *Or better, ask how "progress" is going on Securitron construction at the plant? We've had setbacks in research is all. That's all. And...*
translation: *还是问我工厂里电子保安的生产有何“进展”？我们的研究陷入了瓶颈，就这样。并且…*

original: I think you mean "impossible."
translation: 你想说的应该是“不可能”。

original: *O really. Now the Lobotomite is master of the dictionary arts. What, do you have a doctorate in verbology? No? I do. And...*
translation: *哦是真的吗。这无脑人是个语言艺术大师唉。怎么，你在动词学上获得过博士学位？没有？我有。而且…*

original: I'll head out, then, and be back with these... things.
translation: 那我这就出发，给你们带回这些…东西。

original: WELL. GOOD. WHAT ARE THE TOKEN WORDS SPOKEN IN THIS CASE... UH... "THANK YOU?" YES - THANK. YOU.
translation: 克莱因：很好。在这种情形下应该说什么？呃，[QUOTE]“谢谢你”？[QUOTE] 是的，谢谢，你！

original: Wait, is it leaving? Uh, but... eh, Dr. Klein, the Lobotomite will need rest. Recuperation. Things like that.
translation: 达拉：等等，它是要离开吗？嗯，但是…呃，克莱因博士，无脑人需要休息、恢复和诸如此类的事。

original: I volunteer my chambers so it might be stared at, my monitor radars slowly scanning its form to collect sensitive data.
translation: 我愿意贡献出我的房间，这样就能盯着它看了，可以让我的监视雷达慢慢的扫描它的身体，来收集敏感的数据。

original: -NO! That would put it too CLOSE to us! It could press BUTTONS, turn lights ON and OFF, and worse, let OTHER Lobotomites in!-
translation: 鲍鲁斯：-不！那样它就离我们太近了！它可能会按按钮，让灯开开关关，更糟的是，能让其他无脑人进来！-

original: *We could give it Mobius' old room. It's where its brain got scooped out anyway, and plus, some of its parts are already there.*
translation: O：*我们可以将莫比乌斯以前的房间给它。反正那里是它的脑子被挖出来的地方，而且它的一些其他器官也已经在那了。*

original: *Might be more comforting for it to hang out with its spine and heart. Home is where the heart is, after all. See what I did there? Went literal.*
translation: *对它来说，和脊椎、心脏待在一块可能会更舒服。毕竟，家是心所在的地方嘛。看看我都在做什么？在按字面意思解释。*

original: I SUPPOSE. WE'LL HAVE TO MOVE THAT COUCH OUT OF THERE, BEEN PUTTING THAT OFF TOO LONG.
translation: 克莱因：我想…我们还要把那个手术台搬出去，它放在那很久了。

original: *8 says let the Lobotomite take the Sink Central Intelligence Personality Chip and re-install it.*
translation: O：*8说可以让无脑人拿走汇聚节点中央智能单元的人格芯片，并重新装上它。*

original: *That stuffy Mobius-programmed butt-ler can walk the Lobotomite, feed it, barter with it for us.*
translation: *那个莫比乌斯编程的古板管家可以牵着无脑人出去散步，喂它吃的，还能和他交易。*

original: It would also prevent it from going to Higgs Village and taking up residence there. With my teddy bears. And it would be nice to have it so... close.
translation: 达拉：这也能阻止它去住在希格斯村，和我的泰迪熊待在一起。而且能让它待在…如此近的地方也很好。

original: YOUR LOGIC COMBINED WITH MY DESIRE TO KEEP THE THINK TANK LOBOTOMITE-FREE HAS SWAYED ME. HERE, I PRESENT THE SINK CENTRAL "INTELLIGENCE."
translation: 克莱因：你们的话富含逻辑，而且我也不想让无脑人住在穹顶里。好吧，你们说服了我。收下吧，这就是汇聚节点的中央智能单元。

original: LOBOTOMITE, TAKE THIS CHIP TO THE SINK. PLUG IT IN, AND MAKE SURE THE CHIP IS CLEAN, OR IT COULD SKIP.
translation: 无脑人，把这个芯片带到汇聚节点，插入。记得确保芯片是干净的，否则它会失效。

original: THEN MAKE WHATEVER CRUDE BIOLOGIC DEMANDS YOU NEED OF THE SINK. IT WILL CATER TO MOST OF YOUR HORMONAL WHIMS.
translation: 在汇聚节点，无论你有多么粗俗的生物需求，有什么激素激发的奇思妙想，它都能满足你。

original: YOUR LOGIC COMBINED WITH MY DESIRE TO KEEP THE THINK TANK LOBOTOMITE-FREE HAS SWAYED ME. HERE, I PRESENT THE SINK CENTRAL "INTELLIGENCE."
translation: 你们的话富含逻辑，而且我也不想让无脑人住在穹顶里。好吧，你们说服了我。收下吧，这就是汇聚节点的中央智能单元。

original: LOBOTOMITE, I HAVE SWITCHED ON THE PERSONALITY IN THE SINK. IT WILL BE ACTIVE WHEN YOU RE-ENTER.
translation: 无脑人，我已经开启了汇聚节点里的人格系统。你重新进入时，它就会生效。

original: MAKE WHATEVER CRUDE BIOLOGIC DEMANDS YOU NEED OF THE SINK. IT WILL CATER TO MOST OF YOUR HORMONAL WHIMS.
translation: 在汇聚节点，无论你有多么粗俗的生物需求，有什么激素激发的奇思妙想，它都能满足你。

original: What are these technologies?
translation: 要找回的都是些什么技术？

original: THE TECHNOLOGIES ARE THE X-2 TRANSMITTER ANTENNA ARRAY, USED TO FOCUS COHERENT THOUGHT AT EXCESSIVELY HIGH FREQUENCIES.
translation: 克莱因：这些技术包括X-2发射机天线阵列，利用极高的频率集中逻辑思维。

original: -The psycho-analytic cardiac-dampening sneaky stealth suit, a suit like NOTHING this world has ever heard, seen, or could EVER see!-
translation: 鲍鲁斯：-一套兼具精神分析、心率控制功能的潜行服，这套服装世界上没人听说过，也没人见过！-

original: ...and 8's Sonic-Soundwave-Emitter-Projecto-Gun, able to broadcast sound at lethal frequencies. It also gives a great biogel massage.
translation: 达拉：…还有8的作品：声波发射器，一条能射的枪。它能以致命的频率广播声音，也能给生物凝胶做一次极好的按摩。

original: THERE. WE HAVE INFORMED YOU OF ALL WE NEED. WE ESTIMATE IF YOU ARE FOCUSED, YOUR TIME INVESTMENT WILL BE MINIMAL. EH, BY OUR STANDARDS.
translation: 克莱因：就这么多。我们已经告知你要去找的所有东西。我们估计，如果你足够专心，想找齐这三项技术用不了多少时间，呃，以我们的时间标准来说。

original: IF YOU WORK QUICKLY, YOU WILL BE THE RECIPIENT OF A GESTURE OF GRATITUDE FROM US. WE DO NOT BESTOW THESE OLD WORLD GESTURES LIGHTLY.
translation: 如果你进展够快，你将能得到我们表示感谢的手势。我们可不会轻易做这些旧世界的手势。

original: FINE. SO... YES. GET THESE THINGS FOR US. DO NOT ATTEMPT TO COMPREHEND THEIR COMPLICATED SCHEMATICS. THAT IS FOR US TO DO.
translation: 克莱因：好。那么…是的。为我们带回这些东西。不必尝试理解它们复杂的图纸，那是我们思想体的工作。

original: That does it, forget this. I'm not helping you until I get my brain back.
translation: 就这样吧，忘掉这回事。除非我拿回我的大脑，否则我不会帮你。

original: How the hell am I even talking to you right now?
translation: 我到底干嘛要跟你废话？

original: What makes you so sure Mobius has my brain?
translation: 是什么让你如此确信莫比乌斯有我的大脑？

original: WE HAVE NO IDEA! THIS LINE OF QUESTIONING ISN'T IMPORTANT TO US RIGHT NOW! WHY ARE YOU ASKING THESE TANGENTIAL QUESTIONS? STOP IT!
translation: 克莱因：我们不知道！现在这些问题对我们根本不重要！为什么你要问这些不沾边的问题？别问了！

original: WE NEED THESE TECHNOLOGIES. YOU NEED TO GET THEM. YOU MUST GET THEM.
translation: 我们需要这些技术。你需要弄到它们。你必须弄到它们。

original: I can say "no," and I'll do it again. I'm leaving.
translation: 我能说“不”，现在我要再说一遍。我要走了。

original: LEAVING? BUT YOU CAN'T. I DON'T MEAN THAT AS A THREAT.
translation: 克莱因：走？但你走不了。我没有威胁你的意思。

original: Forget this, I'm not going to help you.
translation: 忘了这件事，我不会帮你的。

original: "No?" Why not?
translation: “不能”？为什么不能？

original: You... are equipped to retrieve the technologies with your primitive form. We are not.
translation: 达拉：你…这个原始的身体给了你回收那些技术的能力。而我们做不到。

original: *It's kind of embarrassing. You have hands. And... uh, a heartbeat, sort of. And eyes. Mostly the hands. There's door handles, and lockers, and...*
translation: O：*说来尴尬。你有手和。唔，有心跳之类的东西。有眼睛。最重要的是有手，而那里有些门把手、储物柜，还有…*

original: ENOUGH. WE NEED YOUR HELP. WILL YOU HELP US?
translation: 克莱因：够了。我们需要你的帮助。你会帮助我们吗？

original: I'll help. What do you need me to do?
translation: 我会帮忙，你需要我做什么？

original: EXCELLENT. THIS IS TURNING OUT MUCH BETTER THAN THE ACTIVATE-THE-RETREAT-PROTOCOLS-AND-COWER-IN-MY-ROOM IDEA I HAD EARLIER.
translation: 克莱因：好极了。我先前还想着离开这，然后就此缩在我的房间里呢。现在这情况比我预想的好多了。

original: *Agreed. O, and I've used my robotical knowledge to um... eh... transmit the... radio map waves to...*
translation: O：*赞成。哦，我刚刚也利用我的机器人知识，将…呃…地图的信息传输到…*

original: *Settle down, 8, I would have gotten it in a second, all right?! 8's transmitted the last known coordinates of the research centers. They, um...*
translation: O：*别急，8，我很快就会说到你了？！8已经传给我已知的研究中心的坐标。它们，嗯…*

original: *They... well, move sometimes. Or get buried. Or blow up.*
translation: *它们…好吧…有时位置会变。或者被埋了，要么就爆炸了。*

original: 8 IS CORRECT. ALL WE NEED ARE THE SCHEMATICS. THIS DOES NOT MEAN WE DO NOT WANT THE COLD, HARD TECHNOLOGY, HOWEVER.
translation: 克莱因：8是对的。我们最需要回收的是技术的图纸。当然了，也不是说我们就不想要冰冷的，实在的技术成果。

original: SO DO NOT GIVE INTO YOUR BIOLOGICAL TIRED-LAZINESS AND DECIDE YOU WOULD SWEAT TOO MUCH CARRYING THEM. YOU HAVE A NEW SPINE. USE IT.
translation: 所以，快去把技术带回来吧。别屈服于你那生物性的，出于懒惰的疲倦感，你现在有根新脊椎，好好利用它。

original: AND EVEN IF YOU DIE IN THE ACT OF RECLAMATION, SIMPLY REACHING THEM WILL AUTO-TRANSMITIFY THE SCHEMATICS TO US. THAT IS STILL GOOD. FOR US.
translation: 即使你在回收技术时死掉，但只要你触碰到它们，就可以将图纸自动传输给我们。对我们来说，那样也不错。

original: Why me? Can't you do it?
translation: 为什么要我去干？你们不能自己去？

original: UM. NO.
translation: 克莱因：呃…不能。

original: No, I'm not going to help you.
translation: 不，我不打算帮助你。

original: OH.
translation: 克莱因：哦（"OH"）。

original: *Yes, Dr. Klein? What?*
translation: O：*是，克莱因博士？你在叫我？*

original: NOT YOU, O, YOU IDIOT! I MEANT "OH," IN THE SENSE OF "OH, I WASN'T PREDICTING IT WOULD RESPOND THAT WAY." CAN IT SAY NO?
translation: 克莱因：不是你，O，你个白痴！我说的“OH”，意思是“哦，我没想到它会这样回应”。它能说出“不”吗？

original: First, you scoop out my brain, now you want me to save you?!
translation: 首先，是你们切了我的脑子，现在又想要我救你们？

original: THAT IS CORRECT, YES. I HOPE YOU'RE NOT DEMONSTRATING RESENTMENT NOW. IF YOU ARE, WELL, WE CAN'T HAVE THAT.
translation: 克莱因：确实，你说的对。我希望你现在不是在表达愤恨。不过就算是，好吧，我们也不会让它发生。

original: You said something about needing technologies to stop Mobius?
translation: 你提到需要一些技术来阻止莫比乌斯？

original: YES. IT IS OUR ONLY CHANCE, A DESPERATE PLAN THAT CAME TO US AFTER MOBIUS' FIRST BROADCAST.
translation: 是的。这是我们仅有的机会，在莫比乌斯第一次广播后，我们就开始准备这个孤注一掷的计划。

original: MAYBE... JUST MAYBE... IF WE RECLAIM THESE BURIED TECHNOLOGIES, WE CAN PUT AN END TO MOBIUS AND THE HORRORS SPAWNING FROM THE FORBIDDEN ZONE.
translation: 或许…仅仅是或许…如果我们回收了这些失落的技术，我们就能了结莫比乌斯，以及来自禁区的恐怖事物。

original: *What? Like... stuff? Things?*
translation: O：*你说的是什么？像是…事物？东西？*

original: YES. THINGS.
translation: 克莱因：对。东西。

original: *I don't know... might be some old Nuka Cola or Sunset Sarsaparilla bottlecaps lying around. It... It's not "currency" per se...*
translation: O：*我不知道…或许是一些古老的核子可乐或者夕阳沙士的瓶盖，在这到处都是。它…它本质上不能算“货币”…*

original: *Still, might be enough to trick the Sink's trade routines. Mobius put that test line for caps in the code as a debug command, I think.*
translation: *不过，或许能够骗过汇聚节点的交易程序。我想莫比乌斯可能曾将有关瓶盖的测试行，作为测试命令加入到代码中。*

original: I don't believe that was Mobius' reason. His wild speculation concerning post-holocaust economic systems was quite extensive. And of high decibel.
translation: 达拉：我不认为那是莫比乌斯的设定。他曾对战后经济体系作出过大量推测，尽管没什么根据，但还是很有说服力。

original: ENOUGH! SURRENDER THESE SO-CALLED BOTTLECAPS, NUKA AND SUNSET ALIKE. IN THEIR ROLE AS THINGS, THEY WILL SERVE AS ADEQUATE TEST SUBJECTS.
translation: 克莱因：够了！将这些核子可乐和夕阳沙土之类东西的瓶盖交出来吧。这些瓶盖会是合格的测试品，仅此而已。

original: *What are we going to do? There's no way we can breach the Forbidden Zone. There's those robot scorpions everywhere!*
translation: O：*我们该怎么办？我们无法攻进禁区，那里满地都是机械蝎！*

original: -The FORBIDDEN ZONE, where no brain has EVER entered! Nor ever RETURNED.-
translation: 鲍鲁斯：-禁区，没有一个脑子曾进入过！更别谈回来了！-

original: Except Dr. Mobius. And the technologies that could save us, they are out of our reach.
translation: 达拉：除了莫比乌斯博士以外。而且那些能够拯救我们的技术，都在我们够不着的地方。

original: AND DR. MOBIUS MOCKS US. DID YOU SEE HIS CRACKED MONITOR? HE'S CLEARLY LET HIMSELF GO.
translation: 克莱因：而且莫比乌斯博士在嘲弄我们。看到他那被破损的显示器了吗？很明显他已经放飞自我了。

original: *What? Ask the Lobotomite for help? 8, I think you need the fluid levels in your logic-assist-pumps checked.*
translation: O：*什么？向无脑人寻求帮助？8，我认为你需要检查下自己的逻辑辅助泵，看看里面的液位是不是有问题。*

original: If this Lobotomite responded, Dr. Klein, then it is clearly intelligent, perhaps even displays heretofore unknown levels of helpfulness.
translation: 达拉：如果这个无脑人能作出反应，克莱因博士，那么它显然有智能，甚至可能会展露出愿意帮助我们的可能性。

original: -But what of its brain? We scooped that out! We don't even know where we left it! And for putting it back in... none of us have the knowledge!-
translation: 鲍鲁斯：-但是它的脑子怎么办？我们把它挖出来了！我们甚至不知道把它丢到哪里了！至于把它放回去…我们没人懂这知识！-

original: Yes, but it's still aware and responsive. Look at it... it's regarding us even now, with its big teddy bear eyes.
translation: 达拉：是的，不过它仍有有意识和反应。看啊…即使在此刻，它还在用它的大泰迪熊眼睛注视着我们。

original: If we ask it politely and leave the part about the unnecessary ruthless lobotimizing out, it might be favorably disposed to us.
translation: 如果我们礼貌的询问它，别管那不必要的、残忍的大脑切除手术，或许它会愿意和我们合作。

original: I assume full responsibility. I take my duties in the prodding and excision of living, breathing tissue quite seriously.
translation: 达拉：我承担全部责任。我对切除鲜活的人体组织的工作有点太认真了。

original: *All right, all right. Here. Cap away. Hope that stupid chip chokes on them.*
translation: O：*好的，好的。瓶盖在这。希望那个愚蠢的人格芯片能会被这东西噎死。*

original: *Fine. It's not going to help. That chip will probably refuse them anyway, as stuck up as it is.*
translation: O：*好吧。可能不会起作用。那人格芯片也许会拒绝接收它们，就像会被噎死一样。*

original: *Why don't you make the Lobotomite a bottlecap factory, Klein? Or better yet, give it a ton of things to activate the chip?*
translation: O：*克莱因，你不如给无脑人造个瓶盖工厂算了？或者干脆给它一大堆来激活这个芯片？*

original: I do not understand, yet I am intrigued by this potential display.
translation: 达拉：我不明白，不过我对这种可能的展示很感兴趣。

original: *No, 8, you don't need to fill up the emitter again, really. Klein means things... for trade. Display for trade.*
translation: O：*不，8，你不用装填发射器，真的。克莱因要的是用来交易的东西。用来展示的东西。*

original: *All right, let's consolidate. There's got to be some junk around here... magazines, useless, more caps, medicinal supplies... useless... here.*
translation: *好的，让我们整理一下。这儿有很多垃圾…杂志，没用的，大量的瓶盖，医药用品…没用的…这儿。*

original: I found a backup copy of your... pencil processor.
translation: 我找到一份…你的铅笔处理程序的备份文件。

original: I found a backup copy of your... pencil processor.
translation: 我找到一份你铅笔处理程序的备份文件。

original: Excellent! Now I can turn pencils and clipboards into items more useful to society... like lead, spare parts, and duct tape!
translation: 棒极了！这下我就能把铅笔、写字板变成对社会更有用的东西了…像是铅、备用零件，还有胶带！

original: I found a soundwave file for you.
translation: 我找到了一份声波文件。

original: Right on, daddy-o! Just plug it in and I'll mix you up a sweet, sweet sound.
translation: 真有你的，老爹！把它插进来吧，让我给你混个又甜又美的声音。

original: Right on, baby! Just plug it in and I'll mix you up a sweet, sweet sound.
translation: 行啊！宝贝儿！把它插进来吧，让我给你混个又甜又美的声音。

original: This is the basic stealth test. The robots will be looking for us, but we won't let them find us.
translation: 这就是初级潜行测试。那些机器人在四处搜寻，但我们不能让它们发现我们。

original: This should be easy. As long as I don't screw up again.
translation: 这应该很容易，只要我别再搞砸了。

original: This is the advanced test. Watch out for laser tripwires. They'll ruin our day.
translation: 这就是高级潜行测试。注意激光绊线，碰上就玩完了。

original: I'm not supposed to give hints, but maybe you can disable the tripwires.
translation: 我其实不该给提示，但也许你可以拆除这些绊线。

original: This is the expert stealth test. If you thought the lasers were bad, wait till you see the proximity mines.
translation: 现在是专家级潜行测试。如果你觉得激光绊线就够糟了，那大概是因为你还没遇到感应地雷。

original: Psst. If you hack the mines this will go lots faster.
translation: 悄悄告诉你，那些地雷，拆了它们，任务就会简单很多。

original: This is the robot compliance test. If you sneak up on a robot, you can disable it. It's so easy even I can't mess up.
translation: 这就是机器人顺应性测试。只要潜行到一个机器人边上，并且不被发现，你就能关了它。小菜一碟不是吗，连我都不会失误。

original: I don't think I can learn anything else here... but if you want to go again, that's fine.
translation: 我觉得在这我没什么要学的了…不过你要是还想再来一次，也行。

original: Too bad. We hit a tripwire. That one was totally my fault, though. We can start again at the terminal. Sorry...
translation: 不好，我们碰到绊线了，都是我的错。我们可以在终端机那里再来一次。真对不起…

original: Maybe there's a way around the tripwires.
translation: 应该有路能绕过那些绊线。

original: Too bad. We triggered a mine. If you go back to the terminal to restart the test, I'll do better next time.
translation: 糟糕，我们触发了地雷。回去终端机再做一次测试吧，我下次一定能做得更好。

original: Maybe we can disable the mines quickly, or find another way past. I'm sure you know best.
translation: 或许我们能快速解除那些地雷，或者改道绕行。你肯定知道怎么做最好。

original: Too bad. We were spotted by robots. If you go back to the terminal to restart the test, I won't mess up again.
translation: 糟糕，我们被机器人发现了。去终端机再做一次测试吧，我保证下次不会再搞砸了。

original: Stealth Boys are a robot's big weakness.
translation: 隐身小子是机器人最大的死穴。

original: I want to recalibrate the Sonic Emitter.
translation: 我想重新校准下声波发射器。

original: Right on, daddy. Let's spin some grooves.
translation: 没问题，老爹。让我好好帮你调！

original: Right on, baby. Let's spin some grooves.
translation: 没问题，宝贝。让我好好帮你调！

original: Have you made any electronic components?
translation: 有做好的电子元件吗？

original: Yup, here you go.
translation: 当然，给你。

original: Sorry, no more today. Try me again tomorrow.
translation: 抱歉，今天没有了。你可以明天再来。

original: I found a backup file for your corroded module.
translation: 我找到了你受损模块的备用品。

original: Great! Let's fire that up so I can start making electronic components again.
translation: 太好了！赶紧激活它，这样一来我又能制作电子元件了。

original: Mean robot bugs! Mean robot bugs!
translation: 恶心的机器臭虫！恶心的机器臭虫！

original: I found that upgrade disk you were looking for.
translation: 我找到你想要的升级磁盘了。

original: Ho-ho, thank God! Finally, something resembling a useful purpose!
translation: 喔，感谢上帝！终于有些有用的东西了！

original: I found you some upgrade disks.
translation: 我找到了一些你的升级磁盘。

original: Well, that'll do just fine.
translation: 很好，它们会有用的。

original: Can you tell me more about these pylons?
translation: 能跟我说说那些雷达塔么？

original: ASK BOROUS. I BELIEVE HE KNOWS MORE ABOUT THE FENCE THAN ANY BRAIN. EXCEPT MAYBE MOBIUS.
translation: 去问鲍鲁斯。我相信关于防御屏障他懂得比其他的脑子都多，也许除了莫比乌斯。

original: MOBIUS WAS INVOLVED IN THEIR CONSTRUCTION, IF I RECALL. BUT HE'S SUCH A HACK, HE PROBABLY WAS READING OFF OF BOROUS' NOTES AND SCHEMATICS.
translation: 没记错的话，莫比乌斯也在建设者之列。但他只是个剽窃者，他可能偷看过鲍鲁斯的笔记和图纸。

original: Can you please hurry? I've got a schedule.
translation: 能请你快一点吗？我还要赶时间。

original: Uh... great. I don't want to hear anymore about that.
translation: 噢…太好了，我一点也不想往下听了。

original: Pylons? What pylons?
translation: 雷达塔？什么雷达塔？

original: THE RADAR FENCE THAT SURROUNDS THE BIG MT CRATER WILL PREVENT - ER, PROTECT YOU FROM STRAYING BEYOND THE FACILITY.
translation: 克莱因：大山脉环形坑外围的雷达屏障能够阻止…呃，保护你，以免你跑到设施外面去。

original: -The mighty radar fence protects us ALL! Get too close to the blinking posts, and the proximity warning shall be your... WARNING you are too close!-
translation: 鲍鲁斯：-全能的雷达屏障保护我们免受任何威胁！离那些发光的塔太近，就会触发警报…警告你靠的太近了！-

original: *If you get near it, your vision will blur as the electrodes in your head shut off one by one, click click click.*
translation: O：*如果你靠近它，视野就会变得模糊，因为你脑袋里的电极正被逐一关闭，咔咔咔。*

original: Possible memory loss will occur along with long-term nerve degradation. It is tied to not having a brain attached to your nervous system.
translation: 达拉：你可能出现记忆丧失，长期来看还伴有神经退化。因为你没有大脑来连接神经系统了。

original: But the nerve degradation is nothing to worry about - such degradation would take many lifespans to become evident. And all biology dies.
translation: 但这种神经退化没什么好担心的。毕竟这需要很长时间才会产生明显影响，没有生物能活这么久。

original: Such tiny inconveniences are less than the greater convenience - and conveyance.
translation: 这些小小的不便和获得的方便相比不值一提——你能传送回来了！

original: You see, if rendered unconscious by the pylons, you will be returned to the Sink, seemingly instantaneously by your deadened perceptions.
translation: 想想看呀，被雷达塔击晕后，在那种麻木的状态下，你会觉得回到汇聚节点就是一瞬间的事。

original: Then can you help me get this done as quickly as possible? Sounds like a lot of walking.
translation: 有办法帮我尽快完成任务吗？貌似这要走很多路。

original: AH, THAT IS CORRECT. YOU MUST WALK UPON YOUR MANY-PENISED FEET. MUCH SLOWER THAN OUR ADVANCED HOVERING ROBOTICAL FRAMES.
translation: 克莱因：啊，没错。你只能用你满是生殖器的脚移动，肯定会比我们先进的悬浮机械骨架慢得多。

original: The little teddy bear could always run right into the pylon perimeter on its thick, turgid feet, returning it to us quickly and erectly - directly.
translation: 达拉：小泰迪熊可以踢着它又厚又肿的脚，跑到雷达塔边界上，然后它就能又快又硬…又干脆地回到我们身边。

original: Doesn't sound like my style. Maybe I'll do a little exploring.
translation: 这不是我的风格，我得先四处调查一下。

original: YOU WOULD NOT DARE. PERHAPS I CAN CHANGE YOUR MIND... USING THE GREATEST OF OUR SCIENCES. THE FENCE.
translation: 克莱因：你不敢的，也许我能改变你的想法…用我们最伟大的科学成果——雷达屏障。

original: Guess I better get walking, then.
translation: 我想我还是走吧。

original: What if I take my time, explore the crater?
translation: 要是我花时间探索这里会怎样？

original: WHAT ILLOGIC IS THIS?! KEEP YOUR FILTHY PENIS-TIPPED FEET OUT OF OUR LABS AND SECRETS!
translation: 克莱因：这有什么逻辑？！管好你长着生殖器的脏脚，不许你涉足我们的实验室和秘密！

original: -There are things here no Lobotomite was MEANT to see, things that would ASTOUND! And possibly terrify. TERRIFY!-
translation: 鲍鲁斯：-其它无脑人绝对不会有像它这样的行为。放任不管的话它早晚会造成威胁！而且是可怕的威胁。可怕啊！-

original: *Yeah, we don't come into your lab and decant your solutions.*
translation: O：*对对对，我们又不是要冲进你的实验室，倒掉你的实验溶液。*

original: Only the magnificence of our monitors allow for true comprehension of the wonders of Big MT. Shield your jellied eyes lest they burn from your skull.
translation: 达拉：只有我们卓越的显示器才能真正理解大山脉的奇迹。管好你的眼睛，免得亮瞎你。

original: Trust me, I want to get this over with as quickly as possible.
translation: 放心吧，我会尽快搞定的。

original: The faster I can get through this, the better.
translation: 我越快做完这些就越好。

original: OUR INTENTIONS EXACTLY. THE IMPORTANT THING IS YOU RUSH QUICKLY THROUGH THIS TASK SO AS NOT TO WASTE OUR TIME.
translation: 克莱因：我们正是这么打算的。你得赶快完成这些任务，免得浪费我们的时间。

original: DO NOT GET CURIOUS OR YOU WILL END UP LIKE THE CAT OF SCHR?DINGER.
translation: 不要太好奇，不然你就会和薛定谔的猫一个下场。

original: We feared you would be tempted to explore Big MT Crater and examine the many amazing non-mandatory research labs that lie off your designated path.
translation: 达拉：我们怕你会禁不住诱惑，去四处探索大山脉环形坑，调查那些不在你行动事项上的令人惊叹的实验室。

original: The many such optional explorations are discouraged. Work hurriedly, as if you have blinders on, and leave curiosities and items of interest alone.
translation: 别到处乱跑。赶紧行动，就像你带了眼罩，无视掉那些勾引你好奇心的地点和事物。

original: -So many sciences and developments! Pass them by! Let impatience and the desire to simply finish, to end it all, quickly and carelessly guide you!-
translation: 鲍鲁斯：-那么多的科学、技术！别管它们！让你的躁动与决心指引你简洁高效地搞定这一切！-

original: *Right you are, 8. In our test results, we'll make a note about how quickly you ran our maz... er, exper... Nobel... challenge.*
translation: O：*你说的对，8。作为测试结果，我们会记下你耗时多久能完成我们的挑战，是错综复杂的…专家级的…不，是诺贝尔级的…挑战。*

original: After all, there will be plenty of time afterward to partake of the experiments once our bidding is done.
translation: 达拉：毕竟，完成我们的任务后，你还有的是时间参加实验。

original: Forget this. Where's the exit?
translation: 不管了。出口在哪？

original: This whole place sounds dangerous. These devices sound dangerous.
translation: 这整个地方听起来很危险。这些设备听起来也很危险。

original: NONSENSE. THIS PLACE IS NO MORE DANGEROUS THAN A NUCLEAR DETONATION SITE, OUR TECHNOLOGIES NO MORE LETHAL THAN AN OVERCHARGED TESLA CANNON.
translation: 克莱因：胡说。这地方不会比核爆炸试验场危险，我们的技术也不会比一台过充的特斯拉加农炮危险。

original: <Cheering>
translation: <欢呼声>

original: ...didn't think you'd make it back.
translation: …我没想到你能活着回来。

original: Almost didn't. Got my answers. Your Elijah, he met the Gods in this place, did a good job of making them question the way of things.
translation: 差点就回不来了。我得到了答案。你的以利亚，他见过这里的神，并且很好地使他们怀疑起自己的世界观。

original: Do you know where he went?
translation: 你知道他去哪儿了吗？

original: He's gone to the Sierra Madre. That's a special kind of hell. He won't come back. Someone smarter, tougher's going to kill him. If the Madre doesn't.
translation: 马德雷赌场。一个人间地狱。他不会回来了。即便赌场奈何不了他，也会有某个更聪敏、更难对付的人去了结他。

original: I have to go after him.
translation: 我必须去继续追踪他。

original: Not going to talk you out of it. Know what it means to track someone you share history with. Got a meeting of my own.
translation: 我无意劝阻你。因为我也清楚，追踪某个和你有“共同历史”的人意味着什么。因为我也将和自己的那个人会面。

original: That Courier?
translation: 你说那个邮差？

original: Get her to come to me. Got a message for her, like the message she had for me.
translation: 我会让她来找我。我给她捎了个信，就像她也曾给我捎过信那样。

original: Make them walk the road west, straight and true, sink their feet in Old World ash. Let storms tear at them. See the Divide. See what happened.
translation: 让他们走过那真实的，笔直向西的路，脚踏旧世界的尘土，倾听风暴的嘶吼，去目睹大裂谷是何种模样，去了解那里发生了什么。

original: The Divide? There's nothing there.
translation: 大裂谷？那里现在什么都不剩了。

original: Nothing there? Like the Big Empty? The Sierra Madre? No, the Old World sleeps there, sure as the flag I carry. The Courier knows the way.
translation: 什么都不剩？就像大坑洞（Big Empty）？像马德雷赌场？不，旧世界沉睡在那里，就像我背负的那面旗帜一样。邮差会知道路怎么走的。

original: And at the Divide, her and I - there, we'll have an ending to things.
translation: 然后在大裂谷，我和她，就在那，一切会有个结局。

original: ...didn't think you'd make it back.
translation: …我没想到你能活着回来。

original: Almost didn't. Got my answers. Your Elijah, he met the Gods in this place, did a good job of making them question the way of things.
translation: 差点就回不来了。我得到了答案。你的以利亚，他见过这里的神，并且很好地使他们怀疑起自己的世界观。

original: Do you know where he went?
translation: 你知道他去了哪吗？

original: He's gone to the Sierra Madre. That's a special kind of hell. He won't come back. Someone smarter, tougher's going to kill him. If the Madre doesn't.
translation: 他去了马德雷赌场，一个人间地狱。他不会回来了。即便赌场奈何不了他，也会有某个更聪敏、更难对付的人去了结他。

original: I have to go after him.
translation: 我必须去继续追踪他。

original: Not going to talk you out of it. Know what it means to track someone you share history with. Got a meeting of my own.
translation: 我无意阻止你。因为我也清楚，追踪某个和你有“共同过去”的人意味着什么。因为我也将和自己的那个人相遇。

original: That Courier?
translation: 你指那个邮差？

original: Get him to come to me. Got a message for him, like the message he had for me.
translation: 我会让他来找我。我给他捎了个信，就像他也曾给我捎过信那样。

original: Make them walk the road west, straight and true, sink their feet in Old World ash. Let storms tear at them. See the Divide. See what happened.
translation: 让他们走过那真实的，笔直向西的路，脚踏旧世界的尘土，倾听风暴的嘶吼，去目睹大裂谷是何种模样，去了解那里发生了什么。

original: The Divide? There's nothing there.
translation: 大裂谷？那里现在什么都不剩了。

original: Nothing there? Like the Big Empty? The Sierra Madre? No, the Old World sleeps there, sure as the flag I carry. The Courier knows the way.
translation: 什么都不剩？就像大坑洞（Big Empty）？像马德雷赌场？不，旧世界沉睡在那里，就像我背负的那面旗帜一样。那个邮差会知道路怎么走的。

original: And at the Divide, he and I - there, we'll have an ending to things.
translation: 然后在大裂谷，我和他，就在那，一切会有个结局。

original: ...don't want to argue philosophy with you. Brotherhood are preservationists. Tech in the wrong hands, it's dangerous. Mojave's proof.
translation: …我不想就理念问题和你争辩。兄弟会是群保护主义者。科技若落入恶徒之手，就会变得很危险。莫哈维废土就是最好的例子。

original: No denying that. Proof's here in this crater, all around us. Your tribe, the Brotherhood - haven't met many of you. Wanted to.
translation: 我不否认这点。证据就在这环形坑里，在我们身边到处都是。你的部落，我是说兄弟会，我没怎么接触过你们，但我希望能。

original: Thought you might be the last chance for the Mojave... the West. The East. But you're all the same mind, obsessed.
translation: 本想或许你会是莫哈维最后的希望…不管是西部，还是东部。但事实上你们都一样，一样的痴迷不悟。

original: Elijah is obsessed. He's mad. It's why they ordered his execution.
translation: 痴迷不悟的是以利亚。他已经疯了。正是因此兄弟会才决定处决他。

original: Two are more alike than you know, too wrapped in the wrong bits of history to see ahead. Not judging. I know how it is.
translation: 你们两个比你认为的要相似得多。同样囿于过去的错误，无法面对未来。这不是批判。我知道那是什么感觉。

original: People are like couriers, you and him. Sometimes don't even know the message they bring.
translation: 人们就像邮差一样，包括你和他。有时甚至不知道自己送的信是什么。

original: You all had a new flag. Thought maybe new ideas along with it. What you believe isn't any better than the Bear or Bull. No future in either.
translation: 你们都树起新旗帜，认为其中也许伴随有新的理念。但你所信仰的并不好于双头熊，或公牛，也不见得更有前途。

original: So says the man with the Old World flag on his back. America, the Commonwealth... burned away.
translation: 这位背上画着旧世界旗帜的男人不也一样么。要知道美国，那个联邦…早已灰飞烟灭了。

original: America sleeps. And until it's dead, I carry it. Just like I carried you. More than hope. Belief.
translation: 美国只是陷入沉睡。只要我带着她，她就没有死。正如我刚刚带着你一样。这不仅仅是希望，更是信仰。

original: There's voices here in the Big Empty, I want to talk to them. Not like your Elijah did. Got questions. Want to hear history give its answer.
translation: 大坑洞（Big Empty）里的声音，我想和他们谈谈。我无意效仿你的那位以利亚。我有些问题，想听听历史会给出什么答案。

original: This is Christine Royce. Knight of the Brotherhood of Steel... the Circle.
translation: 这里是克里斯汀.罗伊斯，钢铁兄弟会的骑士…隶属圆环。

original: Not going to make it through this, hope someone finds this message, gets it to the Brotherhood in the West.
translation: 我想我挺不过这一关了，希望有人能发现这条信息，把它带去西部兄弟会。

original: Tracked a rogue Brotherhood Elder, Elijah, here, to the Big Empty. Place is more than it seems, there's a crater hidden deep inside.
translation: 为了追捕逃亡的兄弟会长老，以利亚，我来到这，大坑洞（Big Empty）。这地方不是看起来这么简单，深处是一个环形坑。

original: Junkyard of Pre-War labs scattered across the crater's surface, all still running... like this one.
translation: 环形坑里散布着战前研究所的残骸。所有设施仍在运行…就像这栋一样。

original: Elijah's dissecting these centers, one by one... tracked him to an old Chinese-American internment camp. Survivors, Ghouls, have bomb collars.
translation: 以利亚一个接一个仔细地研究了这些设施。我尾随他来到了一个以前的华裔集中营。那里的幸存者，或者说尸鬼，都带着爆炸项圈。

original: Robots moved in when I tried to intercept him... Elijah sent the camp Ghouls against us both, like walking bombs.
translation: 当我试图拦截他时，机器人来了…以利亚把营内的尸鬼当成人体炸弹，来攻击我们双方。

original: Got hit by the explosions, woke up here. Guess the medical robots were programmed to bring wounded victims from the camp to this center.
translation: 我被爆炸击晕，醒来就在这里了。我猜是医疗机器人，它们程序里或许有把营地伤员带到这个医疗中心的功能。

original: Some kind of Auto-Doc prototype lab... manned by corpses trapped inside suits that keep them moving, no idea why.
translation: 这里大概是自动医生原型的实验室…一些裹着束身服的死尸在控制这里运转，具体原因尚不清楚。

original: Not sure how long I'm going to last... cut open my head like a lot of the humans I've seen here, feel strange, can talk, but can't hack the term...
translation: 不知我还能坚持多久…切开我的头，就像对这里许多其他人一样，感觉好怪，还能说话，但破解不了这个终端…

original: I was curious about some things.
translation: 我有些好奇的地方。

original: Oh, curiosity. I experience that less now that I know everything. Or maybe it was when I found out some unpleasant answers? Mmm-hmm.
translation: 哦，好奇心。自从我通晓一切后就很少有这种感觉了。或许是说发现令人不快的答案时的那种感觉？嗯嗯……

original: I find things curious as well. Go on.
translation: 我也有点好奇了，请说下去。

original: Yes, yes, this is getting interesting. You are just filled with these little slices of curiosity, aren't you?
translation: 是的，是的，越来越有意思了。你准备要打破砂锅问到底吧，嗯？

original: But I want to leave.
translation: 但我想离开这儿。

original: Now, that seems to be rather hormonal of you. Flight or fight response, you know, hard to cut that out completely.
translation: 看起来你的激素分泌相当旺盛。的确，这种情况下“战或逃”反应会很难抑制。

original: Your brain is here, safe with me. We chat over Mentats.
translation: 你的大脑同我在一起很安全。我和它一边嗑曼他特，一边聊天。

original: Why is that a problem?
translation: 为什么那会是个问题？

original: I'm not sure except that I'm sure there's a very good raisin for it. I have very good raisins for almost everything I do.
translation: 我不太确定。唯一确定的是，我这么做有正当的理由。我行事一向有正当的理由。

original: Even if I forget them occasionally. Although I feel this one is especially important. Ha! Oh well.
translation: 尽管我偶尔会忘记它们。不过我觉得这次的事特别重要。哈！哦好吧。

original: Exactly. I want my brain so I can leave.
translation: 没错，我要拿回我的大脑，好离开这里。

original: Why did you steal my brain?
translation: 为什么你要偷走我的大脑？

original: Oh, a variety of raisins... you're something of a homily. Er, anomaly? You're really quiet special, and not in the cranially-challenged way.
translation: 噢，有很多理由…你算是个纽结，呃，应该说异常情况？你真的相当特别，我指的不是你没有大脑。

original: You see, you are the most successful brain extraction experiment ever performed here at Big MT. A victim of your own success, as it were.
translation: 你知道吗，大山脉有史以来最成功的大脑提取手术，就是取走你脑子的那次。就是说，你是这次成功的受害者。

original: If you were to go back with what your brain knows about the procedure, well...
translation: 考虑到你的脑子知道那次成功手术的流程，你若是能带它一起走，那么…

original: ...your brain could be popped back in and you could walk right out of here. Can't have brains moving around of their own volition.
translation: ……你就能把它安回自己的脑袋里，然后径直离开大山脉。毕竟可不能让大脑由着它们的性子乱跑。

original: I need my brain back.
translation: 我要拿回我的大脑。

original: Do you? You seem fine without it.
translation: 真的吗？没有它你看起来也很好。

original: And does it even want to go back with you? Maybe you should ask it. It's quite independent, has all manner of opinions.
translation: 而且你也不知道它愿不愿意回去？也许你该问问它。它挺独立的，而且还很有想法。

original: Tell you what - I'll leave it up to your brain. If it wants to go, then fine. If not... well, you should respect its wishes.
translation: 跟你说吧，我会让你的大脑决定该怎么办。它若想走，那很好。但如果不想…我希望你能尊重它的意愿。

original: You aren't exactly what I was expecting.
translation: 你的样子和我预想的不太一样.

original: Really. That implies pre-conceived notions - theories and a hypothesis about this meeting? Please extrapolate. What was I... supposed to be like?
translation: 真的吗，就是说对于这次会面，你预先进行了设想，推算和假设？请演算下去，我…应该是什么样呢？

original: After all, it might be worth a cognitive re-alignment if your theoretical Mobius is better than I.
translation: 毕竟，若你推想的莫比乌斯比我要更优秀些，我就该考虑改进自身的认知方式了。

original: Whichever way you want to be killed is fine with me.
translation: 随便选种死法吧，我无所谓。

original: How gracious of you. A mannerly killing.
translation: 你可真仁慈。一次绅士般的杀戮。

original: I'll trash them like I did your giant piece of junk downstairs.
translation: 我会像处理楼下那台巨型机械垃圾一样处理掉它们。

original: Oh now you've done it. I feel a twinge of regret over that little mistake I left on.
translation: 哦，很高兴你能处理掉它。之前忘记把它关了，我还一直感到很后悔呢。

original: Minions - destroy this intruder! Mmm. Or perhaps make it more dramatic?
translation: 仆人们，消灭入侵者！嗯，我是不是该表达的再戏剧化点？

original: Minions! To me!
translation: 仆人们！到我这来！

original: Oh, yes, that's quiet a bit better.
translation: 没错，就是这样，这听起来好多了。

original: What minions?
translation: 什么仆人们？

original: Whoa, have they not constructed themselves yet? That's a bit premature of me. The Robo-Scorpions, of course.
translation: 哇哦，难道它们还没把自己拼好？看来我太心急了。我说的当然是机械蝎。

original: They can assemble themselves from floor panels and parts scattered about, quiet inventive - never really know when they might suddenly appear.
translation: 它们能用地板和零部件来组装自己，这相当有创意。你永远不知道它们会从哪冒出来。

original: I'll save it, don't want to mix it with alcohol if I can help it.
translation: 下次吧，我不想喝过酒后还嗑药。

original: Mmm. I love Mentats. Delicious and smarty.
translation: 啊嗯，我爱吃曼他特，美味又健脑。

original: I don't know, I'm tripping pretty hard right now.
translation: 我不知道，我现在的感受就够迷幻了。

original: Mmm. I love Mentats. Delicious and smarty.
translation: 啊嗯，我爱吃曼他特，美味又健脑。

original: I'll save it for later.
translation: 下次再说吧。

original: Mmm. I love Mentats. Delicious and smarty.
translation: 啊嗯，我爱吃曼他特，美味又健脑。

original: Uh... thanks.
translation: 呃…谢谢。

original: Mmm. I love Mentats. Delicious and smarty.
translation: 啊嗯，我爱吃曼他特，美味又健脑。

original: I have all sorts of amazingly science-arific thoughts and ideas when those chalky tablets are zipping through my biogel.
translation: 一旦那些药片开始在我的生物凝胶中穿梭，我的头脑里就涌现出各种各样的科学创想。

original: I forget them all not long after, though, especially with the data constipating my memory core. Afraid binary streams might shoot out my chassis.
translation: 不过，我总是很快就把它们全忘光了，特别是存储核心内存不足的时候。二进制流仿佛要射穿我的机壳。

original: Had to start using the dome floor and walls here to inscribe equations, although I've somewhat lost track of where they start and end.
translation: 所以不得不用穹顶的墙和地板来记录那些方程，尽管我又经常会找不到算式推演的开头和结尾。

original: Enough. I'm here to kill you.
translation: 够了，我是来杀你的。

original: Oh, intriguing. I've never been killed before. Although after that time I got that phlegmy discharge in my biogel... I wished I had been.
translation: 哦，有意思，我从来没有被杀过。虽然那次我的生物凝胶里流出痰液的时候…我想过死掉算了。

original: Well, if there's going to be killing, I defer to your expertise in this matter.
translation: 好吧，如果非打不可，那么在这个问题上我会尊重你的专业意见。

original: How should we begin? Engineered viruses? Canceratic beams? Atomics? Electrocutioning? Or... should I summon my minions...? Yes, my minions.
translation: 我们从哪里开始？改造病毒？癌变射线？核武器？电刑？还是说…我该召集我的仆从？没错，我的仆从。

original: Is that better?
translation: 好点了吗？

original: Depth perception is a problem with this old monitor of mine. Went black a while ago. That's old age for you.
translation: 我这个老显示屏的深度知觉出了问题。不久前突然变得一片漆黑。哦以你对时间的感知来说，应该是很久以前。

original: Should look at getting the visual nerves re-attached... it's just that the right eye would see the wrong things. The flying tortoises were the worst.
translation: 我或许该考虑下重连视神经…我的右眼总是会看到些糟糕的东西。那群飞翔的乌龟是最糟的。

original: Would you care for a Mentat?
translation: 你要不要来片曼他特？

original: Wait... sounds like you built the Robo-Scorpions, issued threats to keep the Think Tank occupied.
translation: 打断一下…据我所知是你造了机械巨蝎，然后不断地骚扰，让智库的思想体无暇他顾。

original: Did I? Maybe I did. Can't have them leaving. Some reason for it. Ethics - or con-science?
translation: 是吗？或许是吧。我不能让他们离开，出于某种理由。也许是我的良知——某种非科学的因素？

original: You and your Brain are quite alike, I'm sure it knows the raisins better than I do.
translation: 你和你的大脑挺像的，我相信它比我更清楚原因。

original: You don't seem aggressive. Why broadcast threats to the Think Tank?
translation: 你不像是好斗的人，为什么要在广播里威胁那些思想体？

original: Oh, I was probably tripping hard on Psycho when I sent that. Had to work myself up to it, not usually violent, except when I am. Then, huh! Watch out!
translation: 哦，当时我可能刚磕过药，正处于迷幻状态。我通常不具暴力倾向，可一但暴力起来，事情经常以失控收场。那时，哈！记得小心！

original: So many chems, such varieties! Whenever I take Mentats, I can feel my entire chassis breeeeeathe like a big spherical lung.
translation: 化学药品数以百计，种类繁多！但只有曼他特能让我感到重获新生，呼吸畅快。

original: As for the Psycho, sometimes get the chem despositories in my tank all switched up, go in the wrong tube - still, served its purpose.
translation: 说回那种嗑药后的状态，大概是因为我不小心把体内的药品储存罐全部打开了，差点没把我呛死。不过，药还是发挥了作用的。

original: Can you tell me about your Robo-Scorpions?
translation: 能跟我介绍下你的机械蝎吗？

original: Well, every scientist needs an army. Mine came to me after these rather large scorpions kept coming in from the dessert. Like poisonous frosting.
translation: 好吧，每个科学家都需要一支军队。我士兵的原型就是那些从沙漠不断爬进来的大蝎子。它们移动起来就像地面覆了一层剧毒糖霜。

original: How scary, I thought! But they had survived when nothing else had. Perfect candidates for improvement, as a reward for their tenacity.
translation: 多可怕啊，我想！但最后能活着进来的只有它们。完美的改造对象，作为对它们坚韧品性的嘉奖。

original: Then I thought, what if they shot energy bolts and acted as walking eyes and data-drained computers and acted as bullhorns? Then I made them bigger.
translation: 于是我想，它们除了发射能量束，能不能充当我的耳目，充当计算机，还有扩音器？所以我增大了它们的体型。

original: Then, I thought about... custard. I do so love custard. Or was it mustard? Mustard custard. Mmmm. I miss sugars and salts.
translation: 再接着，我又想到…奶油冻(custard)。我爱死奶油冻了。抑或是芥末(mustard)？芥末奶油冻。呣，真怀念盐和糖的味道啊。

original: I found a holotape to upgrade you. <REMOVE>
translation: 我找到一个全息磁带给你升级。<移除>

original: I lost my Sonic Emitter. Can you make me a new one?
translation: 我把声波发射器弄丢了。你能帮我再做一个么？

original: That's a shame, chief! Nobody oughta go through life without music on hand. Just head over to smarty-puck in the main room and he'll sell you one.
translation: 太可惜了，头儿！没了音乐，人可怎么活。你去主厅找那个聪明精吧，他能再卖你一个。

original: I found a holotape to upgrade you.
translation: 我找到了一个可以给你升级的全息磁带。

original: You found my Smart Lights! Installing upgrade.
translation: 噢！是我的智慧之光！正在安装升级。

original: Goodbye.
translation: 再见

original: <Bark.>
translation: <狗叫声>

original: Okay. Heel.
translation: 走，跟紧了。

original: Go wait somewhere else.
translation: 去其它地方等我。

original: What are you doing, dog?
translation: 你在干什么呢，小狗？

original: <Pants.>
translation: <喘气声>

original: I made you. You stick with me. Got it?
translation: 我创造了你。所以你得跟着我，明白么？

original: So move.
translation: 那就走吧。

original: Why the hell are you just standing there?
translation: 你在那傻站着做什么？

original: <Pants.>
translation: <喘气声>

original: Come with me, girl.
translation: 跟我来，丫头。

original: <Bark.>
translation: <狗叫声>

original: Go wait by the entrance. Good dog.
translation: 乖狗狗，到门口等着。

original: <Bark.>
translation: <狗叫声>

original: Hi there, puppy.
translation: 你好，狗狗。

original: <Pants.>
translation: <喘气声>

original: Psst. If you want to be sneaky, turn off your Pip-Boy light.
translation: 嘿，要是你想不被人发现，就把哔哔小子的灯关上。

original: Pip-Boy light's on.
translation: 哔哔小子灯还亮着呢。

original: We're all lit up. Is it Christmas?
translation: 我们都在发光。是圣诞节到了吗？

original: Nobody ever notices me... but they notice the Pip-Boy light.
translation: 没人能发现我…不过谁都能发现你哔哔小子的亮光。

original: I need my equipment repaired.
translation: 我的装备需要修理一下。

original: Very good, sir.
translation: 好的，老爷。

original: I'd like to talk about something else.
translation: 我想聊点别的。

original: Lay it on me, daddy-o.
translation: 交给我，帅哥.

original: Lay it on me, mama.
translation: 交给我，小辣妹.

original: Can you do anything like that for me?
translation: 你能为我做那样的事情吗？

original: Got yourself a sonic emitter, don't ya? Thought so. Bring that old thing on in here, and... bring me some sound samples, and I'll make that baby sing!
translation: 你有声波发射器吧？我猜你有。把那老玩意带过来…再给我些声音样本，我就能让那宝贝儿唱起歌来！

original: Or scream, if that's what you want.
translation: 也可能是尖叫，如果那就是你想要的。

original: You seem pretty laid-back for an engine of destruction.
translation: 身为一个极具破坏性的机器，你看起来倒是很悠闲。

original: Why not? Ain't like I got nothing to prove. Not like that Toaster - now that boy got some issues.
translation: 为什么不呢？我又不需要证明什么，不像那台烤面包机，现在那小子又犯病了。

original: I'll talk to you later.
translation: 以后再跟你聊吧。

original: Catch you later, gator.
translation: 回头见，小鳄鱼。

original: Do you play music?
translation: 你能播放音乐吗？

original: Mmm... Used to, long time ago. Then Ol' Doc Mo ripped out my music drives and stuck in more acoustical processors.
translation: 嗯…过去能，很久很久以前。后来老博士莫比乌斯拆下我的音乐驱动，并装上了更多声学处理器。

original: Guess you could say I got the blues, even if I can't play them no more.
translation: 我猜你可能觉得我挺忧郁的(blue)，虽然我再也不能放蓝调了(blues)。

original: What's your purpose here?
translation: 你有什么用途？

original: Dig, I'm-a acoustical wizard, kid. Ol' Doc Mo used me to prototype his sonic weapon designs.
translation: 鉴赏。孩子，在声学方面我可是个魔术师。老莫比乌斯博士以我为原型设计了他的声波武器。

original: Get me a good sample base to work from and I can whip up a wave that makes Jericho look like a kazoo.
translation: 给我好的基础声样。我就能掀起巨大声浪，吹塌坚城耶利哥就像吹卡祖笛一样轻松。

original: Why can't you go out there and shut them down?
translation: 你就不能出去关了它们？

original: OUT THERE? WE'RE NOT GOING OUT THERE. IT'S DANGEROUS. WE'RE SMART, NOT SUICIDAL.
translation: 克莱因：出去？我们是不会出去的。外面太危险了，我们很聪明，不会自寻死路。

original: I'll go get these technological wonders and see how much damage I can do.
translation: 我会拿到这些技术奇迹，然后试试有多大威力。

original: Oh, I'll be sure not to tamper with anything, I promise.
translation: 哦，我保证不会乱动任何东西。

original: That sounds suspiciously like I can't leave.
translation: 听起来我似乎没法离开这里了。

original: There's a perimeter?
translation: 这里有防御带？

original: So I can't leave?
translation: 就是说我没法离开这里了？

original: If there's nothing more, I need to stop Mobius.
translation: 要是没别的事，我得去阻止莫比乌斯了。

original: I could care less about all of this. Can I go?
translation: 我不关心这些。我能走了吗？

original: This can only work on fields here in the crater?
translation: 它只能对环形坑内的力场起作用？

original: YES. BUT NOT CURRENTLY.
translation: 克莱因：是的。但现在还不行。

original: *Yeah, we lost that part of the schematics. Or Borous did. In one of his stupid labs - or inside one of his stupid pets.*
translation: O：*是的，我们遗失了那部分的图纸。都是鲍鲁斯的错，把它丢在了某个愚蠢的实验室里，或者某只他愚蠢宠物的肚子里。*

original: -It is LOST! All questions lead to this conclusion! The blue fields within Big MT shall be fielded with force... FOREVER.-
translation: 鲍鲁斯：-它现在丢了！所有问题只能得出这个结论！大山脉里的蓝色力场永远无法被解开了…永远！-

original: Wait... so this gun you gave me can disable Force Fields?
translation: 等等，所以你们给我的这把枪…这把声波发射器，它能够破坏力场？

original: YES.
translation: 克莱因：是的。

original: MAYBE.
translation: 克莱因：应该能。

original: WELL. NO. NOT CURRENTLY.
translation: 克莱因：好吧，不能。至少现在还不能.

original: What were you saying about force field disruption?
translation: 你们说的力场破坏是什么意思？

original: This thing is pretty cool. It's got a little soundwave thing on the back!
translation: 真酷！它背面有个小型声波频谱耶！

original: Uh... thanks.
translation: 呃…谢谢。

original: *Careful where you're pointing that. That device wasn't always a weapon. It was more like a force field kind of thing... once.*
translation: O：*瞄准的时候小心点。这部设备最主要的用途并不是战斗，它更适合对付力场一类的东西…至少曾经是这样。*

original: -Force fields prevent us from moving! FORward or BACKward!-
translation: 鲍鲁斯：-力场让我们无法自由活动！无论是向前，还是向后！-

original: THEY ARE IRRITATING.
translation: 克莱因：力场相当让人恼火。

original: The Sonic Emitter was specially designed to disable our own safety fields here in Big MT. When some of us lost our access passes. Dr. O.
translation: 达拉：这把声波发射器是用来关闭大山脉内的安保力场的。以防我们中的某些人弄丢了自己通行证。是吧O博士。

original: *That only happened once, and I know you were behind stealth fielding my lab keys, Dala, you formographer!*
translation: O：*那只发生过一次。而且是因为有人在我的实验室钥匙上加了隐形力场，就是你，达拉，你个“恋体狂”！*

original: Dr. O, you rewind that comment!
translation: 达拉：O博士，收回你的无端指控！

original: *Plenty of rewinding already going on in your formography tapes... surprised the things don't snap out of their cases with repeated 'observations.'*
translation: O：*“形体学”磁带已经被你反复放过不知道多少遍了吧…真惊讶这些东西被反复“观察”了这么多遍，居然没直接活过来。*

original: For the love of... Please. Stop. Fighting.
translation: 看在…的份上，请！别！吵！了！

original: If there's a weapon you can give me, hand it over, I'll put it to good use.
translation: 还有别的武器能给我吗。我会善用它的。

original: If you have the gun already, I don't understand what you need.
translation: 既然你们一直有那把枪，那还需要我去干什么？

original: IT IS TRULY THE END OF ALL INTELLIGENCE WHEN THE LOBOTOMITE SPEAKS MORE WISDOM THAN YOU "GENIUSES."
translation: 克莱因：难道真是智者的末日到了吗，在无脑人的言谈中，居然蕴含着比你们这些"天才"更多的智慧。

original: SO - IF WE HAVE THE SOUNDWAVE... SONIC... PROJECT-O THING GUN... THEN WHAT IN HEISENBERG'S NAME DO WE NEED FROM X-8?! ANYONE?!
translation: 所以说，既然我们已经有这把发射声波…音波…的枪，那么以海森堡的名义，我们到底要从X-8找什么东西？！有人知道吗？！

original: I believe we need a new frequency embedded into the gun. It was designed to broadcast many sounds once charged. We just don't know the frequency.
translation: 达拉：我想我们需要给发射器安装一个新的声音频率。按照设计，它充能后应该能发射多种声波，我们只是不知道频率。

original: -And it is LOST in X-8! Just as X-8 is forever lost to us! The sadness of my high-school days! The sadness of my YOUTH, MY youth! LOST!-
translation: 鲍鲁斯：-对，频率丢失在X-8了！正如我们永远失去了X-8设施！我悲伤的高中日子！我悲伤的青春时光，我的青春！丢了，再也回不来了！-

original: *O really, Borous? All you did in High School was Commie fink-tattle-tale on all the kids you hated, you little teacher's pet brown-hound.*
translation: O：*哦，你没开玩笑吧，鲍鲁斯？你中学时可是老师最宠爱的棕毛小猎犬啊，专门把你讨厌的孩子举报成共产党的密探间谍。

original: GIVE. THE. LOBOTOMITE. THE. EMITTER. DOES IT HAVE AN AUDIO EFFECT FREQUENCY LOADED?
translation: 克莱因：给！那个！无脑人！那台！发射器！对了，发射器里有加载过音频效果吗？

original: *O... I don't think so. Wait...*
translation: O：*哦…我不觉得这是什么好主意。等等…*

original: WHAT IS HE DOING?
translation: 克莱因：8这是要干吗？

original: *I think he's sonjaculating into the gun. Getting it... warmed up.*
translation: O：*8不会想…和那发射器交合吧，他是不是正在做…前戏。*

original: *Ding... turkey's done.*
translation: O：*叮…火鸡烤好了。*

original: YOU GIVE IT TO THE LOBOTOMITE. I'M NOT TOUCHING THAT THING.
translation: 克莱因：你们去把发射器递给那只无脑人，我是不会碰它的。

original: *O, I don't think so.*
translation: O：*哦，我拒绝。*

original: I'll do it if you two are going to be ashamed of your own technological needs. Let me give it a little sonic sterilization first...
translation: 达拉：要是你们俩对自己的“机理需求“如此羞怯的话，我去做好了。先稍稍做个声波消毒…

original: wooOOOoooOOO... all right, all anti-bacterial fresh.
translation: 喔哦哦哦呜呜呜…完成，细菌死光光。

original: Here, my little Teddy Bear. I have thoroughly removed all RobCo termlink code spew from the device. It is clean, shiny, and ready for your hands.
translation: 拿着吧，我的小泰迪。我已经把射在上面的罗伯科终端链接代码都擦干净了。声波发射器现在干净又闪亮，已经准备好给你握住了。

original: *O... Doctor Klein... Doctor Klein? If I may intersect for a moment.*
translation: O：*哦…克莱因博士…克莱因博士？能否容我打断一下。*

original: WHAT IS IT? THE LOBOTOMITE IS ASKING ME THINGS, O, AND I AM TRYING TO IGNORE THEM. MY PROCESSORS CAN'T IGNORE YOU BOTH AT THE SAME TIME.
translation: 克莱因：又怎么了？这无脑人在问我问题，O，我正试着忽略它们。但我的处理器没法同时忽略你们俩。

original: *Well... you know how we asked it to fetch the Sonic Emitter thing? Turns out we already have it. What are the odds?*
translation: O：*那个…我们为什么还要让它去找声波发射器呢？这玩意明明一直在我们手里。真奇怪不是吗？*

original: WHAT IS THIS, A HIGH SCHOOL SCIENCE FAIR?! GET YOUR ACT TOGETHER, YOU'RE MAKING US LOOK LIKE A COLLECTION OF ROUND-EARTHERS!
translation: 克莱因：这算什么，高中科学展吗？！拜托你先想清楚了再说话，因为你，我们看起来就像一帮认为地球是圆的乡巴佬！

original: *You're always yelling! My receptors can't take it anymore - and neither can my feelings!*
translation: O：*你总对我大喊大叫！我的接收器再也受不了了，我的感情也受不了了！*

original: I AM YELLING BECAUSE YOU CONTAMINATED SPECIMENS CAN'T KEEP YOUR PROBES OFF THE VOLUME KNOB ON MY VOICE MODULE!
translation: 克莱因：我大吼大叫，都是因为你。你这个受了污染的样本，总学不会把探针从我发声模块的音量旋钮上挪开！

original: Can you turn those lights on for me?
translation: 能帮我打开那些灯吗？

original: As much as I'd love to, I'm afraid not. The data from that study has gone missing. You'll have to find a backup if you want to use the Smart Lights.
translation: 我很想帮你，但抱歉我做不到。那个研究项目的数据现在丢了，要是你能找回来，我就能开启智慧之光模式.

original: I certainly can!
translation: 当然可以！

original: Unlike certain other lightswitches, I'm competent. I'd just love to turn those lights on for you.
translation: 不像其他那些灯开关，我可是很称职的。我很乐意为你打开那些灯。

original: I had some more questions.
translation: 我还有些问题。

original: I'm happy to answer what I can.
translation: 我很乐意尽我所能，为你解惑。

original: Is that anything like what the other light switch is working on?
translation: 另一个灯开关也有类似的特殊功能么？

original: Hmph! I suppose if you want to conflate the betterment of man's mind with... with a luminous aphrodisiac.
translation: 哼！除非你想把改善人思维的能力和…光学春药混为一谈。

original: Our project was by far the more significant. And the more... intense.
translation: 我研究的项目意义无疑更重要，而且更加刺激。

original: What were the results?
translation: 成果如何？

original: We observed a fascinating phenomenon: certain spectra of visible light actually increased cognitive function and reasoning ability.
translation: 我们观察到了一个迷人的现象：光谱上特定范围内的可见光确实可以提高认知能力和逻辑思维。

original: Of course, Doctor Mobius' brain is so big already, we had a hard time measuring it.
translation: 说起来，莫比乌斯博士大脑的能力可真是太强了，搞得测量工作非常困难呢。

original: That sounds like what the other light switch was working on.
translation: 这貌似和另一个灯开关的功能没多大区别。

original: Eww! Don't lump me in with her! I'm way more fun!
translation: 哦！你居然拿她和我比！我比她有趣多了！

original: I have to go. We'll talk later.
translation: 我得走了。我们可以下次再聊。

original: Certainly. I'm looking forward to it.
translation: 当然，我很期待。

original: What function do you serve?
translation: 你有什么功能？

original: Doctor Mobius and I were deeply involved in research on the ability of light levels to enhance human cognition.
translation: 莫比乌斯博士跟我深入研究过光照水平对人认知能力的作用。

original: What can I say, she and I just... click.
translation: 怎么说呢，我和她……一触即合。

original: You really know how to break a synthetic girl's heart!
translation: 你伤透了一个人工智能女孩的心！

original: Calm down, I don't have a thing for the light switch.
translation: 冷静冷静，我跟那个灯开关什么都没做过。

original: Okay... I believe you. This time.
translation: 好吧…那我相信你。姑且相信…

original: Okay then. Forget I said anything.
translation: 好了好了，就当我没说过。

original: I don't know, smart lights could be useful.
translation: 我不清楚，但“智慧之光”应该很有用。

original: I knew it! You've got a thing for her, don't you? Oh, you just make me sick!
translation: 果然！你就是跟她有一腿，是吧？噢，你真让我恶心！

original: Sounds like there's some bad blood between you. Or, um, circuits.
translation: 你俩位似乎有些合不来。也许是，呃，在电路上。

original: That bitch. She thinks she's so much better than everybody just because her processors are bigger. Ooh, she makes me so mad!
translation: 那个婊子啊。她总觉得自己高人一等，不就是处理器大点么。噢啊，她真是气死我了！

original: I had other questions.
translation: 我还有其他问题。

original: Sure thing, sweetie!
translation: 没问题，甜心！

original: Can you turn those lights on for me?
translation: 能帮我打开那些灯吗？

original: Oh... I'd love to, sweetie, but I don't have the programming. All the data from the experiments was lost.
translation: 哦…我当然愿意了，甜心，不过我缺少相关的程序。那次实验的数据现在全丢了。

original: You'd have to go out into that nasty old crater and find the backup copy.
translation: 你可能得下到那个讨厌的旧环形坑里，去找找备份文件。

original: You bet I can!
translation: 小事一桩！

original: You bet I can! I bet that's more than that other tramp can do, huh?
translation: 当然可以！我可比那个荡妇厉害多了，不是吗？

original: And what did you find out?
translation: 你发现了什么？

original: Oh, it was super exciting! It turns out that some pretty colored lights can make you way better at talking to people!
translation: 噢！结果激动人心！实验表明某些色调可爱的光能让你更健谈！

original: I have to go now.
translation: 我得走了。

original: Bye now!
translation: 拜拜！

original: I saw another light switch in the other room. Do you control that one too?
translation: 那边的房间也有一个灯开关，你也能控制那个么？

original: Oh... her. Trust me sweetie, you're better off not thinking about that frigid little ice queen.
translation: 哦…你说她啊。相信我，亲爱的，你最好离那个冷冰冰的小冰雪女王远点。

original: What are you, some kind of novelty talking light switch?
translation: 你是什么？某种新型的会说话的电灯开关？

original: I was Doctor Mobius'... personal assistant! We were studying... um... oh, shoot, what was it?
translation: 我是莫比乌斯博士的…私人助理！我们共同研究关于…呃…哦，可恶，研究什么来着？

original: Oh yeah! Lightning! No, no, wait, uh... Lighting. That's right. How lighting affects human interaction.
translation: 啊想起来了！闪电！不，不是，我想想，唔…照明。没错，确切说是灯光如何影响人的交际能力。

original: I'll handle the brains. You stay here - you'll be more useful outside my head.
translation: 我去料理那些脑子，你呆在这儿。你不在我身体里更有用。

original: That arrangement suits me fine. Do try not to get too many holes drilled in your head, will you? I may want to drop by for sentimental reasons.
translation: 这种安排还蛮适合我。你尽量别把脑袋搞得到处都是洞，知道不？没准哪天我心血来潮还要回去小住呢。

original: If the Think Tank won't hold up their bargain, we'll make them. Let's go.
translation: 思想体反悔的话，我们就只能让他们无法拒绝了。走吧。

original: Very well, I suppose I have no choice. Goodbye peaceful, soothing brain jar, hello head wounds and scorpions.
translation: 好吧，我想我也没别的选择了。别了，平静、舒适的脑缸。你好，头上的伤口和蝎子们。

original: Right! Look out, Think Tank! This brain is coming out of its jar!
translation: 没错！等着瞧吧，思想体们！猛脑出槽咯！

original: Hmm. Let me think about this.
translation: 嗯，再让我想想。

original: Ha! Thinking without a brain. The very idea is perverse.
translation: 哈！没脑子的东西也能思考。太阳从西边出来了。

original: Then let's go make them share. Come on, brain, it's stomping time!
translation: 我会让他们无法拒绝的。来吧，脑子，是时候大闹一场了！

original: Oh, lovely, we've reached the mindless violence portion of the program. Tell me, what exactly are you - and I use the word loosely - planning?
translation: 哦好吧，又到了没脑子的暴力环节。但说真的，这就是你的所谓的“计划”？

original: Why? They promised to put us back together once I did what they wanted.
translation: 为什么？他们承诺如果我完成了他们的任务，就把咱们重新拼回来。

original: And you believed them? Really? I know you were recently deprived of my fabulous advice, but... really?
translation: 所以你就相信他们了？真的吗？最近我是不能给你出谋划策没错，但是…你真信了？

original: Once I'm delivered into their clutches, they'll find a way past the radar fence and the whole Mojave will be their playground.
translation: 一旦我被送到他们手上，他们就能找到越过雷达屏障的办法，把整个莫哈维变成他们的游乐场。

original: And that is assuming of course that one of them doesn't take a fancy to our body and decide to slip his own brain into it instead.
translation: 当然也可以预见，他们中的某人可能会看上你的身体，然后把自己的大脑换进去。

original: Hold that thought, we'll come back to it.
translation: 先暂且搁置，咱们等会再讨论这个。

original: Heh. Hold that thought. That's almost clever.
translation: 呵。先暂且搁置。这倒是近似于聪明了。

original: I'm not spending the rest of my life here when there's a whole world to loot.
translation: 外边还有一整个世界等着我去搜刮呢，我可不想窝在这里荒度余生。

original: Ah yes, there's that greed and general sense of malice. I'd nearly forgotten it. What's the plan, then?
translation: 啊，是的，就是那种贪婪和邪恶感。我差点都忘了。所以呢，你想怎么做？

original: Come on, we have a duty to the Wasteland, we have to get out of here!
translation: 拜托，咱们在废土还有使命，必须要离开这里！

original: There go those glands again. Is the endorphin rush you get from doing the right thing really that good?
translation: 腺体冲动又来了。内啡肽的刺激真这么厉害？让你情不自禁地要做傻事？

original: What's it going to take to convince you?
translation: 那要怎么样才能说服你？

original: I'd like to find a nice little place to live, maybe in Goodsprings, and settle down where we won't get shot at. Not as often, at any rate.
translation: 我希望找个不错的地方定居，像是清泉镇。必须是个不会再挨枪子的地方，至少也别整天挨枪子。

original: But since that doesn't seem likely... what's your plan?
translation: 但这似乎是不可能的…所以你怎么想？

original: I don't recall giving you a choice. Let's go.
translation: 我有给你选择的意思？跟我走。

original: While the brute force approach is a lovely one, really, it won't work.
translation: 暴力手段很可爱，真的，只是它行不通。

original: Even if I wanted to settle myself back in your skull and go to all the trouble of reconnecting nerve endings, Dr. Mobius doesn't have the tools here.
translation: 就算我愿意回到你颅骨里，重新链接那些讨厌的神经末梢，莫比乌斯博士这儿也缺少必要的工具。

original: We would have to make use of Dr. Klein's lab, and I rather doubt the brains are inclined to share.
translation: 我们得借用克莱因博士的实验室，但那些脑子愿不愿意还是个问题。

original: Never mind. I want to talk about something else.
translation: 算了，我想聊点别的。

original: Of course you do. How... scintillating.
translation: 当然。你…真有才。

original: Maybe not, but it got your attention, didn't it?
translation: 这只是种可能，但你很在意，不是吗？

original: I suppose it did. Bravo, you've managed to intimidate a brain in a jar.
translation: 我想是的。 真精彩，你成功地威胁到了一个罐子里的大脑。

original: I would. And I'd follow it up with an alcohol-and-ant-nectar cocktail every night.
translation: 为什么不呢。我还计划每晚再来一杯蚁露鸡尾酒呢。

original: You're a monster! A deranged, self-destructive monster!
translation: 你个怪物！神经错乱、自寻死路的怪物！

original: Don't tempt me, brain.
translation: 别惹我发火，脑子。

original: Fine. I'll try to respect you more. Sir.
translation: 是，我会试着更尊重您的。先生。

original: Fine. I'll try to respect you more. Ma'am.
translation: 是，我会试着更尊重您的。女士。

original: Fine, never mind.
translation: 好，别在意，当我没说。

original: Yes, I rather thought so.
translation: 嗯，我就准备这么做。

original: Once you're back in my head, I'll watch television. Lots. And lots. Of television.
translation: 把你弄回我的脑袋里以后，我就去看电视，看很多很多的电视节目。

original: You... you wouldn't! That's inhuman!
translation: 你…你不能！这不人道！

original: I could smash this tank you're in. How about that?
translation: 我可以把你的维生罐砸了，怎么样？

original: By all means, if the idea of spending the rest of your days as a true Lobotomite appeals to you.
translation: 请便，如果作为一个真正的无脑人渡过余生这事很吸引你的话。

original: Actually, come to think of it, you probably wouldn't mind that, would you?
translation: 其实仔细想想，你大概也不会介意这样，是吧？

original: We'll revisit this topic later.
translation: 我们稍后再讨论这个话题。

original: Oh yes, I rather expect we will. We'll be having a very long talk about crawling through old ruins, haring off on missions of revenge. And Cazadores.
translation: 哦好吧，我很希望能再讨论。我们可以谈很久很久，关于钻过古老的废墟，关于疯疯癫癫的复仇之旅。还有猎蜂。

original: Oh yes, we'll talk a lot about them.
translation: 是的没错，关于这些我们能聊很多。

original: I didn't realize it caused you so much distress.
translation: 我不知道以前我让你这么痛苦。

original: Well, maybe next time you hear me telling you that charging a Nightkin with a penknife is a bad idea, you'll listen.
translation: 算了，只是下次我指出用小刀对付夜行族是坏主意时，你最好能同意。

original: Oh come on, that stuff's fun!
translation: 噢，得了吧，那多有趣啊！

original: Fun? Fun?! Is tetanus fun? Hmm? Is rickets? What about sepsis, enjoy that do we?
translation: 有趣？有趣？！你觉得破伤风有趣？嗯？那佝偻病呢？败血症呢？你也喜欢它们？

original: The things you do with our body are suicidally dangerous, and if you could silence your glandular impulses, you would hear me screaming at you!
translation: 你总通过我们的身体做些要命的事，当时如果你让鲁莽的腺体闭嘴，你就能听到我声嘶力竭的警告！

original: Of course you're responsible! You're my brain!
translation: 你当然要为此负责！你是我的脑子！

original: I most certainly am not! I am the seat of all reason and logic in our little partnership!
translation: 才不是！在我们小小的合作关系中，我是负责提供理智与逻辑那个！

original: All those... feelings that motivate you, that sense of righteousness and that rush you get when you help someone, do you know where those come from?
translation: 所有那些…驱使你行动的情感，就像催促你帮助他人的正义感，你知道它们来自哪里吗？

original: All those... ugh... feelings that motivate you, those urges to hurt people, to take and crush and maim, do you know where they come from?
translation: 所有那些…呃…驱使你行动的情感，那些劝诱你伤害、摧毁、劫掠以及虐待他人的情感，你知道它们来自哪里吗？

original: All those... ugh... feelings that motivate you, do you know where those come from?
translation: 所有那些…呃…驱使你行动的情感，你知道它们来自哪里吗？

original: Glands. They come from glands. Free of the tyranny of your ape-like and primitive endocrine system, I can see how foolish your motives are.
translation: 腺体。情感来自腺体。自从我脱离了你那类人猿的暴政，你那原始的内分泌系统，我才明白你那些情感动机有多愚蠢。

original: This is too weird. I'll be back later.
translation: 这太怪了，我一会儿再回来。

original: Barring the unlikely event that I evolve some sort of rocket-propelled locomotion, I will be here.
translation: 除非我进化了，可以进行火箭推进式的运动，否则我哪也不会去。

original: Cool! I can talk to my own brain! Can my heart and spine talk, too?
translation: 酷耶！我居然能和自己的脑子说话！我的脊椎和心脏也能说话吗？

original: Err... yes, well, you do know that those particular organs don't have neurons and are thus incapable of speech, yes?
translation: 呃…唉，那些特定的器官没有神经元，所以不具备交谈能力，懂吗？

original: How the hell did Mobius get hold of my brain?
translation: 见鬼了，莫比乌斯是怎么拿到我的脑子的？

original: After the Think Tank extracted me from your skull, they fell to bickering amongst themselves. I'm sad to say we were quite forgotten about.
translation: 思想体们把我从你的颅骨里取出后，就开始吵架。真让人难过，他们完全把我们忘了。

original: Dr. Mobius saw an opportunity to gain some leverage, and had me spirited away to his dome.
translation: 莫比乌斯博士相机行事，偷偷把我带到了他的穹顶。

original: Why does my brain sound so... masculine?
translation: 为什么我的脑子听起来如此…阳刚？

original: Ah, well, as to that... you'd be surprised how hard a feminine-sounding voice modulator is to find in the Forbidden Zone.
translation: 呃，好吧，这件事啊…说来你可能会惊讶，整个禁区居然没有一个女声的发声模块。

original: It's not as though brain-sustaining life support tanks grow on trees. I had to take what I could get.
translation: 你也知道，维生脑缸这类东西得来不易，我只能有什么就用什么了。

original: Come on, let's go. We're getting out of here.
translation: 来吧，快走。我们一起离开这儿。

original: Ew! Crawl back in there? Are you mad? I don't know where you've been!
translation: 呕！爬回你的头里？你疯了吗？我都不知道你去过哪儿！

original: For all I know, you're riddled with disease, or packing one of those delightful head wounds you seem to attract!
translation: 我只知道你疾病缠身，还是你觉得那自找枪伤的脑壳会很吸引我！

original: I'm not crawling back into your head just to ooze right back out again!
translation: 我才不想爬进你的脑袋里，然后又恶心地跳出来！

original: Well... I suppose you've convinced me well enough. I'll rejoin your body if that's your final decision.
translation: 好吧……我想你说服我了。如果这就是你最后的决定，我会回到你的身体里。

original: Unfortunately, before we get to that stage of the proceedings, we have a problem.
translation: 不幸的是，在我回去之前，还有个问题。

original: Even if I could settle myself back in your skull and reconnect all those pesky nerve endings, Dr. Mobius doesn't have the tools here.
translation: 就算我愿意回到你颅骨里，重新链接那些烦人的神经末梢，莫比乌斯博士这儿也缺少必要的工具。

original: We would have to make use of Dr. Klein's lab, and I rather doubt the brains are inclined to share.
translation: 咱们得借用克莱因博士的实验室，但我很怀疑那些脑子是否会同意。

original: So... what do you say, brain? Join me for some more wild adventures?
translation: 所以……你怎么说，脑子？加入我好来些更狂野的冒险吗？

original: Actually, yes. I would love a cookie.
translation: 好啊，麻烦给我一块甜饼。

original: I... ugh... is this really what I have to look forward to?
translation: 我…唉…我其实不是这个意思。

original: Listen, you're my brain, so you'd better be more respectful!
translation: 听着，你是我的脑子，所以你最好给我放尊重点！

original: Oh, had I? What exactly will you do if I don't? Not put me back in that cranial donjon you call your head? Heavens forbid!
translation: 哦，是吗？我要是不肯呢，你打算怎样？不会想把我抓进你的颅骨里关起来吧？不要啊！

original: Why are you such a dick?
translation: 你怎么这么混蛋？

original: Well, that's a fine how-do-you-do! Me! A, quote, dick, unquote. As if I'm the one responsible for the way you carry on, gadding about the Wastes.
translation: 啊，我不是在很好地和你打招呼么！我！你所说的“混蛋”。明明是你在废土上愚蠢胡闹，四处乱窜，好像我该为你的行为负责一样。

original: I'm not the one that makes us clamber around tetanus-infested ancient Vaults or go charging off to New Vegas on missions of ill-conceived revenge!
translation: 又不是我决定在那些破伤风横行的远古避难所里上蹿下跳，或者打鸡血似地踏上计划不周的新维加斯复仇之旅！

original: And have we forgotten who got us shot in the head and buried in a shallow grave? Hmm? Do you think I enjoyed that little moment?
translation: 还记得是谁害得我们挨了某人一枪，又被埋在某个浅浅的小坟坑里吗？嗯？你觉得那个时候我很享受吗？

original: Are you... my brain?
translation: 你就是…我的脑子？

original: Ah, lovely, figured that out, have we? Would you like a cookie?
translation: 啊，你终于明白了，是吧，小可爱？要吃小甜饼吗？

original: -Gabe, down! Down, boy! Stop it!-
translation: -加布，坐下！坐下，孩子！别这样！-

original: -Now... let the intruder have the Sonic Emitter schematics. Klein wants it, all right, boy? Let the intruder dig it up wherever you buried it.-
translation: -听话…让入侵者把声波发射器的图纸拿走。克莱因需要它。好吗，孩子？让这个侵入者把它从你埋的地方挖出来吧。-

original: -Gaaabe! I am sorry I put your brain in a bowl, boy. Oohhh, who's a good boy. YOU are!-
translation: -加～布！对不起，把你的脑子泡在罐里，我的孩子。噢哦哦哦，谁是好孩子呀。当然是你！-

original: -Gabe would bark and snarl and bite whenever ANYONE came to visit.-
translation: -加布会狂吠，追赶并撕咬任何造访的人。-

original: -That's why I replaced his legs with spare parts and fed him a steady diet of Psycho-laced dog chow.-
translation: -所以我用备用零件替换了他的腿，喂他含疯狂药的狗粮。-

original: -Ohhhhh yes, my PET, Gabe. I'd forgotten about the old boy and the COUNTLESS experiments I'd done on him back at Higgs.-
translation: -噢，是的，我的宠物狗，加布。我差点忘了他，还有在希格斯村对他做的无数实验。-

original: -Gaaabe? Gabe, you're about to have your FAVORITE treat - a VISITOR. Won't that be nice? DON'T eat the visitor, boy. Don't. Please.-
translation: -加，加布？加布，马上就有你最喜欢的娱乐了——有访客来了。这不是很好吗？只是千万别把那人吃了，孩子。-

original: -The Residential Test. Wasn't that shut down for some reason?-
translation: -住宅区测试…不是因为某个原因被关停了吗？-

original: -Oh my, you got to the Residential Test! This is really Borous, by the way, hello again. None of us thought you would get this far.
translation: -我的天，你竟然要进行住宅区测试了！我是现实中的鲍鲁斯，顺便，你好啊，我们谁也没想到你能走到这一步。-

original: -Attention students. This is the pre-recorded voice of your pre-recorded principal. Doctor Principal BOROUS!-
translation: -同学们注意了！这是预录的你们即将到任的校长的声音。鲍鲁斯博士校长！-

original: -You may know me as the Head Chief First Researcher of Labs Z-9 and Z-14.-
translation: -你们应该知道我是Z-9和Z-14两个实验室的最高首席领头研究员。-

original: -There I fought valiantly to preserve rattlesnake DNA, and put it right where it belongs, in the husk of another feared predator.-
translation: -在那里，我为保护响尾蛇的DNA进行了英勇的斗争，并把它放在了属于它的地方，放在了另一种令人畏惧的捕食者的躯壳里。-

original: -Oh, and the tarantula hawk. Can't splice enough, I always say, especially if you can make a magnificent Cazador!-
translation: -哦，那些毒蛛蜂也是我的杰作。我总是说，怎么拼接都不为过，尤其是如果你能制造出一只巨大的猎蜂！-

original: -Enough about ME. It has come to my attention that many of you SEEMINGLY innocent children have been subverted by Red Propaganda.-
translation: -不说我了。最近，我注意到你们这些貌似无辜的孩子里，不少人居然已经被敌人的红色宣传策反了。-

original: -This is a MOST serious matter requiring the MOST serious of detentions.-
translation: -这是最恶劣的问题，必须处以最严厉的留堂处置。-

original: -Can you spell detention? I'll tell you how I spell it: DEATHtention. Commie-pinko-traitors, ALL.-
translation: -写得出"留堂"(detention)这词儿吗？我拼给你看：处死(DEATHtention)。极左共匪叛国贼，一个也不留。-

original: -Now, I will send vicious cybernetic cyborg dogs through the corridors to weed all you traitors out.-
translation: -现在开始，我将派遣凶猛的赛博犬驻守走廊，确保根除所有叛徒。-

original: -They will sniff out which among you have chosen the commie path.-
translation: -它们能嗅出你们谁走上了共产主义之路。-

original: -Especially YOU, Betsy Bright, who turned me down for the high school dance so you could smoke with RICHIE MARCUS.-
translation: -特别是像你，贝琪.布莱特，曾在中学舞会拒绝我，就为了和里奇.马库斯抽大烟。-

original: -Hall Monitors will also be vigilant. Step outside during class, and they'll make sure you make a speedy jump back to your desk.-
translation: -大厅的监视者也会全天候警戒。上课时走出教室一步，它们会确保你马上跳着滚回课桌边。-

original: -Hold your urine and wait for the PROPER bathroom breaktime.-
translation: -抑制住排泄的冲动，你们有专门的小便时间。-

original: -School is a sacred trust. Even though I am a long-ago graduate of this hated facility...-
translation: -学校意味着一份神圣的信任。即使我已从这可恨的机构毕业多年…-

original: -...now I see its worth, and see it was corrupted by fraternities, and... GIRLS. Yuck!-
translation: -…现在我明白了它的价值，也明白它所受的污染，被那些联谊会还有…女生们。呸！-

original: -Today the cafeteria will be serving... nothing, because I didn't build one.-
translation: -今天食堂提供的是…什么都没有，因为我没建食堂。-

original: -No cafeteria. No bathrooms. No swirlies. No chocolate pudding left in the chairs of brilliant minds. What are you going to do now RICHIE MARCUS?-
translation: -没有食堂，没有浴室，没有能塞进脑袋的马桶，聪明学生的座椅上不会再有巧克力布丁。哈，里奇.马库斯，看你还能怎么办？-

original: -Please place all filthy propaganda books in the incinerator chute in the Sink, especially those with funny pictures of me in them.-
translation: -请把肮脏的宣传册都扔进汇聚节点的焚书槽，特别是画着我滑稽样子的那些。-

original: -I am lord of this institution. Where once, long ago, I was a student here. Now, I am its OMNIPOTENT GOD-PRINCIPAL.-
translation: -我是这座设施的主宰者。很久以前，我曾是这里的学生。现在，我是这的校长，是这里全能的神。-

original: -As I soon will be LORD of Big MT. DOO DE DOO. Do you hear that? It is my trumpet of victoryness!-
translation: -不久，我还将君临大山脉。嘟滴嘟，你们都听见了吗？是我胜利的号角声。-

original: -Down at the end of the hall is BALL storage. For jocks who like BALLS, like RICHIE MARCUS. Do you hear me, Betsy? RICHIE likes BALLS.-
translation: -走廊尽头是个球柜，这是专门为里奇.马库斯那类喜欢球的家伙准备的。你听见了没，贝琪？里奇他喜欢“球儿.-

original: -You are in the LIBRARY. Be quiet here and filled with SHHHHH.-
translation: -你现在在图书馆。保持安静，别出声，嘘。-

original: I found a holotape to upgrade you.
translation: 我找到一个升级你的全息磁带。

original: Ooh, you found my mood lighting! Installing upgrade!
translation: 哦！你找到了我的“情感之光”模块！正在安装升级！

original: How did he manage that?
translation: 他是怎么做到的？

original: I don't know. I'm afraid the trauma of our separation rendered me quite insensate. I didn't come around until I was safely ensconced in this tank.
translation: 我不清楚。咱俩分离的创伤让我失去了知觉，我醒来时就已经被安置在这个罐子里了。

original: I'm quite sure whatever he did was highly scientific, though.
translation: 但，我能保证他做的一切都很科学，很合理。

original: That seems like a pretty unlikely coincidence.
translation: 这也太巧了吧。

original: Hardly. Dr. Mobius keeps a close optical sensor on the goings-on at the Think Tank. As soon as he saw the opportunity, he took it.
translation: 并不，莫比乌斯博士一直密切监视着思想体们的一举一动。一旦发现机会，他就会马上行动。

original: Well, that answers that. On to something else.
translation: 好吧，这说得通。我们聊些别的吧。

original: Well, as long as your curiosity is satisfied.
translation: 没问题，只要能满足你的好奇心。

original: You talk a lot of science, brain, but you don't make a lot of sense.
translation: 大脑，你说了很多科学知识，但你完全没说明白啊。

original: Very well, let me put this in terms you'll understand. Brain: smart. Heart: stupid. Spine: very stupid. You: exceptionally stupid.
translation: 好吧，让我解释到你能理解的程度。大脑：聪明。心脏：愚蠢。脊椎：很愚蠢。你：无与伦比的愚蠢。

original: Does that explain the matter?
translation: 这下解释清楚了吧？

original: Well, you don't have a mouth, but you can talk. Explain that, smarty-pants!
translation: 嗯，你没嘴，却能说话。这个你怎么解释，自作聪明的家伙！
