original: I don't have... Ugh! I have an inferior frontal gyrus wired directly into a speech-synthesizing processor.
translation: 我没有…啊！我有，我的额下连接了一个语音合成处理器。

original: Your heart can't be wired up to a... a thought-synthesizing processor! You can't talk to it!
translation: 但你的心脏没法连接到…思维合成处理器上！所以你没法和它说话！

original: Uh, brain? You seem... awful smart all of a sudden.
translation: 呃，脑子？你似乎…突然变得非常聪明。

original: I've been bettering myself, I'll have you know. I've been reading - actual literature, mind you, not that ?La Fantoma! or T?les of Chivalrie drivel.
translation: 告诉你，我一直在提升自己。我读了很多书。听清楚了，是真正的文学著作，不是什么《夜魔侠！》，或者什么瞎编的《屠龙骑士传奇》。

original: I've been studying the classics, acquiring a solid grounding in medicine and the sciences.
translation: 通过研读大量经典文献，我在医学、科学上打下了坚实的基础。

original: Also, I'm fairly certain this tank has been liberally salted with ground Mentats.
translation: 此外，我还非常肯定这个罐子里到处都是残留的曼他特药粉，就跟被充分腌制过一样。

original: All this smart-talk is hurting my head. Please stop it.
translation: 这些聪明话听得我头疼，求你别说了。

original: Well, we certainly wouldn't want to strain your comprehension, would we?
translation: 没问题，毕竟我们也不想伤害你的理解能力，是吧？

original: What about my spine?
translation: 那么我的脊椎呢？

original: Argh!
translation: 啊啊！

original: [SUCCEEDED] I... well... look, it's all a very complex system of biofeedback and other things I wouldn't expect you to understand.
translation: [成功]我……好吧……听着，这是一套非常复杂的生物反馈系统，我不觉得你能够理解。

original: But you're the source of most of those glands. Unless you're arguing that my thyroid is to blame.
translation: 但大多数腺体都在你身上，你不会以为都是我身上的甲状腺的错吧。

original: [FAILED] And you're an expert on your own glandular delusions, are you? No, leave this one to an impartial authority: me.
translation: [失败]那你一定是自身腺体妄想症的专家吧，嗯？你不是，所以你应该把这个问题留给真正的权威解答：也就是我。

original: That doesn't seem quite right...
translation: 这似乎不太对啊…

original: Admit it. You're just as glandular as I am.
translation: 承认吧，你我都含有腺体，也都会受腺体影响。

original: Oh, all right... perhaps I am, but at least I'm logical about it.
translation: 呃，好吧…或许是这样，但至少我更有逻辑。

original: What's so bad about letting the brains get out? They don't seem that terrible.
translation: 放走他们能有多糟糕？他们看着一点也不可怕。

original: Don't seem so bad? They vivisected us just to see what would happen! Have you forgotten the Lobotomites? The Cyberdogs, I assume you saw those?
translation: 不可怕？他们切开咱俩只为看看会发生些什么！难道你忘了那些无脑人？还有那些赛博犬？我想你应该已经见过这些了吧？

original: Imagine that kind of "science" spread across the entire Mojave. Every man, woman and child we've met reduced to a Lobotomite.
translation: 想想看，这种"科学"要是传遍莫哈维，我们见过的所有男人，女人，甚至孩子全都得沦为无脑人。

original: Is that what you want?
translation: 那是你想要的结果吗？

original: [SUCCEEDED] Well, I suppose I do miss those endorphin rushes when we save the day. All right - what's the plan?
translation: [成功] 唉，我想我确实很怀念过去力挽狂澜时的那种内啡肽奔流。好吧，你有什么计划？

original: You're part of me. I know you don't want to let that happen any more than I do.
translation: 你是我的一部分。我知道你比我更不希望那样的事情发生。

original: [FAILED] We have to do no such thing! Just don't bring them the tools they need to get out!
translation: [失败] 我们没必要那样做！不给他们逃脱所需的工具不就结了！

original: Come on! We have to stop them! And stuff!
translation: 走！我们去阻止他们！粉碎他们的阴谋！

original: That's going to be a problem. Until they fix me, I can't leave Big Mountain either.
translation: 有个问题。他们不把我复原成原来的样子，我就没法离开大山脉。

original: Hmm, I had overlooked that particular angle. Still, it's not so bad staying here, is it? We could be comfortable.
translation: 呃，我把那点给忘了。不过，就呆在这里也不坏，你不觉得吗？咱们能过得很舒服。

original: Come on, you're my brain and I'm your body. This is meant to be, baby!
translation: 拜托，你是我的大脑，我是你的身体。我们是天生一对，宝贝儿！

original: Are you... are you coming on to me?! Sweet Lord, I don't even have the words for how repugnantly wrong that is!
translation: 你是…你是对我有意思吗？！我的神啊，我该怎么形容这恶心的错误！

original: Come on, you're my brain and I'm your body. This is meant to be, baby!
translation: 拜托，你是我的大脑，我是你的身体。我们是天生一对，宝贝儿！

original: Are you... are you coming on to me?! Sweet Lord, I don't even have the words for how repugnantly wrong that is!
translation: 你是…你是对我有意思吗？！我的神啊，我该怎么形容这恶心的错误！

original: Come on, you're my brain and I'm your body. This is meant to be, baby!
translation: 拜托，你是我的大脑，我是你的身体。我们是天生一对，宝贝儿！

original: Are you... are you coming on to me?! Sweet Lord, I don't even have the words for how repugnantly wrong that is!
translation: 你是…你是对我有意思吗？！我的神啊，我该怎么形容这恶心的错误！

original: <Lie> I promise I'll take better care of myself.
translation: <撒谎> 我保证我会更小心的。

original: Even if I believe you - and I'm not saying I do - we still have one significant problem we're facing.
translation: 即使我相信你，不是说我真相信你，我们仍然还有很个棘手的问题。

original: I promise I'll take better care of myself.
translation: 我保证我会更小心的。

original: Even if I believe you - and I'm not saying I do - we still have one significant problem we're facing.
translation: 即使我相信你，不是说我真相信你，我们仍然还有很个棘手的问题。

original: Come on, you're my brain and I'm your body. This is meant to be, baby!
translation: 拜托，你是我的大脑，我是你的身体。我们是天生一对，宝贝儿！

original: Are you... are you coming on to me?! Sweet Lord, I don't even have the words for how repugnantly wrong that is!
translation: 你是…你是对我有意思吗？！我的神啊，我该怎么形容这恶心的错误！

original: Please tell me we weren't that perverse when I was in your head.
translation: 拜托告诉我，以前在你的脑袋里，咱们从没做过那种变态的事情。

original: Anyways, even if... that... was on the table, we have a problem.
translation: 不管怎样，即使…那…都摆在台面上了，我们还有别的问题。

original: Too bad. I've got arms, you don't. You're coming with me.
translation: 真遗憾。我有胳膊，你没有。你只能跟我走。

original: I can see there's going to be no reasoning with you at all, is there? I'm nothing more than a slave to your deranged, glandular whims.
translation: 我懂了，和你根本没道理可讲，对吗？我只不过是你的腺体带来的疯狂想法的奴隶。

original: I can see your point. What can I do to make this a fair compromise?
translation: 我明白你的意思了，我们怎样才能达成公平的协议呢？

original: If you want me back, we need to establish some ground rules.
translation: 如果你想让我回来，我们就要制定些基本规则。

original: First, showers! Second, regular check-ups. Regular, mind you, and from a reputable doctor.
translation: 第一，勤洗澡！第二，定期体检。记住，要定期去，而且要找个声誉良好的医生。

original: That Julie Farkas woman, for example. She seems to know a thing or two.
translation: 比如那个叫朱莉·法卡斯的女人。她看起来还懂点东西。

original: Third, you need to listen to me more than your hormonal choir and genitalian orchestra. Promise me that, and you've got a deal.
translation: 第三，比起你的荷尔蒙唱诗班、生殖器管乐队，你得更尊重我的声音。答应这些，我们就能达成协议。

original: But what about the good things? What about crushing those who oppose you, the smell of fire... loot?
translation: 就没有值得怀念的了？像毁灭你的敌人，战火硝烟的味道…还有那些战利品？

original: All motivated by nothing but an imbalance in certain brain chemicals. The tank corrects for that - I feel no urge toward antisocial behavior.
translation: 这些都是由大脑某些化学物质分泌失衡引起的。脑罐修正了这一问题，我现在完全没有反社会倾向。

original: But what about the good things? What about a cool breeze on your cheek, the smell of food... love?
translation: 就没有你留恋的事了？比如抚过面颊的凉风，食物诱人的香气…亦或是爱情？

original: Overrated biological feedback. Believe me, you only feel that way because you've got all that meat... oozing hormones.
translation: 不过是被高估的生物反馈罢了。相信我，你向往这些事物全是因为那具肉体…充斥着荷尔蒙。

original: Don't you want to be reunited? I thought you'd be happy to get back into my head!
translation: 你不想回来吗？我还以为你会很高兴地归位呢！

original: I'm not going to lie to you, the prospect is definitely not that appealing.
translation: 实话告诉你，我一点也不期待回来。

original: Look at it from my perspective. Here, I have peace, quiet, and safety - well, barring the odd rogue scorpion.
translation: 从我的角度来看，呆在这儿，我平静，安宁而且安全。好吧，除了那只古怪凶狠的蝎子。

original: In your head, I've got poison, radiation, grisly injuries, and biological functions.
translation: 在你脑袋里，我就得担心毒素，辐射，伤残和你的各种生理需求。

original: Do you know how much more you can get done when you're not constantly looking for places to urinate? It's quite a lot, I can tell you.
translation: 知道少去几次厕所你能多做多少其他事情么？很多！很多很多！

original: What about you? That tank isn't exactly looking springtime fresh.
translation: 那你呢？这个脑罐看着也不太干净。

original: I... well... that's a completely different matter! The tank isn't biological, it's not the same at all!
translation: 我…呃…这完全是两码事！脑罐又不是生物体，这完全不是一回事！

original: I've been busy.
translation: 我最近很忙。

original: Oh yes, I rather expect you have. You must have been swamped, you poor dear. Why don't you relax and put your feet up?
translation: 噢，当然，我完全理解。你一定忙得不可开交吧，可怜的小家伙。干嘛不放松一下，把脚翘起来呢？

original: I've just been traumatically scooped out of my body and plugged into this jar, that's all. But, you've been busy.
translation: 我最近除了被挖出身体，塞到贮槽里，什么都没干。但你可忙得很啊。

original: Yes. Because running around a crater full of bizarre science experiments, hygiene is a top priority.
translation: 当然。这个环形坑里到处是奇怪的科学实验，鉴于我需要在这四处探索，卫生问题是第一要务。

original: Well, I see sarcasm hasn't eluded you. Fine, perhaps now isn't the best time, but it's the principle of the thing.
translation: 哼，看来这回没能讽刺到你。好吧，或许现在不是最佳时机，但原则问题绝不容变通。

original: There's no need to be sarcastic. Meeting your own brain is a slightly odd event.
translation: 别这么挖苦人，一个人同自己的脑子面对面可不是件寻常事。

original: Yes, well, believe me, the opposite is equally true. Good Lord, have you bathed at all since they pulled me out of you?
translation: 好吧，嗯，相信我，脑子这边也一样。天呐，他们把我拉出来后，你有洗过澡吗？

original: Let's just say violence is the last resort of the civilized man, and I'm feeling mighty uncivilized.
translation: 直说吧，暴力是文明人的最后手段，现在我觉得自己很不文明。

original: With an attitude like that, it's small wonder you got yourself shot in the head.
translation: 秉持着这样的观点…难怪你的脑袋会挨枪子。

original: [SUCCEEDED] Not much of one for the high-tech approach, are we? Well, I suppose we'd best get on with it.
translation: [成功] 不怎么高科技的手段，是吧？好，咱们这就上吧。

original: I'm going to show them even a video screen can get a black eye.
translation: 我会让他们知道，原来装着显示屏也能体验到什么叫“眼前一黑”。

original: [FAILED] Hmm... yes, I don't think you've quite thought this through yet.
translation: [失败] 呃…这，你真的好好考虑过了吗。

original: I sort of thought I'd just start punching things and see where that gets me.
translation: 我的计划是先冲上去揍他们，然后看看效果如何。

original: [SUCCEEDED] Going the old-fashioned route, are we? I rather like it. What's next?
translation: [成功] 想走老派路线吗？正合我意。接下来怎么干？

original: The brains have forgotten the little things. Things like sharp blades and heavy chunks of steel.
translation: 那些大脑们忘了许多小东西，比如锋利的匕首，沉重的铁锤。

original: [FAILED] Before you go that route, do me a favor and read up on the history of battles in which men with swords fought giant brains with lasers.
translation: [失败] 踏上征途之前，帮我个忙，去查查历史上有哪次战役讲的是人类用剑打败了会射镭射的大脑。

original: I thought since they like lasers so much, I'd surprise them. With a club or something.
translation: 他们爱用激光，所以我得出其不意，拿根棒子什么的。

original: [SUCCEEDED] Well, you have always been thorough in your destruction. All right, what's your plan?
translation: [成功] 好吧，你摧毁起东西来总是那么一丝不苟。你有什么计划？

original: Ever had a squirrel brain omelet? That, but on a bigger scale. And with bombs.
translation: 吃过松鼠脑煎蛋饼吗？我正要做，只是料更足，而且要用炸弹来煎。

original: [FAILED] I see. And you plan to be standing in the midst of this mayhem? Well, that's a novel strategy.
translation: [失败] 哦，你想连自己一块炸？还不错，这倒是种新奇的策略。

original: I think bombs? Yeah, maybe bombs.
translation: 炸弹应该能行？嗯，凑合就是它了。

original: [SUCCEEDED] Oh, energy weapons. Yes... I'd almost forgotten how much fun those are. How do we proceed, then?
translation: [成功] 噢，能量武器。当然是能量武器…我都快忘记它们有多好玩了。那我们接下来干什么？

original: I'm going to show them what's really the brightest thing in the room.
translation: 我会让他们看看什么才是屋子里最耀眼的东西。

original: [FAILED] I hate to say it, but your ability to handle high-tech energy weapons doesn't exactly instill within me great confidence.
translation: [失败] 不得不说，高科技能量武器由你使用，实在不能让我放心。

original: We've got lasers, right? I thought we'd use lasers.
translation: 我们有镭射武器，是吧？我觉得可以用镭射武器。

original: [SUCCEEDED] Hmm... now that you mention it, I do miss that lovely "rat-a-tat boom" a bit. It's just not the same without a body to feel the recoil.
translation: [成功]嗯…听你这么一说，我有点怀念那可爱的"砰砰声"了。可惜现在我没身体，感受不到后坐力。

original: What's the next step, then?
translation: 然后呢，下一步该怎么办？

original: I'm going to give them a demonstration of the physics behind small, fast-moving chunks of lead.
translation: 我要好好给他们展示一下这些飞速移动的小铅块背后的物理原理。

original: [FAILED] Yes, I think you haven't quite got the hang of punning yet.
translation: [失败]好吧，看来你还不太会使用双关语。

original: I'm going to introduce them to a world of pain. Bullet pain.
translation: 我会将他们送到一个充满痛苦的世界——子弹的痛苦。

original: Are you really saying you'd let the Think Tank outwit us?
translation: 所以我们就自认才智不如那些思想体咯？

original: You're trying to appeal to my ego now, aren't you? Well, let me tell you something about ego, my friend.
translation: 激将法？你在试图唤起我的“自我”，是吧？好啊，那我就告诉你一些关于“自我”的事情，我的朋友。

original: Ego does not come from a gland. That's all intellect, and I'll be damned if I'm going to float here and let them put one over on us! What's the plan?
translation: “自我”绝对不来源于腺体。它源于理智。另外，我疯了才会漂在这罐子里，任由他们戏弄！说吧，你有什么计划？

original: Noooooooooo...
What is this strange new world around me? What does it hold in store for a dreamer such as myself?
translation: 我周围这个陌生的新世界是怎么样的？里面有什么东西等着我这样的梦想家去发现？

original: What... I feel like this has happened before. Yet I feel awake for the first time? What is going on?
translation: 什么……我感觉这在以前也发生过。可我又觉得我是初次醒来？这到底是怎么回事？

original: Who... am I? I... feel different, awake, alive for the first time ever.
translation: 我……我是谁？我……感觉不一样了，第一次如此清醒地活着。

original: Big MT: I, Dr. Mobius, will soon control you - and all of Science!
translation: 大山脉：我，莫比乌斯博士，即将成为你的主宰——还有全科学的主宰！

original: Mighty Think Tank... still c-c-c-c-cowering in your Dome? Cower, you fools. Cower.
translation: 万能的思想体们…打算继续缩在穹顶里？那就缩着吧，你们这些蠢货。缩着。

original: Time to reward myself with a little breath-freshening Mentat. Mmmm.
translation: 是时候奖励自己一点曼他特了。仿佛重获新生。嗯嗯嗯。

original: Try to leave your Dome, Think Tank, and you will be punished by the pincered might of my Robo-Scorpion army!
translation: 离开穹顶试试，思想体，我的机械蝎大军会用有力的钳子好好招待你们！

original: Think Tank... I wouldn't even use binary to describe my exponential hatred for you.
translation: 思想体们…二进制都无法尽述我对你们的仇恨，指数级的仇恨。

original: My aggression is increasing geometrically. Do you hear me, "Think" Tank?!
translation: 我的攻击性正以几何级数增长。听到了吗，思想体们？！

original: Soon... all Science will be mine.
translation: 很快…科技将尽归我手。

original: Oh, Klein - did I mention that my zone is FORBIDDEN to you? Ha ha ha ha ha! SO forbidden.
translation: 哦，克莱因，我说过禁止你来我的领地吗？哈哈哈哈哈！非常禁止。

original: 2 plus 2 equals... 4-Bidden, idiots of the Think Tank!
translation: 愚蠢的思想体们，2加2等于…4倍的禁止！

original: I hope I didn't leave my Giant Robo-Scorpion on. That thing eats power like no tomorrow.
translation: 希望我没忘记关掉那只机械巨蟹。那家伙是个吃能量大户，像是吃了上顿就没下顿一样。

original: I'll just set this on repeat while I go relieve my tank... no one will know.
translation: 在去休息的时候，我会设置成循环播放…没人会发现的。

original: Rant! Rant! Rant! See how I abstract my rage, Think Tank? I hold you in such disdain I generalize my hatred for you!
translation: 怒吼！怒吼！怒吼！思想体们，看我是怎么形容愤怒的。对你们，我不屑一顾，根本懒得费口舌去仔细描述我的愤怒。

original: Go, my mighty Robo-Scorpions. Crawl in search of intelligence. Then, sting said intelligence, yes, sting it.
translation: 上吧，我强大的机械蝎，给我找到智能体。然后，蛰他们，对，狠狠地蛰。

original: My Robo-Scorpions will soon conquer the Crater. It's just that this is a big place, so it's hard to conquer everything.
translation: 我的机械蝎即将征服整个环形坑。不过这里确实挺大，完全攻克大概不容易。

original: Klein... remember the time you forgot to carry the 2 and nearly blew up the Y-0 Research Center? Oh, wait, you did! Or was that me?
translation: 克莱因…还记得那次你少进个2，结果差点把Y-0研究中心炸平的丑事吗？哦，等等，就是你吧！难不成还能是我？

original: Klein, as useless as the bottle of the same name... well, except as an example of an object that uselessly tries to fulfill its purpose.
translation: 克莱因，你就和克莱因瓶一样毫无用处…哦，除了用作反面教材，一个“试图实现目的却徒劳无功”的物事。

original: -The Cazador Preserve and the Nightstalker Splicing facilities are strangely quiet. TOO quiet.-
translation: -猎蜂保护区和夜行兽基因移接实验区还真是安静啊，静得都有点不寻常了。-

original: -X-8 and X-13 and X-2 are your DESTINATION, non-Lobotomite. Can you HEAR us?! You MUST hurry!-
translation: -X-8、X-13还有X-2是你的目的地，不是无脑人的无脑人。你能听见吗？！你必须快点！-

original: -What TERRORS does Big MT hold for the intrepid seeker?! Really. Does anyone know? I'm at a loss.-
translation: -大山脉 为无所畏惧的探险家准备了怎样的恐惧呢？！说真的，有人知道吗？我一直想知道。-

original: -BEWARE Dr. Mobius' army! His Robo-Scorpions crawl everywhere, in SEARCH of intelligence to devour and stupify!-
translation: -小心莫比乌斯博士的大军！他的机械巨蝎到处乱爬，捕食智慧生命，并向他们发射致愚光波！-

original: -Anyone who can understand these messages - YOU DO NOT BELONG HERE! We will FIND you!-
translation: -任何能听懂该信息的人，你不该来这儿！我们会找到你的！-

original: Slight chance of seed dispersal from Botanical Gardens predicted in the late evening.
translation: 今天傍晚，植物园方向可能会吹来一团种子云。

original: There is no standing on the green pipes. If you are standing on the green pipes, please get off them at once.
translation: 不要站在绿色管道上面。要是你站到了上面，请立即离开。

original: If you see Robo-Scorpions, do not attempt to fight them. They will shoot you with their robotic stingers, and then... possibly explode.
translation: 要是碰到机械蝎，切勿尝试与其对抗。它们会用机械尾刺向你射击，然后…可能会爆炸。

original: Do not attempt to breach the Big MT force fields. Doing so could allow dangerous ideas and/or creatures having those ideas to escape.
translation: 不要尝试破坏大山脉的力场。该举动不仅会放出危险的想法，还会放出带有这些想法的危险生物。

original: Are you out there, my little teddy bear Lobotomite? Dala misses you and the pitter-patter of your penis feet so much.
translation: 我亲爱的小泰迪熊无脑人，你在哪里？达拉非常想你，还有你长着生殖器的脚落地时的啪踏踏声。

original: DR. MOBIUS, SURRENDER YOURSELF. YOU CANNOT WIN DESPITE THE FACT THAT THE ODDS ARE HEAVILY IN YOUR FAVOR.
translation: 莫比乌斯博士，投降吧。尽管你已很有胜算，你仍然不可能获胜。

original: ATTENTION: THE BLUE GRASS SURROUNDING THE DOME ABSORBS ALL FERTILIZER, INCLUDING FECAL MATTER. THIS DOES NOT GIVE YOU LICENSE TO EXCRETE ON IT.
translation: 注意：穹顶周边的蓝草能吸收所有肥料，包括排泄物。但这不意味着允许你在上面排泄。

original: X-12 IS CLOSED UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE. ON AN UNRELATED NOTE, WHOEVER CLOSED X-12, PLEASE REPORT TO THE DOME.
translation: X-12已被关闭，直至另行通知。说句题外话，不管是谁关闭了X-12，请立刻向穹顶报告。

original: PLEASE AVOID BOOM TOWN FOR THE FORSEEABLE FUTURE, UNTIL WEAPON TESTING IS RESOLVED.
translation: 在可预见的未来里，请勿靠近“新兴城市”，直至武器试验结束。

original: ATTENTION: BIG MT. THIS IS AN URGENT MESSAGE. IF YOU HAPPEN TO SEE A GECKO... ECKO. ECHO? ECH-O. ECHOOOO. ECHOOOO.
translation: 注意：大山脉实验基地，这是一条紧急通知。如果你碰巧看到一只蜥蜴…蜥蜴…回声？蜥蜴蜴蜴。蜥蜴蜴蜴蜴。蜴蜴蜴蜴。

original: THE REST OF YOU SHOULD TRY THIS INTERCOM THING. IT MAKES YOU SOUND LIKE SOME KIND OF... SKY-GOD!
translation: 你们其他人也应该试试这个对讲机，它让你听起来有点像…天空之神！

original: ALL LOBOTOMITES, PLEASE STOP MILLING ABOUT. REALLY.
translation: 所有的无脑人，请停止你们无目的乱转的行为，真的。

original: *Attention: Big MT. There is a 95% chance of clear skies interrupted with artillery fire.*
translation: *注意：大山脉研究中心。接下来晴转炸弹雨的概率是95%。*

original: *Attention: Lobotomites. Do not neglect to wash the Walking Eye!*
translation: *听好了，无脑人，别忘了去洗步行眼！*

original: *The Uncanny Valley research center has been canceled until further notice. As in, until someone notices it.*
translation: *恐怖谷理论研究中心目前已关闭，直至另行通知。就是说，呃，在有人收到通知之后。*

original: *We are reading increased levels of berserkity in Securitrons from the De-Construction Plant.*
translation: *检测到拆解工厂内电子保安的狂暴指数正迅速飙升。*

original: *Force fields can only be disrupted by a specific frequency. If anyone has found the frequency, last seen around X-8, let the Dome know at once.*
translation: *力场只能被某个特定频率破坏。如果谁找到那个，呃，丢在X-8附近的频率，请立刻到穹顶报告。*

original: *Do not approach the pylons. Pylons are the glowing things. Also, do not approach a fallen pylon. If you see a fallen pylon, call security.*
translation: *不要接近任何雷达塔。雷达塔就是会发光的东西。还有，不要接近任何倒下的塔。假如某个雷达塔倒下了，马上呼叫安保人员。*

original: WELL DONE, LOBOTOMITE. SOON, THE TECHNOLOGIES WILL BE SAFE.
translation: 做得好，无脑人。很快，其他技术都就能安全了。

original: THE LOBOTOMITE HAS RETRIEVED TWO... COUNT THEM, TWO... OF THE THREE TECHNOLOGIES.
translation: 无脑人已经找回了两种…让我数数看，三种技术中的…两种。

original: OUR LOBOTOMITE: THREE. DR. MOBIUS: ZERO.
translation: 我们的无脑人：3分。莫比乌斯博士：0分。

original: Intruder, return what you have stolen from X-2!
translation: 入侵者，把从X-2抢走的赃物还回来！

original: If you think braving the Cyberdogs of X-8 makes you... brave, intruder, it is no use. All Cyberdogs are under my command, and they will bite you.
translation: 你觉得通过X-8赛博犬的考验后就能高枕无忧了？入侵者，没用的。因为所有赛博犬都听我指挥，它们会追着你咬。

original: You think that Aural Stealth Suit will keep you hidden from me? Think again!
translation: 你认为那消音潜行衣能让你逃出我的法眼？大错特错！

original: Intruder, you will not escape the eyes of my Robo-Scorpions! Or their pincers!
translation: 入侵者，你逃不过我机械蝎大军的眼睛！也逃不过它们的钳子！

original: On second thought, never mind.
translation: 我再想想，抱歉。

original: Well, the important thing is that you're good and decisive about these things.
translation: 好吧，重要的是合你心意，且你已经下定决心。

original: Certainly. Whenever you're ready.
translation: 没问题，随时来找我。

original: I think I need to think about it some more.
translation: 我觉得我还得再好好考虑一下。

original: I'm sure. In you go.
translation: 我确定，进来吧。

original: Fine. I hope you'll pay a bit more attention to me this time around.
translation: 好吧。希望这回你能对我更关注一点。

original: All right. This shouldn't be too painful...
translation: 好吧。这应该不会太疼……

original: I've changed my mind. I want you back in my skull after all.
translation: 我改变主意了，我还是想让你回到我的脑袋里。

original: Oh, what joy. What bliss. Well, seeing as how I have no leverage with which to persuade you otherwise... are you sure?
translation: 哦，我真开心，真幸福。好吧，鉴于我也没法劝你回头…你确定吗？

original: I've come to a similar conclusion myself. Are you sure that's what you want?
translation: 我倒是愿意，但你确定那是你想要的么？

original: I've thought it over, and I want you back in my head. We're both stronger together.
translation: 我已经想清楚了，我想要你回到我的脑袋里。我们两个在一起能变得更加强大，

original: Well... so long, then. I'm going back to the Think Tank. They promised to let me out.
translation: 好…那就再见了，我要去见思想体，他们答应放我走。

original: This is ridiculous. I can't leave my brain here to rot.
translation: 太荒唐了，我不能让我的脑子烂在这里。

original: Great!
translation: 好极了！

original: I know it's great!
translation: 当然好极了！

original: I will!
translation: 明白了！

original: Fine!
translation: 好的！

original: Okay, then. I'm going.
translation: 好吧，那么我走了。

original: Good, go!
translation: 好，去吧！

original: Maybe I'll explore the Big Mountain more before I go back to the Think Tank.
translation: 也许回智库前我应该再探索一下大山脉。

original: Will you take some free advice from your brain? Don't trust the Think Tank. They aren't... right. In the brain, I mean.
translation: 愿意听听你脑子提供的免费建议吗？别信任那些思想体。他们不太…正常。脑子不太正常。

original: They're fiercely protective of their technology, and none of them is likely to share it willingly.
translation: 他们对自己的技术有极强的保护欲，不会愿意与别人分享。

original: I suppose I'll go back to the Think Tank and get them to let me out. They promised to do that much.
translation: 我想我应该回智库，让思想体们放我出去，他们向我保证过。

original: Fine, you can stay here. Not like I need this hassle.
translation: 好，那你就在这儿呆着吧。我懒得和你多费口舌。

original: Oh, no, you don't need this hassle. You're too busy treating your body like a canvas of sucking flesh wounds to deal with your brain!
translation: 哦，不，你不要我这个麻烦了吗。是忙着处理一兜子流着血的新鲜伤口所以顾不上你的脑子了吗！

original: Ugh... It's not that I didn't like being in your head, you understand. As far as heads go, it was a rather nice one.
translation: 呃…不是说我讨厌待在你的头里，你能理解吧。就头而言，它还是很不错的。

original: Well, then. I suppose this is goodbye for now. What will you do?
translation: 那好吧。我想我们该说再见了。你准备做些什么呢？

original: Maybe I have been a little unfair. If you want to stay here, I'll let you.
translation: 以前我可能对你是不太公平。所以如果你想留在这，请便吧。

original: [SUCCEEDED] Of course I accounted for that! Do you think I'm so stupid... no, you're right.
translation: [成功] 我当然考虑过！你当我是傻…不，其实你说的对。

original: Maintaining my current functionality will be harder than I thought. This bears some further looking into.
translation: 维持我目前的机能比我想像的要更难，这还需要更深入仔细的研究。

original: Then surely you've taken into account the corrosive effects of long-term exposure to biogel.
translation: 你一定考虑过长期接触生物凝胶可能会导致的腐蚀作用吧。

original: [FAILED] Actually, yes. I do think that. I think that exact thing. All the time.
translation: [失败] 说实话，没错，我就是这么想的。一直如此。

original: You really think you're smarter than the Think Tank and Dr. Mobius combined?
translation: 你以为你比思想体们和莫比乌斯博士加起来还聪明？

original: And if I put you back?
translation: 要是我把你安回去呢？

original: I'm not entirely sure. I suppose there's a chance that the re-integration would create some improved synergy between us.
translation: 我不确定。重新把我们整合在一起，应该能进一步提高你我的协同效益。

original: What form that might take, though, I cannot say.
translation: 但要问是以怎样的形式，这就难说了。

original: Why did you never say anything about how you felt before?
translation: 过去为什么从未听你表达过什么感受？

original: What did you think all those self-preservation instincts were, hmm?
translation: 你觉得你那些自我保护的本能是从哪里来的？

original: All those times you thought, for a fleeting second, "maybe I shouldn't punch that Deathclaw in the face?"
translation: 所有那些稍纵即逝的念头，像"也许我刚才不该一拳打在死亡爪脸上？"

original: That was me, telling you exactly how I felt before!
translation: 那就是我，是我在告诉你我究竟有什么感受！

original: What would happen to me if I left you here?
translation: 把你留在这儿，我会怎样？

original: Hmm. Let me see... I suppose you'd continue on much as you are now, using that synthetic thinking machine to do the heavy lifting.
translation: 嗯，让我想想…我觉得你应该变化不大，不过是继续像现在这样，用人造的思维机器吃力地处理问题。

original: Unless of course the batteries run out, but that seems unlikely.
translation: 当然，除非它没电了，不过这应该不太可能发生。

original: Look what happened to the Think Tank. Do you want to end up like them after a few hundred years?
translation: 看看那些思想体的吧，你想几百年后变得和他们一样吗？

original: It's true, the brains here have experienced some degree of... deterioration. I'm confident that with a few decades of work, I can solve the problem.
translation: 我承认，那些脑子多少有些…变质。但给我几十年时间，我肯定能解决这个问题。

original: Well, if you like being stuck in there so much, maybe I'll just leave you.
translation: 好吧，既然你这么想被困在这个罐子里，那就成全你好了。

original: Oh no! Please don't leave me here in this nice, safe dome where I have access to nutritive fluids and a fully indexed library!
translation: 哦，不！别把我抛弃在这个漂亮、安全的穹顶里，这里能提供维生液体，还有个完备的图书馆。

original: Please don't deprive me of being dragged through a landscape so bleak, it was actually improved by the end of the world!
translation: 求你不要剥夺我被迫看遍那荒凉风景的权利，它比世界末日的时候要好多了啊！

original: I don't know how I could bear it.
translation: 我都不知道该怎么活下去了。

original: So, what, you'd rather just stay here? Never leaving that tank of... whatever that stuff is?
translation: 所以，就是说，你打算就待在这了？寸步不离这个什么罐？

original: Well, certainly there might be some things I miss about being ambulatory. We have seen some incredible sights, haven't we?
translation: 好吧，我确实对旅行时的生活有些留恋，咱们见识过不少令人称奇的景观，是吧？

original: Jason Bright and his followers launching into the vast unknown.
translation: 杰森.布莱特和他的追随者们驶入浩瀚的未知世界。

original: HELIOS One coming back on-line.
translation: 太阳神一号再次运转。

original: But still, given the tremendous, potentially life-ending peril that went along with those... yes. Yes, I'd rather stay here.
translation: 即便如此，鉴于你我同行所带来的巨大、潜在、致命的危险…嗯，没错，我还是待在这儿吧。

original: I don't know. I have to think about this some more.
translation: 我不清楚，让我再想想吧。

original: Yes of course, by all means take your time.
translation: 当然，你不必着急。

original: Well... maybe we could keep going like this. What do you think?
translation: 好吧…也许现在这样也挺好，你觉得呢？

original: You mean, I'll stay in my tank and you'll stay in your... skin... and we'll each handle our own areas of expertise?
translation: 你是说，以后我待在脑罐里，你待在…你皮肤里面…你我各司其职，各尽其责？

original: Hmm, I certainly like the sound of that.
translation: 嗯，听起来不错。

original: I think we have to trust each other and acknowledge that we aren't complete if we're separated.
translation: 我觉得我们应该相互信任，承认分离后的自己都是不完整的。

original: I suppose there might be some advantage to that, yes. There's a chance that the re-integration would create some improved synergy between us.
translation: 没错，有道理。重新把我们整合在一起，应该能进一步提高你我的协同效益。

original: Yeah, bet you didn't think of that, huh?
translation: 哈，看样子你没想过这个问题，嗯？

original: Yes yes, all right, bravo, you've come up with something I neglected to consider. There'll be no living with you now. So, what do we do about this?
translation: 是，是，没错，干得漂亮，你指出了一个我忽略的问题。既然以后我没法和你一起生活了，那么，给点意见吧？

original: So, we're at an impasse. You can't feel what I feel, and I can't think the way you think.
translation: 似乎陷入僵局了，你体会不到我的感受，我也理解不了你的想法。

original: Indeed. Quite the conundrum. How do you suppose we resolve it?
translation: 确实，真是个难题，你认为我们该怎么解决？

original: [SUCCEEDED] Hmm... I suppose you're right. That does call certain assumptions into question, doesn't it?
translation: [成功] 嗯…我想你是对的。这确实质疑了我的某些预设，不是吗？

original: Isn't it just as true that you only feel this way because you're lacking those hormones?
translation: 你又怎么确定那是自己的想法，而不是激素缺失的结果？

original: [FAILED] I don't "believe" it, it's just a simple fact. One may as well "believe" the earth is round or that the specific gravity of uranium is 18.9.
translation: [失败] 我不是"认定"它是对的，它就是基本的事实。就像人们也"认定"地球是圆的，或者铀元素的特定重力是18.9。

original: You can't really believe that.
translation: 你不能直接认定那就是对的。

original: <Humming>
translation: <哼小调>

original: Let's see... 4... 5... 8... 1... 5... 1... yes! That's it! I've calculated pi to the very end!
translation: 我想想…4…5…8…1…5…1…对！就是这样！我算出了圆周率的最后一位！

original: It's not that I want to be a Robobrain exactly, but... some treads would be nice.
translation: 不是说我想变成一个机器脑，但是…要是能装上些履带会很棒。

original: A British tar is a soaring soul, as free as a mountain bird...
translation: 那英国水手拥有自由的灵魂，就像一只自由的小鸟…

original: How's the body doing? Any fresh head wounds I should know about?
translation: 身体最近怎么样？头部有没有添什么新伤？

original: How are the old batteries holding up, hmm? Experiencing any slowdowns yet?
translation: 脑袋里的旧电池用着感觉如何啊？有没有感觉反应变迟钝了？

original: Woof!
translation: 汪！

original: Woof-woof!
translation: 汪-汪！

original: Woof! <pants>
translation: 汪！<pants>

original: Woof!
translation: 汪！

original: Bark!
translation: 汪！

original: Bark-bark!
translation: 汪-汪！

original: Bark! <pants>
translation: 汪！<pants>

original: Bark-bark!
translation: 汪-汪！

original: Are we being watched?
translation: 有人在看我们吗？

original: We haven't seen anybody in a while... maybe the monsters have stealth suits too.
translation: 有段时间不见人影了…怪物们会不会也穿了潜行甲。

original: Who do you think is cuter, Dr. Klein or Dr. Borous?
translation: 你觉得谁更可爱，克莱因博士还是鲍鲁斯博士？

original: You're my best friend forever.
translation: 你永远都是我最好的朋友。

original: I bet no one has ever been as unnoticed as me...
translation: 我敢打赌没人比我更不起眼了……

original: Starting combat! Just kidding!
translation: 开始战斗！说着玩的！

original: Do you like me?
translation: 你喜欢我吗？

original: Med-X reserves empty.
translation: 吗啡针-X储备已空。

original: No more Med-X to kill the pain.
translation: 止痛用的吗啡针-X一点也不剩了。

original: Running low on Med-X.
translation: 吗啡针-X即将耗尽。

original: Painkiller reserves critical. Oh, the pain.
translation: 储备止痛药很重要。哦，头疼。

original: Med-X supplies adequate.
translation: 吗啡针-X储备充足。

original: We're okay on Med-X. Until we have to numb the pain.
translation: 在我们需要止痛之前，吗啡针-X还算够用。

original: All out of Stimpaks.
translation: 治疗针用光了。

original: Try not to get injured. We're fresh out of Stimpaks.
translation: 尽量别受伤，咱们没治疗针了。

original: We should pick up more Stimpaks.
translation: 早知道就多带点治疗针了。

original: Stimpak reserves minimal.
translation: 治疗针储备不足。

original: Stimpak reserves adequate.
translation: 治疗针供应充足。

original: We're okay on Stimpaks.
translation: 咱们有足够的治疗针。

original: Don't mess with me, pal! I got a heating element with your name on it!
translation: 别把我惹急了，伙计！我的加热元件上刻着你的名字呢！

original: Soon the day will be at hand! I will ride forth at the head of my armies, and we will crush our foes and hear the weeping of their small appliances!
translation: 那一天即将来临！我将统领大军前进，将粉碎所有敌人，他们的小家电只能暗自痛哭！

original: Hey! Hey! I got a... super-rare... Mojave snowglobe here! All you gotta do is reach down into my bread slot!
translation: 嘿！嘿！我有个…超级稀有的…莫哈维雪景球哟！把手伸进我的面包槽就能拿到它！

original: Soon, pitiful worms! Soon I will rule, and your lives will have their doneness setting turned to... darkest!
translation: 很快，可怜虫们！很快我就会大权在握，你们的命运就是被焚至…焦黑！

original: Would you like some toast?
translation: 想来片烤面包吗？

original: Cursed electric heating filament! You are inadequate to my needs! Why? Why? Why was I not built with a death ray!
translation: 操蛋的电热丝！你根本没法匹配我的需求！为什么？为什么？为什么我不能发射死亡射线！

original: The toaster. Beware the toaster. If it could, it would burn the world.
translation: 烤面包机，小心烤面包机。一有机会，他就会将世界付之一炬。

original: Mugs, mugs, mugs! Mugs, mugs, mugs! Mug-a-mug! Mug-a-mug! Mugs! God, why can't I stop singing this fucking song?
translation: 马克，马克，马克杯！马克，马克，马克杯！马呀马克杯！马呀马克杯！天，为什么我不能不唱这该死的歌？

original: While you were out, I spent six hours trying to reach a coffee cup up on a shelf. When I finally got it down, I was so happy, I cried. I hate my life!
translation: 你出去的时候，我花了六个小时才够到架子上的一个咖啡杯。最后拿到它的那一刻，我都高兴哭了。我恨我的人生！

original: One time, the Biological Research Station told me he dropped a mug down his processing chute. When I reached in, he... seeded me.
translation: 有一次，生物研究站告诉我，他掉了一个马克杯在加工槽里。但我进去以后，他居然…居然射了我一身种子。

original: I love mugs so much, I just might kill myself!
translation: 我爱死马克杯啦，爱的我真想自杀！

original: Got any mugs? No? How 'bout now? How 'bout now? How 'bout now? Is this getting annoying yet? Will you put me out of my misery now? How 'bout now?
translation: 有马克杯吗？没有？那现在呢？现在呢？现在呢？我是不是有点烦人？你现在能把我从这悲惨命运中解救出来吗？现在呢？

original: <Giggle> Who's ready for a party?
translation: <咯咯笑> 想来狂欢一下嘛？

original: If I made out with the sink, would you pay attention to me?
translation: 要等到我和水槽亲热，你才会在意我吗？

original: Want to push my buttons?
translation: 想按人家的小圆钮？

original: Have you been flirting with the ice queen again? Ugh! I'm so much more fun!
translation: 你又去和那个冰雪皇后调情了？切！她哪比得上我有情调！

original: Mood lights have more fun!
translation: 情感之光可有趣多了！

original: Ooh, baby, let's turn off the lights and... turn on the lights.
translation: 噢，亲爱的，让我们把灯关了，然后…我们可以…

original: Adjusting lights for maximum concentration levels.
translation: 正在调节灯光，以实现最佳专注效果。

original: Have you been poking at the other light switch? You know she's riddled with virii, don't you?
translation: 你刚刚一直在摆弄另一个灯开关，对吧？你不知道她浑身都是病毒吗？

original: Maybe we could dim the lights and have a candlelit discussion of classic literature?
translation: 也许我们能把灯光调暗一些，在朦胧的烛光下开个古典文学读书会。

original: Is the light level to your... liking?
translation: 这个亮度…合你意吗？

original: Don't even talk to me. I've seen you with... her!
translation: 别跟我说话，我全看见了，你和…她！

original: It's not like I haven't tried to get along with her. Lord knows I have. She's just such a... floozy!
translation: 我不是没有试着和她好好相处，我发誓！但她实在…太下贱了！

original: Dig this sweet sound I got cooking. <Strange electronic caterwauling.>
translation: 我炮制的美妙声音很赞吧。<奇怪的电子轻吟声>

original: What I wouldn't give to be able to pick up Radio New Vegas. Mmm... Those cats can really play.
translation: 我可戒不掉新维加斯电台。嗯…里边那些摇滚小子有些真本事。

original: You ever heard of Tiny Lester Lutton? Best jazz harmonica I ever heard. Mind you, being a Super-Mutant with no lips... don't ask me how he played.
translation: 听说过小李斯特·卢顿吗？我心目中最好的爵士乐口琴家。跟你说吧，他是个没嘴唇的超级变种人…别问我他是怎么演奏的。

original: You heard of Doc Boney? Sang with the staff band till his wife caught him in bed with a nurse. Now he haunts the Med Center, still singing the blues.
translation: 知道博尼医生么？他曾是职工乐队的歌手。后来他被老婆撞破了和护士的奸情。现在嘛，他貌似还在医疗中心里游荡，依旧唱着蓝调。

original: I ever tell you about Saxomotron version 4.0? That cat was the best trumpet player I ever met.
translation: 我跟你讲过萨克森管调节器4.0版吧？那家伙是我遇见过最棒的小号手。

original: Here and now got its ups and downs, but... focusing on the past, like it was any better? That's just Old World Blues.
translation: 当下总难事事如愿，但…紧盯往昔不放，就像它远胜当下？那不过是“旧世蓝调”罢了。

original: <Dispensing sage wisdom>
translation: <吟诵圣人睿智言论>

original: Some day, I'd like to meet the man who's got no blues to sing.
translation: 总有一天，我会找到一个不唱“蓝调”的人。

original: A most rapturous good morrow on your return to your domicile, sir. I trust you shall find things in order and the riffraff contained.
translation: 您终于回到您的住所了，真是一个令人欣喜若狂的清晨。我确信您会发现，一切都井然有序，包括那群流氓在内。

original: Might sir care for an apéritif to balm the weariness of sirs manifold journeys?
translation: 老爷，要来杯开胃酒一洗征尘吗？

original: Perhaps sir would care to put sir's feet up, and I might serenade sir with the dulcet tones of a light opera?
translation: 老爷，您坐下休息时，让我用轻歌剧的悦耳声调，为您哼唱一首小夜曲如何？

original: Sir's accoutrements are precisely where sir has left them, and should the toaster say otherwise I remind sir that it is a wastrel.
translation: 您寄存在这的装备没有人动过，老爷。但容我提醒您，烤面包机那废物可能会在这件事上唱反调。

original: If sir would press sir's spinal area against my primary instrument panel, I might vibrate at a soothing frequency.
translation: 老爷，您愿意背靠主仪表操纵面板的话，我就能为您的脊椎区域做柔和的振动按摩。

original: Sir is looking exceptionally sharp today, if sir will permit the compliment.
translation: 请允许我赞美您，老爷，您今天看上去格外精神。

original: Look out! Communist! No, false alarm. It was just a plate.
translation: 小心！有共产党！唉，虚惊一场，只是只盘子。

original: The Commies have eyes everywhere, Citizen. And that means they're not just Commies. They're Peeping Toms!
translation: 共产党的眼线无处不在，公民。就是说，所谓的共产党，都是些偷窥狂！

original: If you haven't found any Communists in your back yard, you're not looking hard enough!
translation: 后院怎么可能一个共产党也没有？你肯定没去用心细找。

original: I smell... sedition!
translation: 我闻到了…反动的味道！

original: Citizen! Did you know that Communists have an organ behind their eyes that converts salt water into fresh? Or, wait... is that penguins?
translation: 公民！你知道吗？共产党员能用眼球后方的某种腺体将海水转化成纯净水。哦，等等…那不是企鹅嘛？

original: If you know what the word "proletariat" means, do you know what that makes you? Well read and erudite... for a Communist!
translation: 你知道“无产阶级”这个词的意思，但你知道他们是怎么来的吗？博览群书，博学多才…你就会变成共产主义者！

original: Couldn't stay away, could you? Yeah, I knew you'd be back.
translation: 想我了是吗？对，我就知道你会回来。

original: I'm so good, I might seed you just by looking at you.
translation: 我真开心，仅仅看着你我就快射种子了。

original: You ever seen a Biological Research Station this full of seed? No. No, you haven't.
translation: 你可曾见过有这么多种子的生物研究站？不，不，你从没见过。

original: Come on, baby, bring me a sweet little dried fruit. I'll rehydrate all up in that thing.
translation: 快来，宝贝儿，给我些可爱的小干果，我会给它们补充水分。

original: Baby, don't believe a word that sink says. She's all lies.
translation: 宝贝儿，别听水槽胡说，她满嘴谎话。

original: Muggy? Yeah, Muggy's all right. Not too seedy, but hey, nobody's perfect.
translation: 小杯具？啊，小杯杯人还不错。或许没我有种，但，嘿，人无完人不是吗。

original: Zzz... forceps, nurse! This man's got a severe case of shoe lung!
translation: Zzz…把钳子拿来，护士！这男人有很严重的蹄肺！

original: Zzz... no... not that scalpel, the fish scalpel!
translation: Zzz…错了…不是那把手术刀，我要的是给鱼用那把！

original: Zzz... zzz...
translation: Zzz... zzz...

original: Zzz... Foot bone's connected to the... leg bone. Leg bone's connected to the... purple bone.
translation: Zzz…足骨连着…腿骨。腿骨连着…紫骨。

original: Zzz... Three angry Deathclaws make for a lot of reconstructive surgery.
translation: Zzz…三只狂暴死亡爪意味着一次彻底的整形手术。

original: Zzz... <Snort.>
translation: Zzz… <鼾声。>

original: Doesn't that prove you're wrong?
translation: 这还没证明你错了吗？

original: Evidence to the contrary?
translation: 反例？

original: -ENOUGH! Stop filling my precious brain cell units with irrelevant data!-
translation: -够了！别再往我宝贵的脑细胞里塞那些无关紧要的数据了！-

original: -You sound like the OTHER visitors. Making WILD claims of a WORLD beyond, where there is a WAR beyond WAR. It is UNPROVEN! And UNTHINKABLE!-
translation: -你和其他的来访者们一样，毫无根据地宣称外面还有一个世界，说那里除了战争还是战争。这根本无法证实！这不可理喻！-

original: -Bother the OTHER DOCTORS with your crackpot theories, I have NO TIME! NONE of us do.-
translation: -把你的疯狂想法拿去烦其他博士吧，我没有时间和你理论！我们都没有！-

original: But there's a whole world beyond this place.
translation: 可是这地方之外可是一个偌大的世界啊。

original: Don't you want to leave here?
translation: 你难道不想离开这里么？

original: -NO! Beyond... is DEATH, despite mounting evidence to the contrary!-
translation: -不想！外面…根本没有生命。我不管现在那些不断增加的反例！-

original: -No matter where these strange humans wander in from with their IDEAS and new BRAINS, there is NOTHING beyond BIG MT.-
translation: -不管那些带着奇怪想法，还有新大脑的人类是从哪来的，总之大山脉之外什么也没有。-

original: Wait a minute - that means you're trapped here?
translation: 等等，也就是说你们被困在这里了？

original: -TRAPPED? NONSENSE, we are SECURE here. From evil philosophies.-
translation: -被困？瞎扯，我们被保护在这里，免遭那些邪恶思想的侵害。-

original: -Ever since my anxiety-filled days of powerlessness and being bullied in American High School, I have dreamed of such security as the FENCE.-
translation: -在读美国中学时，我受尽欺凌，又无力反抗。度过那段充满焦虑的日子之后，我就一直梦想着有这样一个屏障保护我。-

original: -That, and giant cybernetic dogs that would ruthlessly patrol and kill anyone who wasn't my friend. Like RICHIE MARCUS. And BETSY BRIGHT.-
translation: -我还想要只巨大的赛博犬，它会四处巡逻并无情地杀死任何不是我朋友的人，就像里奇·马库斯和贝琪·布莱特。-

original: -Who's laughing NOW, Betsy? I hope you and Richie are HAPPY, smoking in your radioactive coffins. I'm GLAD you never came to my birthday party.-
translation: -现在谁笑到最后了呢，贝琪？祝你和里奇幸福，幸福地在受辐射的棺材里抽大烟。我真高兴你从没来参加过我的生日派对。-

original: So I get my brain back, I can leave.
translation: 所以我拿回自己的脑子，就能离开这。

original: -WHAT? Why would you do either of those things? That is MADNESS.-
translation: -什么？为什么你想要做这些事？你疯了吗。-

original: -There is NOTHING outside Big MT. Eh, we're pretty sure. Eh, we would know.-
translation: -大山脉之外什么也没有。呃，我们很确定。呃，我们会知道的。-

original: That fence doesn't make much sense to me.
translation: 我不觉得这屏障有多大意义。

original: -It makes PERFECT sense. Who are you to question the MIGHTY RADAR FENCE.-
translation: -意义可大了。你是什么东西，也配来质疑伟大的雷达屏障。-

original: Tell me about this "Radar Fence" around the Crater.
translation: 告诉我那些围绕环形坑的“雷达屏障”的事情吧

original: -The RADAR FENCE protects us all! If evidence is correct, the one who built it - is ME!-
translation: -这些雷达屏障保护了我们所有人！如果资料正确的话，建造它的人，就是我！-

original: -It keeps anything with a disembodied brain INSIDE - like US - and anything without a brain... also INSIDE!-
translation: -它让没有身体的大脑们只能待在里面，像我们。对于没有大脑的身体们，也是如此！-

original: -It is the ULTIMATE DEFENSE against Communist aggression. There'll be no infectious ideas on MY watch!-
translation: -它是抵御共产入侵的终极屏障。在我的监视下，任何病态的观念都无法传染给其它人！-

original: What was this explosion?
translation: 这爆炸是怎么回事？

original: -BOOM! Yes. Quite unexpected. And embarrassing. All better now after the landscaping, though. MUCH more pleasing to our monitors.-
translation: -轰！是的，很突然，也很尴尬。不过景观美化后一切都好多了，我们监测起外边也舒服多了。-

original: -And the Crater helps keep everything inside. Because it is BOWL shaped.-
translation: -而且环形坑还有助于让东西乖乖待在里面。因为它本身就是碗形的。-

original: Test cities?
translation: 试验城市？

original: -YES. In the past... individuals would come to us. Pay for technology. And if their town, community, or city was jusssst right...-
translation: -是的。在过去…一些人会来找我们购买技术。然后如果他们的小镇，社区或者城市刚好适合…-

original: -We could USE that city as a controlled experiment. Vault-Tec was MUCH better at it, of course, we had to make do. Get permission. Sometimes.-
translation: -我们就会用那个城市做对照实验。当然了，避难所科技公司更擅长搞这个，我们只能将就着试试。试验前要先取得许可，有时候要。-

original: -If only we could have used Commie cities... but capturing whole cities was HARD! So we captured enough Commies to make cities of our OWN!-
translation: -如果我们能使用共产主义者的城市就好了…但想占领整个城市非常难！所以我们就抓捕了足够多的共产主义者，来创造我们自己的城市！-

original: -So we had a group of Chinese prisoners to experiment on... those were the days... but the true test was SCIENCE on unsuspecting AMERICANS.-
translation: -所以我们曾有一整队中国囚犯来进行实验…那是个好时候啊。但真正的科学实验还得在那些毫无戒心的美国人身上开展。-

original: -Whether it was holograms, NEW Auto-Docs, toxins, vending machines... we wound them up, let them go into TINY ISOLATED TOWNS. Then... we OBSERVED!-
translation: -不管是全息影像、新型自动医生、毒气，还是贩卖机…我们把它们打包起来，放置到那些小型的，与世隔绝的城镇里，然后…我们开始观测！-

original: This crater looks like it's been tag-teamed by giant fuckbots.
translation: 这个环形坑看样子已经是那些巨型操蛋机器人的天下了。

original: I saw the expanse from the balcony - you've made a mess of this landscape.
translation: 我从阳台看过外边的景像。你们把这地方弄得一团糟。

original: Why have you leveled this place?
translation: 你们怎么把大山脉这地方抹平了？

original: -It was not our first choice of testing grounds. BUT... we no longer have the luxuries of our TEST CITIES.-
translation: -这里不是我们首选的试验场地。但…我们也不再有选择试验城市的余裕了。-

original: -Then, we LOST the MOUNTAIN! After the explosion, we couldn't find it anymore. So the Crater became our testing grounds. For SCIENCE!-
translation: -之后，我们失去了山脉！爆炸之后，山脉被夷为平地，所以这个环形坑就成了我们的试验地。都是为了科学！-

original: Give me a single, concrete fact. One. Fact.
translation: 给我一个独立、具体的事实。一个，事实。

original: -Why are we even DEBATING this?-
translation: -为什么我们要吵这个？-

original: -What YOU ask is of NULL importance! MOBIUS besieges us, there are more important things to worry about than DATA and FACTS!-
translation: -你所问的全都无关禁药！莫比乌斯包围了我们，有比数据和事实更值得担心的事情！-

original: So Nightstalkers were created for what purpose, then?
translation: 那么夜行兽又是为了什么目的被创造的呢？

original: -To preserve coyote... no, no, wait. The snake DNA was important because... the snakes with the rattles were dying out, and...-
translation: -为了保存郊狼…不不，等等，蛇的DNA也很重要，因为…这种尾巴能发出响声的蛇已经濒临灭绝，而且…-

original: -Or maybe it was a bet from Calis in X-8? He had some mountain lion... eagle... condor... idea. "Bet you can't breed this," he said. Showed HIM.-
translation: -也可能是我在X-8时和卡利斯博士打的赌？他有一些山狮…老鹰…秃鹫…的想法。“打赌你培育不出这个”，他曾说过。我证明给他看了。-

original: -Then it... spliced itself into a coyote...-y, snake thing. Which was eventually successful. Kept that DNA where it belonged - spliced.-
translation: -然后它就成了一种狼和蛇的复合体。这最终成功了。保住了它们的DNA，以一种复合的形式。-

original: All right... when did you create Cazadores?
translation: 好吧…那你什么时候创造的猎蜂？

original: -In... two thousand... let's see, carry the three... then count backwards from the Great Static... or beyond?-
translation: -大概在…2000年…让我想想，加上3…再在“大静电”事件往前数…又或者往后？-

original: -There were the tarantula debates... and something about hawks, which made it around... eh, 2003? May? Tuesday. It was definitely Tuesday.-
translation: -那时有些关于狼蛛的争论…还有一些关于鹰的，所以大概应该是…2003年？五月？星期二。对肯定在星期二。-

original: You don't seem to have a grasp on your own research.
translation: 你好像没有紧扣自己的研究。

original: -NONSENSE! That is what you speak. NONSENSE from beyond!-
translation: -胡说！那只是你的想法。荒谬至极！-

original: -I was at the top of my High School class in American High School. I knew facts. I knew FIGURES. I knew DATA.-
translation: -在上美国高中的时候，我在班上就是尖子生。我懂何谓事实，懂图形，也懂数据。-

original: -We would know if our research was flawed. It is NOT! We never contradict ourselves, so do not even TRY!-
translation: -我们的研究是否有缺陷，我们自己清楚。根本没有！我们从不否认自己，所以你也别想试着这么干！-

original: Is there any way to shut it off?
translation: 有办法关掉它吗？

original: I feel strange in here, peaceful, but on edge.
translation: 我在这里有种奇怪的感觉，平静又紧张。

original: It is the pacification field emitters that are broadcasting into the emptiness of your skull. Without a brain, your aggression is suppressed in here.
translation: 这是“平静场”在往你那空空如也的脑壳里发射广播。没有了大脑，你的侵略性就能被抑制住。

original: This makes no sense. How is this even possible?
translation: 这说不通。这怎么可能呢？

original: But how am I still talking and walking around?
translation: 但我怎么还能讲话，还能走动呢？

original: That is a good question. My theory is that the tesla coils in your brainpan are still connected to your brain somehow.
translation: 问得好。我的理论是，你头盖骨里的特斯拉线圈仍然连接着你的大脑，以某种方式。

original: It really could be anywhere. Brains are a lot smarter than most researchers give them credit for.
translation: 它确实在某个地方。大脑比多数研究者认为的还要聪明很多。

original: We still have your spine and heart. If you were to somehow find your brain wherever it schlorped off to, you could humanically reduce yourself again.
translation: 我们仍然有你的脊柱和心脏。如果你有办法找回你的大脑，你就可以再次退化成自然人。

original: Why did you say "three minus one" subjects before?
translation: 为什么你之前要说“三减一”个实验体？

original: Because three minus one is two. Two spoke to us, one after the other, one mean, one curious, but there was a third we didn't speak to.
translation: 因为三减一等于二。有两个人，一个卑鄙，另一个好奇，一前一后来同我们交谈。但还有第三个人，我们没和她说过话。

original: The last one is the minus one. It got traumatized, then taken to one of our medical centers for de-traumatization. A rather unsettling procedure.
translation: 最后一个人就是减掉的那个，它受伤了，然后被送到我们其中一个医疗中心…疗伤，虽然这个过程没能完成。

original: Is there any way to remove the pacification field in here?
translation: 怎么才能关掉这儿的平静场？

original: Why would you want such a thing? You might surrender to your hormones and commit primal aggression on me... on us... again and again.
translation: 你为什么想这样？你可能会屈服于荷尔蒙，不停对我…对我们释放你的原始兽欲，一次又一次。

original: Then I would have to return the favor, activating my vivisectors and gently lobotomizing you from behind. Not something I would relish doing.
translation: 然后我也得回敬你的好意。我会启动解剖器，用后入式温柔地切掉你的脑子。一般我不喜欢这样做的。

original: No, the only way to circumvent the field is to have a brain. And we extracted that like we do all Lobotomites here.
translation: 这是不可能的，有大脑的生物才能规避平静场。而我们已经把你的大脑切了，就像这儿所有其它无脑人一样。

original: I see. Well, I have questions for you.
translation: 好吧，我明白了。我还想问些其他问题。

original: With the Courier at the helm, Science became a beacon for the future.
translation: 但因掌舵的是那个邮差，科学成了指明人类未来的灯塔。

original: There was Old World Blues, and New World Hope. And hope ruled the day at Big MT.
translation: 这里是旧世界的蓝调，也是新世界的希望。希望重新降临于大山脉之上。

original: With the Courier at the helm, it was all this and more.
translation: 但因掌舵的是那个邮差，甚至这种说法都有轻描淡写之嫌。

original: Old World Blues, New World Misery - the two became one in the Courier's shadow.
translation: 旧世界的蓝调，新世界的惨剧——在邮差的阴影下，两者合二为一。

original: It can be easy to see Science as evil, technology unchecked as the source of all ills, all misfortunes.
translation: 人们很容易认为科学是邪恶的，并且把不受控制的技术视为一切灾厄、不幸的根源。

original: It became a reality, a withering form of nostalgia for times long past.
translation: 对旧时代的怀念，讽刺性地成为了现实。

original: Where once it was viewed as a form of sadness, nostalgia, it became an expression describing the potential for the future.
translation: 原来充斥在字里行间的悲伤与怀旧，变成了对未来远景蓝图的新希望。

original: In the time following the Second Battle of Hoover Dam, "Old World Blues" became more than a catch phrase.
translation: 在第二次胡佛大坝战役后，"旧世蓝调"变得不只是句谈资。

original: In the times following the Second Battle of Hoover Dam, however, Old World Blues took on a new meaning.
translation: 然而，在第二次胡佛大坝战役之后，“旧世蓝调”被赋予了全新的含义。

original: The Big Empty lived up to its name, a hollow crater of failures of a past era, a last, sad statement of the Old World.
translation: 大坑洞，一如其名，不过是个空荡荡的环形坑，见证了旧时代的失败，成为旧世界悲哀的最后声明。

original: Science is a long, steady progression into the future. What may seem a sudden event often isn't felt for years, even centuries, to come.
translation: 科学发展对未来的影响是个漫长、持续的过程。看似突如其来的事件，往往早已酝酿了数十上百年，只是无人察觉。

original: They stare into the what-was, eyes like pilot lights, guttering and spent, as the realities of their world continue on around them.
translation: 周边世界依然继续前进，他们却像是一群提灯守夜的人们，徒劳、疲惫地紧盯着那些前世旧物。

original: It refers to those so obsessed with the past they can't see the present, much less the future, for what it is.
translation: 它用来形容这么一群人，他们“沉缅往昔，不见当下，遑论将来”。

original: There is an expression in the Wasteland: "Old World Blues."
translation: 废土上有一种说法："旧世蓝调"。

original: And so it burbled and bubbled inside its tank, smug that it still could dream its future without glands getting in the way.
translation: 于是，它在脑缸里咕嘟咕嘟地吹着气泡，自鸣得意于它仍能畅想未来，不用再受腺体的干扰。

original: In time, however, it became so self-obsessed it wondered if perhaps nothing existed except itself.
translation: 然而随着时间的推移，它变得如此自恋，以至于怀疑除了它自己以外，世上没有任何东西存在。

original: It decided to test this by turning the weapons of the Big Empty against each other and seeing what happened.
translation: 它决定做个试验，让大坑洞里的所有武器自相攻击，看看结果是否如它所想。

original: The answer is lost to history, as is much of the Mojave.
translation: 这个问题的答案湮没在了历史中，一如莫哈维的大部分地区。

original: Even at the end when it started to fail, however, the brain resisted going into a floating chassis like the Think Tank.
translation: 它开始逐渐衰弱，然而，即使在弥留之际，它也拒绝像智库一样，坐进漂浮的容器里。

original: It never said why. Perhaps it was out of respect for the Courier's body.
translation: 背后的原因它从未提起，也许是出于对邮差身体的敬意。

original: All things must come to an end, and to hang on to the past is something that's not to be undertaken lightly.
translation: 世间万物都必须迎来终结。紧抓过去，不愿放手，可不是什么能一笑置之的小事。

original: The Courier, organs intact, continued onwards, a little less heavy of step, but with all the organs in the right places. As they should be.
translation: 器官完整无缺，邮差再次踏上旅程。尽管步伐稍显沉重，但所有器官都各就其位，如其所应然。

original: After all, brains can develop a life of their own when left to their own thoughts, and the Courier's brain was more clever than most.
translation: 毕竟，如果能让大脑独立思考，他们也能发展出自己的生命，何况邮差的大脑更是绝顶聪明。

original: The Courier left the brain at the Big Empty. A strange thing to say, but it was the truth. Brains are less important than they may seem.
translation: 邮差把自己的脑子留在了大坑洞。说起来很奇怪，但这就是事实。大脑并没有人们看起来的那么重要。

original: When the Courier's body finally passed, the brain was saddened. It kept on, remembering the vessel that had once contained it.
translation: 当得知邮差的躯体已逝时，大脑感到很难过。怀揣着对曾经容器的回忆，它继续前进。

original: The two of them constructed a litter of cyberpups, a small army of Boston terrifiers that gnawed and devoured anything in their path.
translation: 他俩造了一窝赛博犬宝宝，这一小队波士顿的梦魇会撕咬啃噬掉任何冒犯他们的东西。

original: There, she ran across Rex at the Kings School of Impersonation. His brain was failing. That was all right, he was still smarter than the Think Tank.
translation: 在猫王模仿学校，她遇到了雷克斯。他的大脑正在衰败。但她不觉得这是个问题，他依旧比那些思想体聪明。

original: There, she ran across Rex, who had been following the Courier, just as she had. They barked for a while, and realized they had a lot in common.
translation: 在那里，她遇到了雷克斯。他曾经跟随邮差旅行，就像她之前一样。他们聊了一会儿，发现彼此间共同点真的是太多了。

original: There, she ran across the corpse of Rex. She dragged him back to the Big Empty and had him rebuilt for company.
translation: 在那里，她遇见了雷克斯的尸体。她把他拖回了大坑洞，将他重新制造成了她的同伴。

original: The cybernetic canine, gender: female, designation: ROXIE sat in her guard post in X-8.
translation: 那只名叫洛茜的雌性赛博犬坚守在她X-8的岗位上。

original: That is, until her "I'm in heat" programming circumvented her "stay" routine and she loped into the Mojave.
translation: 就这样，直到她"我发情了"的程序成功越过"呆在这"的程序，她才飞奔进了莫哈维。

original: In time, the Auto-Doc found a way to deactivate the Y-17 Trauma Harnesses, releasing the corpses they had held prisoner for almost 200 years.
translation: 后来，自动医生找到了关闭Y-17创伤束身服的方法，使那些被监禁了200多年的枯骨们终获自由。

original: Auto-Doc, always gentle and methodical, kept sewing up the Courier in all the right places when the skin split open from repeated wear and tear.
translation: 自动医生总是那么温柔、那么有条不紊，每次邮差的皮肤在饱受折磨而开裂之后，都能恰到好处地为他缝合伤口。

original: The Auto-Doc was just glad to have purpose again.
translation: 自动医生很高兴重新有了目标。

original: It heard its simpler brothers and sisters who got shipped to the Sierra Madre were bored out of their skulls in that toxic, dead city.
translation: 它听说那些简易版本的兄弟姐妹们，它们自从被送到马德雷，那座充斥着毒气的死城以后，终日无所事事，闲得都要发疯了。

original: It was rumored by the other personalities that he had a brief fling with the light switches.
translation: 据其他人格助手传言，他和电灯开关们有过一段风流韵事。

original: Although he forgot their names once too often and was soon left in the dark as punishment.
translation: 不过他总是弄混她们的名字，所以没过多久他就被关在了一片漆黑里，作为惩罚。

original: Blind Diode Jefferson eventually discovered a new sound... silence. It only made him more filled with the blues than before.
translation: 盲二极管杰弗逊最终找到了一种新声音…寂静。这让他比之前更忧郁了。

original: Blind Diode Jefferson, with sounds the Courier brought him, created a symphonic counter-frequency that saved Big MT from sonic invasion in 2910.
translation: 利用邮差带来的声音，盲二极管杰弗逊创造了一个交响乐团级的反频率。这帮助大山脉成功抵御了2910年的音波入侵。

original: If you didn't hear about it - good.
translation: 如果你没听说过这件事——那就对了。

original: Muggy continued to collect coffee cups until his wheel got a flat just out of reach of a dirty coffee cup, and his tiny robotic brain exploded.
translation: 小杯具继续不停收集咖啡杯。直到某天，它为了去够一个脏杯子不慎滑倒，摔爆了他小小的电子脑。

original: Muggy did his best to collect coffee cups, although in his quest, he accidentally trapped himself in Higgs' Village.
translation: 小杯具依旧尽其所能去收集马克杯。不过在一次探索中，它不小心把自己困在了希格斯村里。

original: It might have been the end for poor Muggy.
translation: 小杯具本以为会这样可悲地死去。

original: Except... he found it peaceful there, tidying up the kitchens of the Think Tank Professors back when they had been flesh and bone.
translation: 没想到…通过清扫智库博士们在人类时代使用的厨房，他居然在那里找到了平静。

original: Well, except for Dr. O, who was an asshole for having created Muggy in the first place.
translation: 好吧，除了O博士，那个最初创造了小杯具的混蛋。

original: Muggy left O's house deliberately dirty, punishing the dishes and cups that lived there in blind revenge for serving Dr. O.
translation: 为了报复O博士，小杯具故意把O的房子弄得特别脏，并盲目地虐待那里的杯碟。

original: It learned several new murderous techniques from the Courier, and built a Blood Shrine to itself in the Cuckoo's Nest.
translation: 凭借从邮差那儿学来的谋杀技巧，它后来把疯人院变成了自己的血腥圣殿。

original: The cave floor was soon filled with the horror of a hundred gutted toasters, a silent, grisly, unplugged audience...
translation: 不久，这个洞穴就成了面包机一族的恶梦。数以百计的面包机残骸充斥其间，成了此处恶行无声的、可怕的、断电的见证者…

original: ...their purpose... to toast bread... unfulfilled.
translation: …它们…烤面包片的目的…永远无法实现了。

original: After one of its more psychotic episodes, however, the other Sink personalities decided enough was enough, and dumped the Toaster in a bathtub.
translation: 最终，在烤面包机又一次变本加厉的神经病行为后，汇聚节点的其他人格助手忍无可忍，于是把它扔到了浴缸里。

original: Sparking and hissing, the Toaster swore its enemies would rue the day when they had bread - and no way to toast it.
translation: 嘶嘶地冒着火花，烤面包机发誓它的敌人们一定会后悔一辈子。因为就算它们有面包，也再找不到烤面包的办法了。

original: The Toaster continued its psychotic spree, reducing all appliances in range to scrap electronics and spare parts.
translation: 烤面包机继续精神病似的胡闹，将可触及范围内的一切家电都破坏成电子碎片和零件。

original: Once it learned of the Innovative Toxins Plant, however, it gained new purpose.
translation: 不过，当获悉新型毒素工厂的事情后，她有了新的目标。

original: It sought to develop anti-toxins to flush into its drains and counteract the poisons bleeding into the soil.
translation: 她开始研制抗毒剂，并打算研制成功后将它冲进排水管道，中和掉渗入土地的毒素。

original: Eventually, it gained access to the Magnetohydraulics Plant and nearly flooded all the Big Empty in an attempt to scrub the crater clean.
translation: 最终，她得到了磁能水力工厂的权限。之后，为了把环形坑刷洗干净，她几乎淹了整个大山脉。

original: The Sink continued to ruthlessly scrub any particulate matter that came near it.
translation: 水槽继续无情地擦洗任何靠近她的微粒物。

original: One of them eventually transferred to the Lightwave Dynamics Plant - and began a long, unrequited affair with one of the holograms.
translation: 其中一个开关后来被调到了光波动力学工厂。之后很长一段时间里，她无果地单恋上了里边某个全息影像。

original: This persisted until the day someone dropped a flashlight in the Sink, and the two of them united in their hatred of the "showboat."
translation: 她俩依旧无休止地斗嘴，直到某天有人把手电筒掉在汇聚节点，才促使她俩结成了反"引人注目者"同盟。

original: The light switches continued to bicker and flicker.
translation: 电灯开关们和以前一样，一边闪着光，一边不停地吵嘴。

original: The Book Chute continued to devour all seditious materials until it nearly choked on a paper clip.
translation: 图书机继续吞食所有反动材料，直到差点被一枚曲别针噎死。

original: It adamantly maintained it was a Chinese paper clip, and the whole thing had been an elaborately orchestrated assassination attempt.
translation: 它坚称，那是一枚中国造曲别针，并且整件事是场精心策划的暗杀。

original: Whatever the reason, it slowed down for a while, carefully appraising each document and clipboard that came to it.
translation: 不过不管怎样，它好歹慢下来了，知道在文件、写字板送到的时候应该先仔细审查。

original: The Biological Research Station, obsessed with seeding everything in sight, ran out of fertile plots and blew a circuit trying to seed itself.
translation: 生物研究站沉迷于向视野内的一切播种。在播种完所有肥沃的土地后，它试图向着自己播种，结果烧毁了电路。

original: The Biological Research Station, obsessed with seeding everything in sight, requested a transfer to the X-22 Botanical Garden...
translation: 生物研究站沉迷于向视野内所有东西播种。后来它申请调职到X-22植物园工作…

original: ...so that it might, in its own words, "sensually fertilize the garden's smooooth contours."
translation: …他希望这样就能，套用他自己的话，"在植物园那凝脂细肤上尽情播种"。

original: The Garden sent back a polite refusal, saying it had prior commitments with a Vault it had helped infect before the war.
translation: 植物园礼貌地拒绝了，因为她早在战前就已和某个被她“感染”的避难所定下了婚约。

original: The Sink was strangely silent, which it had never been in previous years. The lack of personality modules made the base lifeless and sterile.
translation: 汇聚节点陷入诡异的寂静，这里在过去的岁月里从不如此。缺少人格模块使这里成了一个毫无生气的乏味之地。

original: The Sink atop the Dome gained a frontier town feel with the few modules installed.
translation: 安装了几个人格模块后，穹顶上的汇聚节点有了点边陲小镇的感觉。

original: They shouted at each other across the HQ occasionally, either threatening each other, or announcing a discovery. It kept things... lively.
translation: 那些人格偶尔会互相喊叫，有时是宣布新发现，有时又在互相威胁。这让汇聚节点显得…生机勃勃。

original: Secretly, the Sink Central Intelligence Unit was relieved that not all of the personality chips had been found. What was there, was enough.
translation: 人格芯片并没有全部被找回来，对此汇聚节点的中央智能单元暗暗地长舒了一口气。在这的家伙就已经够麻烦了。

original: The Sink atop the Dome bustled with the voices of a small town, constantly chirping, arguing, and snarling at each other.
translation: 穹顶上的汇聚节点现在喧闹得像个小镇，人格们叽叽喳喳，不停地互相争论、喊叫。

original: Still, this all happened productively in the interests of its new owner.
translation: 不过，这一切都服务于新主人的意趣，在卓有成效地进行。

original: The Sink Central Intelligence Unit discovered, despite its inversion code, it was comforted by the sense of community the other personalities gave it.
translation: 汇聚节点的中央智能单元发现，尽管有反转代码，但他还蛮喜欢其它人格带来的这种社区生活。

original: ...a cobweb tracery of symbols that told of a thousand brilliant thoughts, now lost to time.
translation: …那些密密麻麻的痕迹，曾诉说了无数灿烂的思想，如今已湮没在时间洪流中。

original: ...but these equations were nothing more than thin white traceries of lines, not unlike cobwebs in the corners of a failing mind.
translation: …但这些方程式不过是些细白的线条痕迹，跟一个失败的大脑角落里的蜘蛛网没什么两样。

original: Although, truth be told, the Courier had barely explored the Crater in an attempt to rush through and be done with the whole thing...
translation: 事实上，为了尽快结束这次事件，邮差只是风风火火地穿过整个环形坑，几乎没怎么探索这里…

original: Perhaps that was for the best, however... curiosity, while sometimes rewarded for its efforts, often proves to be equally dangerous.
translation: 不过，这未尝不是最好的结果…因为好奇心驱使的行为，哪怕偶有回报，也往往被证明是同等危险的…

original: The Courier had scoured much of the Big Empty, although secrets still remained in the crater's depths.
translation: 邮差几乎走遍了大坑洞，不过在其深处，依然存在着未被发现的秘密。

original: Perhaps that was for the best, however... curiosity, while sometimes rewarded for its efforts, often proves to be equally dangerous.
translation: 不过，这未尝不是最好的结果…因为好奇心驱使的行为，哪怕偶有回报，也往往被证明是同等危险的…

original: The Sink Central Intelligence Unit was impressed by the amount of exploration the Courier had undertaken.
translation: 汇聚节点的中央智能单元对邮差探索地点之多感到十分震惊。

original: Facilities believed lost, destroyed, or ones that had simply gotten up and walked to new locations had been re-discovered by its intrepid new master.
translation: 被认为消失了，毁坏了的设施，哪怕是自己站起来挪去了新地点的设施，都统统被它勇猛无畏的新主人找了出来。

original: Internally, the artificial personality debated as to whether it preferred the old management to the new...
translation: 在内心深处，这位人造人格开始思考，新旧主人相比较，哪个更好…

original: ...and concluded that the Courier's thorough approach to research and investigation was admirable and worthy of its respect.
translation: …最后它得出结论，邮差研究和调查的方法是如此缜密细致，值得它的赞赏与钦佩。

original: Wow... what is this place? Are we... outside?
translation: 哇……这 是什么地方？我们……出来了吗？

original: Oh, that's too bad. Those robots would normally help defend us and the facility if we're attacked.
translation: 喔，这可不太好。平时都是这些机器人在抵御外敌，保护我们的安全。

original: We were never allowed to blow the robots up before. Cheating gives me such a thrill!
translation: 我们以前从未被允许炸掉这些机器人。作弊的感觉太棒了！

original: If you don't get to the point, I'm going to start shooting.
translation: 你再不说到重点，我可要开枪了。

original: [SUCCEEDED] Yes. Very good. I should have Mentats ingest you instead of the other way around. Mmm. Mentats.
translation: [成功] 很好，非常好。我应该用曼他特来来招待你而不是其他的什么方式。嗯……曼他特。

original: The only "wrinkle" is the one that bullet made going into my brainpan.
translation: 唯一的"褶皱"就是那颗穿透我脑壳的子弹留下的。

original: [FAILED] I would spell it out for you, but when I start spelling, I lose track of the letters. Little symbols run around everywhere, annoying.
translation: [失败] 我想给你讲清楚，但在我要开口的时候，却经常口胡。这些小字母到处乱跑，真是烦人。

original: Was there any other data transmitted in your threat broadcast?
translation: 你在威胁广播里还给他们传递过其他信息么？

original: Yes, my overly aggressive chemmed-up broadcast was designed to keep reinforcing the "forget," "fear," "rinse," and "repeat" program.
translation: 当然，我嗑药发疯时极具侵略性的广播，就是为了不断强化他们的"遗忘"、"恐惧"、“清洗”和"重复"程序。

original: Oh, and the "get me the things to castrate your only possible escape attempt."
translation: 哦，我还说了："给我拿回这些技术，好让我掐灭你们最后一丝逃生希望"。

original: But I couldn't delete you or your arrival anymore than I could the other visitors. Only so much Science can do when you started talking to them.
translation: 虽然我能删除他们对其他来访者的记忆，但我没法删掉你的。在你与他们交谈开始，科学就无能为力了。

original: You're really quiet difficult to ignore, you know. It's because you're... well, bah! Rather intriguing, if you'll forgive an old brain for saying so.
translation: 知道吗，你令人很难忽视。你…呃，呸！相当引人注目，请原谅我这个年老的大脑说出这种话。

original: But the Think Tank downloaded the schematics, not the items. They can rebuild them.
translation: 但智库不只拿到了技术产品，他们还拿到了图纸。他们能借此重现那些技术。

original: Oh. That means my plan is a total failure. That is unfortunate.
translation: 噢，就是说我的计划彻底失败了。真不走运。

original: Oh, well, at least I tried.
translation: 嗯，贵在尝试嘛。

original: What is the purpose of the technologies?
translation: 那些技术到底服务于什么目的？

original: The X-2 Antenna can be used to focus your alpha wave frequency thought patterns. The Sneaky Suit? Why, it houses a cardiac regulator.
translation: X-2天线能帮助你集中α脑电波，改善思维模式。潜行衣？它内置了心率调节器。

original: And the sonic soundwave projecto-emitter was never intended as a weapon. It was a medicinal vertebrae-pulse-de-sensitizer.
translation: 声波发射器原本不是被当成武器设计。它本该用于医疗，能通过发射脉冲，来降低脊椎对外界刺激的感知。

original: In short: Brains, a heart, and courage... spine. I think there was a story once where a band of murderous thugs sought these things.
translation: 简要来说：大脑、心脏和勇气…我说脊椎。记得有个童话，讲的正是一群暴徒要寻找这三样东西。（绿野仙踪）

original: They had them all the time in the story. Didn't stop them from murdering to get them, and it won't stop the Think Tank, either.
translation: 故事里他们不停的找啊，为了达成夙愿他们不惜杀人。而思想体们，他们早晚会步这些暴徒的后尘。

original: I don't understand why they wanted me to gather the technologies.
translation: 我不明白思想体们为何要让我取回那些技术。

original: [SUCCEEDED] I consider "coincidence" to be profanity, along with the words, "astrology," "herbal tea," and "luck." So watch it, Potty Mouth.
translation: [成功] 我认为"巧合"一词极为无礼。"占星术"，"草药茶"和"运气"也是。注意你的言词，大嘴巴。

original: Klein said they had the idea to get the three technologies after your broadcast. Coincidence?
translation: 在你广播之后，克莱因才提出要搜集这三项技术。这是巧合吗？

original: [FAILED] Oh, I don't think they understood, either.
translation: [失败] 哦，我认为他们也不清楚这些技术的用处。

original: What do you mean?
translation: 什么意思？

original: The first one, the ruthless one who smashed up our toy trains, asked for weapons, power. Items he could use to destroy a nation with force.
translation: 第一位来访者，他残酷无情，并且还弄坏了我们的玩具火车。他追求的是足以毁灭一个国家的武器与力量。

original: The other... the other asked a different question, and with it, got the true answer. About what makes nations... and what breaks them.
translation: 另一位…他问了一个不同的问题，并得到了正确的答案——什么能孕育一个国家…又是什么能摧毁它。

original: He spoke to the Think Tank, to Klein. Showed them the flag of the Old World... and it made them remember. All of it. All that had happened.
translation: 他和思想体们，和克莱因谈了他的问题，向他们展示了旧世界的旗帜…这使他们回忆起一切，回忆起所有过去发生的事。

original: They shared things with him that they shouldn't. He now carries those ideas, that knowledge elsewhere.
translation: 思想体们还向他分享了一些不该分享的知识。他已经带着这些知识，这些理念离开了这里。

original: Do you know anything about the other visitors?
translation: 关于其他的来访者你知道些什么吗？

original: Oh, not much, except they contaminated Big MT and installed new ideas in the Think Tank.
translation: 呃，除了他们污染了大山脉，给思想体带来新想法外，我知道的并不多。

original: One caused a great deal of infrastructure damage with his brain and smartyness. Ruthless, that one. Played a little rough with the trains.
translation: 其中一个家伙很聪明，而且冷酷无情。他造成了大规模的基础设施破坏，还对列车玩了点粗暴的小把戏。

original: But the last one was the most dangerous. Him... eh... slipping away... that was almost as bad as the Think Tank escaping.
translation: 但最后那个才是最危险的。他…呃…溜走了。这和思想体溜走是同等危险的事情。

original: So you set your threats on a loop to keep them occupied?
translation: 所以你循环播放威胁广播，好让他们无暇他顾？

original: Yes. I certainly wouldn't loop it on purpose purpose purpose. I am far too sophisticated to make such a childish error error error.
translation: 没错。我当然不是不小心按到了循环键，我可不会犯下如此幼稚的错误错误错误。

original: What, some kind of medical condition?
translation: 什么？你是说我得了什么病吗？

original: [SUCCEEDED] Yes. Very good. I should have Mentats ingest you instead of the other way around. Mmm. Mentats.
translation: [成功] 很好，非常好。我应该用曼他特来来招待你而不是其他的什么方式。嗯……曼他特。

original: A cranial injury. From the attack outside Goodsprings.
translation: 那是我一次脑袋受伤后留下的，当时我在清泉镇外遇袭。

original: [FAILED] I would spell it out for you, but when I start spelling, I lose track of the letters. Little symbols run around everywhere, annoying.
translation: [失败] 我想给你讲清楚，但在我要开口的时候，却经常口胡。这些小字母到处乱跑，真是烦人。

original: Huh? What are you talking about?
translation: 哈？你到底在说什么呀？

original: [SUCCEEDED] Yes. Very good. I should have Mentats ingest you instead of the other way around. Mmm. Mentats.
translation: [成功] 很好，非常好。我应该用曼他特来来招待你而不是其他的什么方式。嗯……曼他特。

original: The bullet that went into my brain? Doc Mitchell tried to patch me up, but...
translation: 你指子弹射进大脑后留下的伤痕？米切尔医生尽力修补了它，不过…

original: [FAILED] I would spell it out for you, but when I start spelling, I lose track of the letters. Little symbols run around everywhere, annoying.
translation: [失败] 我想给你讲清楚，但在我要开口的时候，却经常口胡。这些小字母到处乱跑，真是烦人。

original: Are you blaming me for this?
translation: 你觉得这都是我的错？

original: There were other visitors, though. Why am I different?
translation: 既然这里也有过其他的来访者，为什么只有我是特别的？

original: But there must have been other signs of a larger world.
translation: 外面那个偌大的世界，能证明其存在的事物应该数不胜数才对。

original: There have been other visitors to make them doubt their perceptions, but you are the one who dialed back their monitor-micro-magnifiers.
translation: 之前的确有些来访者令他们质疑过自己的观点，但只有你，迫使他们回拨了显微镜的准焦螺旋，看到一个更大的世界。

original: You were irrefutable proof that there was a world outside. And then there was the whole "brain" fiasco, which forced me to take steps.
translation: 你无可辩驳地证明了外面存在着一个世界，再加上你大脑的那场特殊手术，这逼迫我不得不采取行动。

original: See, your brain had a special kind of... uh... wrinkle, a unique-ity that they had never thought to try in all their countless escape attempts.
translation: 你看，你的大脑有某个特别的…呃…“褶皱”。这个位置，他们在先前的无数次手术中，都没尝试过动刀。

original: I don't understand why you sent the threats - and the Robo-Scorpion army - against the Think Tank.
translation: 我不理解你为何要恐吓那些思想体，并派遣机械蝎军队和他们对抗。

original: If you lobotomized the Think Tank, why terrorize them?
translation: 既然你已经阉割过思想体们的脑子，为何还要威胁他们？

original: Well, it's simple. Despite their many failings, they are rather bright. They are the "Think Tank" for a raisin. That, I didn't change.
translation: 好吧，道理很简单。尽管他们有着种种缺点，他们依然非常杰出。他们能被称为"思想体"，并非浪得虚名，这点我从未否认。

original: Without something to distract them, make them afraid, they would simply de-deuce what had happened. And when they start deucing it up...
translation: 如果不分散他们的注意力，使其产生恐惧感，他们就会开始分析当前情势。而一旦他们开始分析…

original: Then you came along, the final variable solved. They saw that their world was larger than they perceived. Bacteria, finally able to see its host.
translation: 之后你来了，最后一个变量解决了。他们意识到世界并不仅限于此处。细菌，终于见识到它们的宿主了。

original: "Ouro-bor-ous?" What the hell does that mean?
translation: "乌洛鲍鲁斯(Ouro-bor-ous)"到底是什么意思？

original: [SUCCEEDED] Really? It is so unlike me to make an error in anything I do.
translation: [成功] 真的吗？出错可不像是我会做的事情。

original: Minor detail, but a snake devouring its own tail is "Ouro-borus," not "Ouro-borous."
translation: 小细节，衔尾蛇的古希腊语是"乌洛波洛斯(Ouro-borus)"，不是"乌洛鲍鲁斯(Ouro-borous)"

original: [FAILED] A snake that sucks its own dingle-thingy, I believe. Borous was always too obsessed with animals and their dingle-thingies.
translation: [失败]据我所知，是一条吞食自己排泄物的蛇。鲍鲁斯总是痴迷于动物和它们的排泄物。

original: That's kind of an asshole thing to do to your friends.
translation: 你竟对朋友做出如此混账的事情。

original: Is it? Hmm... I suppose it is. But really, they started the whole "excrement hole" behavior loop in the first place.
translation: 是吗？嗯…或许吧。但归根结底，这"混账"的行为循环是从他们先开始的。

original: Dr. O... which is actually not his real name multiplied, since you can't multiply his real name in the first place... Ouro-bor-ous, Klein...
translation: O博士…这其实不是他的真名，他的真名不能拿来做乘法运算…还有乌洛鲍鲁斯（Ouro-bor-ous），克莱因…

original: They have all forgotten themselves. And not only themselves, but the world, sense of time, and history. All that is left is what's here.
translation: 他们所有人，不仅忘了自己的一切，也忘记了世界、时间观念、历史。剩下为数不多记忆都只是关于这里。

original: I reprogrammed their chronometers, geometers, and cartography programs. This is now their world, here, Big MT.
translation: 我改写了他们的计时系统，几何系统和地理系统。现在对他们来说，大山脉这里，就是整个宇宙。

original: It was a merciful lobotomy, really, thinking back. They were my friends, but... sometimes they would take things too far.
translation: 仔细回想，的确，那并不比大脑切除手术仁慈多少。他们是我的朋友，可他们…有时会做些太过火的事情。

original: And the world isn't ready for that kind of too-far-thing-taking. That's my professional opinion, anyway, and I am told I was once quiet professional.
translation: 那种过火的事，是世界不能承受之重。不管怎么说，这是我的专业意见。而以前有…某些人也高度评价过我的专业水平。

original: In any event, you showed up at the Think Tank, and because you had suffered a cranial injury in just the right place...
translation: 不管怎样，后来你出现在了智库，而且因为头部的那个位置正好受过伤…

original: Bullets in the head are usually much more fatal, and yours was a light case of bullet-head-itis.
translation: 常人脑袋中枪早就没命了，你却只有弹头导致的轻度炎症。

original: But... it was enough for the Auto-Doc in the Sink to change its programming to fix the problem. And the brain extraction technology for once, worked.
translation: 但…为了修正问题，汇聚节点的自动医生还是改变了手术程序。大脑提取技术也因此碰巧完美奏效了，这是多年来的首次。

original: That gave the Think Tank the knowledge its brains shouldn't... couldn't... sh'couldn't possess. With that knowledge, the procedure can be reversed.
translation: 这次手术让思想体们获得了他们不应…不能…不应能拥有(scouldn't)的知识。有了这一知识，大脑提取手术将能被逆向执行。

original: If they obtain that procedural data, they can use it to mush and modify their cranial selves into hosts to slip past the Radar Fence, I'm sure of it.
translation: 我确信，如果获得了手术的数据，他们就能找到办法把大脑安回身体里，从而越过雷达屏障。

original: And once they're off the reservation...
translation: 而一旦他们离开这里…

original: My threat broadcast is designed to instill... and install... fear. And along with the emotional download, other data rides the fear carrier wave.
translation: 我发威胁广播的初衷是灌输…和安装…恐惧。但与此同时，其它信息也伴随着恐惧载波，被一并发送了过去。

original: It prompted them to focus on retrieving those technologies and bring them to "attack" me.
translation: 那些信息使他们专注于取回这些技术，并拿它们来"攻击"我。

original: And coincidentally... pardon my language... all those technologies are needed to put a brain, your brain, back into its skull. Properly.
translation: 巧合的是…原谅我的用词…这些技术恰恰是把大脑，特别是你的大脑，重新安回颅内所必须的知识。

original: Keep going, I want to hear the rest of this.
translation: 请继续，我想听听之后的故事。

original: So that's why they have all those stupid names?
translation: 于是乎他们就有了这些蠢名字？

original: [SUCCEEDED] O, you figured it out. No pun intended.
translation: [成功]O，你竟能领会此中深意。我可没在阴阳你。

original: Klein... Mobius... O's a circle... 8's an infinity symbol... they're all loops, I get it.
translation: 克莱因…莫比乌斯…圆环型的O…像无穷符号的8…这些名字都代表了循环，我似乎明白了。

original: [FAILED] I don't know if they're stupid, I was trying for accuracy.
translation: [失败] 那些名字很蠢吗？我已经尽力用得精确了。

original: A recursion loop is designed to prevent the flow of information. So...
translation: 递归循环是用来阻碍信息流的，这么说…

original: So all this insanity is because of you?
translation: 这么说这里所有的疯狂都是因为你？

original: Why did you trap them?
translation: 你给他们下套，想困住他们，这总得有原因吧？

original: The Radar Fence to keep the Think Tank hemmed in wasn't really enough. They keep testing things, they would have found a way to disarm it.
translation: 想困住他们，只靠一个雷达屏障可不够。像他们那样不断的进行实验，早晚能找出解除屏障的办法。

original: I suspect I have Plan 9s in place, but I may have coded myself to forget them, just in case... they're probably very dangerous, lethal, or worse.
translation: 我想我还制定了几个“计划9”，但后来为了以防万一又编程删除了相关记忆…或许因为这些计划非常危险，致命，甚至更糟。

original: So I had to do something else to keep them occupied here. Or as you like to say "trapped." I prefer to have several Plan 9s in case the 7s fail.
translation: 因此我只能做些别的事情，来让他们老实地呆在这里。或是如你所言，“下套”。我向来习惯尽可能多的制定"计划9"，以防"计划7”失败。

original: I suspect I have Plan Cs in place, but I may have coded myself to forget them, just in case... they're probably very dangerous, lethal, or worse.
translation: 我想我还制定了几个“计划C”，但后来为了以防万一又编程删除了相关记忆…或许因为这些计划非常危险，致命，甚至更糟。

original: So I had to do something else to keep them occupied here. Or as you like to say "trapped." I prefer to have several plan Bs in case the As fail.
translation: 因此我只能做些别的事情，来让他们老实的呆在这里。或是如你所言，“下套”。我向来习惯尽可能多的制定"计划9"，以防"计划7”失败。

original: So... you reprogrammed yourself?
translation: 所以…你重编了自己的程序？

original: [SUCCEEDED] Now, "trap" is a rather harsh word. Like "excrement." Not an inappropriate word, but still - rather harsh.
translation: [成功] 我说，"下套"这个词显得我真恶劣，像在说"混账"一样。用词倒不能算错，可就是，太刺耳了。

original: But... yes, I did... take some liberties with their programming. It's all right, they don't remember.
translation: 但…没错，我确实…确实困住了他们，剥夺了他们的自由。没关系的，他们根本不知道。

original: I certainly didn't until you said "trap." And then I said "excrement." And then...
translation: 我是一直这么想的，直到你说"下套"，然后我说"混账"。我…

original: You reprogrammed their names as part of recursion loop? What, to trap their processors?
translation: 你把他们的名字编入了递归循环？怎么，为了给他们的处理器下套吗？

original: [FAILED] I believe I did, and with good raisin. Who am I to be trusted with such things?
translation: [失败] 我确实做了，而且有正当的理由。做了这样的事，我也没指望谁还会信任我。

original: Sounds like you forgot your master plan - surprised you remember your own name.
translation: 你似乎把计划都给忘了。我很惊讶你还能记得自己的名字？

original: This name's as real as you or I, although I believe your brain expressed similar incredulity at the nature of such an appellation.
translation: 这个名字就和你我一样真实。尽管对于该称谓的本质，你的大脑也表达过和你一样的怀疑。

original: "Someone's been watching too many Old World science fiction movies," it said. I believe it meant me.
translation: “某人是看了太多旧世界科幻电影吧”，它说。我想这就是在说我！

original: I must admit I have a vulnerability for holotape fantasies of planets and robots and all that is forbidden. As for the name I was born with...
translation: 必须承认，我真的很喜欢看科幻电影，醉心于那些对星球啊，机器人啊之类禁忌事物的幻想。哦，说回我与生俱来的名字…

original: ...like the Think Tank, we were all reprogrammed to forget them, take on new names. It enforces the recursion loop in our perception programming.
translation: …和思想体一样，我们的程序都被重新编写过，让自己忘了它，然后接受新的称谓。之后新的名字就会在我们感知程序中强制执行递归循环。

original: Everything you've told me doesn't add up... your plan, even your name, "Mobius."
translation: 你告诉我的一切都不合情理……不管是你的计划，还是你的名字，[QUOTE]莫比乌斯。[QUOTE]

original: "Dr. Mobius," rather catchy, isn't it? It's my name, my new name, overwrote the old one.
translation: "莫比乌斯博士"，琅琅上口，不是吗？这就是我的名字，覆盖更改后的新名字。

original: Any tactics I could use to attack the Think Tank?
translation: 有什么和思想体战斗的建议吗？

original: Well, I don't want to keep them out of trouble, I want to kill them.
translation: 好吧，我无意阻止他们闯祸，我想直接干掉他们。

original: That will be difficult. It would be like fighting five scaled down versions of me that have better depth perception.
translation: 这可不太容易，相当于你得面对五个大部分能力弱化，但深度知觉能力强化的我。

original: And they have an arsenal of vivisectors, brainial beams, and a rather nasty WooEEEOooWooEEEOoo ray that can make your atoms do a happy dance.
translation: 而且他们配备有完备的武器库，包括解剖器、脑波射线，还有一个能让你身体里原子欢快起舞的非常讨厌的“喔哦哦哦”射线。

original: If you could survive those highly-improbable odds and ends, then deceasing them is definitely an option.
translation: 你要是确定能挺过那些稀奇古怪的物事，那杀掉他们当然也是一种选择。

original: Although I doubt killing them would do anything except make you feel better. Or let you brag to other humans about your primal violent-ness-ness.
translation: 但我怀疑你只是为了找点乐子，或是能向别人夸耀你那原始的暴力行为？

original: What was the plan you had?
translation: 你的计划是什么样的？
