original: Something ingenious and needlessly complicated, I expect. I may have already told you and forgotten it.
translation: 应该是个新颖巧妙并且复杂繁琐的计划，我想。也许我已经跟你说过，只是后来又忘了。

original: I forgot I had forgotten pencils until one day I found one. Spent days studying its purpose before my memory circuit kicked in. Felt quiet silly.
translation: 我试过忘了自己已经不记得铅笔是什么，直到有一天我找到一根。在记忆恢复前，我花了好几天来研究它的作用。感觉挺蠢的。

original: Do you know how I can stop the Think Tank?
translation: 怎么做才能阻止思想体？

original: My brain told me the Think Tank needs to be stopped. Can you help?
translation: 我的大脑告诉我必须要阻止那些思想体，你能帮忙吗？

original: If I recall... I had a plan that was working, eh, whatever it was. I don't think it reached fruition. I would recall fruit if it had happened.
translation: 让我想想…我似乎有一个能奏效的计划，呃，之类的。但我想这个计划没能有结果。如果有结果的话，我应该能想起“果实”。

original: I wasn't trying to kill them, just keep them out of trouble. What was that plan?
translation: 我没想要杀死他们，只想让他们别再惹麻烦。计划到底是什么来着？

original: Blast! I probably... uh... wrote it down on the... floor somewhere.
translation: 对了！我大概…呃…把它写在了…某处的地板上。

original: I think I'm going to kill you after all.
translation: 不管怎样，我还是打算杀了你。

original: Really? Oh... you're not thinking about doing it, you are going to do it.
translation: 真的吗？哦…你不只是想想，你要付诸实践了。

original: Oh, intriguing. I've never been killed before. Although after that time I got that phlegmy discharge in my biogel... I wished I had been.
translation: 哦，有意思，我从来没有被杀过。虽然那次我的生物凝胶流出痰液的时候…我就想死了。

original: Well, if there's going to be killing, I defer to your expertise in this matter.
translation: 好吧，如果非打不可，那么在这个问题上我会尊重你的专业意见。

original: How should we begin? Engineered viruses? Canceratic beams? Atomics? Electrocutioning? Or... should I summon my minions...? Yes, my minions.
translation: 我们从哪里开始？改造病毒？癌变射线？核武器？电刑？还是说…我该召集我的仆从？没错，我的仆从。

original: The Sonic Emitter should be sterilized and more than enough for you to encircle your warm hands around, cradling it gently with your finger muscles.
translation: 达拉：声波发射器已经仔细消毒过了。你完全可以用你温热的小手拿起它，用手指轻柔的抚弄它。

original: *O... I think it wants a combustion pistol.*
translation: O：*哦…我想它要的是那种需要点火才能射击的手枪。*

original: -A GUN! Are you MAD?! We can't give it a GUN! GUNS kill, leave big open holes in you that are like sores but WORSE.-
translation: 鲍鲁斯：-枪！你疯了吗？！绝不能让它拿枪！枪能杀人，能在你身上开个大洞，就像溃疡一样，甚至比溃疡更糟。-

original: Dr. 8 is correct. We already have given the teddy bear a lethal sonic death ray filled with his sonic ejaculate and sterilized by my soft WooWOOing.
translation: 达拉：我支持8博士。我们已经给了小泰迪一把声波发射器，一把能发出致命声波射线的武器，并且也经过了我雷达温柔的“喔哦哦呜呜”消毒。

original: Giving the teddy bear a gun would be the equivalent of following a glass of hemlock with an Abraxo chaser. Delicious and redundantly deadly.
translation: 给泰迪熊一支枪，就像喝了杯烈性毒芹汁之后，再灌盒阿伯莱萨清洁剂。美味又致命。

original: IF WE'RE GOING TO BRING THE SOCRATIC METHOD INTO IT, FINE. GIVE THE LOBOTO-BEAR A COMBUSITON GUN. BOROUS? DON'T YOU HAVE SOMETHING LIKE THAT?
translation: 克莱因：如果非要搞苏格拉底式反诘法，好吧，那就给这只无脑熊它要的火器。鲍鲁斯？记得你有这种东西？

original: -Are you MAD?! We can't give it a GUN! GUNS...-
translation: 鲍鲁斯：-你也疯了吗？！绝不能让它拿枪！枪会…-

original: -...wait, I said that already. Yes, I have THE Cyberdog Gun. With the little floppy metal ears and the curious nose sensor. Here.-
translation: -…等等，我说过这件事了。对了，我是有支装在赛博犬上的枪，长着小金属耳朵和灵敏的鼻子探测器。在这呢，给。-

original: FINE. DONE. THAT GUN MAKES ME UNCOMFORTABLE ANYWAY, ALWAYS WORRIED ITS GOING TO HUMP MY CHASSIS. ANYTHING ELSE, LOBOTOMITE?
translation: 克莱因：很好，这件事就这样吧。那把枪我不爽很久了，总担心它会顶起我的底盘。还有什么其他事，无脑人？

original: -Top shelf ammunition. Let's see... hollow point, that's worthless but tasty... oh, and here's some Jay-F-Pee. As if bullets need jackets.-
translation: 鲍鲁斯：-顶级的弹药。我找找看…空尖弹，便宜又好用…哦，居然有些被甲平头弹（JFP）。就跟子弹也得穿夹克似的。-

original: -The JFP might make it ill and poop a lot, but when you're hungry, you're hungry.-
translation: -被甲平头弹（JFP），吃了可能会让它生病，然后大量排便。但你饿了的时候，就饿了不是吗。-

original: They certainly did. Batteries for my vib... vivisectors... would always come up short right before climax.
translation: 达拉：确实。我的震动…解剖器总是在准备到高潮前没电。

original: *I think Wattz manufactured holodisks. Or was it holotapes? Never can keep those two straight. Anyway, we're out of small energy cells. Dala.*
translation: O：*我认为是瓦特兹公司制造了全息磁盘。又或者是全息磁带？总是分不清它们。不管怎样，我们能量电池都用完了。达拉。*

original: *You have some? Why do... actually, never mind, I don't even want to know.*
translation: O：*你说你有些电池？你是怎么…算了，当我没问，我一点也不想知道。*

original: *And no, I don't want to handle your batteries. Just... pass them on to the Lobotomite yourself.*
translation: *另外，我也不想碰你的电池。我…你还是自己把电池递给无脑人吧。*

original: *Are you... echoing what he said, or... are you asking for real?*
translation: O：*你…是在附和他，还是说…你真真的在询问？*

original: He's asking, yes. Dr. Klein, there are many other personalities. If you recall, you hurled them off the Sink balcony after your argument with Mobius.
translation: 达拉：是的，他是在询问。克莱因博士，还有另外一些人格芯片。不知你是否还记得，某次和莫比乌斯博士争吵后，你把它们从汇聚节点的阳台上全扔了出去。

original: IT IS NOT AN ARGUMENT IF ONE IS CLEARLY RIGHT AND THE OTHER IS CLEARLY WRONG!
translation: 克莱因：如果其中一个人完全正确，另一个人却错的离谱，你就不该将其称为争吵！

original: I REMEMBER NOW. YES, LOBOTOMITE, THERE ARE OTHER CHIPS. IF YOU WANT, FIND THEM. I BELIEVE THEY ARE STORED ON HOLOTAPES IN MANY OF OUR FACILITIES.
translation: 克莱因：我想起来了。没错，无脑人，还有其他的芯片，你想要就去找吧。它们都存储在全息磁带里，你能在各个不同的研究设施里找到它们。

original: BUT YOU SHOULD STAY OUT OF THOSE - NO EXPLORING AND DISCOVERING THINGS. THE SINK CENTRAL "INTELLIGENCE" SHOULD BE ENOUGH FOR YOUR... HEH... NEEDS.
translation: 不过我奉劝你远离那些，无关探索和发现的东西。汇聚节点的主"智能"单元应该足以满足你的…哼…需求。

original: I'd rather have a good old-fashioned gun.
translation: 我宁愿要把传统意义上的好枪。

original: [SUCCEEDED] WHAT DID IT SAY? SPIT "LEAD?" WHAT, LIKE PENCILS?
translation: [成功] 克莱因：它说什么？能射出"铅块"的东西？比如说铅笔？

original: This sonic gun looks like an energy projectile. Got anything that spits lead?
translation: 这声波枪看上去是射能量束的。有没有什么能射铅块的武器给我？

original: [FAILED] NO. WHAT ELSE CAN WE DENY YOU?
translation: [失败] 克莱因：不。给你的还不够吗？

original: So I just go back upstairs and to the main circular console?
translation: 所以我只要回楼上，找那个圆形的主控台就行了？

original: YES. SIMPLY... SPEAK TO IT. WITH VERBAL WORDS TRANSMITTING IN AN OPEN AIR MEDIUM.
translation: 克莱因：没错。只要…对它说话就行。让语音信息在空气介质中传输。

original: THERE IS NO MORE WE CAN DO TO AID YOU AND OUR PATIENCE LEVELS ARE DEPLETED. NOW GO. REST IN THE SINK IF YOU MUST. BUT LEAVE US TO OUR RESEARCH.
translation: 我们已经没有什么可以帮你了。我们的耐心水平也已耗尽。赶紧走吧，有需要可以在汇聚节点休息。别再来打扰我们研究了。

original: Just one of these chips, huh? Guess they're rare.
translation: 就一块芯片，哈？它一定非常稀罕。

original: [SUCCEEDED] ARE THERE OTHER CHIPS?
translation: [成功] 克莱因：还有别的人格芯片吗？

original: This chip looks like it was mass-produced. Are there other chips?
translation: 这块芯片看起来是量产的，还有其他的吗？

original: [FAILED] RARE? I GUESS. MIGHT BE MORE SOMEWHERE, I FORGET. I MEAN... SUCH KNOWLEDGE IS ENCRYPTED DEEP IN MY DATABANKS.
translation: [失败] 克莱因：罕见吗？也许吧。可能还有别的芯片，只是我忘了。我是说…这些知识在我的数据库中被深度加密了。

original: All right, having a store available would be helpful... it has a store connection right?
translation: 好吧，有个商店能用总是有帮助的…它连接了一个商店，是吧？

original: So just plug it into the circular map-thing in the Sink upstairs?
translation: 所以把芯片插进楼上汇聚节点那圆形地图一样的机器里就行了？

original: YES. YOU MAY NEED TO WIGGLE IT IN A BIT, BUT DON'T FORCE IT. WE CAN'T RE-CODE THEM IF YOU BREAK IT.
translation: 克莱因：没错。可能要你稍微拧一下，但别用太大劲。弄坏了，我们也没法重编一个。

original: THERE IS NO MORE WE CAN DO TO AID YOU AND OUR PATIENCE LEVELS ARE DEPLETED. NOW GO. REST IN THE SINK IF YOU MUST. BUT LEAVE US TO OUR RESEARCH.
translation: 我们已经没有什么可以帮你了。我们的耐心水平也已耗尽。赶紧走吧，有需要可以在汇聚节点休息。别再来打扰我们研究了。

original: *Uh, if you're done, can we move again? My biogel's starting to crampagulate.*
translation: O：*呃，没别的事的话，我们能动了吗？我的生物凝胶都要开始扭成一团了。*

original: OF COURSE. GO MAN YOUR SCIENCE STATIONS. GO! I AM SURROUNDED BY CHILDREN.
translation: 克莱因：不然怎样。回你的研究岗位上去。快去！没一个懂事的。

original: Just spit it out before you bore me to death.
translation: 在烦死我之前，你最好能说出点什么。

original: I'm listening, let's hear it.
translation: 我在听，你说吧。

original: Uh... these have been sterilized, too, right?
translation: 呃…这些也消过毒了，对吧？

original: So these will work in the Sonic Emitter?
translation: 所以这些会作用于声波发射器？

original: Nice. This should be enough.
translation: 很好，这应该够了。

original: I could use some more... energy... stuff.
translation: 我需要一些…能…用来充能的东西。

original: [SUCCEEDED] HMMM. YES, I BELIEVE WATTZ ELECTRONICS TENDED TO MAKE THE BATTERY SHELF LIFE ON THE LOW END.
translation: [成功] 克莱因：嗯，好吧。我觉得瓦特兹电子公司故意把电池寿命做得越来越低。

original: Energy Cells have a high expenditure rate. Some extra reserve cells could offset that.
translation: 能量电池的消耗率很高。准备些额外的备用电池可以抵消该影响。

original: [FAILED] NO. WHAT ELSE CAN WE DENY YOU?
translation: [失败]克莱因：不。我们拒绝。

original: Is this gun all? Uh, can't have enough guns, really.
translation: 就这把枪？呃，可以再多给些，真的。

original: [SUCCEEDED] FINE. BOROUS, MORE AMMO. THE GOOD STUFF.
translation: [成功] 克莱因：好吧，鲍鲁斯，要更多的弹药，高质量的。

original: Um, this gun looks really hungry. I'd like to make sure it gets fed lots of bullets.
translation: 嗯，这把枪看起来饿坏了。我得用更多的弹药才能喂饱它。

original: [FAILED] NO. WHAT ELSE CAN WE DENY YOU?
translation: [失败] 克莱因：不。给你的还不够吗？

original: I don't give a shit what you have to say. Tell me why you hauled me here. Now.
translation: 你说的我他妈的一点也不关心。你们把我拖到这里到底想干嘛，快说！

original: THAT RESPONSE SEEMED DEMANDING, AS IF CUTTING TO THE CASE. UH... CHASE. HOW SURGICAL. REMINDS ME OF...
translation: 克莱因：它似乎是在表达某种强烈的要求，想要直奔…主题。像外科手术般精确，让我想起了…

original: These technologies seem more useful... medically, somehow.
translation: 某种程度上说，这些技术似乎更具…医学价值。

original: [SUCCEEDED] HEAL YOU? WHAT, PUT YOU BACK TOGETHER LIKE SOME GIANT HARD-BOILED YUMYUM DEVILED EGG?
translation: [成功] 治好你？怎么做，把你的身体部分都放回去，像只巨型恶魔美味芥末蛋？

original: The cardiac, spinal, and brainwave aspects of this tech... couldn't they heal me?
translation: 现在这里有心率，脊椎和脑波方面的技术…有了它们难道还不能治好我？

original: [FAILED] WHATEVER. THE ONLY MEDICINE MOBIUS WILL NEED IS A RESUSCITATOR AFTER WE... YOU... BREAK IN THERE.
translation: [失败] 怎么想随你。在我们…在你…突入禁区以后，莫比乌斯唯一需要的医疗品就只有呼吸机了。

original: That's actually not the conclusion I would have drawn.
translation: 这可不是我会得出的结论。

original: [SUCCEEDED] BIOLOGICAL? PFF. RIDICULOUS.
translation: [成功] 生物学？天马行空，无稽之谈。

original: Don't these items seem more... biologically-focused than that, though?
translation: 但比起那些，这些技术看起来不是更具…生物学意义吗？

original: [FAILED] WHATEVER. I'M AFTER RESULTS.
translation: [失败] 不管了，我只追求结果。

original: Then there's no time to waste.
translation: 那就别浪费时间了。

original: So I go after him, then?
translation: 找到他，然后呢？

original: THE DOOR SHOULD BE UN-SEALED. NOW, INSTEAD OF BEING SUBJECTED TO THREATS, WE CAN NOW SEND AN EQUALLY THREATENING MESSAGE TO MOBIUS.
translation: 大门应该已经打开了。如今，我们不用再受制于莫比乌斯的威胁。相反，我们可以给他发送对等的恐吓信息。

original: AND THAT MESSAGE IS SCIENCE! DELIVER THIS MESSAGE, AND BIG MT SHALL BE FREED FROM MOBIUS' REIGN OF TERROR!
translation: 而那信息就是科学！传达了这条信息，大山脉就能摆脱莫比乌斯的恐怖统治，重获自由！

original: UM, YOU CAN GO NOW. THAT'S YOUR CUE.
translation: 呃，你可以走了。该你出场了。

original: LET ME CHECK SOMETHING... OF COURSE!
translation: 让我看看…就是它！

original: I HAVE IT. THE OVERRIDE SEQUENCE TO OPEN THE FORBIDDEN ZONE DOOR IS HIDDEN IN THE SCHEMATICS.
translation: 我找到了。开启禁区大门的覆写序列就藏在这些图纸之中。

original: WELL, NOT HIDDEN, IT'S ACTUALLY RIGHT THERE, BEHIND THE PROGRAMMING EQUIVALENT OF COFFEE STAINS...
translation: 好吧，没被藏起来。实际上它就在这儿，在这段咖啡渍似的程序后面…

original: IT'S EMBEDDED IN WHAT SEEMS TO BE RECURSIVE CODE... IT'S BADLY COMMENTED, THERE AND THERE... OH, AND NULL POINTERS. VERY SLOPPY, MOBIUS.
translation: 它被嵌套在像是一段递归代码里…这里和这里，都注解得好糟糕…哦，竟然还有空指针。莫比乌斯，你还真是马虎啊。

original: YOU SEE, USING THE ANTENNA TO BOOST THE EMITTER'S SONIC FREQUENCY, AND THE STEALTH SUIT TO BYPASS THE FORBIDDEN ZONE LOCK... YES, THAT COULD WORK.
translation: 你看，使用天线来加强声波发射器的频率，使用潜行甲来解开禁区的锁…没错，这应该可行。

original: WAS THAT MY PLAN? IT MUST HAVE BEEN. SOMETIMES I TRULY SURPRISE MYSELF. THE DOOR IS OPEN... AND NOW, MOBIUS WILL GET HIS.
translation: 这是我的计划吗？理所当然是的。有时候我真的会让我自己都惊叹。禁区的大门即将打开…马上，莫比乌斯就会得到他应得的。

original: I MEAN, TECHNICALLY, THESE ITEMS COULD ALL BE USED TO PUT YOU BACK TOGETHER ONCE YOU HAD YOUR BRAIN.
translation: 我的意思是，从技术上讲，在你取回你的大脑后，这几件物品也能用来把你的器官拼回去。

original: BUT FOR NOW, THEY CAN BE USED IN THE NAME OF AGGRESSION.
translation: 但此时此刻，它们显然更适用于进攻和战斗。

original: Do you remember what other biological effects the other items had?
translation: 你还记得其他物品有什么生物学功能么？

original: ...I'm waiting for you to draw a conclusion.
translation: …我在等你下结论。

original: Yes?
translation: 所以呢？

original: I'M THINKING. THIS IS ALL VERY COMPLICATED.
translation: 我正在思考。它太复杂了。

original: And the suit's a cardiac regulator, and the sonic frequency is a spinal vibrator?
translation: 潜行甲原本是个心率调节器，而声波发射器是脊椎颤振器？

original: I'VE GOT IT. THE CARDIAC REGULATOR IN THE SUIT, THE ANTENNA FOR BRAINWAVES, AND THE SONIC FREQUENCY FOR THE VERTEBRAL NERVES...
translation: 我懂了，潜行装甲是为了里面的心率调节器，天线可以用于脑电波，声波发射器的频率可以用于脊椎神经…

original: These devices all seem very scientific. Very.
translation: 这些设备看起来都很科学，非常的科学。

original: [SUCCEEDED] YES, THAT'S WHAT I BELIEVE I SAID.
translation: [成功] 是的，我想这就是我说过的。

original: Look, the antenna focuses brainwave patterns, right?
translation: 看，这个天线可以集中脑电波的形态，对吗？

original: [FAILED] PLEASE LET ME THINK. THIS MAKES MY BRAIN HURT.
translation: [失败] 容我再想想，伤脑筋啊…

original: I'll let you think it over, then.
translation: 好吧，你想清楚再给我回复。

original: The antenna looks like it could break things beyond repair. Maybe it could break in?
translation: 这根天线看起来破坏力很强，应该能打烂禁区的大门？

original: [SUCCEEDED] SO YOU'RE SAYING... IT'S THE X-2 ARRAY, NOT THE ANTENNA I SHOULD BE EXAMINING? THAT WAS... MOST LIKELY MY PLAN, YES.
translation: [成功] 你是说…我该检查的是X-2的阵列，而不是那根天线？这…跟我设想的一样，没错。

original: The antenna, any chance it was damaged, or broke the X-2 array once removed?
translation: 那根天线，有没有可能它坏了，或者在被摘走后弄坏了X-2的天线阵列？

original: [FAILED] YES, YES, THE ANTENNA CAN DO DAMAGE...
translation: [失败] 对，对，天线能用来搞破坏…

original: ...AND IT DID DO DAMAGE, ONCE YOU REMOVED IT FROM X-2. WAS THAT MY PLAN? IT MUST HAVE BEEN.
translation: …它也确实造成了破坏，一旦你从X-2拔了它。那是我的计划吗？应该是的。

original: Think the X-13 sneaky suit can slip in and get to Mobius?
translation: X-13潜行甲能自己溜进禁区，找到莫比乌斯？

original: [SUCCEEDED] I SUPPOSE IT COULD. IF IT COULD BE QUIET FOR MORE THAN A FEW MOMENTS, ALWAYS TALKING, TOUCHING THINGS...
translation: [成功] 也许可以，但前提是那个叽叽喳喳，情感过剩的家伙能把嘴闭上那么几小时…

original: ...HMMM. IT DOES HAVE AN INTERFACE DISRUPTOR WEAVE AGAINST ELECTRONICS. LIKE THE FORBIDDEN ZONE DOOR.
translation: …嗯，它内置的交互干扰器确实能对付电子设备，比如禁区的大门。

original: Would the suit's dampening abilities allow me to sneak into the Forbidden Zone?
translation: 潜行装的消音功能可以帮助我潜入禁区？

original: [FAILED] NO, THAT'S TOO EASY. AND IT WOULDN'T WORK BY ITSELF. IT'S... SLIGHTLY CO-DEPENDENT.
translation: [失败] 不，没那么简单。而且它不能自己动的，它需要…依附在人身上。

original: Maybe the new frequency for the Sonic Emitter can blast open the Forbidden Zone door lock, or...?
translation: 也许声波发射器的新频率能爆开禁区的门锁，或者…？

original: [SUCCEEDED] ITS RANGE IS LIMITED, AND IT WOULD NEED A BOOSTER OF SOME SORT, A... CARRIER, BUT...
translation: [成功] 它的范围有限，还需要一个加压放大器之类的东西，某种…载体，但是…

original: Maybe the frequency in the Sonic Emitter's a sonic key of sorts? Like an electronic lockpick?
translation: 可能声波发射器里的频率会是个声波密钥？类似电子开锁器？

original: [FAILED] IF THAT WAS THE CASE, I'D USE AN ATOMIC KEY ON THE DOOR AND BE DONE WITH IT.
translation: [失败] 这要行得通的话，我早就做了把原子钥匙，然后早早把这事了结了。

original: I'm going to advance my boot into your voice module if you don't give me some solid data.
translation: 你如果提取不出什么可靠数据，看我不踢爆了你的发声模块。

original: Why did you have me get them if you don't know how they would help?
translation: 你都不知道这是干什么的，干嘛还让我去回收它们？

original: Do you even know what these technologies do?
translation: 你连它们干什么用的都不知道？

original: I KNOW HOW THESE TECHNOLOGIES WORK. OF COURSE I KNOW.
translation: 我知道它们的用途。我当然知道。

original: IF YOU REMEMBER, WE DESCRIBED THEM IN CLEARLY ABSTRACT CONTRADICTORY STATEMENTS BEFORE. WHY WOULD WE DO THAT IF WE WEREN'T CERTAIN ON...
translation: 你应该记得，之前我们清晰明了地描述过它们，它们的作用非此即彼。这说明我们不可能不知道它们…

original: ...ON HOW TO USE THEM, YES. SO LET ME... HMM, A BIT, I... I'LL FIGURE IT OUT.
translation: …怎么使用，对。所以让我…嗯，一小会儿，我…我马上就能搞清楚。

original: "Yes..." what?
translation: "对…"什么？

original: NO... I MEAN YES. JUST NEED TO ANALYZE THESE TECHNOLOGIES FOR A MOMENT. THEY ARE EXTREMELY ADVANCED, YOU KNOW.
translation: 不对…我是说，对。我只是需要些时间去分析这些技术。你也知道，它们非常先进。

original: Something wrong?
translation: 有什么不对吗？

original: Your answer isn't filling me with confidence.
translation: 你的回答没什么说服力啊。

original: All right, glad that you received the schematics.
translation: 好吧，很高兴你得到了图纸。

original: Do these technologies have the information you need?
translation: 这些技术里有你要的信息吗？

original: So genius, what now?
translation: 那么大天才，接下来呢？

original: YES. HMMM. AH, YES. YESSS... YES... AH. HMMM.
translation: 对，嗯嗯，啊，对，对…没错…啊，嗯。

original: Why would Mobius want my brain?
translation: 为什么莫比乌斯想要我的大脑？

original: WHY DOES HE SEEK OUR DESTRUCTION? WHY DID HE BUILD ROBOT SCORPIONS WITH INTELLIGENCE-DRAINING STINGERS?
translation: 为什么他想消灭我们？为什么他要造出带有“降智”尾刺的机械蝎？

original: IT IS BECAUSE HE HASN'T CLEANED HIS BIOGEL IN... A LONG TIME. CLEARLY, HE'S GOT SOME SORT OF PSYCHOLOGICAL CORROSION. HE'S MAD.
translation: 这是因为他一直没有清理他的生物凝胶…一直没有。显然，他的精神被腐蚀了。他疯了。

original: You said before that Mobius might have my brain?
translation: 你之前说…拿走我的脑子的可能是莫比乌斯博士？

original: YES. IN ALL PROBABLE LIKELIHOODS, YES. POSSIBLY.
translation: 是的。在所有的可能中，这个的可能性要大些。

original: THAT IT MAY HAVE GONE TO MOBIUS IS MERELY AN INKLING. I DON'T KNOW WHY, BUT IT MAY BE SOMETHING INVOLVING THE SURGERY CODE.
translation: 我只是隐约觉得应该是莫比乌斯干的。具体为什么我也不清楚，但貌似和手术代码有关。

original: ACTUALLY, I DON'T KNOW. ALL I KNOW IS IT MISPLACED ITSELF. OR IT FLOATED OFF. THEY GET INTO ROBOTS SOMETIMES AND GO ON A TEAR.
translation: 其实，我不知道你的大脑去哪了。我只知道它不见了，可能是被水冲走了。它们有时也会钻进机器人里，然后跑去鬼混。

original: I have some questions about this "brain extraction" you all performed.
translation: 我想知道一些关于你做的"大脑提取"手术的事。

original: WELL, WE DIDN'T ACTUALLY DO IT. WE TRIED TO CLEAN UP AFTER, AS ALWAYS, BUT USUALLY THE AUTO-DOC RUNS ON REMOTE. BUT WE PROGRAMMED IT. OR, MOBIUS DID.
translation: 好吧，事实上不是我们做的手术。我们只是惯例事后去做个清理。通常是由远程控制的自动医生主刀。但自动医生的程序是我们写的，或者说是莫比乌斯写的。

original: STILL, THIS NEW WRINKLE WITH THE TESLA COILS IN YOUR SKULL WAS UNEXPECTED. I MEAN WE PREDICTED WE'D HAVE A BREAK-THROUGH EVENTUALLY, BUT...
translation: 尽管如此，我们也没想到，在你颅骨的这个“褶皱”里，会多出新的特斯拉线圈。啊我的意思是，我们本来预期最后会有新的发现。但是…

original: DALA KNOWS MORE. SHE SUPERVISED YOUR SPINE-PEEL. AND THE HEART CIRCUMCISION. THEN DUMPED THEM BOTH INTO THE TANKS IN THE SINK ABOVE. QUITE SANITARY.
translation: 达拉比我更了解情况。她是进行剥离你脊椎操作的负责人(教母)，还有心脏移除(割礼)。最后又把它们放到贮槽里。整个过程都非常的卫生(圣洁)。

original: SURE TOOK HER TIME. SHE ALWAYS TAKES LONGER THAN PROJECTED WITH LOBOTOMITE SURGERIES, NOT SURE WHY.
translation: 这当然费了她不少功夫。但话说回来，每到做大脑提取手术的时候，她总得比平时花更长的时间，莫名其妙。

original: Scare them? How?
translation: 恐吓他们？要怎么做？

original: Oh, tell them I'm still alive, we had a nice chat, and we agree on a few things. That's true... isn't it?
translation: 哦，像是告诉他们我还活着，我们进行了一次很愉快的交谈，甚至还在某些事上达成了一致。毕竟事实如此嘛，不是吗？

original: Or, you could kill me and lie about it. Either way, it would be interesting.
translation: 或者，你也可以杀了我，然后向他们撒谎，说我还活着。不管你选哪种方式，都一定会很有趣。

original: And if you are partial to lying and deception... well, you could tell them a ludicrous lie. The more over-the-top, the better, that's my experience.
translation: 你如果打算撒谎骗他们…好吧，那就编造一个尽可能荒谬的谎言。越荒唐越好，这是我的经验之谈。

original: They're more than a little gullible. Better make it convincing, though, or it'll be the dissection table and vivisectors for you.
translation: 他们其实还挺容易上当的。不过还是编的像话些，如果他们识破了你的谎言，你就得等着上解剖台了。

original: And if you speak of me, please try and make me look good. I am Dr. Mobius, after all, not some lab assistant teacher's aide.
translation: 另外，你要是谈到我，请尽量把我说得好些。毕竟，我可是莫比乌斯博士，不是什么给实验室助理打下手的家伙。

original: I'd like to make the effort.
translation: 我会尽力。

original: Well, there's many things they have forgotten, sitting in their bowls. Friendship. The thrill of discovery. Love. Masturbation. The usual.
translation: 唉，脑子泡在缸里，他们忘记了太多东西，像友谊、对新发现的喜悦、爱、自慰、日常。

original: Much like your brain, I am certain there is something you can spark within each of them. Memories, hormones...
translation: 和你的大脑一样，我相信一定有什么东西，能重新点燃他们的这些情感。比如说回忆、荷尔蒙…

original: ...a wise man once said, the eyes do more than see. Make them see, if you can.
translation: …某位智者曾说过，眼睛不仅仅是用来看的。让他们看到这点吧，如果你能做到的话。（艾萨克·阿西莫夫同名科幻小说）

original: Or, if not, you can always make them succumb to fear... it certainly worked for me. For a time.
translation: 或者，如果不这样，你也可以让他们屈服于恐惧…一度，我认为这是最有效的方法。

original: Then you came along, and bravery and/or desperation trumped that little idea. Back to the drawing board, I suppose. Or is this the end? Hard to tell.
translation: 直到你来了，他们的勇气和绝望压倒了恐惧。于是一切仿佛又重回开始，又抑或这将是终结？我也说不清。

original: Any suggestions for how to make them change their minds?
translation: 有什么办法能让他们改变主意吗？

original: I'd really, really like to kill them.
translation: 但我真的，真的很想杀了他们。

original: Hmmm. Well, if you're determined to go down that road, so be it. They will undoubtedly switch off the pacification field when you return.
translation: 嗯，好吧。既然你意已决，那就随你好了。你回去的时候，他们肯定不会再打开平静场了。

original: Anything I could do to stop them that doesn't require violence?
translation: 有什么方法可以兵不血刃地阻止他们吗？

original: Well... you could try and appeal to their humanity. That's a tired cliché. And really, when they were humans, they weren't very good humans.
translation: 这个…你可以试着唤醒他们的人性。这都是些陈词滥调了。而且说真的，即使在他们还是人类的时候，他们也不算是什么好人。

original: I can't let you dissect the Mojave. Or let you leave.
translation: 我不能放任你们去解剖莫哈维。不能放你们出去。

original: YES, YOU CAN. YOU DON'T REALLY HAVE AN ALTERNATIVE THAT I CAN SEE.
translation: 克莱因：噢，你当然能。这件事上你根本没有别的选择。

original: I'M NOT GOING TO HARM IT, I'M GOING TO DISSECT IT UNTIL ITS DEAD. WHY THE SUDDEN INTERSECTION, DALA.
translation: 克莱因：我们不会伤害它，只是在它完蛋前详尽地解剖一番。为什么突然打断我，达拉？

original: Um... it's personal. But... I would hate if its dying screams revealed any odious personal habits I... or any of us might have.
translation: 达拉：呃…只是个人看法。但是…我怕它垂死的尖叫会暴露我…或者我们某些人的怪诞习惯。

original: I cannot stand a breathing, a sweet breathing organism, breathing in, and out, to suddenly not breathe. We must keep it alive. For study. Slow study.
translation: 达拉：我不能接受一个能呼吸的，贴心的，鲜活的小有机体忽然不再吸气，吐气了。我们得让它活着，好进行研究，慢慢地研究。

original: DALA, THESE... VOCALIZED PAUSES ARE... UNLIKE YOU. WHAT DO YOU CARE?
translation: 克莱因：达拉，你怎么…支支吾吾的…这可不像你。你到底想说什么？

original: *Klein, um - are you sure we've calculated all the combat probabilities here? I mean, the Lobotomite confronted Mobius...*
translation: O：*克莱因，唔。你肯定我们计算到了这场战斗的所有可能性？要知道，这只无脑人可是从莫比乌斯那儿活着回来了…*

original: *Plus, you know, we haven't had a C-O-M-B-A-T drill in forever. I don't think we could form a tactical attack triangle if we wanted to.*
translation: *还有，你也清楚，我们从没做过任何作-战训练。我不觉得开打后，我们能顺利组成那个战术进攻阵型。*

original: *Klein, uh... you know, this Lobotomite, it's a great sounding board. You respect Idea-ology, right? This one's... well, it's... got good ideas.*
translation: O：*克莱因，呃…你知道的，这只无脑人…向它咨询总能获得很棒的回应。你一向推崇理念学，不是吗？它…呃，它…总有很好的理念。*

original: RELEASING THE W-O-M-B-A-T WAS NOT MY PLAN, O, SO GET OFF MY VOICE BOX.
translation: 克莱因：我没考虑过让这只树-袋-熊活着。O，所以你离我的音箱远点。

original: SILENCE, DR. O. THIS IS A THINK TANK DECISION. SAVE YOUR OBJECTIONS UNTIL AFTER I HAVE DECIDED OUR COURSE OF ACTION.
translation: 克莱因：安静，O博士。这是智库的决定。在我决定了行动方案后，不要再有异议了。

original: *You know what, Klein? Stick a straw in your tank and suck yourself. Long and deep.*
translation: O：*你知道吗，克莱因？拿根吸管伸进罐子里吸自己脑浆吧你。插得越长越深越好。*

original: *And you know what, I don't like the way you say my name. Never did. It's "O," as in "O, look what I stepped in." I'm proud of it - all right?*
translation: O：*还有知道吗，我不喜欢你叫我名字的方式，一点都不喜欢。应该念"O"，就像在说“哦，看我发现了什么。”我为我的名字骄傲，好吗？*

original: *And my name is Zero - yeah, a big fat zero, with a slash through it.*
translation: O：*还有，我的名字是零——没错，又大又圆，带着斜杠的零。*

original: THE SLASH... AS A DESIGNATOR OF... WHY, THAT IS BRILLIANT. BUT HOW DID YOU...?
translation: 克莱因：用斜线…作为标识符…太妙了。但你是怎么…？

original: *The Lobotomite taught me that. Taught me a name is more than... um... that I should take pride in... things. Like... names... and...*
translation: O：*那只无脑人教会了我这些，教会了我名字不仅仅是…唔…还是我应该为之自豪的东西，比如说…名字…和…*

original: *You know what, forget it, Klein. I hate you. And your theory of brainial beam oscillation? The Chinese had it first, you copycat!*
translation: *你知道吗，别管这些了，克莱因，我讨厌你。还有你那有关脑波振荡的理论，那是中国人先搞出来的，你个无耻的剽窃者！*

original: HOW DARE YOU! BRAINIAL BEAM OSCILLATION WAS SOLELY MY DISCOVERY! I EXPRESSLY TOLD YOU THAT AND DELETED ALL EVIDENCE TO THE CONTRARY!
translation: 克莱因：放肆！脑波振荡理论完全是我的发现！而且我之前早就告诉过你，还删除了所有不利证据！

original: *Silencing opinionators.*
translation: O：*我闭嘴不代表我没意见。*
克莱因：8，怎么连你也?

original: WHY ARE YOU ACTING LIKE THIS? YOU'VE NEVER REFUSED TO COMMIT NECESSARY... SURGERY BEFORE. AND THIS LOBOTOMITE NEEDS ITS SURGERY.
translation: 你为什么会这样？你从未拒绝…进行必要的手术。现在这只无脑人就需要进行手术。

original: WHAT IS WRONG WITH YOU? YOU SOUND... BRAIN-SCRUBBED, BLINDLY AGREEING WITH THE LOBOTOMITE. WHAT...?
translation: 克莱因：你到底是哪不对劲？你听起来像是…被洗脑了一样，对那无脑人言听计从的。发生什么了…？

original: A NOBLE SPEECH, BUT... THERE IS NO ROOM IN MY VOCABULATORS FOR "FRIEND" AND "LOBOTOMITE" IN THE SAME SENTENCE. THE VERY CONCEPT - REVOLTING.
translation: 克莱因：真是精彩的辩论，可惜…我的词汇表不允许"朋友" 和"无脑人"出现在一起，这叫人反胃。

original: PERHAPS YOU ARE IRRADIATED WITH CAMARADERIE RADIATION. WE HAVE CHEMS FOR THAT, WE CAN SAVE YOU FROM YOUR EMOTIONAL... ADDICTION.
translation: 我猜你们都感染了“同志情谊”的辐射。没关系，我们有药，专治这种情感上的…瘾症。

original: -I, for one, cannot bear to let this continue.-
translation: 鲍鲁斯：-我，就我个人而言，我绝对不能容忍这种事情继续下去。-

original: -I don't see what is to be gained by throwing another body into our labs... especially one that has done us a service, gone where we feared to go.-
translation: -我看不出继续把又一个活物扔进实验室对我们有什么好处…更何况它还曾帮助过我们，前往我们惧怕的地方。-

original: -This Lobotomite doesn't deserve our knives. It deserves our respect. We should care for it. Feed it. Nurture it - give it the life Gabe never had.-
translation: -这只无脑人不应该被解剖，它值得我们尊敬。我们应该照顾它，喂养它，培育它——给它加布没能有的生活。-

original: -If I may, I feel as if I must be the voice of reason here.-
translation: 鲍鲁斯：-恕我冒昧，但这里此刻需要我理性的声音。-

original: -This Lobotomite is much like us, regarding even animals and pets as nothing more than avenues to promote Science! There is good here.-
translation: -这只无脑人和我们很像，明白动物、宠物之流只不过是科学进步的踏脚石！这点很好。-

original: -Instead of ending its life on the table, we should prolong its suffering, in the name of Science. Like good old Gabe, the FINEST of lab specimens.-
translation: -比起在手术台上结束它的生命，我们更应该延长它的痛苦，为了科学。就像亲爱的老加布，是最好的实验样本。-

original: Dr. Klein, please. Let's see what its insides look like. Finally.
translation: 达拉：克莱因博士，拜托了。让我们看看它的内部结构吧，让我如愿以偿。

original: Dr. Klein, I must... intersect. Please... do not harm the Lobotomite.
translation: 达拉：克莱因博士，我必须…打断一下。请…请不要伤害这只无脑人。

original: WHY AM I EVEN LISTENING TO YOU FOOLS? THE DETERMINATORS ARE GREATER THAN THE HESITATORS. SO HESITATORS, BE QUIET.
translation: 克莱因：我干嘛要听你们这些蠢货的话？坚定之人胜于犹豫之人。所以犹豫者们，都把嘴闭上。

original: WHY AM I EVEN LISTENING TO YOU FOOLS? ENOUGH OF THIS MUTINOUS CHORUS! IF THERE'S A WORD I HATE, IT'S "MUTINY."
translation: 克莱因：我干嘛要听你们这些蠢货的话？想合起伙来造我的反是吧！要问什么词令我最厌恶，那一定是“背叛”。

original: AND THE WORD "JISM," WHICH NEVER MADE ANY SENSE TO ME. IT'S RIDICULOUS, PUTTING "J" AND "SM" TOGETHER LIKE THAT. NONSENSE!
translation: "精液"(jism)也是，对我来说没有任何意义。荒谬的东西，把"J"和"SM"像这样组合起来，愚蠢之极！

original: I COUNT AS FIVE. LIKE THE MIGHTY HUMAN HAND I ONCE HAD, WITH ITS FIVE PENISES CLENCHED IN A FIST.
translation: 我一个就能顶五个。就像曾经我那有力的人类大手，它的五根生殖器紧握在一个拳头里。

original: WE ARE BIGGER, SMARTER, AND FLOATIER THAN YOU, LOBOTOMITE. WE DON'T WISH TO FIGHT YOU, SO SURRENDER YOUR BRAIN. NOW.
translation: 克莱因：无脑人，我们比你更强大，更智慧，更能飘浮。但我们无意与你战斗，所以，把脑子交出来，快点。

original: Mobius and I talked it over, reached an understanding.
translation: 我和莫比乌斯谈过了，而且我们达成了某些共识。

original: YOU ARE LYING. NO, YOU ARE NOT. YOUR HEARTBEAT, PERSPIRATION... ALL EXCESSIVELY CONFIDENT AND SURE OF YOURSELF.
translation: 你在撒谎。不，你没有。你的心跳，渗出的汗…证明你现在过于自信，且得意自满。

original: WHY WOULD YOU REASON WITH THAT MANIAC? HE'LL DESTROY US ALL!
translation: 你怎么能和那个疯子讲道理？他会害死我们所有人！

original: Do you think I killed Mobius?
translation: 你认为我杀了莫比乌斯？

original: YES. WAIT. YOU DID, DIDN'T YOU?
translation: 当然。等等，你是杀了他吧，难道你没有？

original: You may have noticed the pacification field is down. Guess what happens now?
translation: 你大概已经注意到平静场罢工了，猜猜看接下来会发生什么？

original: I heard one of the previous visitors to the Dome spoke to you, asked you some questions.
translation: 听说前不久有位来访者来穹顶拜访过你，还问了些问题。

original: HMM? OH YES, THE LAST VISITOR... WELL, THE ONE JUST BEFORE YOU. HAD AN INTERESTING NAME FROM SOME LANGUAGE THAT'S ALMOST UNPOSSIBLE TO SPEAK.
translation: 嗯？哦，是的，上一个拜访者…想起来了，在你之前那个。}他的名字很有趣，取自某种已经几乎没人能说的语言。

original: WHAT DID WE SPEAK ABOUT...? MELANCHOLY FELLOW, HAD QUESTIONS ABOUT... HISTORY? BUT...
translation: 我们聊了什么来着…？那个忧郁的家伙问我有关…历史的问题？但…

original: OUR CONVERSATION GOT INTERRUPTED... TWICE, I BELIEVE? ONCE WHEN THE TRAINS GOT DERAILED, AND THEN A SECOND TIME...
translation: 我们的谈话被打断了…两次，大概吧？第一次是在列车脱轨时，然后第二次…

original: ...ODDLY ENOUGH, NOW THAT I'M ACCESSING MY DATABANKS, I DON'T RECALL WHAT THE SECOND TIME WAS. MOBIUS' INCESSANT TRANSMISSIONS KEEP DISTRACTING ME.
translation: …真奇怪，我的数据库竟然检索不到第二次的记录，一定是因为莫比乌斯不停发送的信息干扰了我。

original: ALSO, WE DIDN'T BRAIN-SCRUB THE VISITOR. HE MAY HAVE LEFT WITH SOME KNOWLEDGE HE SHOULDN'T'VE. I BELIEVE. MAYBE.
translation: 而且，我们没有擦除他的记忆，因此他可能带走了一些不该带走的知识。我猜…大概。

original: OH WELL, I'M SURE IT'S OF NO CONSEQUENCE. I DON'T MAKE MANY MISTAKES IN CALCULATION OR PERCEPTION, SO PROBABILITY FAVORS ME.
translation: 哦，好吧，我肯定这无关紧要。我的演算与推测极少出错，因此，一定是因为这对我有利。

original: I can bring the Mojave, this world to you. You'll be safe, and you'll still be able to experiment.
translation: 我可以把莫哈维废土，这个世界带到你们面前。这样你不但安全，还能继续进行实验。

original: You can still do that... here, quietly, for me.
translation: 你仍可以做实验…不过得为了我，在这里，安安静静的。

original: FOR YOU? AND FOR SCIENCE?
translation: 为了你？也为了科学？

original: I HAVE A STRANGE SENSATION... THAT I WOULD LIKE THAT. HOW... ODD.
translation: 我有种奇怪的感觉…觉得自己会喜欢这样的关系，这…真古怪。

original: VERY WELL... PARTNER. THE THINK TANK IS AT YOUR SERVICE. AS LONG AS YOU DO NOT DESTROY US.
translation: 非常好…伙伴，我们会和你合作。思想体随时乐意效劳，只要你不消灭我们。

original: Are you willing to risk it?
translation: 你愿意冒这个险吗？

original: [SUCCEEDED] THAT SOUNDS LIKE SOMETHING MOBIUS WOULD SAY.
translation: [成功] 这种说话的口气确实是莫比乌斯的。

original: HOW DARE YOU BREACH THE THINK TANK? AND WHAT DO YOU WANT HERE?!
translation: 你竟敢入侵智库？你来这儿想干嘛？！

original: You FOOLS had best listen. Or MOBIUS will bring his army here, to sting you STUPID.
translation: 你们这些蠢蛋最好乖乖听话，不然莫比乌斯会派他的大军到这儿，把你们全蛰成傻子。

original: [FAILED] MOBIUS DOES NOT FORM ALLIANCES. HE WAS A TERRIBLE LAB PARTNER, AND HE WOULD MAKE A WORSE ALLY.
translation: [失败] 莫比乌斯不会和人结盟。他是个糟糕透顶的实验室搭档，更是一个糟糕的盟友。

original: He offers a deal - stay here, stay put, and he'll let you live.
translation: 他有个提议，你们乖乖待在这里，他就放你们一条生路。

original: THAT'S NO DEAL AT ALL! THERE'S A WHOLE WORLD BEYOND THE CRATER... FILLED WITH IDEAS AND POSSIBILITIES!
translation: 这件事上我们绝不会妥协！一个全新的世界就在这环形坑之外…一整个充满各种理念和可能性的世界！

original: WE COULD HAVE ESCAPED, SEEN IT ALL FOR OURSELVES. TESTED IT, PRODDED AT IT. MADE IT SQUIRM.
translation: 我们可以逃出去，亲眼目睹它的全貌，亲手测试它，刺激它，让它蠕动起来。

original: <Lie> Do you think I killed Mobius? No, he lives.
translation: <撒谎> 你以为我杀了莫比乌斯？不，他还活着。

original: YOU MUST HAVE KILLED HIM. HE WOULDN'T HAVE JUST LET YOU WALK IN, TAKE YOUR BRAIN... WOULD HE?
translation: 你肯定已经杀了他。他不会就这样放你进去，拿回你的脑子…他会么？

original: NO... SOMETHING IS WRONG. YOUR PERSPIRATION... HEARTBEAT... ALL TELL A DIFFERENT STORY, I THINK.
translation: 不…有什么不对劲。你的汗液…心跳…都在表明事情是另一个样子。

original: Science provided a way, Klein.
translation: 科学提供的是途径，克莱因。（不是目的）

original: [SUCCEEDED] YOU SPEAK THE TRUTH. AND THE DECIBEL VARIATION IN YOUR VOICE... IT IS MOBIUS.
translation: [成功] 你所言不虚。而且这种说话时的分贝变化…的确是莫比乌斯。

original: HOW DARE YOU BREACH THE THINK TANK? AND WHAT DO YOU WANT HERE?!
translation: 你竟敢入侵智库？你来这儿想干嘛？！

original: Nothing is unpossible for SCIENCE! Mesons, lasers, atoms, brainwaves... all are at MY command!
translation: 科学无所不能！介子，镭射，原子，脑波…尽在我的掌控！

original: [FAILED] "A WAY" IS CORRECT. AS IS, "AWAY." WHICH IS WHERE YOUR BODY IS GOING ONCE WE'RE DONE PEELING YOU.
translation: [失败] "一种途径(a way)"用的很好，就像在说"分离(away)"。等我们剥掉你的皮，你就真的“分离”了。

original: There's plenty of medical ways to pull off that... stunt.
translation: 许多医疗技术都能完成这一…绝技(stunt)。

original: [SUCCEEDED] YOU SPEAK THE TRUTH. AND THE DECIBEL VARIATION IN YOUR VOICE... IT IS MOBIUS.
translation: [成功]  你所言不虚。而且这种说话时的分贝变化…的确是莫比乌斯。

original: HOW DARE YOU BREACH THE THINK TANK? AND WHAT DO YOU WANT HERE?!
translation: 你竟敢入侵智库？你来这儿想干嘛？！

original: COUNTLESS brain extraction surgeries exist... but only one IMPLANTATION one - from MOBIUS!
translation: 大脑提取成功的手术数不胜数…但植入成功的却只有一例 – 来自莫比乌斯的案例！

original: [FAILED] "STUNT" IS CORRECT. AS IS, "SHUNT." WHICH YOU WILL BE INTIMATELY FAMILIAR WITH AS WE'RE DISSECTING YOU.
translation: [失败] "stunt"这词恰如其分，就像在说"分解(shunt)"，因为我们马上就要解剖你。

original: Mobius and I... we... formed an alliance. Sort of.
translation: 莫比乌斯和我…我们…结盟了，之类的。

original: [SUCCEEDED] THAT IS THE MOST INSANE THING I'VE EVER HEARD. THERE IS NO WAY MOBIUS WOULD... CONDESCEND TO STEP INSIDE YOU.
translation: [成功]这是我听过的最疯狂的事情，莫比乌斯他绝不会屈尊纡贵，寄居在你的体内。

original: BESIDES, THERE IS NO WAY SUCH A THING COULD BE ACCOMPLISHED. IT'S UNPOSSIBLE.
translation: 另外，迄今没有任何一种技术能实现这件事，这不可能办到。

original: <Lie> You think I am the Lobotomite...? No, for my skull houses the BRAIN OF MOBIUS!
translation: <撒谎> 你以为我还是原来那只无脑人吗…？你错了，现在这颅骨里装的可是莫比乌斯的脑子！

original: [FAILED] MOBIUS DOES NOT FORM ALLIANCES. HE WAS A TERRIBLE LAB PARTNER, AND HE WOULD MAKE A WORSE ALLY.
translation: [失败] 莫比乌斯不会和人结盟。他是个糟糕透顶的实验室搭档，也会是个糟糕的盟友。

original: I'm okay. Talk to you later.
translation: 我没事了，下次再聊。

original: Come back any time you want a drink. Or to get... clean.
translation: 感到口渴，或者…想清洁一下，请随时回来。
